It has 40-inch interactive TV, internet and high-quality wi-fi, and for those who want to work a little, it offers a studio with a good desk and an inspiring view. The apartment is all available to guests. I leave my guests at ease, but I am available whenever they need me. It is a typical neighborhood of Porto, where you have silence and tranquility, little traffic, no noise, but everything at hand: good restaurants and c
neighborhood_overview: It is a typical neighborhood of Porto, where you have silence and tranquility, little traffic, no noise, but everything at hand: good restaurants and cafes, shops, services and even hospital, all with total tranquility and security.
notes: The apartment is located in a strictly residential area, and silence should be kept after 10 pm. Although we love pets, here they are not welcome, not with prior consultation and approval, subject to an extra cleaning fee. No smoking in the apartment. The apartment is ideal for families and couples. It is located in a building and in a strictly residential area, and therefore requires care not to harm the other residents. So, to groups of friends who wish to rent you, I ask you to send detailed information about you, such as the name and profile of the (Hidden by Airbnb) of all travelers, and other information that allows us evaluate a suitability of the property to your needs. Thank you! Take care of the apartment and belongings with the same care that we have.
transit: The apartment is a 15-minute walk from Aliados Square and 20 minutes from downtown, the main sights and conviviality of the city. It is 3 blocks from Faria Guimarães subway station and 6 blocks from the Marquês and Constitución stations, interconnected with buses to all locations in Porto. It has easy access also to the stations Lapa and Trindade, and for those who come to Porto by train, can come directly to Faria Guimarães by the São Bento Station.
access: The apartment is all available to guests.
interaction: I leave my guests at ease, but I am available whenever they need me.

Não fumar nas dependências do apartamento.

name: Charming Spacious Park Slope Studio
summary: Spacious and inviting garden level studio apartment in townhouse with separate entrance and large kitchen located in Park Slope, very near the F and G subway and Prospect Park, and only a few steps away from 7th Avenue, with its many fine shops and restaurants.
space: The apartment is a very pleasant and comfortable place to relax after a busy day exploring New York. It is located on a quiet tree-lined block on the ground floor of the townhouse where we live. There is a separate entrance to the studio apartment, which leads into a fully furnished living room/bedroom area, with wifi, TV, books to read, music to listen to, even a guitar to strum if you’re in the mood. There is a queen sized bed as well as a futon that can convert into a very comfortable bed as well where children could sleep. The full kitchen is quite spacious, with butcher block countertops and a new dishwasher. There is a coffeemaker, toaster oven, and microwave in the kitchen, as well as other amenities like pots, pans, dishes, glasses, mugs, cutlery, soap, towels, etc. The dining room is connected to the kitchen and is also quite roomy and comfortable, with lots of light coming from the backyard; it is one of our favorite spots in the whole house. You are also welcome in warmer mo
description: Spacious and inviting garden level studio apartment in townhouse with separate entrance and large kitchen located in Park Slope, very near the F and G subway and Prospect Park, and only a few steps away from 7th Avenue, with its many fine shops and restaurants. The apartment is a very pleasant and comfortable place to relax after a busy day exploring New York. It is located on a quiet tree-lined block on the ground floor of the townhouse where we live. There is a separate entrance to the studio apartment, which leads into a fully furnished living room/bedroom area, with wifi, TV, books to read, music to listen to, even a guitar to strum if you’re in the mood. There is a queen sized bed as well as a futon that can convert into a very comfortable bed as well where children could sleep. The full kitchen is quite spacious, with butcher block countertops and a new dishwasher. There is a coffeemaker, toaster oven, and microwave in the kitchen, as well as other amenities like pots, pans, dish
neighborhood_overview: Park Slope is truly one of the best neighborhoods in New York; friendly and safe for kids and adults alike, with all sorts of conveniences, fresh air, a short and easy subway trip to the exciting bustle of Manhattan but also a pleasant escape from it at the end of a long day. We are located very close to 7th Avenue, which has all kinds of shopping. There are fine groceries such as Union Market, several good delis, some of the best bagels in New York at the Bagel Hole,etc., as well as restaurants with food from every corner of the globe, ranging from higher end fare at places like Talde to our local diner located right on the corner of the block.  Many fine coffee shops, bars and stores of every description are also only a short walk away, as is Prospect Park (located two blocks away) with its many wide open spaces and forest paths, where you can forget for a while that you are in a big city.
notes: Please, no smoking, no pets, and no parties, and please use the recycling bins.
transit: SUBWAY We are located three short blocks from the 7th Avenue subway station on the F and G lines. The F train is the easiest way to get to Manhattan, about 20 minutes from Greenwich Village, and there are easy transfer points along the F line that will get you anywhere you need to go in Manhattan. The G train does not go into Manhattan but offers easy access to Brooklyn’s Williamsburg neighborhood and locations in Queens.  BUSES The 67 and 69 buses run along 7th avenue, and the 61 bus that runs along 9th street is also very close.  TAXI There are often green or yellow NYC taxis around. The green taxis work the same as the yellow but are designated specifically to stop in Brooklyn and boroughs other than Manhattan. There are many car services in the neighborhood as well (we’ve had pretty good luck with Eastern). PARKING There is free parking on the numbered streets and metered parking on 7th Avenue. Read signs carefully for street cleaning rules.  CAR RENTAL There are many Zipcar locati
access: The apartment is located on the ground floor of our townhouse. There is a separate outdoor entrance that opens from the bottom of the stoop on the left. Once inside, there is another key which opens the door to the apartment, located immediately on your left. We infrequently use this hallway for basement access. We will either be available to hand you the keys ourselves or make other arrangements if you arrive when we are not able to be there.
interaction: We are a family of three living upstairs (with a cat who is not allowed into the rental apartment), so while we are of course busy with our daily routine, please don’t hesitate to contact us by phone, text, or e-mail if there are any problems, items missing, or other questions. If by chance you are staying while we are out of town, we will give you the contact information of someone who can help.

name: Panoramic Ocean View Studio in  Quiet Setting
summary: Luxury studio unit is located in a family-oriented neighborhood that lets you experience Hawaii like a local! with tranquility and serenity, while in close proximity to beaches and restaurants! The unit is surrounded by lush tropical vegetation! High-speed Wi-Fi available in the unit!!
space: A large, private patio (lanai) with fantastic ocean views is completely under roof and is part of the studio unit. It's a great space for eating outdoors or relaxing, while checking our the surfing action. This patio is like a living room without walls, with only a roof with lots and lots of skylights!!! We provide Wi-Fi and beach towels!
description: Luxury studio unit is located in a family-oriented neighborhood that lets you experience Hawaii like a local! with tranquility and serenity, while in close proximity to beaches and restaurants! The unit is surrounded by lush tropical vegetation! High-speed Wi-Fi available in the unit!! A large, private patio (lanai) with fantastic ocean views is completely under roof and is part of the studio unit. It's a great space for eating outdoors or relaxing, while checking our the surfing action. This patio is like a living room without walls, with only a roof with lots and lots of skylights!!! We provide Wi-Fi and beach towels! The studio is detached from the main house, which has long-term tenants upstairs and downstairs. The lower yard and the front yard are assigned to those tenants, not the studio guests. The studio has exclusive use of its large (600 sqft) patio - under roof! Check-in and check-out times other than the ones listed, are by request only and an additional charges may apply;
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is called Maunalani Heights and locals refer to it as "mountain" living because it's 5-10 degrees cooler at night than down by the beach. When it's hot at night down in Waikiki, on top of Maunalani Heights we sleep with a light summer blanket and no air conditioning!! The area is lush, residential, yet 6-8 minutes down the hill there is Waialae Ave., the "eating" district of Honolulu (called Kaimuki). Beaches are found 10 minutes away by car. There is ample street parking
notes: There is high-speed Internet and  Wi-Fi service.  There is no laundry service on the premises and for longer stays, housekeeping can be offered upon request.  The unit is in a residential, single-family neighborhood and there is lots of street parking available. Guests are welcome to park along the mock orange hedge. The setting is lush and tropical and sometimes you may come in contact with flying insects or bugs, which are part of the Hawaii eco system. For example at night, when you have the lights on, its best to keep the entry door closed; all windows have mosquito screens and we have the company Orkin under contract for pest control.
transit: Bus number 14 stops on the street, nearly in front of the house. Most guest rent cars when they come to the island.
access: The studio is detached from the main house, which has long-term tenants upstairs and downstairs. The lower yard and the front yard are assigned to those tenants, not the studio guests. The studio has exclusive use of its large (600 sqft) patio - under roof! Check-in and check-out times other than the ones listed, are by request only and an additional charges may apply; please inquire before booking. Check-in times need to be agreed with host.  In general, guests self-check-in themselves into the unit.  The day before guests' arrival, self-check-in instructions and photos are sent by host. A check-in video will be sent to your personal email shortly before your arrival. A KEURIG coffee (K-CUP) machine and coffee capsules (PODS) are provided. Barbecue unit is not shared with guests for safety reasons and only the owner has access. Best to take Sierra Dr. on the way up the hill; it has gentle switchbacks!
interaction: I will be available on the phone or via text; local manager Jhanna will be available to help with any topics that might come up. A check-in "orientation" video will be made available as soon as we have your personal email. Self-check-in instructions will be emailed the day before your arrival or as soon as the previous guests have checked-out; typically, the check in email with access codes is send after you land in Honolulu. Assisted check-in (with a person) is available upon request and for an additional fee; it is available for special situations, "just in case"! It is rarely used by our guests. Our guests find the video and the self-check-in email very helpful and sufficient.  A special message for our international guests: to coordinate the check in, we set up a group text message that includes local manager Jhanna; this is needed because Jhanna does not have access to Airbnb. We can use popular texting applications and we will ask you which one you prefer. It is advisable to have
house_rules: Although the studio is in relatively close proximity to the main house - which is occupied by separate people on each of its two levels - and the next-door neighbors, it enjoys lots of sound and visual privacy – it is basically extremely quiet at all times.!!! The studio guests are requested to behave respectfully, in order to provide the same level of privacy to the people around them. No visitors are allowed on the premises at any time; No smoking, pets, loud music please!!  The hallway door, which affords privacy to your patio, needs to be kept closed at all times; if left open, the wind will slam the door shut and create noise and possible damage to the door. Early check in and late check out by request only; unless owner or Jhanna can accommodate such requests, please observe 3 pm check in and 10 am check times.

name: Colonial Mansion in Santa Teresa
summary: A beautiful colonial mansion for office or residential rental/lease/sale - set in a peaceful area of Santa Teresa - perfect for a family/business team coming to Rio for business or pleasure. Ideal center for live-in studio accommodation, with five bedrooms and three bathrooms.
space: Built before the turn of the century, this fully-renovated historical landmark mansion located in the artistic Santa Teresa neighborhood offers a variety of rooms suited for the traveler seeking an authentic Carioca experience! GREAT LOCATION  This colonial mansion is located close to the heart of the city and walking distance to bus lines and the Gloria metro station for convenient access to all the major tourist hotspots of Rio. Public transportation can be accessed nearly 24hrs a day. Ipanema and Copacabana beaches are only 15 minutes away by taxi and can be easily reached via public transportation as well. Lapa, the famous bohemian nightlife scene, is only a 15min walk away. Some of the most famous sights in Rio are only minutes away from the house - the art collector Raimundo Otoni Castro May's Chácara do Céu mansion, Parque das Ruinas, Lapa's nightlife, and Chilean-born artist Jorge Selarón's famous tiled steps. Supermarkets, coffee shops and lounges are all located nearby as wel

name: Asia House, Garden Room, Princevile
summary: Asia House, sits on an ocean bluff in Princeville on the spectacular north shore of Kauai. The ocean or Queen's Bath is right across the street. There are beaches all over Princeville, all within 1-2 miles or less. Princeville Resort is a jewel on Hanalei Bay, known as one of the most beautiful bays and beaches in the world. This location is very quiet. Kauai has it all... spectacular scenery, gracious people, bird-watching, whale watching, snorkeling, diving, golfing, hiking, and more.
space: This private Garden Studio, with separate entrance, is fully furnished and has a Queen bed, cable TV, and WIFI.   There is a small kitchenette with a full refrigerator, microwave, dishes, pots and pans, blender, coffee pot, toaster oven, and more. It also includes linens, beach towels, and beach chairs.   Guests are welcome to use my kitchen for more extensive cooking. LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION.  We are within walking distance of two of the highest rated beaches in the world, Hideaways, and also across the street is famous Queen's Bath. It is a natural lava pool.The studio  is also a short distance to many breathtakingly beautiful beaches, 2 world famous golf courses, tennis courts, 2 world class resorts, a shopping center, beautiful walking paths, and many five star restaurants with spectacular views overlooking beautiful Hanalei Bay.   There are gardens, ponds, flowers, fruit trees, and lawn area that you are free to enjoy as well as a small garden patio with table and chairs.  Yo

We are within walking distance of two of the highest rated beaches in the world, Hideaways, and also acro
neighborhood_overview: Princeville is a development of some 500 acres on the north shore of Kauai, between the towns of Hanalei and Kilauea. What started as a coffee plantation in the mid-1800s is now the largest planned development on Kauai. Princeville is home to some of the finest resorts, golf courses and restaurants on the islands. Kauai’s north shore is also where you’ll find some of the most spectacular scenery in Hawaii. There are three main beaches in Princeville, which are Kenomene Beach, Kaweonui Beach and Puu Poa Beach. A wide reef along these beaches creates warm pockets for swimming and snorkeling in calm weather. Other area activities include tennis, golf, windsurfing, kayaking, fishing, sailing, helicopter tours and shopping. You can arrange for a private guided jungle hike, waterfall excursion or kayaking adventure.
notes: The pool and hot tub are available for your use until 9 pm.  Sorry no pets or smoking.
transit: The Kauai Bus is just about one mile away at the shopping center.
access: There are gardens, ponds, flowers, fruit trees, and lawn area that you are free to enjoy as well as a small garden patio with table and chairs. Other amenities include BBQ, pool, hot tub, and parking.
interaction: We love meeting our guests and hearing about their lives and other travels, but they are free as well to enjoy as much seclusion and privacy as they wish.
house_rules: Here are a few things that may be helpful to your stay. Please do not leave fan or lights on when you are not in residence. As in all resorts, no towels on balcony railing but on chairs is fine. Also observe Hawaiian tradition of "no shoes" in house. No loud noise or music after 9pm.  Please rinse beach items off after use by patio shower. Please use rags under kitchen or bath sink to clean off Kauai red dirt (not bath or beach towels!). Do not take bath towels to the beach. AT&T phones get poor service here. WiFi available.  Queen's Bath is right across the street. It is a natural volcanic lava pool. Please observe the warning signs at the top of the path. Always keep an eye on the ocean and stay off wet rocks as that means waves have broken over them. Also the path can be slippery when wet.  The pool and hot tub are for your pleasure from 9am - 9pm.  Do not park overnight on the grass. It is against Princeville rules.  Please tell us if you have a concern. Often things can be easily

name: Apart-hotel w/ Wonderful Ocean View - 2 bedrooms!!

A 2 bedroom aptm. in front of Barra da Tijuca´s beach, fully equipped and with excellent facilities in the building. * Ocean front balcony with hammock and breakfast table; * Bedroom suite with ocean view; * Great beds and shower; * Security and Reception 24 hrs; * Supermarket under the building; * Close to bars and restaurants * Easy access to the rest of the city; * Swimming pool with sea view and bar service; *Buffet restaurant; * Parking;
space: You can sleep to the sound of the waves from any of the bedrooms. It is a fully equiped apartament, ready to host a family or up to 5 friends travelling together. Reception and security  are 24/7. The building has 2 swimming pools (1 for children),  2 restaurants and 1 supermarket (please go have breakfast there and eat their pizza. its really good, no kidding), gym, beauty salon... Cozy like home, prepared like a hotel!

neighborhood_overview: Barra da Tijuca is probably the most modern neighborhood in Rio de Janeiro. Barra will host most of the olimpic´s games in 2016 and is ready for tourists from all over the world. The beach is ideal for swimming, surfing, kite surfing or just sun bathing. There is a great gastronomy, bar options and nightlife so you don´t really need to leave the area if you don´t want, but of course if you want to visit the rest of the city you can easily reach "Zona Sul" (where Ipanema, Copacabana, Leblon, Sugar Loaf and Christ the Redeemer are) by bus or by cab.
transit: As long as you avoid traffic time, going in and out of Barra da Tijuca is very simple.
access: Reception and security  are 24/7.
interaction: I speak english, french, spanish and italian and will be happy to assist you with anything you might need.
house_rules: Smoking is allowed only in the balconies. Please use the bathers entrance to wash your feet and remove the sand before entering in the apartment. Additional guests are not allowed.

name: Bright Inner West Terrace Value+
space: Come and stay in wonderful Petersham! This amazing and large terrace house is located only minutes from the train and buses that will have you in the heart of the city within 15 minutes.  The room is a large and sunny double room, located on the first floor of a renovated terrace overlooking the garden. You will have a private and relaxed stay. The room is perfect for a couple or single and is easily accessible to the shared bathroom. We are very close to public transport (and even a pub next door) but it is quiet and relaxed so no need to worry about noisy trains waking you up at night!). We are a short walk away from Leichhardt which is Sydney's amazing Italian dinning and entertainment precinct. On the other side of the railway line is Petersham's famous Portuguese dining strip. Glebe, Balmain and Rozelle markets are a short bus trip away. This is a lovely and safe area to walk around at any time of day or night. The streets are quintessentially Sydney with a real mix of architectur

neighborhood_overview: What you will see: The crowds flowing from Taksim Square tend to sweep visitors onto İstiklâl Caddesi; the cars and kebab shops that line the top of Sıraselviler Caddesi, one street to the left of the famous pedestrian thoroughfare. Just out of sight is one of the most attractive parts of Istanbul. After a couple of minutes’ walk from Taksim, its arrival is heralded by a great old-fashioned Istanbul patisserie, Savoy. Across the street and down the stairs is Otto, a fashionable café/bar in a shady tree-filled courtyard. A little further along is Pilot, a pioneering contemporary art space housed in a converted 1970s nightclub. Opposite is a square with the pastel-green Firuz Ağa Mosque and a few cafés that are always busy, including two where you strictly drink tea, lovingly known to the locals as the Cihangir çay bahçesi. Also try Firuz and Kardeşler Kebap. Opposite these, you’ll find a branch of Selim Usta’s Tarihi Sultanahmet Köftecisi, an Old City institution. But for the indigenous

name: Renovated Classic Design Studio with Sun Room
summary: Take in the regal elegance of this classic design studio set in a renovated former piano academy and factory. Discover a downtown getaway featuring original ornate finishes, custom made furniture, colorful decor, and a sun room.
space: Experience the historic charm and romance of the 1900’s combined with modern amenities of today in this magnificent apartment. Meticulously renovated in 2016 and decorated with great taste by a renowned Interior Designer and Architect.l All the furniture has been costume made with the time period in mind allowing for the perfect combination of new and old. Ornate stucco ceilings created by artisans and restored preserving their originality. The spacious apartment features a renovated bathroom with shower, enclosed balcony, closet and spacious dining/living room with plush carpeting. The bedroom is equipped with a safe box, the modern kitchen is equipped with all basic appliances: Fridge, oven, microwave, Toaster, Nespresso Machine, Tea Kettle, ceramic cooktop, cooking and serving utensils, fine crystal and cutlery for your self-catering. Super comfortable mattress and soft designer bedding. Lacoste towels, slippers and amenities are provided for your enjoyment.
description: Take in the regal elegance of this classic design studio set in a renovated former piano academy and factory. Discover a downtown getaway featuring original ornate finishes, custom made furniture, colorful decor, and a sun room.
neighborhood_overview: The area is home to historic sites, theaters, entertainment venues, bars, restaurants, and cafes.
notes: The apartment is located in one of the most trendy but quite and family oriented areas in Porto, near the Faculty of Belas Artes, The avenue is lined by beautiful small palaces and exotic gardens, designed by internationally renowned architects, where the elite and wealthy lived during the early 18th century. This studio offers recent customizations, beautiful new wood flooring, modern bathroom fixtures, and restored high ceilings displaying antique chandeliers. It is only a few minutes from the main tourist attractions. This spacious apartment (46 m2) features a very comfortable bed (Size: 150 cm width x 190 cm length) and a memory foam mattress Sofa bed suitable for 1: Size 158 cm width x 160 cm length)
transit: The neighborhood is very typical with plenty of history between the University of Fine Arts (Faculdade de belas artes), S. Lazaro Garden (Jardim de São Lázaro) the oldest in the city, the Municipal Library (Biblioteca Municipal). Parking space is easy just front door (paid) or we can provide underground park for 7.5€ per day. Various transport links nearby.  The closest  are: São Bento Train Station (0.9 km) Sao Bento Metro Station (1 km) , Heroismo Metro Station (0.5 km), Bolhão Metro Station (0.8 km),  18 minutes drive to the Airport, Campo 24 de Agosto Metro Station is 400 meters away. Campanhã train station it is 1.1km away. Shopping malls, commercial areas and amazing nightlife spots such as Galerias Paris which is the main one.  Historical and popular landmarks like Oporto Coliseum "Coliseu do Porto" (0.6 km), Luis I Bridge (01.1 km), Church of Santo Ildefonso (0.7 km), Bolhão City Market  (0.8 km) and the the iconic Clerigos Tower, Lellos Bookstore are easy walking distance. name: Trendy apartment in BCN centre
space: This is a brand new apartment that was completly refurbished. Is located in the very centre of Barcelona (L'eixample district).  The area is very quiet, safe and perfect for a holiday break, because even when you can reach the luxury Avenue Passeig the Gracia within 3 metro stops, you´ll be still experiencing the real Barcelona style life. The Paseig the Gràcia area offers all it's modernist architecture, the tàpies foundation, and luxury shops, restaurants and cafes. A few minutes away from it, you'll be in Plaza Catalunya, the neuralgic nerve of Barcelona. The apartment is sorrounded by all sort of shops such as supers, pharmacies, coffe stores and restaurants. It has a huge terrace with amazing views of the city. The kitchen is fully equiped and linen and towels are provided. This is a great option for families and couples. It's also equiped with high speed wi fi and TV For further info don't hesitate in asking! ;) Check-in after 21:00 has an extra fee of 30€.

house_rules: - Keep noise levels down and after 21:00 there is a no noise policy - Please throw your garbage in the street after 20:00 - Smoking is allowed on the terrace but not inside - Bathroom and shower are shared with other guests in the house and the housekeeper/cleaning lady cleans both every day. - No friends or extra guests that have not been notified of can enter the flat - Late check in fee payable ONLY in cash at the check in is 20 euro from 21:00 - 23:00 and 40 euro from 23:00 till late... - It's very important to arrange your check-in time as soon as possible and to communicate the flight number/code. - Children are counted as an extra person please include them when booking - Keys : Getting keys cut in Barcelona can be expensive. We understand accidents happen, but should they get lost or you forget to give them back at the end of your stay, you will be charged 50€ to replace them.  -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

name: well lit East Williamsburg apt.
summary: First word to describe when you walk into the space is ZEN. Spacious, peaceful, roof top, large kitchen, turntable. Has a great record shop, yoga studio, top notch cocktail bar. Close to the L,J, and M trains. Very welcoming neighborhood vibe.

name: Spacious 2 Bedroom: Soho/Escalator
summary: Bright and spacious two bedroom apartment located in Soho along the famous HK escalator.  Numerous restaurants, cafes and bars (including the Lan Kwai Fong district) are only minutes away on foot. All comforts are provided including clean sheets, towels, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, hair dryer, laundry, hand soap, full kitchen amenities and wifi.
space: We will accommodate a maximum of 5 guests including kids/children (this does not include infants). Four guests fit most comfortably here so guest five will be charged $100HKD/night.  The master bedroom (2 guests) includes a queen size bed, new mattress, blackout curtains and a large closet.  The second bedroom (2-3 guests) has a double bed with a new mattress and a twin size sofa bed (also new!). We also have two travel cots available, a baby bathtub and highchair for guests with infants. Beds are super comfy and the shower is amazing.  We know you will be comfortable here. We ask that you do not use more bed linens or towels other than what has been provided for you. This may result in an extra charge for laundry. Please ask if you need more. We also have a high grade water filter installed in the kitchen. Hong Kong water is safe to drink and this water filter makes it even more so. Try to use less plastic and drink the tap water.
description: Bright and spacious two bedroom apartment located in Soho along the famous HK escalator.  Numerous restaurants, cafes and bars (including the Lan Kwai Fong district) are only minutes away on foot. All comforts are provided including clean sheets, towels, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, hair dryer, laundry, hand soap, full kitchen amenities and wifi. We will accommodate a maximum of 5 guests including kids/children (this does not include infants). Four guests fit most comfortably here so guest five will be charged $100HKD/night.  The master bedroom (2 guests) includes a queen size bed, new mattress, blackout curtains and a large closet.  The second bedroom (2-3 guests) has a double bed with a new mattress and a twin size sofa bed (also new!). We also have two travel cots available, a baby bathtub and highchair for guests with infants. Beds are super comfy and the shower is amazing.  We know you will be comfortable here. We ask that you do not use more bed linens or towels other than wh
neighborhood_overview: Our Soho neighbourhood is an exciting place to be.  Be sure to check out amazing deals on lunch specials and happy hours.  We've also left you a Super Mondays card which gets you 2 for 1 dinner entrees at a number of restaurants in the neighbourhood on Monday evenings.  Details are in the information binder.
notes: Please be quiet and respect our neighbours. Particularly when you are in the hallway coming and going. This is not a hotel! This is a residential building. Please also keep the place tidy and clean up after yourself. There is a larger garbage/rubbish bin in the hallway stairwell and extra garbage bags under the sink. If you want to recycle, you can take recyclables one escalator down to the separation bins.
transit: The Airport Express direct from the airport arrives at Hong Kong Station, which is only a 15-20 minute walk along the Shelley Street escalator to our place.  This escalator goes up the hill from 10am to 12 midnight and down the hill for morning rush hour between 6am and 10am.  If you have lots of luggage you may prefer to take a taxi from Hong Kong Station, which is about $40HKD.  The Airport Express costs $100HKD/person and a taxi direct from the airport is about $350HKD.   If you are arriving by train from China you will arrive at Central Station. This is also a 15-20 minute walk along the escalator or a $40HKD taxi ride. There's also big buses and minibuses that run along our road.  Let me know if you have any questions on getting around HK.  I'm happy to help!
access: The building has a 24 hour doorman with key-less key pad entry on both the downstairs door and apartment door.  Codes are changed regularly.
interaction: Key-less key pad entry makes this place super easy to enter.  A binder with detailed instructions on wifi, TV and other important information is provided.  I am always available by message on Airbnb.
house_rules: We're sure you will have a wonderful stay in this very exciting neighbourhood.  Although our walls are pretty thick, please respect our neighbours and be quiet, particularly when you are in the hallway coming and going. Please do not use linens and towels other than what are provided for you. This may incur an additional charge for laundry services. Please also keep the place clean and tidy. There is a large garbage/rubbish bin in the stairwell. Extra garbage bags are under the sink. If you would like to recycle, you can take recyclables down one escalator to the seperation bins.

name: Spacious 3bdrm. Artsy and Perfect Location!
summary: Welcome to stay in my 3bed apartment. Its a rare gem in HK,  as its Huge compared to other Hk apts! Perfect for a few friends sharing or a family. Walk everywhere in Central in  few min. Soho, Escalator, Hollywood road, MTR. It’s walk up building! please check my profile, I have many reviews :)
space: Its a classic central hong kong style building. It is an older style building and apartment, an old touch of Hong Kong history and character.  I've added all my favourite artistic touches and light fixtures  to make it more modern and cosy. The place is white and grey with light wooden floors. This place is very large for hk around 1000 sqft! Its perfect for sharing and everyone can have their own room :) The large size reflects the character of its time, spaces were large back then and now modern HK apartments are very small and cramped.  **Please note: There is NO elevator. It's a walk up building to 4th floor.** The Bathroom set up is interesting, there are 2 rooms w toilets.  I have designated one as the wet Room / shower room and the other as the toilet room. This way the toilet doesn't necessarily need to get wet. Unless you choose to use the toilet in shower room :)

neighborhood_overview: Super location for tourists, you can walk to most places within minutes  5 min to Lan kwai fong  5 min to sheung wan Mtr 5 min to SOHO 5 min to Escalators 10 min to Central Mtr  15 min to IFC
notes: **Please note: There is NO elevator. It's a walk up building to 4th floor.** *** They are doing some construction in the building's stairway right now, so it may be dusty and have some stuff like ladders in the hall. sorry about the inconvenience but don't worry if the apartment is perfectly fine and ready for your arrival :) *** In Hong Kong there is always construction going on. Its hard to avoid so you most likely will  hear  construction / street noise in the apartment during the day. The heater for shower needs to be turned on to heat up about 10 min before using, and please turn it off after :) Kitchen has the basics, such as stove burner, kettle, toaster, coffee maker, fridge, pots and pans, utensils and more. Please note we don't use a microwave, so there is no microwave. No smoking-200 fine  Lost keys- 200 replacement fee
interaction: I give my guests privacy but I'm always available for any questions or if anyone needs suggestions :)
house_rules: No parties or loud music after 10 No smoking inside  Take care of my place as ur own  Be nice and respectful to the neighbours around :)

name: Big Private BR Steps to Barnard Columbia & Subways
summary: This listing is for a large, comfy private BR in a quiet, sun-filled apartment on  a high floor in a safe, friendly pre-war elevator building in the heart of Morningside Heights. You will be just steps from Columbia and Barnard Universities and a few blocks from the Manhattan School of Music, Jewish and Union Theological Seminaries, and Riverside, Morningside and Central Parks. With high-speed wifi, cable TV, printer, dishwasher, microwave, a/c, 24-hour laundry room and evening doorman
space: This is a peaceful apartment with all the comforts of home.  It is a perfect size for traveling couples or individuals, students or professionals, who are looking for a quiet and comfortable place near any of the nearby schools or a welcoming home base for their city vacation experience. There is a queen-sized bed in the private bedroom (it's not a pull out couch, despite what it looks like in the pictures; I built a frame off of the couch and put an extra comfy queen mattress on top of it). The room overlooks a quiet courtyard from a high floor. It also has a desk, air conditioner, ceiling fan, cable TV, printer and a classic New York view of building tops and water towers The kitchen is fully equipped for cooking and is sunny and bright all day long, making it very comfortable to cook, work or just hang out in. The bathroom has classic pre-war fixtures, a large tub, strong water pressure and  hot water 24/7.
description: This listing is for a large, comfy private BR in a quiet, sun-filled apartment on  a high floor in a safe, friendly pre-war elevator building in the heart of Morningside Heights. The room ove
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in Morningside Heights, a picturesque neighborhood just north of Manhattan's Upper West Side. It is just across the street from Columbia's historic campus and less than a block away from the beautiful and green Riverside Park, a great place for a relaxing stroll, jog or bike ride along the Hudson River. It's also walking distance from Harlem, Central Park, and the Upper West Side. The neighborhood is also home to Barnard College, Grant's Tomb, Riverside Church, The Cathedral of St. John the Divine, Morningside Park, and an assortment of great restaurants, cafes, diners, book shops, and stores and shops of every kind. Morningside Heights is simultaneously vibrant and low-key, an area that many say is one of the few remaining genuinely 'neighborly' neighborhoods in NYC - a great place to stay when visiting the city.
notes: 5% discount for stays of 1 week or more 10% discount for stays of 1 month or more 20% discount for stays of 3 months or more
transit: The 1 train is just two blocks away and the 2/3 express trains are only 2 stops away; all of them quickly connect to Times Square where almost all the other subway lines stop too. There is also frequent bus service in the neighborhood, with direct service to and from LaGuardia Airport for the same cost as a subway ride.
access: There's a brand new laundry room in the basement, and you will also have access to the building's courtyard with a sitting area and basketball hoop
interaction: I will be here sharing the apartment in another private bedroom and am happy to interact as much or as little as you like. You will have your own set of keys and  direct access to the front door of the apartment and your bedroom, so you can come and go as much as you please at any hour without disturbing me and I can do the same without disturbing you.
house_rules: Additional guest fees apply.  Minimum stay of 3 nights if booking Friday or Saturday.  Long-term stays welcome Please be respectful of my neighbors and my living space Thanks

name: Artist Garden Duplex Ft. Greene - 2.5 Bedroom
summary: Beautifully renovated Brownstone garden duplex - BEST BLOCK in Ft. Greene (S Portland Ave). High end renovation: full kitchen, private entrance, master bedroom with Queen bed, glass partition, study (extra bed - the "half bedroom"), glass doors to patio/garden. Living room sofa opens to Queen. Cellar: TV room, extra sleep quarters (3 twins or  king), bath w shower . Perfect for 1 - 2 couples or families.  5 minutes to BAM, subways, restaurants, park, farmer's market. Superb base for NY vacation.
space: Gorgeous brownstone garden duplex (private entrance) on best block - sleeps 8. Main floor comfortably sleeps 4: 1 queen in master bedroom, queen sleeper sofa in living room with luxurious high end kitchen and bathroom.  Cellar TV room has two regular twins that fit together to make a king bed (I add a foam strip to fill the gap between the two twins and belt the two mattresses together so they don't come apart when made into a king) and two extra long twin futons that sit on the floor;  full bathroom with tub and shower. Note: This is not a conventional 3 bedroom! Some guests prefer placing a futon in the extension and using it as another bedroom. This can work great with kids. The entrance to the bathroom is through the master bedroom so from the extension, you walk through the master bedroom to get to the kitchen or bathroom. Full backyard garden (gorgeous woodland feel - cool and shaded in summer) with BBQ and private patio.  Please read "Other things to note" below! The house is be

neighborhood_overview: Ft Greene is a fabulous neighborhood, accessible to everything. People love living in this part of NYC. My house is on what is considered the "the best block," most central with elegant brownstones, Sycamores. Within just a couple blocks is the neighborhood park with playground , farmer's market, flea market, Brooklyn Academy of Music (dance, theater, movies, concerts), restaurants and cafes. Check out from NY Times real estate section - a promo piece: (URL HIDDEN)
notes: We provide all linens (high quality) you require and we'll make up the master bed and the twins in the cellar but leave the other beds for you to make up (in case you want to set up the sofa as a bed each night). Linens for the sofa queen, twins and king including mattress pads are located in the plastic storage cases under the cellar stairs. Extra towels and pillows can be found in the closets in the master bedroom and the bathroom vanity in the cellar. When you leave, please clean your dishes and put them away. Thank you!
transit: You will not find a better location to stay in Brooklyn.  You can easily go anywhere by subway within minutes of the house. Time to the Financial District: 15 - 20 minutes; to Penn Station and Time Square: 30 minutes; Upper East or Upper West Side: 40 minutes. The house is 1 1/2 blocks to the C and G, 5 minutes to both the Atlantic Avenue (2, 3, 4, 5, N, R, Q, D) and DeKalb (B, Q, N, R) subway stations and the LIRR.
access: The duplex is for your use alone, with a private entrance under the stoop.  If you have a late afternoon or evening flight, you can stay in the apartment until you need to leave if no one has booked it. Otherwise, you can leave your luggage upstairs with me and collect it when its time to go to the airport. Just ask and we'll arrange! KEY: The key to the apartment is a medico key. Because so many guests have left without returning a key to me, I now have to charge $10 to replace it so please take care not to loose it. I typically provide two keys.
interaction: I'm happy to help either before you arrive or once you are here! I live upstairs and own the Brownstone.
house_rules: The house can't accept pets and no smoking except outside. No extra guests.

name: Designer Apartment in Sheung Wan
summary: We live in a beautiful and spacious one bedroom apartment in the heart of Sheung Wan.  Lots of natural light and an open view over trees on Hollywood Road and the Man Mo Temple. We are close enough to the action whilst still being in a quiet spot, a rare find!
description: We live in a beautiful and spacious one bedroom apartment in the heart of Sheung Wan.  Lots of natural light and an open view over trees on Hollywood Road and the Man Mo Temple. We are close enough to the action whilst still being in a quiet spot, a rare find! Often described as the new SOHO, there are chic coffee shops and international gourmet restaurants as well as small street side dai pai dongs, up market boutiques and antique shops as well as traditional Chinese medicine and dried food shops – the best of both worlds where old meets new. The area is well served by minibuses, City Bus, taxis, and the old style Hong Kong tram. The MTR is a two minute walk from the flat. Many bus routes run along Des Voeux Road and Queens Road West and though many streets are too steep or narrow for buses, some minibus routes travel through the upper streets.

name: Private Cozy Bedroom in Brooklyn
summary: Your private room is located in our family's lovely 3-bedroom condo, a welcoming space for you to call home while enjoying all that New York's five boroughs have to offer. We are artists and students of culture and will be happy to help with recommendations during your stay. We also have another bedroom listing with more space: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/135393?s=8&user_id=663764&ref_device_id=834476da76042c7d3d85486a5eaac86e8cc4de3b
space: To yourself, you'll have a cozy room furnished with a comfortable and adjustable Ikea bed that pulls out from a twin to become a double. Your room also has a small refrigerator/freezer. yay! Clean sheets, blankets, pillows, and shampoo/conditioner are provided, as well as fresh towels and some closet space. (There are no additional charges for these items.) (Note: When set-up as a double, the bed will take up most of the space in the room, though you may push it back into a twin for more space during the day.)  We provide you with your own set of house keys, including for your private room.  We don't impose a curfew so you're welcome to come and go as you like -- make yourself at home! There is one bathroom in the unit with a sink, toilet, and shower/tub to be used by all.  While communication about timing for the use of the bathroom for morning and evening schedules is always beneficial, we have never had any issues sharing this space with guests. We are artists and students of culture and will be happy to help with recommendations during your stay. Your room also has a small refrigerator/freezer. yay! Clean sheets, blankets, pillows, and shampoo/conditioner are provided, as well as fresh towels and some closet space. (There are no additional charges for these items.) (Note: When set-up as a double, the bed will take up most of the space in the room, though you may push it back into a twin for more space during the day.)  We provide you with your own set of house k
neighborhood_overview: Please check our Guidebook to see recommendations for places to visit in our neighborhood!
notes: PLEASE NOTE: when the Ikea day bed is pulled out into a double there is a weight limit of 225lbs per person. ADDITIONALLY: We have another private bedroom in our home also listed on Airbnb. We verify all our guests through the site and guests will have keys to lock their bedroom doors. We find most guests rarely meet as everyone is out seeing the city! If you are interested in checking out our other room, please use the following link: https://airbnb.com/rooms/135393?s=8&user_id=663764&ref_device_id=834476da76042c7d3d85486a5eaac86e8cc4de3b
transit: Our apartment is one block away from the 2 and 5 express subway lines, which can take you to Downtown Manhattan (Battery Park, Wall St, etc) in 20-25 minutes, to Mid-town Manhattan in 30-40 min, and to many of Brooklyn's best sites in just 10-15 minutes. (Note: directions will be provided by AirBnb on the itinerary you are sent following booking.)
access: Our home includes: - high-speed Wi-Fi - large washer & dryer - bathtub/shower - fully-equipped kitchen - living & dining room - Apple TV with Hulu, Netflix, & HBO - library of books and vast movie & music collection - hardwood floors throughout
interaction: We have been hosting on Airbnb since 2011 and have really enjoyed sharing our home with visitors from other cities and countries   Since we don't travel as much now that we have children we love that people from all over bring the flavors of their culture into our home when they come to stay with us.  ;) We are friendly and would be happy to share our love of New York with you during your stay. With our backgrounds as a licensed NYC tour guide and a member of multiple theatrical and performance unions, as well as our own general passions and interests, we are very knowledgeable about theatre, film, jazz, art and science museums, public parks, historical and cultural landmarks and other ins-and-outs about the city, and we would be glad to give you tips on (for example) standby tickets for The Book of Mormon, the best options for Monday night jazz, or how to get discounted entry to the Met and other museums. If our schedules allow and guests have an interest, we welcome conversation over
house_rules: Our apt is 2k. When you arrive, buzz 2k from the lobby! Once inside the apartment, please take off your shoes and leave them by the front door. Whenever you leave our home or return, please lock the front door behind you.  Our home is strictly non-smoking.  Please do not take any showers between 645am and 745am as we need to get in and out of the bathroom to get kids off to school.  If you are using the AC in your room, just make sure and turn it off when leaving for the day. (Unless you'll only be gone a short while. It's just too expensive to cool an empty room!) Also, please turn off lights in your room if you are leaving for a significant amount of time. If you would like to use the washer and dryer, please talk to me first. Our washer uses concentrated soap and the dryer filter needs to be changed before each load. Let me show you the basics (soap, filter, etc.) It'll be quick and easy. ;) (Here's a suggestion, Not a rule ;) If you arrive into JFK or LGA, take a cab not an Uber. U

name: Aquilla House - Ocean Views Newport
space: Enjoy breathtaking Newport Beach and ocean views from   every room except the bathrooms of this beautiful, family home. Positioned overlooking the stunning Pacific Ocean, with a south easterly aspect, this relaxed family home is perfect for a holiday escape!  Ideal for both family and entertaining, set against inspiring ocean and Newport Village views, only a 5 minute short walk to the beach via steps leading down from the garden.  > Four bedrooms, two bathrooms; two bedrooms and one bathroom on each level with level access to entrance.  > Spacious open plan living and dining, polished timber floors, open fireplace.  > Stunning gourmet kitchen features large preparation island, European appliances and professional Ilve oven and gas range hob.  > Open plan lounge and dining leads to an expansive deck with sweeping 180 degree views of the Pacific Ocean via bi-fold doors..  >  Landscaped, tiered ocean view garden with in-ground trampoline at the front for the kids.   > Fully equipped with

name: Quarto de Casal em Ipanema
summary: Ideal para hóspedes do mundo todo que buscam um lugar para poderem descansar e se socializarem depois de um longo dia na Cidade Maravilhosa.
space: Um lugar calmo e descontraído, onde você poderá interagir com outras pessoas e compartilhar a experiência de estar visitando o Rio. O apartamento fica na principal rua de Ipanema, a poucos passos da incrível Praia de Ipanema e próximo às famosas Praias de Copacabana e do Leblon.  Ele fica na zona de comércio do bairro, entre a Rua Farme de Amoedo e a Rua Texeira de Melo, onde também há grande variedade de bares e restaurantes nos arredores. Tudo acessível a pé. neighborhood_overview: Ipanema é um dos lugares mais especiais do Rio de Janeiro. Um paraíso, que mistura a vida urbana e belezas naturais. É cercado por praia e possui os melhores restaurantes e bares.
transit: O apartamento fica a menos de uma quadra da estação de metrô General Osório e fica em frente a um ponto de ônibus. Táxis e carros do Uber e outros aplicativos são acessíveis à nossa porta. Uma dica é se registrar no aplicativo BikeRio, por meio do qual você poderá utilizar as "city bikes" para se locomover para onde quiser. O carioca é adepto ao uso da bicicleta, uma forma saudável e rápida de locomoção na cidade.

neighborhood_overview: Neighborhood is a diverse culture/eclectic with townhouses, apartment buildings, places for eating, bars, banking, and supermarket. There is major construction around the neighborhood and new construction next door.  Unfortunately, due to construction with digging/breaking ground, we have unfriendly critters (rodents) popping up in the late hours in the streets/subways.  We Brooklynites can't wait till beautifying the neighborhood, especially on our block is completed.  This is just an FYI.
notes: IMPORTAN (Website hidden by Airbnb) The Queen Size bed is a Select Comfort Bed - The mattress is controlled (by remote) for a soft or hard feel "your choice comfort", every guest choice is personal.  -     The neighborhood is quiet at night, much traffic during the day which could be noisy due to buses and delivery trucks (not totally distracting unless you are super noise sensitive, there are earplugs).  Presently, there is construction on the block from homes being renovated or built so construction crew starts to work as early as 8 a.m.  -    Just an FYI...     --   Please note the nightly booking rate is for two people.  If a confirmed booking is for one person, any additional person checking in after confirmed booking will have to pay a nightly rate per person upon request.   -    Airconditioner is in the apartment (utilized summer dates June 1 until Sept 30) unless extremely hot, want to make you comfortable, controlled by remote. ALSO, NOTIFY HOST WITH YOUR DEPARTURE TIME - PLEASE DO NOT LEAVE WITHOUT NOTICE.  Departing after check out time (noon) will incur the daily rate.

name: Makai Hideaway
summary: This house is a hidden treasure. It is located one hour south of Kona and 65 miles  from Volcano National Park. It has fantastic ocean views and a wonderful deck.House is on an old lava flow -shop before you come as nearest  store is  22  minutes away!  12  minutes off highway 11 descend a curvy road with phenomenal ocean views.I think it's one of the best views on the island! Our house is 600 feet from the ocean! Walk to snorkeling/swimming hole in 3 minutes! There isn't a beach right by house.
space: A Hideaway quiet and peaceful, set in an authentic fishing village. Unwind and relax from city life and packaged vacations. Three bedroom, three baths, and game room. A large Lanai runs the length of the house for dolphin and whale watching. Have dinner on a beautiful Lanai and watch the incredible sunsets enjoy the warm climate with cool coastal breezes. One and half blocks to water access for swimming, snorkeling, kayaking, scuba diving and fishing. There are kayaks and boogie boards ... at the house. The Milolii area is famous for deep sea fishing, and you can watch the fishing boats or go out yourself.Whales frequent Papa bay from December  through mid- March.The beautiful secluded Honomolino Beach is close by-short walk along the coast from Milolii State Park-watch the spinner dolphins, snorkel with the fish in the coral, and maybe see a sea turtle or a rare Hawaiian monk seal. There are wild goats over on Umi street and the king's hiking trails is a 3 minute walk away. Many peopl
description: This house is a hidden treasure. It is located one hour south of Kona and 65 miles  from Volcano National Park. It has fantastic ocean views and a wonderful deck.House is on an old lava flow -shop before you come as nearest  store is  22  minutes away!  12  minutes off highway 11 descend a curvy road with phenomenal ocean views.I think it's one of the best views on the island! Our house is 600 feet from the ocean! Walk to snorkeling/swimming hole in 3 minutes! There isn't a beach right by house. A Hideaway quiet and peaceful, set in an authentic fishing village. Unwind and relax from city life and packaged vacations. Three bedroom, three baths, and game room. A large Lanai runs the length of the house for dolphin and whale watching. Have dinner on a beautiful Lanai and watch the incredible sunsets enjoy the warm climate with cool coastal breezes. One and half blocks to water access for swimming, snorkeling, kayaking, scuba diving and fishing. There are kayaks and boogie boards ... at t
neighborhood_overview: I love walking the streets to get exercise. Cars are traveling slowly in the neighbourhood. Speed limit is 15 miles per hour. The swimming hole is two minutes away- go northwest on Kai street to find- its over by the bay. That's where we put kayaks in. There are tide pools in the village and the wharf is a great snorkeling place as is the swimming hole by the house. There really isnt a beach close to the house but drive  into the village of Milolii  , the last hawaiian fishing village,park, and hike  15 minutes into Honomolino Beach, a pretty, quiet, black sand beach with a patch of white on the southern part.
notes: Seeing the dolphins in Papa bay and the humpback whales in the winter are a great experience.    Also, there are wild goats over on Umi Street. There are tide pools before you reach the community center on the right side. Buy fish in the village or up at the top of the hill- sushi grade Ahi tuna is wonderful!  Ono is also a great fish to cook in butter and enjoy.
transit: You  need to have a rental car for this house. Four  wheel drive is a great addition to your car experience on the island- there are lots of places on  the island to enjoy 4 wheel drive- you don't need it though to reach the house- roads are paved but curvy to the house.
access: There are boogie boards, snorkel gear and beach toys in the closet  on the first floor. There are a gazillion DVDS and netflix  in the house. The kayaks are great! There is a play station in the lower master and WII is in a box in the closet- feel free to use.
interaction: Most of the year  I am in California  so my interaction with guests is via email  but I am happy to answer any and all questions. There is an orange folder  titled Welcome Book on the desk or bar  with ideas of what to do plus there are guidebooks in the house. Please leave them for future guests when you leave. Daniel's latest favorite thing is manta ray diving on the Hang Loose Boat which is north of Kona.  Talk to him about it if you are interested! Everything is a drive on the Big Island so be prepared for that!
house_rules: Aloha.First of all have a wonderful trip and thank you for renting our home! We continue to share as most people have been very considerate of our house! Please be very careful of water usage.  Larger groups  and sometimes longer groups due to utilities and cleaning fees have larger fees cleaning plus utitlities so inquire first before you book.  If you arrive with extra guests they are 50 dollars per day per person  plus extra cleaning. Please advise me two weeks before your arrival of any people changes . Only two year old kids and under are free- there is a charge for all extra people over the age of 2.   Smoking is allowed outside of the house but not inside please. Please use ashtrays.Please put furniture back where it started.Please don't bring metal furniture into house as it scraps the  bamboo floors.Again  Rules are on fridge. Internet password is all over the house. There will be a  cancellation charge to a reservation that holds up my house for 6 months or more and then canc

name: Super location - Walk to the City!
space: Stay for a long weekend, a week or the whole month!! Come and live in my beautiful Art deco 1 bedroom apartment. Furnished with an adorable mix of retro and modern furniture. It is fully equipped and ready to move in for short or long stays.  The apartment has a very clever layout with great use of space. There is a separate bedoom with double bed & ensuite bathroom with shower over bath. A Walk-in-robe keeps all your clothes and suitcases out of sight!  An L-shaped living area wraps around a separate kitchen. The lounge room has a 3 seater lounge and armchair and a LCD TV with good TV reception. Cute dining space seats 4 and is a comfy spot to sit with your laptop.  Kitchen has a bar fridge with freezer, 2 burner cooktop and combined microwave and convection oven (it grills, it bakes and it microwaves!). Its also equipped with crockery, cutlery, pots and pans.  Its a lower ground floor apartment on a sloping block looking into an internal shared courtyard and walkway. Surprisingly qui

Its a lower ground floor apartment on a sloping block looking into an internal shared courtyard and walkway. Surprisingly qui
house_rules: Make yourself at home. Please leave the apartment clean and tidy though. No parties. No internet or Wifi provided Free to Air TV - Foxtel is available for longer stays if you want to connect it at your cost Bedding, towels etc provided Tea and cofee and a Small breakfast hamper provided to start off your stay I try to be as flexible as possible with checkins and checkouts - however I do need to work around other bookings and also my work.  Checkout by 11am - unless I dont have anyone booked for the following night.

name: Holoholo Inn: Rain Forest (Priv-2)
summary: Very quiet hostel in the the rain forest in Volcano Village. Located 1 mile from Hawaii Volcanoes National Park. We offer a private room with private bath accommodating up to 2 adults.
space: In Hawaiian, "holo holo" means "leisurely journey", and this is the spirit reflected in the atmosphere of our casual hostel next to our home. Our hope is to provide the Holo Holo In as a mix of convenient location, a comfortable base and serene surroundings. We have been operating as a hostel since 1988.

name: Alcam Colon 52 Apartment
summary: Spacious and bright apart., 30 meters from Ramblas and the sea front. Nice views, 2 bedrooms, 1 double and 1 with twin beds, living room with sofa bed, modern bathroom with shower flat walk. Free wifi central AC and heating.
description: Spacious and bright apart., 30 meters from Ramblas and the sea front. Nice views, 2 bedrooms, 1 double and 1 with twin beds, living room with sofa bed, modern bathroom with shower flat walk. Free wifi central AC and heating. The Gothic Quarter is the medieval centre of the city and a true labyrinth for the adventurer visitor. Walk the little streets around the Cathedral and discover the most antique dealers, or the feathers and umbrellas’ merchants in the mythic street Banys. It is been here where took place the most determining historical events of Barcelona along the centuries. To see : Chapel of Saint Agatha, Roman Wall, Jewish Quarter, Chapel of Saint Llúcia, The Cathedral , Pia Almoina, Frederic Marès Museum, The Royal Palace, The Chapel of Saint Agatha, Clariana-Padellàs House (Historic Museum of the city), Columns of the Temple of Augustus, Sant Jaume Square , Sant Felip Neri Square, Plaça del Pi.

summary: Set in a prized area for tapas and vermouth, you'll get the best of Barcelona and sunset views in your very own Poble Sec pad. space: Welcome to your fully renovated and stunning BRAND SPANKING NEW 55m2 Barcelona home. Ideal for couples, groups or families; the light modern interior mixes character with clean lines, while the little balcony is furnished for breakfast or drinks at sunset. All of Barcelona’s favourites are easy to reach on foot or by metro. The lounge area has a comfortable sofa, flatscreen SMART TV, and dining area. There are 2 double bedrooms. One has a 140x200cm bed and the other is 135x190cm. The kitchen is equipped for cooking, including fridge freezer, oven, vitro-ceramic stovetop, Nespresso coffee maker, toaster, kettle. The bathroom is full size with a WC and shower. It is complete with towels, shower gel, shampoo, hairdryer.   THE APT. INCLUDES:  Hot/cold AC, Samsung Smart TV with USB ports/HDMI cable, WIFI internet, Bosch washing machine, ironing equipment. Enjoy the cool local vibe nestled below Montjuïc and fast transport connections to beach (10 mins) and airport (30 mins). Perfectly located, close to Mobile World Congress Welcome to your fully renovated and stunning BRAND SPANKING NEW 55m2 Barcelona home. Ideal for couples, groups or families; the light modern interior mixes character with clean lines, while the little balcony is furnished for breakfast or drinks at sunset. All of Barcelona’s favourites are easy to reach on foot or by metro. The lounge area has a comfortable sofa, flatscreen SMART TV, and dining area. There are 2 double bedrooms. One has a 140x200cm bed and the other is 135x190cm. The kitchen is equipped for cooking, including fridge freezer, oven, vitro-ceramic stovetop, Nespresso coffee maker, toaster, kettle. The bathroom is full size with a WC and shower. It is complete with towels, shower
neighborhood_overview: Poble Sec is is the best kept secret in Barcelona. Foodies will delight in the tapas and vermut scene here, highlighted on Calle Blai just around the corner, which is buzzing with Pintxo bars. Fine dining includes Xemei (with 1 Michelin Star) and Tickets restaurant of Ferran “El Bulli” fame. Cross Av.Parallel into Sant Antoni to the new brunch mecca with cafés, bodegas (old wine cellars) and super trendy local hangouts (Rekons, Taranno, Federal, Lando, El Dinamic to name just a few).  One of Barcelona’s must-sees is Montjuïc. A short walk uphill will take you to some of the citys best and lesser known attractions, such as: A multitude of lush, winding gardens with panoramic views to the city and the sea, the Olympic swimming pools, the Joan Miró gallery, summer open-air cinema at the castle wall, the Grec theatre festival, the enjoyable Magic Fountains and the Fira tradeshow arena at the foot of the MNAC (National art palace museum). Be sure to pack a picnic!  Nightlife around Poble Se
notes: We are LEGAL operators, with a tourist license. To comply with licensing requirements we will collect personal data at time of booking, to register your stay with local authorities (MOSSOS). - Please send your airport/arrival information when you book so that we may estimate your arrival time.  - Private apartment for 4 persons maximum; the final price includes both VAT and applicable touristic taxes. - The damage deposit is fully refundable on your departure provided there are no claims for damages, smoking inside the apartment or community complaints such as excessive noise or misconduct. - By booking you acknowledge: MUST CLIMB four flights of stairs. - Guests are LIABLE for all costs associated with noise complaints that generate an OFFICIAL 092 OR MOSSOS Complaint. This can include the costs of any fines for the noise complain or the manner in which the Host responds to the noise complaint (Guest responsible for any sanctions for unsatisfactory response or failure to respond). Gue
transit: The nearest metro station “Parallel” services both the purple line for Sagrada Familia or the green line to Plaça Catalunya, Camp Nou stadium, Passeig de Gracia for Gaudí and artsy Gracia district with Güell Park at its crest. On Av. Parallel you can catch bus No.57, 157 or 64 direct to Barceloneta beach (10 mins) or No.46 to both terminals at Barcelona airport (30 mins). Taxis are readily available on Av.Parallel and you are recommended to rent bikes as a fun way of exploring Barcelona.
access: The space is an independent and private apartment in a building with other residents. Guests have key access to the entrance of the building and their apartment. By booking you acknowledge: MUST CLIMB four flights of stairs.
interaction: We enjoy playing tourist just as much as you, and are available by Whatspp to help you make smart restaurant choices and organize day tripping.

neighborhood_overview: AKARETLER ROW HOUSES Designed by Sarkis Balyan in 1875, the Akaretler Row Houses were built by Sultan Abdulaziz to accommodate the most prominent and high-ranking officials of Dolmabahce Palace. After careful research into their cultural and historical significance and structure, the Row Houses were authentically restored in Akaretler, one of the most important districts of Istanbul where the city’s deep historical legacy feels tangible. Upon the completion of restoration work that highlights the area’s architectural and visual grace, this historical district has been re-introduced to modern city life. At the completion of this restoration process that emphasized the region’s architectural and visual elegance, this historical district entered an exciting new phase, becoming a thriving part of contemporary urban life.    The Row Houses project enriches the fabric of the city and each of the venues and galleries that are opening one after another include historically conscious artistic t

name: MONTJUIC FOUNTAINS APARTMENT
summary: Excellent apartment situated opposite Barcelona Fair and Conference Centre complex.
space: Recently renovated, beautiful apartment in an elegant building which was built in the sixties. It faces the Barcelona Convention and Exhibition Centre, and has wonderful views of Barcelona. It has two double bedrooms, two single bedrooms (all with single beds), two bathrooms with a shower, a fully-equipped separate kitchen, and a living room. The building has a lift. It is perfect for companies which want to be based near to all the conventions. The apartment is decorated in a very functional, minimalist style. You will find a wide range of services and entertainment close at hand. You can take a stroll along Paralelo Avenue, the Barcelona street famous for its shows, visit Plaça Espanya Square, see the Fountains of Montjuic, or climb to the top of the hill where you can visit the castle, and enjoy a view of the city and port which you will never forget. name: Spacious and quiet duplex apartment in Poble Sec
summary: Spacious apartment in a peculiar building in the central neighbourhood of Poble Sec, with patio and terrace, ideal for families with children or groups. Walking distance from center, Montjuïc, Plaza España, Fira Montjuïc/Gran Vía, Sant Antoni, Raval.
space: Spacious and quiet duplex apartment in the heart of the colourful Poble Sec neighbourhood, with entrance from a peculiar and protected archway. Equipped for 6-7 guests. 3 double rooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 patio, 1 terrace and 1 balcony. First floor: entrance, living-dining room with open kitchen giving onto the patio, chill out corner and a bathroom with shower. Second floor: hall, complete bathroom, 3 bedrooms (2 with double bed, 1 with bunk beds), balcony and terrace. Ideal for families with children and groups. Smoking is not permitted inside the apartment, but it is allowed in the terrace and the patio. Basic rate intended for 4 guests. Children up to 12 years are not calculated as extra guests during low season. Wi-Fi/wired connection (100Mb), washing machine, smart TV, DVD, Nespresso. Kitchen basics.

neighborhood_overview: Poble Sec is located just next the mountain of Montjuic, not to be missed for its several museums (Miró Foundation, MNAC, Caixafòrum, Ethnological Museum, Archaeology Museum, etc.), the Olympic Ring, the Castle and the cableway, its wonderful views of Barcelona and for being a green escape to the bustle of the city (and to heat in summer). The area is very well supplied: supermarket right in front of the apartment, the best artisan bakery in the neighbourhood just next door, two butchers (one of them organic), fish shop, drugstore, banks and playground for children, all just within a 100 meters radius (more facilities a bit farther). The neighbourhood is a lively and trendy one, with plenty of cafés, bars, restaurants, theatres and concert halls to enjoy the city from breakfast to evening, either alone, in couple, with friends or with kids.
notes: Licence number: HUTB-007120
transit: Excellent location: subway at walking distance (3-5 minutes away to Poble Sec stop, green line (L3), which takes directly to the city centre – 4 stops to Plaza Cataluña - the Sants rail station - 3 stops - and to the Camp Nou Stadium), Plaza España/Fira de Montjuic/Aerobús stop to the airport at 10-15 minutes walking or 1 subway stop away; walking distance to the Ramblas, Raval, Sant Antoni market and Colón/Drassanes. Bike rental at 10 minutes walking from the apartment. Beach at 10-15 minutes from the apartment by bike!
interaction: Yamila lives in the neighborhood. Should you need it she will be near! Before your arrival, you might interact by e-mail either with Yamila or with me (Cristina, the apartment's owner).

notes: KEYS The gate at pavement level isn't locked. Up the steps to the front door, only the lower of the 2 locks is used. This is the key with blue paint on it. The 2 keys to Apt 302 have red paint on them and are both deadlocks, not latch locks - you cant slam them to lock the door. When you get in you have to lock again from the inside. If you use the lower of the two locks you can leave that key in the lock, and people outside can still get in using their own key. RUBBISH. Branca generally leaves small bags inside the public litter (colour orange) bin on the lamppost near the front door. I am not sure that this is kosher but they seem to disappear. The days when rubbish is collected are Tuesdays, Thursdays and Saturdays. The rubbish can be left in front of a light pole in front of the building. Please make sure the bags are well  closed. name: Burgazada da çarşıya yakın daire
summary: Yeşillikler ve tipik ada evleri arasında yürüyüş yapmak, bisiklete binmek, yüzmek, S.F.Abasıyanık Müzesini gezmek, İstanbul un en güzel gün batımına şahit Kalpazankaya da yemek yemek, baharda mimoza toplamak, Marta yı anlamak koyunda yüzerken
space: Bahçe diğer 3 daire ile ortak ve sulama yapabilirseniz iyi olur.
description: Yeşillikler ve tipik ada evleri arasında yürüyüş yapmak, bisiklete binmek, yüzmek, S.F.Abasıyanık Müzesini gezmek, İstanbul un en güzel gün batımına şahit Kalpazankaya da yemek yemek, baharda mimoza toplamak, Marta yı anlamak koyunda yüzerken Bahçe diğer 3 daire ile ortak ve sulama yapabilirseniz iyi olur. Tüm daireyi balkonlarla birlikte kullanabilirsiniz. Misafirlerin konaklamaları boyunca Kadıköy İstanbul da isem, onlara her konuda yardımcı olabilirim. Bu ara Eskişehir' de yaşıyoruz ve telefonla ulaşılabilirsiniz. Adanın bir çok sahilinden denize girmek mümkün, en uzağı 20 dak. en yakını 2-3 dak. yürüme mesafesinde. Akşamları sahildeki içkili lokantalar, gündüz mütevazı çay bahçeleri, dondurmacı adayı renkli kılıyor. 24 saat 112 acil servis ve 2 eczanemiz mevcut. Adaya şehir hatları vapurları, deniz otobüsleri ve motorlar ile ulaşım kolay, tarife yaza kışa göre değişiyor. Ayrıca deniz taksi de var. Adada bisiklet kiralamak, faytona binmek de mümkün. Bulaşık ve çamaşır makineleri var
neighborhood_overview: Adanın bir çok sahilinden denize girmek mümkün, en uzağı 20 dak. en yakını 2-3 dak. yürüme mesafesinde. Akşamları sahildeki içkili lokantalar, gündüz mütevazı çay bahçeleri, dondurmacı adayı renkli kılıyor. 24 saat 112 acil servis ve 2 eczanemiz mevcut.
notes: Bulaşık ve çamaşır makineleri var. İhtiyaç olunacak yorgan, yastık, yastık yüzü, çarşaf, havluyu çıkarıyorum, dolapların acil durumlar hariç karıştırılmasını istemiyorum. Kırılan, dökülenlerin yerine konulmasını beklerim. Açık tavada kızartma yapılmasını istemiyorum.
transit: Adaya şehir hatları vapurları, deniz otobüsleri ve motorlar ile ulaşım kolay, tarife yaza kışa göre değişiyor. Ayrıca deniz taksi de var. Adada bisiklet kiralamak, faytona binmek de mümkün.
access: Tüm daireyi balkonlarla birlikte kullanabilirsiniz.
interaction: Misafirlerin konaklamaları boyunca Kadıköy İstanbul da isem, onlara her konuda yardımcı olabilirim. Bu ara Eskişehir' de yaşıyoruz ve telefonla ulaşılabilirsiniz.
house_rules: Eve ayakkabıyla girilmiyor, dilerseniz kendi terliklerinizi getirebilirsiniz  Tuvalet kağıtlarını çöp kutusuna atın lütfen, aksi durumda wc tıkanıyor. Kızartma yapılmamasını tercih ederim, bronş hassaslığım var, kokulardan çok rahatsız oluyorum. Kombiyi geceleri kısabilirseniz harika olur, Kırılan dökülen (kaza olabilir) olursa lütfen ne olduğunu söyleyin. Bu benim ve sizden sonrakilerinin kullanımında sorun yaşanmaması için önemli.

This is seriously the best location if you want to enjoy this hip part of Brooklyn, and it takes 5 minutes on the L train from Bedford Avenue to get to Union Square in Manhattan which has connections to any train you wish to take in the city. name: 302 Kanai A Nalu Ocean front/view
summary: Welcome to Kana'i A Nalu a quiet resort that sits on the ocean away from the road. This property has the BEST ocean front views of Molokini Crater and Kaho'Olawe Island. There is a resort swimming pool and BBQs next to the ocean. This gorgeous 2 bed 2 bath unit is on the third floor look over the Pacific Ocean with views of Sugar Beach and Mount Haleakalea!  The condo is light and bright with all the creature comforts of home.  The beds are very comfortable.
space: In my opinion this property has the Wow Factor!  If you are looking for a BEAUTIFUL upgraded home that is nicely decorated with comfortable beds look no further this is the place to stay.  The views will take your breath away.  You may never want to leave the condo. This two bedroom two full bath is 952 sq ft.  Enjoy sunsets over the ocean and watch the turtles play in the ocean below right from your lanai. This is a great location year round particularly during the winter months; humpback whales can be seen in abundance. This unit includes window A/C in the living room, 4 ceiling fans, and FREE secure Wi-Fi Internet access for your laptop. This unit is spacious and bright. The kitchen is fully stocked with dishwasher, stove/oven; linens and towels; washer/dryer inside the unit; a telephone for free local calls, cable TV, CD/stereo. The master bedroom has a comfortable pillow top King size bed for your sleeping comfort. The second bedroom has two single beds with pillow tops. This home

neighborhood_overview: This lovely resort sits on Sugar Beach!  You can walk for miles on the soft sandy beach! There are other boating trips that depart from other harbors and Maalaea Harbor is less than a mile from our other beautiful rentals Kanai A Nalu and Island Sands. Many dive/snorkeling excursions and sunset dinner cruises take off from here.  Maalaea Harbor has wonderful dining experiences for all budgets and a variety of cuisine choices to whet the appetite!  There are fun activities for the kids and adults visit Maui Golf and Sports Park.  You can play miniature golf, X-treme trampoline, rock wall climb, and bumper boats.  If you want to venture under water and stay on dry land visit the Maui Ocean Center!  Named one of the Top 25 Best Aquariums in the U.S. by TripAdvisor, the Aquarium features a variety of Hawaii’s sharks, turtles, stingrays and thousands of vibrant tropical fish. The Aquarium is home to the world’s largest collection of live Pacific corals, faithfully replicating thriving marin
