name: Large Duplex in Midtown East with backyard!
summary: Enjoy New York at this comfortable duplex. Only a few blocks from the main subway lines and within 15 mins from Grand Central and Central Park by foot, allowing you to reach major points of interest with ease. Close to the Roosevelt Island Tram, providing beautiful view of the city. Near Central Park and a quick ride to the West Side. Quiet apartment, lively neighborhood with premiere dining and shopping right outside of your door.
space: My duplex can comfortably sleep up to 6 people. Fully equipped for every need with direct access to the backyard to enjoy grilling on sunny days. This 2 bedroom 2 bathroom duplex with hardwood floors, full kitchen and large windows for lots of natural light is sure to leave a good impression. The upper floor has a bedroom with a queen-sized bed and a sofa bed in the living room. The lower floor has a queen sized bed and a single bed and has its own full bathroom. Both floors have direct access to the backyard. Although the neighborhood has lots going on, the apartment is very quiet at night for a very goodnight's sleep. The mattresses are very comfortable as well! The building has a washer and dryer in the basement, so you can wash your laundry easily at your convenience.

neighborhood_overview: Wether for tourism or business, everything you need is close by. Whole foods is a 10 min walk from the apartment on 57th Street and 2nd Ave and Duane Reade is around the corner on 1st avenue for 24/7 necessities. The Museum of Modern Arts can be reached by foot in 15 mins and Central Park in 20.
transit: A few blocks from 6, E, and M subway lines, less than 15 mins walk to Grand Central Station. From JFK Airport you can take the AirTrain to Jamaica Station from where you can take the E subway line directly to Lexington Av/53 St to reach the apartment in a little over an hour. From Newark airport you can take the Northeast Regional train to Pennsylvania Station where you can take the E subway line from Penn Station/34 St to Lexington Ave and 53 St to reach the apartment in less than 45 minutes.
access: Entire apartment and backyard.
interaction: Guests have my personal contact phone and that of the superintendent of the building.
house_rules: No smoking inside the apartment please - in the backyard is fine. Please keep the noise level down in the backyard after 10pm. Check-out time is flexible if I don't have guests coming for that day. There is a penalty if check-out occurs after the specified time and I cannot grant late check-out.

name: Pineapple Paradise
summary: The pineapple is known  as the symbol of welcoming and warmth. This oceanfront studio conveys just that.  Newly renovated in 2014 you will find all the comforts of home in this 17th floor MOUNTAIN VIEW STUDIO. Come enjoy paradise - Hawaii.
space: The Ilikai Marina is one of the first condominiums built in Honolulu - it can be seen in the original Hawaii Five-0 televisions show and the marina is still used for many movies and tv locations. Since Honolulu is a city, the building may blend in with its surroundings, however, once inside the units you will feel the comforts of home and Aloha. This studio is newly renovated and features all the comforts of home.  Located on the Ala Wai Harbor you are just steps from the beach and some of the best shopping in the world.   The bath features a shower/tub and haidryer. The kitchen is fully equipped to handle take out or to make a nice meal.  Facing the mountain/city, you can relax and watch the sun rise.  Since space is an issue in a studio, our Murphy Bed setup allows you to fold the bed up in the morning and pull it back down during the day.  For a third person there is a twin size Aero bed.  Linens, beach towels, and beach chairs are provided.  A cleaning service will come in on the d

neighborhood_overview: Located at the beginning of Waikiki or as some call it the Quiet end, you have access to all of the beaches and shopping and restaurants, and are away from the hustle and bustle. The Modern Hotel and Hilton Hawaiian Village are right next door. While we don't have a pool, the worlds largest pool is right behind the building - the pacific ocean and all of the beautiful beaches of Hawaii.
notes: Anything you may need is at your fingertips. From a Cuisinart Coffee Maker to a Rice Cooker, a hair dryer or a dvd collection, you shouldn't have to go far to cook in, have a relaxing night at home or grab the beach chairs and head out for the day. We treat this as our "Home away from Home", and hope our guests will feel the same way. Why rent a cold generic hotel room when you can stay in a comfy, homey place instead?
transit: Waikiki is a walkable city.  It gives the guest a chance to see the culture and expore a bit more than with a car. The BUS is the city transit system and it is very efficient and only $2.50 for a ride.   If you choose to rent  car parking is available in the building at the guests expense.  It is 25.00 per day.
access: A quick 5-10 minute walk to the Convention center, beaches, shopping, restaurants and so much more are within your reach.
interaction: While phone calls are always nice, with people in different time zones, sometimes email is the easiest and most efficient way to communicate.  If a guest has an issue, I will respond as soon as I am able after I get the message.  Remember, if I don't hear from you I can't take care of any issues. I try to give you the tools you will need when I am not there via the itinerary sheet as well as a welcome sheet when you arrive.
house_rules: I believe my guests will treat my home with respect and respect the neighbors around them. Smoking is not allowed inside or on the balcony (Hawaii State Law prohibits). Although I love pets, they aren't permitted. In order for you to check in on time,- 3 PM the guest before you has to check out on time 12PM, and not leave a mess for the cleaning lady. (dispose of your trash, place linens and towels in laundry basket, dispose of your food). Please do not jam the door open to keep it open - if damage to the door and the walls are noticed after you check out - you will be charged to fix them. (A photo of the unit will be taken before you arrive and after you check out). Just common courtesies make each stay a little nicer and more memorable.

neighborhood_overview: Sai Ying Pun is an area in the northwestern part of Hong Kong Island, part of Central and Western District. Full of life and new restaurants ( High Street) since the opening of the second escalator.  Called the “new soho" as more and more expats are moving to this area to modern and renovated flats/ rooftops in old walkup buildings.
transit: WALK A series of escalators can take pedestrians from First to Third Street via the markets. Making the walk to central and soho via hollywood rd in only 10 min. (Free = Healthy) MTR Only 100 meters away from the new Sai Ying Pun MTR station and 2 stops away form Central on the Island line. TAXI Taxis frequent First, Second and Third Streets. It takes only 3 min to reach Central. (25 HKD = 2,5 Euros) TRAM Trams run along Des Voeux Road West, taking passengers to the east or west of Hong Kong Island. (2,4 HKD = 24 cents Euro) BUS Many bus routes run every 5 min along Des Voeux Road and Queens Road West. (around 9 HKD = 90 cents Euro) Also Is Well conected to Kowloon side as The Western Harbour Tunnel goes from Sai Ying Pun under Victoria Harbour to West Kowloon and is a popular route for cars, trucks and buses.
access: You will have access to TV+Cable TV, Wifi and anything else in the living areas of the flat Kitchen (feel free to cook),Terrace + Bath etc.
interaction: Please enjoy while we are on holidays. Respect neighbors. Enjoy!

Roses throughout for your special person - no problem.  Anything you want - dream it and we will create it. name: Sugar Beach Resort 1BR Ground Floor Condo !
summary: The Sugar Beach Resort enjoys a beachfront setting fit for a postcard.
space: The property (including pool and hot tub) are steps from five miles of unobstructed white sand beach coastline. Guests love walking along the beach in the morning or at sunset to simply look for shells and gaze out over the ocean. Besides the close proximity to the ocean, the Sugar Beach Resort is also somewhat central on the island. You can drive to Lahaina/Kaanapali in about 25 minutes, the beaches of Wailea in 15 minutes, or to the north shore in 25 minutes. If you just want to hang around the property, you will have plenty of options for entertainment as well. Take a dip in the oceanfront pool or soothe the muscles in the hot tub. Practice your putting on the putting green. Grab some meat and grill up a lunch or dinner on the propane barbecue facilities and stop in to the Sandwitch Bar/Deli for a drink. Lastly stop in to the onsite activity desk to book an excursion around the island! This one bedroom/one bathroom ground floor condo is over 700 square feet with a sliding glass door

name: Furnished Nolita Studio
summary: This studio apartment in Nolita, Manhattan is in the heart of downtown -- close to the B/D/F/M/6/N/R trains. The apartment will be furnished with a queen-sized bed, a desk , a sofa, flat-screen television, and internet / Netflix.
description: This studio apartment in Nolita, Manhattan is in the heart of downtown -- close to the B/D/F/M/6/N/R trains. The apartment will be furnished with a queen-sized bed, a desk , a sofa, flat-screen television, and internet / Netflix. Located north of Little Italy, Nolita was originally considered part of Little Italy but has gradually lost most of its recognizable Italian character. As trendy restaurants, bars and boutiques popped up in Nolita’s winding streets, the area started developing a separate identity from the surrounding neighborhoods. Similar to SoHo, Nolita is known for its architecture and “hip” reputation. However, Nolita lacks the high density of tourists that flock to its neighbors, allowing for a more local feel. Known for its fashionable retail, young residents and expensive apartments, Nolita is slowly splitting from its association with SoHo and Little Italy, maturing into a full-fledged neighborhood. The B/D/F/M/6/N/R trains are within 5 mins walk.

space: I would be happy to welcome you to my humble, yet cozy house. It has a huge big garden in the back. The bathroom is new and you can enjoy 1 queen bed and another double one, plus a couch ideal for "sièste". I also have a cat that would have to stay with you, but she's not demanding and really nice to people.  The neighbourhood is quiet and close to the more moving, artsy streets like Mont-Royal, Laurier, Ontario, Downtown, etc. Querky cafés, croissants (the best in Montréal) and bars are close by, together with "poutine-fries" places and Parc Lafontaine. Enjoy Montréal!

neighborhood_overview: Bundeena is a unique village completely enclosed by national park and four beautiful beaches, yet still within the Sydney metropolitan area and only an hour away from city restaurants, galleries and concerts. In Bundeena you will find: - Unspoilt beaches, with the opportunity to swim, kayak, snorkel or go fishing. - Walking access to the famous Coast Walk (Wedding Cake Rock, Marley Beach, Wattamolla) and short drive to other Royal National Park bushwalks. - Cafes, restaurants: there are cafes open for breakfast and/or lunch on most days, and a few options to eat out at night. The Community and Services Club is open for lunch and dinner every day, and has great views over Port Hacking. At 'The Bowlo' there is a bistro with Asian/Australian meals. Driftwood Cafe also has evening dining on Wed-Sat evenings. The IGA is great for picnic/self-catering provisions, with fresh bread, hot chooks and a good selection of beer and wine in addition to all of the basics. - Talented artists who open t
notes: Minimal kitchen supplies (eg tea/coffee/milk/sugar/condiments) are provided, please bring other supplies. The local IGA is a few minutes walk away (near the ferry wharf) and is open 8am to 8pm every day for groceries, fruit and veg and liquor.
transit: The drive to/from the city of Sydney is around 60-80 minutes depending on traffic. There is a ferry to/from Cronulla ever hour until 7pm in the summer, until 6pm in the winter. From Cronulla you can get a train to the city - total trip around 90-120 minutes depending on connections. If arriving from the airport, take the train to Cronulla and then ferry to Bundeena, but car is easier and quicker. Bundeena is easy to walk around, everything is within walking distance. Note - there is no bus service or taxi service. You can also do tours of Port Hacking by ferry. Search on 'cronulla ferries' for Ferry information.
access: Guests have their own access through the garden. Studio facilities include TV/DVD, ipod dock, CD player/radio and basic wireless internet. There are books, CDs, DVDs and board games for your entertainment. Linen and towels are included (but byo beach towels). The shady deck overlooks the garden, and there is a small private courtyard with gas BBQ.
interaction: We live in the main house on the same property but guests have their own access through the garden and do not need to interact, however we are available to answer any questions.
house_rules: House rules for Bundeena Garden Studio: Please read this carefully before your visit so you know what to expect. If you need anything at all or have any other questions, please don't be afraid to ask – we want to make sure you enjoy your visit ☺  • CHECK IN/OUT  Please advise of your time of arrival by text message or email. Check in is usually after 2pm, check out is normally before 12pm (noon), but these can be negotiated if there are not adjacent bookings. • KEY You can pick up the key from us in the main house, or will be advised where to pick up if we are not at home. Ensure when you leave the studio that the doors are locked. • YOUR ROOM Sheets are changed for each visitor, but not the bedcover and cushion covers, so please keep them clean. The room is not serviced during your stay, so please hang towels for re-use. • FACILITIES A broom is provided – a mop and vacuum cleaner available on request. There is a clothes airer in the kitchen, and also retractable washing line under the

ACCOMMODATION: Beautiful 3 bedroom house near Green square train station (Direct line to the airport and city loop). House is big, beautiful, clean and spacious, with all modern amenities like dishwasher, dryer and wifi. Home office area, multiple living rooms, and large courtyard with bbq and outdoor setting. You will be sharing the house with 2 professional couples  of ages between 25-35 . All friendly, sociable & easy going. Fully furnished ensuite room with  Queen bed, balcony, tv & air conditioning. ADDED EXTRA'S: I've created for my guests an In House Visitors Directory which has loads of suggestions on things to do ie. Best restaurants, bars, supermarkets, car hire, public transport etc. I've also hav
neighborhood_overview: Quiet leafy street with a Park in the front with tennis courts and bbq area. It is also minutes walk away from " The Grounds" a beautiful space with cafes and food carts and "The potting shed", a greenhouse style bar with incredible atmosphere, which you shouldn't miss out on if you are in Sydney!
transit: Airports (Domestic & International) are a $20-25 cab/uber ride or if you are moving solo you can just catch the train to/from Green square station (6 mins walk away from the house)  Sydney CBD it's really easy to access as you can always catch a cab or public bus transport on Botany Road or it's a $10-15 cab ride . It takes 15 mins to get to the city. Public transport is so easy as it's only a 2 minute walk from my door to a bus stop ( with express buses to the city and the beach)or 5 minute to Green Square train station (it is the direct line to airport and city!!!) If you hire a car you can park  on the side street with no metre restrictions.
access: Full access to everything in the house.
interaction: You will interact with me. I'm always available to offer help if needed on getting around or showing the best cafes and bars in the area.
house_rules: Please treat the house as if it were your own.

name: 2 confortables habitaciones en el centro de BCN!
summary: Hola! Mi apartamento se encuentra en pleno centro de Barcelona (Ciutat Vella), al lado de la Rambla, Plaza Catalunya, todos los servicios y algunos de los monumentos más importantes de la ciudad.  Tengo 2 habitaciones disponibles: una con cama doble y la otra con cama individual. Perfecto para una pareja o grupo de 3 personas.  NO SE ADMITEN PERSONAS QUE VIAJAN SOLAS. Os espero en Barcelona. Muchas gracias y saludos cordiales!
space: Hola a tod@s! Si estáis planeando un viaje a Barcelona y buscáis un alojamiento cómodo y económico en pleno centro de la ciudad, mi apartamento es una buena elección. Me llamo Aliona. Vivo en un espacioso apartamento de 3 habitaciones en el histórico barrio El Raval (Ciudad Vella), al lado de las Ramblas.  Si sois 2 personas, os puedo ofrecer una habitación doble, limpia, confortable, tranquila y luminosa en mi apartamento por un precio más que razonable. La habitación dispone de una cama doble con colchón nuevo y cómodo, armario grande empotrado, mesita de noche, mesita para el ordenador, sillas. Están incluidos la ropa de cama y las toallas. Si sois 3 o 4 personas, dispongo de otra habitación con un sofa-cama, armario grande, mesa de escritorio, mesita de noche, sillas.
description: Hola! Mi apartamento se encuentra en pleno centro de Barcelona (Ciutat Vella), al lado de la Rambla, Plaza Catalunya, todos los servicios y algunos de los monumentos más importantes de la ciudad.  Tengo 2 habitaciones disponibles: una con cama doble y la otra con cama individual. Perfecto para una pareja o grupo de 3 personas.  NO SE ADMITEN PERSONAS QUE VIAJAN SOLAS. Os espero en Barcelona. Muchas gracias y saludos cordiales! Hola a tod@s! Si estáis planeando un viaje a Barcelona y buscáis un alojamiento cómodo y económico en pleno centro de la ciudad, mi apartamento es una buena elección. Me llamo Aliona. Vivo en un espacioso apartamento de 3 habitaciones en el histórico barrio El Raval (Ciudad Vella), al lado de las Ramblas.  Si sois 2 personas, os puedo ofrecer una habitación doble, limpia, confortable, tranquila y luminosa en mi apartamento por un precio más que razonable. La habitación dispone de una cama doble con colchón nuevo y cómodo, armario grande empotrado, mesita de noche
neighborhood_overview: El Raval es un céntrico barrio multicultural, lleno de tiendas, bares, restaurantes, etc.  En la accesibilidad peatonal de mi apartamento se encuentran algunos de los puntos de interés más importantes de Barcelona: - Las Ramblas (5 min. a pie) - La Catedral (10 min.)  - Plaza Catalunya (15 min.) - El museo de Picasso, el Museo de Arte Contemporáneo (МАСВА), el Museo del Mar, el Museo de Arte Nacional de Catalunya (MNAC), el Centro de la Cultura Contemporánea de Barcelona (СССВ), etc. - Paseo de Gracia (15 min. a pie) - la calle más elegante de la ciudad, llena de lujosos boutiques, buenos restaurantes e importantes monumentos arquitectónicos de Gaudí. - Hasta la popular playa Barceloneta se puede llegar a pie (25-30 min.) o en autobús desde Las Ramlas (15 min.)
transit: Al lado de mi casa hay varias paradas de metro: "Liceo", "Paral-lel", "Sant Antoni" y también varias líneas de autobuses.
access: Mi apartamento (80 м2) se encuentra en un edificio restaurado y tiene ascensor. La cocina es de tipo americano, intergrada en el salón. Hay wi-fi, lavadora, microhondas, horno, cafetera Nesspresso, tetera eléctrica, calefacción central, ventiladores en las habitaciones. La mesa del comedor es grande. Se puede usar la cocina, la nevera, la vajilla y todos los utencillos de cocina. También a disposición de los invitados están los productos básicos de alimentación: aceite de oliva, sal, azúcar, té, café, etc.
interaction: Si no conocéis la ciudad ó tenéis algún tipo de duda, estaré a vuestra disposición para ayudaros en todo momento.
house_rules: - Antes de efectuar la reserva inmediata me gustaría recibir un mensaje informativo sobre el huésped, sus acompañantes (sexo, edad, nacionalidad) y el motivo de viaje. -  No se admiten personas que viajen solas. -  Se ruega mantener limpias y ordenadas las zonas comunes: el baño, la cocina y el comedor. -  No está permitido invitar al apartamento a personas ajenas, que no sean huéspedes. -  Se ruega respetar el descanso de los vecinos y no hacer ruido en el apartamento ni las zonas comunes del edificio (el portal, la escalera, el ascensor). -  Pérdida de llaves por cualquier motivo = 50 euros.

name: listing_id: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) THE BEST LOCATION IN LEBLON

space: The apartment is spacious, bright, quiet and very well located. You can go to the beach, nearby lake, cinema, theatres, restaurants, supermarkets and shopping malls on foot. The apartment is located in a wooded dead-end street with public square, children's playground and private security.

neighborhood_overview: Leblon is considered one of the best neighborhoods in Rio. The apartment is located in a set of buildings whose accesses are made by dead-end streets and monitored by private security. The neighborhood is served by vast commerce, besides the Shopping Leblon and Rio Design Center. Other attractions in the neighborhood are restaurants, theatres, cinemas and beach. The apartment is also close to Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas and the Botanical Garden. Nearby subway stations will be inaugurated in August 2016.
notes: We offer our guests the Personal Chef service, which consists of having a chef at your disposal to prepare a special dinner, without you having to do a thing. Just book with us!
transit: This neighborhood allows us to do everything by foot. There are taxis and buses just a few metres away. The building has private garage and external parking.

name: Midillis 202 (Double Room)
summary: A double room with its own ensuite shower and bathroom. One of four rooms in our premesis. We are located 5 minutes away from the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sofia at the center of Sultanahmet, Istanbul's major tourist area. From here you can easily take the tram to explore other areas of Istanbul.
space: The pleasantly decorated room has two single beds and satellite television. WiFi is complimentary. The room has air-conditioning and heating. All bed linen is supplied. The bathroom with a shower also has a hairdryer supplied.
description: A double room with its own ensuite shower and bathroom. One of four rooms in our premesis. We are located 5 minutes away from the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sofia at the center of Sultanahmet, Istanbul's major tourist area. From here you can easily take the tram to explore other areas of Istanbul. The pleasantly decorated room has two single beds and satellite television. WiFi is complimentary. The room has air-conditioning and heating. All bed linen is supplied. The bathroom with a shower also has a hairdryer supplied. In addition to your room you also have access to a common kitchen area and terrace on our top floor with stunning Bosphorus views. We run a travel agent from the same premises so can offer you the best advice for how to see the sights of Istanbul, suggest tours and trips in Istanbul and farther afield. We also run a coffee shop from the premises. We are ten minutes walk from the Sultanahmet tram station. From there you can reach all parts of Istanbul on public transport.
transit: We are ten minutes walk from the Sultanahmet tram station. From there you can reach all parts of Istanbul on public transport.

name: Lulapartment II
summary: Apartamento situado no centro histórico do Porto, paredes meias com a muralha Fernandina, em pleno bairro típico Portuense, com uma vista soberba!!! Recuperado e decorado com o objectivo de tornar confortável a estadia dos nossos hospedes.
space: Apartamento recuperado no centro histórico do Porto, detentor de uma vista soberba sobre o Jardim da Cordoaria, Palácio da justiça, Rio Douro,.. O apartamento foi decorado com o objectivo de trazer conforto a quem nos visita, o estilo que o caracteriza é jovem e fresco!  O apartamento tem uma varanda e uma marquise. O lulapartment II está a 2 minutos da emblemática Torre dos Clérigos, a 10 minutos a pé da Zona Ribeirinha e das Caves do Vinho do Porto, a 3 minutos das Galerias Paris (zona de bares e restaurantes). A zona onde está inserido o apartamento está muito bem servida de serviços desde transportes públicos (metro, autocarro, táxis, comboio), hospitais e farmácias, mercados e comércio de rua.

neighborhood_overview: O Lulapartment II está inserido num bairro típico do Porto, onde se vive e respira a vida da cidade e das suas gentes! Pode usufruir de todo o comércio local, deleitar-se com as iguarias gastronómicas, da história presente em todos os edifícios, de sentir o pulsar da cidade!
transit: A zona onde está inserido o Lulapartment II está muito bem servido de transportes públicos, estamos perto da estação de São Bento, da estação de metro, de paragens de táxis e de autocarros.
access: Os nossos hospedes têm acesso ao apartamento por completo!
interaction: Um dos nossos objectivos é receber bem, por conseguinte estamos disponíveis para qualquer necessidade ou eventualidade que possa surgir!
house_rules: Esperamos que os nossos hospedes respeitem a nossa casa! Que respeitem os nossos vizinhos, não fazendo ruído após as 22h. Que levem o lixo embora. Que não fumem dentro de casa (fumar nas varandas). Que deixem o apartamento como o encontraram!

name: Harbourside Apartment - Water Views
summary: This one bedroom apartment is bright and airy with unique views of the Sydney Harbour Bridge, Sydney Harbour and surrounding North Sydney and Kirribilli. One Queen Bed + Sofa Bed, wifi, balcony, undercover parking, 5 minutes to Ferry wharf, 7 minutes to Milsons Point train station, 2 minutes to bus.
space: This apartment is quiet, neat and compact, with a newly renovated kitchen and bathroom and a great balcony for entertaining or just taking in the view. There is also a common grassed area just beneath the apartment with views of the Harbour Bridge as well which is excellent for picnics.  The apartment has a Queen Bed in the bedroom but also a Double Sofa Bed which would be fine for occasional guests or perhaps a child, though the apartment is ideal for 1-2 adults. There is a flat screen TV, DVD player, fully equipped kitchen, table and chairs (in the main room, plus an outdoor table and chairs on the balcony) ceiling fans, heaters and wireless internet access, as well as a common coin operated laundry one floor down from the apartment and an undercover carspace.
description: This one bedroom apartment is bright and airy with unique views of the Sydney Harbour Bridge, Sydney Harbour and surrounding North Sydney and Kirribilli. One Queen Bed + Sofa Bed, wifi, balcony, undercover parking, 5 minutes to Ferry wharf, 7 minutes to Milsons Point train station, 2 minutes to bus. This apartment is quiet, neat and compact, with a newly renovated kitchen and bathroom and a great balcony for entertaining or just taking in the view. There is also a common grassed area just beneath the apartment with views of the Harbour Bridge as well which is excellent for picnics.  The apartment has a Queen Bed in the bedroom but also a Double Sofa Bed which would be fine for occasional guests or perhaps a child, though the apartment is ideal for 1-2 adults. There is a flat screen TV, DVD player, fully equipped kitchen, table and chairs (in the main room, plus an outdoor table and chairs on the balcony) ceiling fans, heaters and wireless internet access, as well as a common coin opera
neighborhood_overview: This is unique part of Sydney to stay in - quiet and safe but with plenty to do, right by the Harbour and within minutes of the CBD. I lived in the apartment for four years, and I absolutely loved waking up to a beautiful Sydney sunrise and the Harbour Bridge, and then watching the sparkling harbour from the comfort of the couch.  There are a number of beautiful harbourside parks nearby with excellent views, and Kirribilli Village is just a 7 minute walk away. Here you will find a number of excellent restaurants, cafes, bars and shops (including an excellent boutique Choclatier), as well as the wonderful Kirribilli Markets (on every second weekend), Luna Park, and award winning restaurants such as Garfish (excellent seafood), The Botanist (great cocktails), Batch (fantastic burgers), Street Market (great Asian Tapas style restaurant) Cool Mac (great Japanese fusion cafe) and Ripples Milsons Point - perfect for a casual meal under the Harbour Bridge. There are a number of great cafes wi
notes: There will be basic provisions in the apartment for you upon your arrival, as well as instructions for the apartment and a guide of things to do/places to eat nearby/in Sydney. Obviously all linen, kitchen items, iron/ironing board and whatever else you need for your stay are provided - just make sure to let us know if you will require the sofa bed so we have all the linen ready. There are a number of unique artworks decorating the apartment of harbour scenes from the surrounding area by a local artist which are for sale - if you’re interested, let us know!
transit: You can get to the city by ferry, bus or train: North Sydney Ferry Wharf - 400 metres Milsons Point Train Station - 650 metres Bus to CBD (direct to York St, no stops) - 280 metres The Ferry Trip to Circular Quay from North Sydney Wharf is stunning - a 15 minute trip over and a 10 minute trip back. From Milsons Point Train Station (7 minute walk), you are one station (a 4 minute train ride across the bridge) from Wynyard Station, Town Hall (8 minutes) or Central (12 minutes).  From Kirribilli/Milsons Point you can also access the public stairs to walk across the Harbour Bridge to The Rocks. The trip to and from Sydney Airport by Train takes 30 minutes, or a Taxi is roughly 15 minutes.
access: You will have private access to the entire apartment and laundry, plus car space if needed.
interaction: Basic provisions, welcome manual and dining suggestions provided. If you have any problems during your stay I'm usually easily contactable by phone or email, and there is also a Building Manager who can help in emergencies. My husband and I used to live in the apartment but now live around the corner so we’re very nearby if there’s anything you need.
house_rules: Just common sense really - please leave the apartment as you found it, and not do anything that is likely to disturb the neighbours (no parties)!  The building is strictly no smoking, and unfortunately no pets are allowed due to Strata rules. There will be instructions in the apartment about where to dispose of rubbish and any other details like this you might need. Children are welcome though the apartment is not child proof, and there is a balcony (one level above ground). Please be careful on arrival and on returning to the apartment that you get the right building - the next one along is almost identical!

name: O'Porto Studio | Historic Center

The apartment is very cosy and with a nice decoration  Very well located in the heart of the city and only 40 minutes from the airport by Metro. notes: All linen and towels are included in the apartment. After one week stay (stays up to 7 nights), changing of linen/towels and general cleaning of the apartment, free of charge. The apartment includes a bath towel and a hand towel for each guest. Extra linen and towels possible (charged).
transit: If you come from the airport, you only need to take the metro from the airport to the city centre (Trindade). To explore the city centre, you don't need car or any public transport. You can always go everywhere by foot.
access: The apartment is all for you.
interaction: I'm always here for my guests!  You can contact me by phone, email, imessage, (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), sms during your stay. It's always helpful to know at what time are you thinking arriving and leaving the apartment
house_rules: - Pets not allowed; - Smoking allowed only in the balcony; - The apartment will be cleaned before the arrival of each guest; - On leaving, the guest must leave the apartment without waste, all the lights turned off and windows closed; - Always maintain the front door of the building closed; - No cleaning fee. After one week stay - free cleaning changing linen and towels. Extra cleanness, linen and towels possible but will be charged; - Check-in 3p.m. and check-out before 11a.m. (other hours may be agreed where possible); - Report if some incident happens; - The furniture of the apartment should be left in the same places where you found them;

name: 1 sunny bedroom in large St-Henri appartment
summary: The apartment  is located in the  up and coming neighbourhood St. Henri. Close to new hip cafés and restaurants, as well as Canal Lachine and metro station. The apartment is very spacious, with two closed bedrooms and a shared backyard.
space: The apartment is very spacious, it includes two closed bedrooms, one living room, one dinning room, one kitchen, one bathroom and one shared backyard. There's also a washing machine and a dryer that you can use for free. Your room is very big and sunny. There's a double bed, a desk and a closet.  It is veery quiet at night. We often take care of our neighboor's dog, so not a good place for people with allergies...

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the up and coming neighbourhood St. Henri. Lots of new hip restaurant springing up such as Tuck shop, Grumman 78, Sumac along with the infamous staple coffee shops St. Henri Cafe and Campanelli. Also, a great wine bar Loic is just around the corner. Our place is also a block away from the beautiful the Lachine Canal, an 8 min walk to the atwater market and only 3 min walk to the subway (metro Place Saint Henri - orange line).
transit: 3 min walk to the subway, metro place saint henri - orange line. A lot of free parking spots on the street, we never have problems parking our own car!

name: ROOM + ENSUITE INNER CITY MOD HOUSE
summary: Large room with en-suite full personal bathroom plus own TV  in modern house with all mod cons less than 10 minutes to the city by bus and a short walk to cafes, restaurants and pubs plus shopping. Set in a quiet friendly back street with parking.
space: New to the market. A large private room with a double bed, en-suite bathroom  and city views in my newly renovated and completely refitted house, just 10 minutes by bus from the centre of Sydney. Located in a quiet corner of the Balmain/Rozelle area, the house is just a short distance from the heart of Balmain and its famous cafes, markets, pubs, shops and restaurants. You are welcome to use the kitchen and living room facilities and the wireless internet connection. Victoria Road is also just a 3 minute walk away with frequent bus services to the city, Circular Quay and also west to adjoining suburbs. This is a non smoking house however there is a small courtyard at the front for those who like to sneak one or two. As my house is always kept clean and tidy I would appreciate it if my guests followed suit, and I have a dishwasher for those who like to cook so easy cleaning up. Other than that I am very relaxed so make yourself at home.

name: The Sassy Lilac Megan Love Room
summary: This is a beautiful bedroom perfect for two located in the Megan Love in Hawaii House. The house has four bedrooms and four bathrooms and is located in a gated community in Hawaii right off of Ali'i drive close to beaches and town. Come stay with us! Aloha
space: This room is super cozy and comfy and the house is so beautiful. I have painted the whole House bright Happy colors and it really feels amazing. The room has hard wood floors and air conditioning
description: This is a beautiful bedroom perfect for two located in the Megan Love in Hawaii House. The house has four bedrooms and four bathrooms and is located in a gated community in Hawaii right off of Ali'i drive close to beaches and town. Come stay with us! Aloha This room is super cozy and comfy and the house is so beautiful. I have painted the whole House bright Happy colors and it really feels amazing. The room has hard wood floors and air conditioning You will have access to he whole house pretty much. There is a big living room, lanai, kitchen, creation station, big yard, and many places to sit and relax. I live in the downstairs bedroom and I am around to host and clean and to Meg sure you are having an amazing experience :) My house is 2 1/2 miles from town and about a five minute walk to the beach A rental car would be ideal since the island is so big. We also have uber, taxis, and buses. I also have a few bikes that I share and I live right on Alii drive so u can easily walk or bike
neighborhood_overview: My house is 2 1/2 miles from town and about a five minute walk to the beach
notes: This bedroom shares a bathroom with another bedroom in the house but there is also another half bath downstairs. This is normally not an issue since everyone is on different schedules and doing different things. I clean the bathroom every day knowing that people are sharing :)
transit: A rental car would be ideal since the island is so big. We also have uber, taxis, and buses. I also have a few bikes that I share and I live right on Alii drive so u can easily walk or bike to some of the Beaches :)

name: Tai Hang (Causeway Bay) Sunny Aprt'
summary: Quiet, light apartment. Suits 3 people (couple + single). 4th Floor walkup. Countless nearby eateries are scattered in this quaint, quiet area which a blends 'old' & 'new'. A supermarket is downstairs. Easy access to trains, trams & buses to all areas. Reviews are in listing 389017 Please note: this is my home and only available to book when I am away. My belongings are in the apartment - it is not an empty apartment.
space: A bright and cosy Hong Kong apartment with two separate bedrooms: a double bed in one room and a single bed in the second room. This listing is only active when the host is away on holiday as the host usually lives in the apartment. As is usual in Hong Kong, the apartment is small, and bedrooms compact, but outfitted comfortably. The only downside is that it is on the 4th floor - with no elevator, however this has not caused problems as yet and the price is set to reflect this (please refer to the many positive reviews on this listing, as well as my 'room only' listing). It can be counted as 5th floor (though the letterbox is 4th floor) There is a double & a single bedroom. The kitchen & living areas flow into the open space. The bathroom & kitchen are both renovated in western style. There will be one drawer available for clothing storage in each bedroom, as well as space in the wardrobe for hanging clothes. Remaining drawer spaces are for my personal use and I ask that these remain p
description: Quiet, light apartment. Suits 3 people (couple + single). 4th Floor walkup. Countless nearby eateries are scattered in this quaint, quiet area which a blends 'old' & 'new'. A supermarket is downstairs. Easy access to trains, trams & buses to all areas. Reviews are in listing 389017 Please note: this is my home and only available to book when I am away. My belongings are in the apartment - it is not an empty apartment. A bright and cosy Hong Kong apartment with two separate bedrooms: a double bed in one room and a single bed in the second room. This listing is only active when the host is away on holiday as the host usually lives in the apartment. As is usual in Hong Kong, the apartment is small, and bedrooms compact, but outfitted comfortably. The only downside is that it is on the 4th floor - with no elevator, however this has not caused problems as yet and the price is set to reflect this (please refer to the many positive reviews on this listing, as well as my 'room only' listing).
neighborhood_overview: Tai Hang is an older area where the 'village' houses have been renovated while still keeping the low-rise open feel of the original area. Many of the apartment blocks are only 5-6 floors high, not common in Hong Kong these days. The area is unique and renowned for the eateries at street level. There is a walkway at the end of the street to Victoria Park and to Tin Hau, another popular eating area. Causeway Bay shopping Centre is within walking distance.
notes: I am happy to chat via email prior to your stay to help you plan and prepare for your time in Hong Kong Regarding the floor levels: The apartment is officially named as 4/26 Wun Sha. This means it is on the 4th floor (as per British numbering of floors) but the Chinese character outside the apartment door shows it as 5th floor (as per Chinese way of numbering floors). It is 26 as it is on the left of the stairwell - 28 is to the right. You'll know it by the plants by the door as well.
transit: The MTR in Hong Kong is excellent, providing regular and easy access around the city. The Tin Hau station is a 6-7 minute walk. Buses are available at the end of the street, at a nearby terminus and on several surrounding streets, making travel around Hong Kong very easy. Taxis are also available and cheap.
access: This is the entire apartment. Guests staying have full access to all amenities As this is my private home, and only hosted when I am away, I ask that the space is respected and cared for as a home. Check in & out is often flexible - bur needs coordination with a friend who takes care of my home while I'm away.
interaction: I am happy to advise and chat with guests about the many options of things to do in Hong Kong. Hong Kong is a vibrant and busy city and guests will find they have easy access to areas of Hong Kong. I am happy to help to make your stay as comfortable as possible - to either share my 'local' knowledge of the city or to let you explore with maps and a sense of adventure.
house_rules: Appreciate no smoking inside the building. I've never had a problem in my 8 years of hosting this apartment - all guests have been extrememly respectful of the space and items in it. Few details to help maintain the 'pest free' and comfort of my home: 1. Please keep the 3 sink holes covered & closed when not in use.  I have no cockroaches etc and ask that drains remain covered to ensure my home remains this way. 2. Walter filter. Water is drinkable from the tap. If you choose to use the filter - please ensure it is only filtered with COLD water. The hot water ruins the filter. 3. Hot water: please leave OFF when not in use - prevents high power costs. It is electric so it'll need 3-5 minutes to hear prior to a shower  4: When going out for the day, or leaving, please ensure the following is turned off: water heater, air-conditioners, lights & coffee machine. (& sink holes closed/covered) 5. When leaving, please ensure the door is locked (seems crazy, but many forget this!)

name: * Lani Beach House
summary: "Lani Beach House" Aloha - Please do not reserve until reading about the State Tax in "Other Things to Note" section. Please do not reserve unless you agree to pay taxes to Hawaii Beach Homes directly. If you have questions, please inquire before booking.   The home has been completely redecorated in a luxurious island style: vaulted ceilings, skylights, granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances and a gourmet kitchen are just some of the the features. All bedrooms have ocean views
space: Beautiful upscale home located on a pristine beach, just outside of Historic Haleiwa Town and a few miles from Waimea Bay. The home has been completely renovated and redecorated in a luxurious island style: vaulted ceilings, skylights, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and a gourmet kitchen are just some of the the features. All bedrooms and common rooms have ocean views. Enjoy the serenity of this unique location from the expansive deck, and watch the breathtaking Hawaiian sunsets from the large jacuzzi . Surf the famous surfspot, Laniakea, swim with the turtles right out front of the house, or paddle to Waimea Bay, an awe-inspiring ride away. Wonderful long beach walks are also available just outside the back door, stroll to the farmers market on Sundays or into town for shave ice.
description: "Lani Beach House" Aloha - Please do not reserve until reading about the State Tax in "Other Things to Note" section. All bedrooms and common rooms have ocean views. Enjoy the serenity of this unique location from the expansive deck, and watch the breathtaking Hawaiian sunsets from t
neighborhood_overview: Located about 5 minutes outside of historic Haleiwa Town, with its charming surf shops, art galleries, restaurants and shave ice stands, this property sits just in front of one of the North Shores premier surfing spots. A peaceful retreat where your surroundings invite you to let it all go and succumb to the calm and peace of the ocean.
notes: The state of Hawaii requires both the GET (General Excise Tax 4.712%) and TAT (Transient Accommodation Tax (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) %) be applied to rent and fees, a total of (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) %. The Airbnb platform does not currently give us the ability to itemize and charge these taxes accurately. We are in contact with Airbnb regarding this, and hope to have the issue fixed soon. In the meantime, after making a reservation all guests will be sent a separate e-contract with house rules, and will be required to pay the taxes using a major credit card. We will not ask for or accept checks/cash. We collect tax only, Airbnb collects all other rent and fees. # W (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Local Contact: Hawaii Beach Homes
transit: Public Transportation is possible and a bus stop is located just up the block, but we highly recommend a car as there are many spots you will want to see on the island that aren't accessible by bus.  Taxis are available in this area if you call ahead, and Uber is also now available on Oahu.
access: The entire property is all yours! The house is a private, detached, single family, fenced in, beach front home with no other tenants on site.
interaction: We provide guests with a free app that includes driving directions, move in instructions, information about the house and loads of info about our island. We love to share our favorite recommendations with guests, and are available in the office 7 days a week to answer your questions. After hours we use an answering service in case you need reach us about anything urgent.
house_rules: All guests will be required to sign a house rules contract and pay required State of Hawaii taxes prior to arrival.   If you do not feel comfortable signing the house rules or paying the taxes outside of the Airbnb website please do not book online. The house rules are standard, such as no smoking and no pets.  One very strictly enforced rule is that we do not permit outside guests; all people on property must be registered.  Our homes are intended for the enjoyment of our resident guests and not as a gathering spot for parties or events. This is in order to honor and respect the neighbors - we take pride in being great neighbors! If you would like more information about the rules please request a copy of our full contract before making a reservation. The state of Hawaii requires both the GET (General Excise Tax 4.712%) and TAT (Transient Accommodation Tax 9.25%) be applied to rent and fees, a total of 13.962%. name: Big, glamorous, 4BR, 3-story house
summary: Our 4-bedroom, 3-story beautiful Brooklyn townhouse is a great place to stay for your NYC trip.   Located in Fort Greene, right in the heart of Brownstone Brooklyn's Arts District and only 10 minutes by Subway to Manhattan.
space: Our Home  Our home is a classic Brooklyn brownstone with traditional detail but a modern renovation to give it a light and open feeling. An open living room, dining room and very modern kitchen makes up the 1st floor. Out the back door and down a stairway from the ground floor, you will find our beautiful back garden filled with herbs, flowers, and vegetables. The master bedroom, study/guest bedroom, walk-in closet, and master bathroom make up the second floor. The master bedroom has a king-sized bed and nice views to the backyard. The master bathroom has a beautiful pebble-floored, two-headed shower, and matching modern sinks.   The study/guest bedroom has a queen bed.   There is a heavy curtain separating the two bedrooms on this floor rather than a door so there is visual privacy but less sound separation.  On the top floor, you will have access to two more bedrooms, a laundry room, and a second, more basic, bathroom with a tub, great for kids.   The front bedroom on this floor has
description: Our 4-bedroom, 3-story beautiful Brooklyn townhouse is a great place to stay for your NYC trip.   Located in Fort Greene, right in the heart of Brownstone Brooklyn's Arts District and only 10 minutes by Subway to Manhattan. Our Home  Our home is a classic Brooklyn brownstone with traditional detail but a modern renovation to give it a light and open feeling. An open living room, dining room and very modern kitchen makes up the 1st floor. Out the back door and down a stairway from the ground floor, you will find our beautiful back garden filled with herbs, flowers, and vegetables. The master bedroom, study/guest bedroom, walk-in closet, and master bathroom make up the second floor. The master bedroom has a king-sized bed and nice views to the backyard. The master bathroom has a beautiful pebble-floored, two-headed shower, and matching modern sinks.   The study/guest bedroom has a queen bed.   There is a heavy curtain separating the two bedrooms on this floor rather than a door so there
neighborhood_overview: Fort Greene is one of the classic brownstone neighborhoods of Brooklyn, brimming with the energy of New York City.  Our house is one block from the world famous performance space Brooklyn Academy of Music and two blocks from the Frederick Law Olmsted-designed Fort Greene Park where you'll find a weekly farmer's market, a regular pickup soccer match, outdoor musical performances, tennis courts, playgrounds, and families picnicking. Along Fulton and DeKalb streets, you'll find restaurants with Manhattan-quality food but Brooklyn prices. Only 1 stop from Chinatown and 2 stops from Union Square on the Q train, you can easily spend your days touring busy Manhattan and retreat to our quiet, lovely house and garden for a more relaxed experience.  We love our house and our neighborhood and know that you will too.
notes: Downstairs Tenants – We have a rental apartment on the bottom floor underneath our house with a  long-term tenant who also serves as our house manager. As of July 1st, after surveying our guests, we no longer offer cable television.  We do have great Wi-Fi (see instructions for network and password) so you can still stream your favorite media.
transit: The great thing about Fort Greene is it has amazing subway access.  We are a 5-minute walk to the following lines:  Q,B,G,A,C, 2,3,5,6 which means you can get to any part of Manhattan easily.
access: There is a lockbox with keys outside the house.  If I accept your reservation, I will e-mail you the code for the lockbox before you move in.
interaction: Contacts – Next door neighbors (to the right if you are facing our front door) are Martin (pronounced Mar-teen) and Pam.

name: Fresh and modern 1BR in Bed-Stuy
summary: A spacious, art-filled one-bedroom apartment near the express train (28 minutes to Times Square) and a Citibike station. Sample Bed-Stuy life at a nearby French restaurant,  a sunny Haitian cafe, a boutique grocery and more. We do NOT discriminate based on race, religion or sexual orientation.
space: Our sunny, newly renovated and furnished ground-floor apartment is located in the heart of Brooklyn, in the historic Stuyvesant Heights area of Bed-Stuy. We are close to the A train (express) and C train (local), getting you to lower Manhattan in 15 minutes and Midtown in under 30 minutes, and the J-train for lower Manhattan. For easy access to Fort Greene, Williamsburg and the rest of Brooklyn, try our new Citibike station, also nearby. Walk down treelined brownstone streets to neighborhood favorites like Saraghina, Lunatico, l'Antagoniste, Bed-Vyne Cocktail Bar, the Wilky craft beer bar and Manny's cafe (serving Bed-Stuy's famous Dough donuts!). It's also a quick ride or a long walk to Swell Dive's Tex-Mex/Filipino tacos, D.S. & Durga's cult perfumery, the nightclub C'mon Everybody, and Peace & Riot's eclectic home furnishings and gifts.  The spacious apartment  with one queen bed is perfect for a single person or couple, and while it's perhaps not the greatest for kids, we can easil

transit: Less than a 10-minute walk to the Utica Ave.stop on the  (A)/(C) subway line and the Gates Ave. stop on (J)/(Z) line. Utica stop has a CitiBike station. A block away from two bus stops with multiples routes.
interaction: .  Guests stay in a separate,  private apartment and we make every effort to not disturb you unless absolutely necessary. We live above the apartment and will be happy to accommodate any reasonable requests
house_rules: A/C may be used only when you are at home.  Please respect our delicate old pipes (no grease down the drain, etc.).  No smoking on premises. Guests are expected to wash take out their trash and recycling as needed. Guests are expected to wash and put away dishes prior to check-out (apartment has a dishwasher, soap packets are under the sink) Longer term guests may wish to launder the sheets and towels during their stay. This service is not provided. (There are two sets of bed linens provided and two sets of towels for each adult guest.) Owners may occasionally need to go through the apartment to access the basement. We shall endeavor to give advance notice of this and find a mutually convenient time.  $50 fee if keys are lost or not returned.

name: Bright, Modern, Spacious Duplex Apt
summary: We recently updated this listing from a room to the full apartment! That means more privacy for our guests, and an even better experience. Please ask about the changes if you have questions! Astoria is 15 minutes from midtown via subway (N and Q lines near the 30th ave stop). Relax on the couch, enjoy the queen-sized bed, or do some work in the sunlight dinning room. There's no better place to rest up and recharge during your stay in NYC.
space: This used to be a private room, but we've upgraded it to a whole apt! Beautiful decor, custom built furniture, and tons of space make the apartment an incredible place to stay. You'll have the lower level bedroom and the upstairs living room and kitchen. Having one and a half baths is great for larger groups as well.

neighborhood_overview: We have a 24 hour fruit stand, great supermarkets, and world-class restaurants. The neighborhood is family friendly and safe. Living here has been great for me and my family and I can't wait for you to experience the magic of Astoria. Be sure to set aside some nights to eat out locally!
transit: We're just a block away from 30th ave, and Astoria Blvd. Both stops on the N Q line. The N and Q go from Astoria to Manhattan and Brooklyn. We're also close to the express bus that goes to LaGuardia airport and Harlem (both just 10 minutes away!). There's parking on the street, but read the signs we have alternate side parking.

interaction: Think of me as your concierge. I'll answer any questions you have about the area during your trip. Ask me any time! I'll do my best to help.
house_rules: Please remove your shoes when you're in the apartment. There's a nice shoe rack right by the door. Please wash your dishes after you use them. At the end of your stay, please shut all lights and close windows when leaving the apartment. You may leave the keys on the dining room table. Thank you so much for your help.

name: The Local Nook // Cozy Kona Hale
summary: Our cozy and comfortable one bedroom Ohana is handcrafted from the walls itself to the artwork on them! Enjoy Kona coffee out on the patio or watch the sunset from our amazing view. Our cheery Ohana is located in the heart of Kona and five minutes drive away from the closest beach. - fast wifi - fresh clean towels and linens
space: Hello! We're Caleb + Cece. We are a husband and wife photography team that calls for a bit of traveling through out the year! We converted our parents garage into our comfy dwelling space back in 2013 when we got married. Our goal was to keep life simple and focus on our passion. This also allowed for us to travel for months on end at a time more conveniently.  Anyways, we have been heavily traveling for about three years and most years find ourselves gone just as much as we are home. We LOVE Airbnb and the experiences we've gained from staying at cute/quaint little homes all over the world. This inspired us to open up our personal home to welcome like minded travelers, adventurous couples, and business minded people like ourselves into our home. All that we ask is that you respect our little home and fully enjoy yourselves :) About the space : Our space is equipped with a full kitchen and dining area, simple living room, bedroom, full bathroom, outdoor half enclosed room, patio garden

Our cheery Ohana is located in the heart of Kona and five minutes drive away from the closest beach. - fast wifi - fresh clean towels and linens Hello! We're Caleb + Cece. We are a husband and wife photography team that calls for a bit of traveling through out the year! We converted our parents garage into our comfy dwelling space back in 2013 when we got married. Our goal was to keep life simple and focus on our passion. This also allowed for us to travel for months on end at a time more conveniently.  Anyways, we have been heavily traveling for about three years and most years find ourselves gone just as much as we are home. We LOVE Airbnb and the experiences we've gained from staying at cute/quaint little homes all over the world. This inspired us to open up our personal home to welcome like minded trave
neighborhood_overview: Because we live in a local Hawaiian family neighborhood, we ask that our guests also treat our neighbors and other locals with respect. Thank you! :)
notes: Maid service is available on request! This involves towel/bedding laundry, kitchen, bathroom, and floors. Violet or Niki will be watering all indoor and outdoor plants on Tuesdays and Fridays at 3pm.
transit: Our space is conveniently located above two main highways. We are approximately 5 minutes away from Costco, 5 minutes away from other grocery stores, 10 minutes away from the airport, 10 minutes away from downtown, and 5 minutes away from the closest beach. We recommend renting a car during your stay as our island is vast and all of the best adventures call for driving.
access: The main entrance is to the right through the white gate in front of your parking stall. We ask that guest please enter this way to give our parents and yourselves some extra privacy, though there is another entry door to the left in front of the main house entrance.
interaction: If you are staying in our home then this usually means that we will be away traveling. We try to keep our phones on hand but may not be available at times due to work or being out of the country. You will always have a host/house manager to contact if we are unavailable :)
house_rules: Quiet hours are from 9pm - 7am. Please remove shoes before entering home. Only one vehicle allowed per booking. Must tolerate kitties as our kitties do roam the property + patio :) We regularly treat our home and property for bug/pest control. Our vendors use an organic material as we have a sustainable home. But please keep in mind that we do live in the tropics and bugs can be inevitable, especially certain times of year.  Here are some things we recommend to keep the critters away : - always clean up any food or cooking messes - do not leave any food out on counters  - we also suggest keeping your shoes inside as well - keep natural bug spray handy while in the outdoors   It was quite an adjustment for us moving to the tropics from the mainland so we always like for our guests to be prepared, especially when visiting the wet side of the island! :) Basic cleaning supplies are available for any unusual messes or accidents. Please wash dishes and take out trash prior to check out. All

If the apartment vacancy is mid month, then the move in date should be on that date, and move out date on the last day of the month. WE CAN NOT ACCOMMODATE PARTIAL MONTH STAYS.  2) We reserve the right to show the unit to prospective renters during your stay. This will only be done on Monday-Friday between 12-5 pm. We will also give you one days advance notice.   3) The minimum stay is one month. This applies to all guests that may occupy the apartment.   4) Utilities are included in the rental rate. However, there is a $250 monthly utility cap. If your utilities exceed this amount, then the tenant must pay the difference.

name: The Ohana at Volcanoes National Park!
summary: Ohana: noun, Hawaiian, 1) Extended Family, 2) Guesthouse. Explore the big island with your ohana at our ohana. No cleaning fee! More reviews than any other rental in Volcano! Free travel advice! The entire guesthouse is yours! A quiet, private base for exploring the park, Ka'u, Hilo, and Puna; just 4 minutes from the park gate! Great for couples! Space for families! With solar water heating we're green! All races, religions, colors, nationalities, orientations, and genders welcome!
space: Detached guest house with its own entry: one cozy bedroom with two queen beds, full bathroom, kitchen/living room with sofa-bed.
description: Ohana: noun, Hawaiian, 1) Extended Family, 2) Guesthouse. Explore the big island with your ohana at our ohana. No cleaning fee! More reviews than any other rental in Volcano! Free travel advice! The entire guesthouse is yours! A quiet, private base for exploring the park, Ka'u, Hilo, and Puna; just 4 minutes from the park gate! Great for couples! Space for families! With solar water heating we're green! All races, religions, colors, nationalities, orientations, and genders welcome! Detached guest house with its own entry: one cozy bedroom with two queen beds, full bathroom, kitchen/living room with sofa-bed. You get the whole guest house; called an "Ohana" in Hawaii. Someone is usually home at the main house, but if you need something give me a call, or better yet use the Airbnb app. The guest house is tucked away from the road behind the main house giving you serious privacy. It's quiet because there is almost no traffic. The neighborhood is literally a rain-forest, dominated by nativ
neighborhood_overview: The guest house is tucked away from the road behind the main house giving you serious privacy. It's quiet because there is almost no traffic. The neighborhood is literally a rain-forest, dominated by native ohia trees and giant tree ferns. Our skies are so dark that on clear nights the Milky Way is stunning. Four minutes from Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park on the Big Island, this is an ideal base for touring the park and is centrally located between Ka'u and Puna. The national park is currently closed except for the Kahuku Unit in Ka'u. In the village there are five restaurants, two general stores, and a post office - check out my Guidebook for the island at the bottom of this listing. A farmer's market is held in the village every Sunday where you can get food, local produce, coffee, honey, and crafts. Local food includes the Tuk Tuk Thai food truck, the Lava Rock Cafe, Thai Thai Bistro and Bar, Ohelo Cafe, Eagle's Lighthouse Cafe,  Ono cafe, and the upper scale Kilauea Lodge and Vol
notes: TRAVEL ADVICE: Due to Airbnb's new policy of allowing cancellations within two days of booking, I'm afraid I  cannot answer extensive planning questions until after 48 hours. MAP CENTER: The map center has maps and brochures, and a map of local restaurants including my own recommendations.  TV: There is a DVD player (no cable or broadcast TV) and toys and games for the kids. COFFEE and TEA: There is complementary coffee and tea by the coffee maker in the kitchen. GROCERIES: If you will be staying a while and doing any cooking, you should get groceries in Kona or Hilo before arriving. There are local general stores, but their selection is limited and the prices are higher. GRILL: If you would like to use the grill please ask. WATER and RAIN: The house is on a catchment water system, which is fine for bathing and washing dishes. Spring water is provided for drinking and cooking. There is cedar paneling throughout, so the house smells like cedar. Please understand that we get 9 FEET (2.7
transit: The only public transportation is an infrequent bus to Hilo. There is no Uber on the island. There are some taxi services in Hilo. Kona Airport (KOA) is 2.5 hours away. Hilo Airport (ITO) is 45 minutes away.
access: You get the whole guest house; called an "Ohana" in Hawaii.

house_rules: We value safety, so we will not tolerate illegal activity, and will call the police if necessary. We follow Airbnb's rules, so please do not try to book for other people, the person booking must be part of your group. Do not re-arrange furniture or take furniture outside. You make take the coat rack outside. Only plug the space heater into a wall outlet, do not plug the space heater into a lamp outlet. Do not use the space heater and hair dryer at the same time, that trips the circuit breaker. Guest must notify host by text that they are checking out.

neighborhood_overview: Greenpoint has been one of Brooklyn's hottest and hippest neighborhood's for a few years now. With the ultra-posh Williamsburg only a few blocks south, you have access to some of the best restaurants, shopping and entertainment that Brooklyn has to offer. There are tons of amazing shops right on Franklin Street and also Manhattan Avenue (the two main thoroughfares of Greenpoint). There are new restaurants and bars all over the place, as well as access to parks, the East River (including the ferry), and public transportation. Manhattan is only a 20 minute subway ride in any direction.
transit: Parking is pretty easy in the neighborhood and there are several bus options and the G and L Trains to get you wherever you need to go!

summary: Studio in modernized building with games room, gym, computer room, ballroom and rooftop pool. The studio with modern, cheerful decor, with light vintage feel is divided into bedroom and living room with kitchen.
space: Split air conditioning and all household items. Located near Arcos da Lapa and Rua do Lavradio, the most bohemian place in Rio de Janeiro. Close to numerous museums, art galleries, show houses, restaurants and bars. Located in the famous Lapa district of Rio de Janeiro, Flat Viva Lapa offers an outdoor pool and a gym. This property is located 1 km from Largo da Carioca subway station and 2 km from the Sambódromo, one of the attractions in the carnival. The building has a contemporary design, a TV and air conditioning, split. There is a terrace, an equipped kitchen, a dining area and living room. The private bathroom has a hot shower. neighborhood_overview: The nearby cultural centers need to be visited. Do not miss Rio's newest museum: the MAR, the Imperial Palace where you can listen to good music in its graceful bistro, the cultural centers of the Bank of Brazil and Post Office and the museum of modern art. Usually they all have great exhibits, mostly for free. The night of Lapa is vibrant, lively. That's where the locals have fun. In the surroundings of the apartment there are more than ten nightclubs and places where you can listen and dance to typical Brazilian music. Traditional bars and restaurants are within walking distance of the apartment. Santa Tereza, nearby neighborhood is worth a visit. The staircase of the artist Seleron, also deserves to be visited. You can frequent the night life and come back safe walking home.
notes: Situado en el famoso barrio de Lapa, en Río de Janeiro, el plano Viva Lapa ofrece una piscina al aire libre y un gimnasio. Este establecimiento cuenta con Wi-Fi y completa se encuentra la propiedad es de 1 km de la estación de metro Largo da Carioca y 2 km del Sambódromo, una de las atracciones de la feria. El edificio cuenta con un diseño contemporáneo, TV y aire acondicionado split. Hay una terraza, una cocina, un comedor y sala de estar. El baño privado tiene una ducha de agua caliente. Usted puede disfrutar de la vista de la ciudad. En el edificio que dispone de sauna, bañera de hidromasaje y bañera de barbacoa, y otras comodidades como salas de reuniones, un salón de uso común y una sala de juegos se ofrecen. Además, hay un bar y un snack bar en el lugar. El piso es de 5 minutos de las tiendas de senderismo, restaurantes y bares. La playa de Flamengo y el estadio Maracaná son 6 km de distancia. Usted será 2.7km del aeropuerto Santos Dumont ya 18 del aeropuerto de Galeao.
transit: Easy access to all the city, several lines of bus and taxi circulate in the street Gomes Freire, with access to all the city. At 30 minutes from Copacabana, Ipanema, Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas, 20 minutes from Corcovado and Sugar Loaf and 30 minutes from the international airport (by taxi). Metro station about 20 minutes walk. About 3 minutes from the famous street of Lavradio and several nightclubs, restaurants and bars. Bakery, pharmacy and supermarket less than 1 minute walk. The most bohemian place in Rio de Janeiro. Several museums and cultural center within a 20 minute walk. Bus lines circulate in Gomes Freire to many places in the city, including Copacabana, Ipanema and Leblon. Taxis are not expensive and they circulate all the time in the area. About 500 meters from Cinelândia subway station.
access: Guests will have access to all the facilities of the building.
interaction: Guests can contact the owner anytime they need it via phone, Whatsaap or email. The owner will not be present during the stay of the guest, leaving him very at ease.
house_rules: Cinco passos para ser um ótimo hóspede e ganhar uma excelente avaliação! : 1) Não é permitido a entrada de pessoas que não estejam registradas.  2) Não é permitido barulho,  respeite as regras do condomínio.  3) Não é permitido a presença de animais.  4) If you break glasses and/or plates, you replace it, please..... 5) Não é permitido fumar dentro do apartamento, nem mesmo na janela, ótima oportunidade para ficar ao ar livre! 6) Não deixe as luzes acessas, nem o ar condicionado ligado ao sair. O ambiente e eu agradecemos! 7) Não leve as toalhas de banho para a praia, se ficarem manchadas com protetor solar terei que solicitar a sua reposição. All over, please leave it in a shape you would like to find!

name: 2 BR Oceanview - Great Location!
summary: Location, location, location... This is a great 2 bed, 2 bath condo is within walking distance to fabulous restaurants, all kinds of shopping, and even the grocery store.  Simply walk across the street to the beach for swimming, surfing & kayaking.
space: This two bedroom, two bathroom condo is located in Kihei Parkshore.  The complex has 16 units, some owner occupied, some rentals.  The condo has everything you need to enjoy island living including air conditioners in each bedroom and in the living room, comfortable beds and couches.  The kitchen is small but well equipped with the basics to cook a meal.  The lanai has an electric BBQ and is just steps from the gated pool. The condo offers beach chairs, umbrella, boogie boards and other miscellaneous beach toys.  There is also  a cooler to take to the beach or day trips around the island.

neighborhood_overview: Kihei Parkshore is located directly across from a great surfing beach.  There are several spots to rent gear and even take lessons.  A block away are several restaurants, bars and shopping.  The grocery store is just one block further.  Kalama Park is also across the street and offers horseshoes,  a playground, tennis courts, basketball courts, baseball and soccer fields.  There are also many spots to BBQ and picnic tables to enjoy your meal.

Quiet hours are from 9 pm to 8 am.  The bedrooms are located near the parking area so please be as quiet as possible so as not to disturb other occupants.

name: ★Cozy doble bedroom ★Nearby Christ the Redeemer★
summary: Stay in a quiet place with great location! Free wifi access throughout the house. Close to shops, restaurants, bakery, pharmacies, bus stops and subway. We're also close from the tram to the Christ the Redeemer! Situated on the South Zone of Rio de Janeiro, on the charming neighborhood of Laranjeiras, which lies between the city center and the beaches, the house is an ideal base to relax and explore this wonderful city.  Come see for yourself! ♡ LGBT+ guests are welcome! ♡
space: The house was built in 1927 and is preserved by the Municipal Secretariat for Cultural Heritage (SMPC). We did a restoration when we bought the house in 2007 and since then we continue to take care of this little piece of Rio's history. This spacious house has three floors. The first floor is at street level and has a private entrance. The second floor is one level below the street and is the main floor of the house. This is where you will find the kitchen, the shared bathroom, the dining room and the workspace. The third floor is two levels down the street and although our wall of ferns and our roof garden take nature to all floors, it is here that you can enjoy our quiet, secluded green courtyard. You won't even feel like you are in the city! It's also here who stays our living room and laundry room. The cozy double bedroom is on the second floor and in it you will find ceiling fan, towel rack, mirror, hair dryer, plenty of space for your clothes and all the necessary for your comfor

Situated on the South Zone of Rio de Janeiro, on the charming neighborhood of Laranjeiras, which lies between the city center and the beaches, the house is an ideal base to relax and explore this wonderful city.  Come see for yourself! ♡ LGBT+ guests are welcome! ♡ The house was built in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and is preserved by the Municipal Secretariat for Cultural Heritage (SMPC). The first floor is at street level and has a private entrance. The second floor is one level below the street and is the main floor of the house. This is where you will find the kitchen, the sh
neighborhood_overview: Laranjeiras is a traditional neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro, very wooded and quiet, which has several leisure alternatives and tourist attractions. It's a very charming neighborhood. Located in the heart of Rio de Janeiro, near the beaches of the South Zone, the City Center, Lapa, Santa Teresa and the Botanical Garden. It is here in Laranjeiras that you take the train to climb to the statue of Christ the Redeemer. The neighborhood is great for those who want to travel around the city using public transportation, by bicycle or arriving quickly and without spending so much, as the distances are short, by taxi or Uber.  The region has supermarkets, bakeries, bars, restaurants, pharmacies, banks and fairs. Its streets are well wooded and shaded, providing a fresh and pleasant climate. Due to the fact it is a relatively cheap neighborhood to live in, (as opposed to others in the South Zone of Rio), many musicians, artists, painters, sculptors, actors, filmmakers, photographers live here. Ma
notes: ￫  Feel free to smoke in our outdoor area, but never in any room inside the house. OK? ♡
transit: The house is 2 minutes walk from Rua das Laranjeiras (the main avenue that goes through the neighbourhood). Here, apart from a varied collection of shops, bars and restaurants you will also find taxi ranks and bus stops to help you get around the city at your convenience. The bus stop where the bus lines connecting the Laranjeiras neighborhood to the main points of the city are two minutes walk from the house. A few minutes on foot, there is a Bike Itaú Station where you can rent a bike.Rio has many cycle paths on the beaches, in tourist spots and in some neighborhoods of the South Zone and the Center, as well as Laranjeiras, which is connected by bike paths. For those who love to ride a bike, it is a great way to visit several parts of the city.   The nearest metro station (Largo do Machado) is 18 minutes away (walking calmly), 5 minutes by bus or 9 minutes by bike.    There are two bus lines that run in front of the house (the bus stop is just a few meters away): - the line 133 that
access: House access 24/7 via safe digital lock. Guests have 24/7 access to all common areas on the second and  third floor.   The comon areas are shared with the guests from another two rooms who I also rent through AirBnB, but the house is big and you have privacy even with a full house. If you want to take a look at the other ads, here is the link: https://www.airbnb.com.br/users/59638323/listings Our kitchen is equipped with all mod cons and is available for use 24/7. In it you will always find  coffee powder, sugar, sweetener and also water at our bottled water cooler. In the bathrooms you will find electric showers with instantly hot water for a relaxing shower. In our laundry, in addition to the washing machine you will also find laundry soap. Guests will always receive in addition to the bed linen, towels, soap and shampoo.
interaction: My co-host, Edson, lives on the first floor of the house. But it has a private entrance. I live nearby (2 minutes), but I'm always attentive to the messages and try to respond as quickly as possible. We like to respect each person's way of been. Also, this is your trip... We respect your privacy, but you can contact us when you need it. ☺
house_rules: ENGLISH / ESPAÑOL  / PORTUGUÊS • Feel free to smoke in our outdoor area, but never in any room inside the house. And remember to put  the buts of the cigarettes in the provided ashtrays. OK? • Parties are not allowed because we like to keep a quiet house. But visitors are welcome, they just cannot spend the night. • Please enjoy and respect the noise curfew between 10pm and 8am. • As the kitchen is for collective use, we ask that you help us to keep it clean and tidy. Please always wash what you use.  • Avoid leaving your personal belongings in the house´s common areas, please keep them in your room. • The refrigerator is at your disposal. But please, remove your food before you check-out or let us know that  and later we do it for you. • Please do not  throw toilet paper or any other sanitary products in the toilet. We have trash bins in all the bathrooms. • Please don't consuming food and drink in the bedrooms. Enjoy our dining room and our garden. • Please try to reduce electricity
