neighborhood_overview: This enigmatic city of skyscrapers, ancient traditions and heavenly food will fascinate, whether it's your first visit or your 50th. Culture Beyond the glass and steel of Hong Kong’s commercial persona, the city also boasts a vibrant cultural scene that features the eclectic influences of its Chinese roots, colonial connections and a wondrous pool of homegrown talent. Here, you’re just as likely to find yourself applauding at Asia’s top film festival as joining in dawn taichi or reading the couplets of a local poet to the drumbeat of a dragon boat. Culture could also mean indie music under the stars, a classy art walk, your first Cantonese opera – not to mention the exhibitions and events staged year-round at the many museums and concert halls. Why I Love Hong Kong I love Hong Kong because it has a complexity that eludes definition, sometimes even by its own people. I can be soul-searching near the Chinese border, lunching with Sikhs at a Sikh temple, splurging on a set of kitchen kniv
notes: Please note that not every neighbor is happy about the New Sharing Economy. If we want them to understand the 21st century :-) we should respect normal house rules like:  -no party after 10pm -be quiet in the staircase/hallway -don't ring at neighbours bell because you cannot find the key in your handbag -don't throw things out of the window Although the apartment is on a very high standard and equipped like a serviced apartment - I am still a private host but not a Hotel with fully employed staff and a front desk. Me and my team are always happy to assist - but if can take time to follow your not urgent request (like 1 more towel). Well, in case that shiny Hotel style entrances and hallways are more important to you than an airbnb Hong Kong LOCAL apartment in a Hong Kong usual residential style apartment - you might want to look elsewhere. There is 24/7 video surveillance and the lifts are operating 24/7.  Just keep in mind it's NOT a new building but the building and environment is a

Detergents for washing machine and dish washer are provided for a stay of 3 nights. My stand-by guest manager will happily provide more supplies on request for small additional costs.

I am online while using the following tools: airbnb thread, e-mail, phone, we chat, viber, line etc. Let me know your preferred communication tool.

name: Inner City Terrace - 2 rooms 2 beds - 4 ppl.
summary: Our home is located in Darlington, a small niche suburb of Sydney with a relaxed, friendly and safe atmosphere. We are located a 10 min walk to Broadway, Glebe, Newtown, The University, surrounded by fantastic restaurants, cafes, pubs, markets and public transport. It is a 20 min walk to the city centre.
space: Our house is a classic 110 year old renovated inner city terrace with original timber floorboards, fireplaces and high ceilings. We have kept the rustic charm to the front section of the house, with the kitchen and bathrooms being renewed.  Our kitchen is well equipped with a gas stove, appliances and utensils. We also have a pantry of cooking essentials, an assortment of teas and Italian ground coffee.  There are two rooms with this listing in our 110 year old renovated inner city terrace. The room is on the second level and contains a new double bed with advanced comfort and support, double wardrobe with polished original timber floors. The second room is the attic on the third floor and has skylights with views over the suburb and contains a new double bed with advanced comfort and support, and a comfortable chair to relax in the morning sun. neighborhood_overview: Darlington is a small inner city suburb of Sydney surrounded by many trendy suburbs like Surry Hills, Glebe and Newtown, all with a great mix of shops, cafes, restaurants, bars and people. We are within a 15 min walk to the below; Arts: Seymour Centre and the Carriageworks, performing arts theatres,  Attractions: Chinatown, Darling Harbour, Fish Markets, QVB. Markets: Eveleigh farmers markets, funky Glebe markets and Paddys, Food: @ Glebe, Newtown and Surry Hills. Pubs: Ask for a list.... how much time do you have? Shopping: Broadway, Central Park University: University of Sydney & UTS.  The city is a pleasant 30 min walk or easily accessible by public transport.
notes: There are detailed instructions on how to arrive to our house by various methods once you have booked. We also would consider people looking for long term stays or WHV, please send me an email with the details.
transit: •Darlington is approximately 2 klm's to the centre of the city. •3.8 klm's to Circular Quay and Sydney Harbour. •A 5-10 min walk to Redfern or 15-20 min walk to Central train station. •There are buses to the city 5 min's away at Broadway. •Sydney airport is  9 klm's. •There is off street parking or a parking station at the end of the street. •There are two shopping centres (Broadway & Central park) and another supermarket (Spar Redfern) all within a 10 min walk for any grocery or shopping needs.
access: Please enjoy all areas of the house, relax on the lounge, turn on the TV or radio, enjoy a book or magazine from the bookshelf, prepare a delicious meal in the kitchen, there is also a tranquil garden to relax in out the backyard. * CHECK IN/OUT: We are flexible with guests arrival and departure times. Guests can arrive in the morning to leave luggage, or welcome to leave luggage for the day if they have an afternoon/evening departure.
interaction: We have a good knowledge of restaurants, bars and clubs, tourist attractions and sights to see in Sydney and other parts of Australia. There are maps of Sydney and Australia and guidebooks on the bookshelf. We are happy to assist with information or let you explore on your own.
house_rules: We enjoy sharing our home with you and other Airbnb guests, please be considerate, enjoy the house, treat it with respect and apply some common sense! We are relaxed and easy going, we do not have rules or a curfew, however from our hosting experience we have generated some simple guidelines; •	Please ensure the house is locked for everyone's safety and security when you leave.  •	If you cook or use things in the kitchen place it in the dishwasher, and if you make a mess please clean it up. •	Please be considerate when using the bathroom, and be thoughtful for the next person to use it.  •	Please hang wet towels behind the door or on the rack provided. •	We enjoy cooking and are happy to share what we have in the fridge or pantry, but please do not freeload, for longer stays please be thoughtful by replacing or buying your own products. •	We appreciate that people enjoy their own space, may be tired after a long day or have limited/basic English. name: Kowloon Mongkok 1812 Twin Room A, near station
summary: Located at center of Mongkok. 3 mins walk to Mongkok railway station & the biggest shopping mall of the area – Langham Place. Clean & tidy room with free wifi. Free luggage storage service: starts from 9:30am on check in day / until 6pm on the check out day.
space: Located at center of Mongkok. 3 mins walk to Mongkok railway station & the biggest shopping mall of the area – Langham Place. Clean & tidy room with free wifi. Please feel free to ask for if you want to explore Hong Kong in local way, I have many suggestions for restaurants and places to go. Public Transportation  Mongkok railway station, bus stops are nearby, you can go anywhere easily. Getting here from Airport:  Airport Bus (recommended): Take A21 bus, get off at Nathan Road, our place is opposite to the bus stop. Railway: take airport express to Tsing Yi Station, then take Hong Kong Line to Lai King Station, then take Central line to Mongkok Station. The nearest exit is E1 Exit. *photos are references, room decoration will be a bit different, but generally similar. And all the facilities are the same.

neighborhood_overview: Mong Kok is one of Hong Kong's liveliest districts and includes popular markets, shopping streets, stalls and malls. The neon-bathed historic streets that wind through one of the densest parts of the world are worth visiting.  The neighbourhood includes one of Hong Kong’s most popular markets, the Ladies' Market, and also has a ton of shopping streets, which are a common feature in southern China. Conveniently, these are where a cluster of merchants sell one type of product on a single street. Mong Kok has entire streets and street sections dedicated to the sale of goldfish, flowers, birds, sneakers, and kitchenware. ･Sai Yeung Choi Street sells electronics, cosmetics and clothes. ･Shantung Street and Dundas Street are where you can pick up the latest Japanese and Western fashion and accessories. ･Langham Place is one of the many malls where you can do your Mong Kok shopping in air-conditioned comfort.
transit: The nearest railway station is Mongkok station (3 mins walk). And there are lots of bus routes running near my place. (Airport bus to Airport is just downstairs of my place). You can go anywhere in Hong Kong easily.
interaction: Please feel free to ask if you want to explore Hong Kong in local way, I have many suggestions for restaurants and places to go.
house_rules: Please keep quiet after 11pm. Thanks

name: Spacious, bright, central. AC. Rambla Catalunya
summary: Spacious bright and stylish 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment in the very central Eixample area, ideal for seeing the whole city. Reception open daily 9AM - 10PM with large terrace for all guests. Wi-Fi, satellite TV and well-equipped kitchen. The apartment is spacious and full of natural light. The double glazing keeps it nice and quiet. Modern decor, comfortable furnishings, wooden floor. The living room has 2 balconies onto a lively street. 3 bedrooms look onto an inner terrace.
space: Four-bedroom two-bathroom apartment, ideal for a group of eight people. The master bedroom has a queen-size bed, the other three bedrooms have got two single beds each.  The spacious and bright living room has two balconies that look onto the street. Three bedrooms look onto the inner terrace, one onto the inner courtyard. The decor is modern and comfortable, with wooden flooring. The kitchen is fully equipped, there is also an extra dining area. This luxury apartment is located in the Eixample, near many famous modernista (Catalan Art Nouveau) buildings and close to the charming and historically interesting area of Ciutat Vella. There is free Wi-Fi and TV with international channels. Fresh bed linen and towels are provided. The towels are changed every other day and the sheets every week. The reception desk is open daily from 9 am to 6 pm and our friendly staff are on hand to make recommendations and help you with anything you might need.

The double glazing keeps it nice and quiet. Modern decor, comfortable furnishings, wooden floor. The living room has 2 balconies onto a lively street. 3 bedrooms look onto an inner terrace. Four-bedroom two-bathroom apartment, ideal for a group of eight people. The master bedroom has a queen-size bed, the other three bedrooms have got two single beds each.  The spacious and bright living room has two balconies that look onto the street. Three bedrooms look onto the inner terrace, one onto the inner courtyard. The decor is modern and comfortable, with wooden flooring. The kitchen is fully equipped, there is also an extra dining area. This luxury apartment is located in the Eixample, near many famo
neighborhood_overview: The Eixample is the Catalan Art Nouveau centre of the city. The area was built in the late 19th and early 20th century and the architecture of the neigbourhood is stunning, with some real gems to explore. A few steps from your apartment you’ll be able to feast your eyes on amazing buildings such as Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and the lesser-known but stunning Casa Amatller. The area is one of the cultural and shopping heart of the city. You’ll find designer stores and high street brands next to all sorts of great restaurants and bars. A short walk (5 minutes) will get you to the bustling old city, where you’ll have another great selection of shops, markets, museums, art galleries, restaurants and bars to choose from. The area boasts great transport links and you’ll be able to get to all ends of the city in a few minutes by underground, overground, bus and taxi.
notes: City tax is not included (2,48€ per person per night) and is payable upon arrival. HUTB-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)B
transit: Passeig de Gràcia: overground trains to Figueras, Girona, France, airport T2 etc. Metro lines L2, L3 and L4. Plaça Catalunya: overground trains to Sitges etc.  Buses: there are dozens of buses that stop nearby. You can easily get a bus from Plaça Catalunya to the beach, for example. Aerobus: the airport bus runs every few minutes throughout the day and leaves from Plaça Catalunya.
access: The reception desk at the building just across the road is open daily from 9 AM to 10 PM. For arrivals later than 10 PM an automated check-in system is available. Check-in is from 2 PM. Check-out is by 11 AM. Lockers are available for earlier arrivals or later departures.
interaction: The reception desk at the building just across the road is open daily from 9 AM to 10 PM and our friendly staff are on hand to make recommendations and help you with anything you might need.  Outside these times a member of staff is always on call for any emergencies and you will have their direct line.

É perto do Shopping Rio Design Barra e do Barra Shopping (10 min), poucos minutos do Outback. E 14 km do RIR.

neighborhood_overview: O local é super calmo e gostoso. Muito seguro. Possui guarita de segurança. Fica a 10 min dos shoppings Rio Design Barra e Barra Shopping. 5 min do restaurante Outback.  Ha pontos de onibus perto. Servico constante de taxi e uber. Caso a opção seja vir de carro temos garagem coberta.  Ficar dentro do condominio também é delicioso, pois tem ampla area de lazer com piscinas, sauna, academia, quadras, churrasqueira, salao de festa.
notes: É necessario me enviar com antecedencia para liberacao na guarita de seguranca do condominio o nome completo, numero da RG, CPF, data de nascimento de todos os ocupantes.  Se vierem com veiculo precisa enviar tambem, placa, cor, modelo e Marca.

neighborhood_overview: Griffintown is a former industrial district of the hearth of Montreal where old factories are now renovated to be beautiful housing buildings. The neighborhood has a lot of great restaurants, cafes and clubs, and it is perfectly located, a few minutes away from downtown, old town, old port and the Lachine canal.
notes: Parking is often available on the street or you can have a guaranteed spot right across the street on the Vinci Parking (not free)  Feel free to use the kitchen amenities, the basic products like seasoning, and the tea, coffee and sugar that are made available for you. And if you are here to visit the city you can borrow the travel guides and bring them with you during the day as long as you don't forget to put it back ;)
transit: Bonaventure station on the orange line is 5 min walk, or you can walk 1 block and catch a bus to downtown or old port.

name: O charme de estar em frente à praia
summary: Apart-hotel em frente a praia. Aconchegante e com um espetacular amanhecer e entardecer. Varanda ampla para poder realizar as refeições aproveitando a vista da praia e das piscinas. Lindo! Pertinho das melhores praias do Rio de Janeiro, shopping, cinemas, excelentes restaurantes e barzinhos.
space: Aconchegante, em frente à praia e inteirinho pra vc aproveitar dias incríveis. Você, separado da praia apenas por uma ciclovia. Desça do apto e esteja na areia da praia.

Praia, academia, piscina externa e interna(quente), restaurante dentro do prédio, sauna, garagem privativa, internet no apartamento, TV a cabo. Sempre que for solicitado, deixando-os à vontade para realizar contato quando precisarem. Para quem ama praia como eu, viver em frente ao mar é a chance de acordar a cada dia mais feliz. house_rules: Respeitem as regras do Apart. Após as 22h não é permitido barulho com risco de multas previstas nas regras do condomínio, além disso durante o tempo restante respeite o seu vizinho, ele também poderá estar de férias e querendo descansar. É permitido fumar nas áreas abertas do prédio. Utilizem o ar-condicionado com consciência ecológica, desligando-o sempre que não estiverem no imóvel. Mantenha o imóvel sempre limpo e cuide dos móveis e demais utensílios com cuidado. Esta é também a minha casa e gostaria que tudo fosse cuidado com carinho. Não é permitido exceder o número de 4 pessoas no apartamento, sendo 2 adultos e 2 crianças. Quaisquer multa geradas pelos hóspedes no período de sua permanência devido ao não cumprimento das normas internas do condomínio, deverá ser paga antes do check-out.

name: Colourful apt in Plateau/Mile End
summary: Located on the border of two of Montreal’s hippest neighbourhoods (Mile End and the Plateau Mont Royal), this apartment is only a minute away from your choice of restaurants, bars, shops, boutiques, grocery stores, an SAQ (for buying wines and liquor) and pretty much everything you could possibly want. There are also several parks nearby, including Mont Royal, for which the city is name. NOTE: The bedroom sleeps 2 (double bed) and the living room can sleep another 2 (queen-size air mattress).
space: The apartment has beautiful hardwood floors and lots of natural light. The kitchen is large and sunny, with a table seating 6. It is fully equipped (fridge, stove, oven, toaster oven, blender, hand blender, mixer, etc.), and has all the spices and basics you would need to make a home-cooked meal, should that be your preference. Off the kitchen in the rear of the apartment, you’ll find one of the two patios, where you can enjoy the afternoon and evening sun.  The living room is warm and inviting, with super comfy couches, a TV and DVD player, and a door leading to the front balcony. The bedroom is large and sleeps two in the double bed, and there’s room for a Pack ‘n Play, for those with little ones. There is also a queen-size air mattress, which can be used in the living room to sleep two more. (If you would like the air mattress set up for your arrival, please let me know in advance.) The apartment includes a washer and dryer, hair dryer, linens (towels and sheets), WiFi internet, A/C
description: Located on the border of two of Montreal’s hippest neighbourhoods (Mile End and the Plateau Mont Royal), this apartment is only a minute away from your choice of restaurants, bars, shops, boutiques, grocery stores, an SAQ (for buying wines and liquor) and pretty much everything you could possibly want. There are also several parks nearby, including Mont Royal, for which the city is name. NOTE: The bedroom sleeps 2 (double bed) and the living room can sleep another 2 (queen-size air mattress). The apartment has beautiful hardwood floors and lots of natural light. The kitchen is large and sunny, with a table seating 6. It is fully equipped (fridge, stove, oven, toaster oven, blender, hand blender, mixer, etc.), and has all the spices and basics you would need to make a home-cooked meal, should that be your preference. Off the kitchen in the rear of the apartment, you’ll find one of the two patios, where you can enjoy the afternoon and evening sun.  The living room is warm and inviting, w
neighborhood_overview: Located on the border of two of Montreal’s hippest neighbourhoods (Mile End and the Plateau Mont Royal), this apartment is only a minute away from your choice of restaurants, bars, shops, boutiques, grocery stores, an SAQ (for buying wines and liquor) and pretty much everything you could possibly want. There are also several parks nearby, including Mont Royal, for which the city is name.
notes: Check In Check in time is 3 pm. Early check in will need to be arranged in advance. Check Out Check out time is 11 am. Should you wish to stay beyond 11 am, please arrange this in advance. Windows and Doors Please note that not all windows in the house have screens. For fresh air, please only open the windows that have screens in order to avoid an invasion of insects. Please make sure all windows and doors are locked upon checkout. Air Mattress If you would like the air mattress set up before your arrival, please let me know. If you would like the living room clear, feel free to set it up yourself. It is quite easy as the air pump does all the work for you!
transit: The apartment is a block away from the intersection of two main streets, Mont-Royal Ave and St Laurent Blvd. Wander east, and within minutes you hit St. Denis, another great street for window-shopping or people-watching. To the north, you have the trendy Mile End with its main streets, Laurier, Fairmount, St-Viateur, and Bernard. Walk west and you can venture to Parc Avenue and the Mountain (Mont Royal). And, if you like discovering a city by walking, you can enjoy the Quartier des Spectacles to the south (where all of the festivals are held), Parc La Fontaine (to the south east), Outremont (to the north and west of Mile End), and Little Italy and the Jean Talon Market (north of Mile End). Should you prefer using public transit, Laurier and Mount Royal metro stations (both on the orange line) are each about an 7-10 minute walk. Once on the metro, you can be in Old Montreal or downtown within 10-15 minutes. There are also buses traveling east-west on Mont-Royal Ave, north on St-Laurent
access: You will have access to the entire apartment except for a closet in the bedroom and a spare room with my personal effects. In lieu of the closet, you can use the dresser and a rolling garment rack.
interaction: While it is unlikely that I will be able to greet you personally, you will be given my phone number and e-mail address. As well, you will have the contact information for the cleaner and my neighbours, who will be able to answer your questions or help out in case of an emergency.
house_rules: * Make sure to lock the door as you leave the house either using the top or bottom locks. It DOES NOT lock on its own. Before leaving the apartment during check-out, make sure that you have taken all of your belongings. Please leave the keys on the kitchen table and lock the door from the inside, using the lock on the door handle. * There is no smoking in the apartment, but you can smoke on the front and back balcony. * Please leave your shoes on the shoe rack near the front door. * When showering, please open the bathroom window. * Children should be supervised at all times. * Please do not take any cutlery, utensils, or other kitchen items of any kind. * Please, do not damage the walls or windows, or make changes or additions to the premises, including changing or installing new locks.  * Please do not allow unauthorized persons onto the premises. * Please leave the local town guides for the next visitors.

neighborhood_overview: Escape to paradise with a beautiful beachfront tropical resort set on 6 acres with lush landscaped gardens, swaying palm trees, all sitting on the beachfront. Enjoy the three-story plantation style resort to soak up the sunshine on the beach or the beach side outdoor pool and hot tub while you sip on your favorite tropical drink from the poolside bar, or take advantage of the ocean side grills for an evening barbecue. Located on a sandy beach with breathtaking views of the blue Pacific Ocean and year-round cool trade winds. Accommodations include spacious air conditioned rooms with a private lanai with ocean or exotic tropical garden views. Walk to the popular Coconut Marketplace with dozens of boutique shops and restaurants. Located on the East-side just 7 miles north of the airport that is convenient for trips north, south, and west on the island. Renting from a privately managed unit gives you all the advantages for less the cost.

name: Spacious bedroom with a trundle bed in Botafogo
summary: A bedroom for two in a beautiful colonial style home built in the early 20th century. Located in Botafogo in a quiet village with lots of vegetation just minutes from one of the landmarks of Rio. The neighborhood features many leisure activities.
space: Nowadays houses in major cities are uncommon, so consider my home as a very special place. It is one-storey and lies in a very private village with 24-hour security. A perfect place to rest after a day of discoveries!
description: A bedroom for two in a beautiful colonial style home built in the early 20th century. Located in Botafogo in a quiet village with lots of vegetation just minutes from one of the landmarks of Rio. The neighborhood features many leisure activities. Nowadays houses in major cities are uncommon, so consider my home as a very special place. It is one-storey and lies in a very private village with 24-hour security. A perfect place to rest after a day of discoveries! The guest is free to use; the blue bathroom and lavatory, living room, dining room, kitchen and laundry room. I wish my guests have the best experience as possible. I will be available to help with whatever you need. I can give you many tips on amazing places that will add to the traditional tourist itinerary. Botafogo is a neighborhood that features plenty of good restaurants, cultural centers, pubs, cinemas, markets. Here you'll live an authentic carioca style. The house is located in a privileged area, we're very close to Copa
neighborhood_overview: Botafogo is a neighborhood that features plenty of good restaurants, cultural centers, pubs, cinemas, markets. Here you'll live an authentic carioca style. The house is located in a privileged area, we're very close to Copacabana, Ipanema, Gávea, Lapa and downtown Rio. The House is a haven of comfort and tranquility after a full day.
notes: The house has 3 bedrooms.  We have 2 bedrooms to receive guests. This listing is about the blue bedroom that has a trundle bed, a desk, a chair, wooden wardrobes, a chest of drawers and a ceiling fan. The wifi is free for the guests' use. As for September/2016 the bedroom will have air conditioning. From Monday to Friday my father stays in the house. He works out all day, so you'll just see him in the morning and at night.  On the weekends I stay in the house.
transit: Subway just over 10 minutes away, providing access to areas such as Lapa, Largo do Machado, Catete and many other places. Buses at all times in front of the house will take you to the beach in just 10 minutes. Walk to the pond as a morning activity or in the evening.
access: The guest is free to use; the blue bathroom and lavatory, living room, dining room, kitchen and laundry room.
interaction: I wish my guests have the best experience as possible. I will be available to help with whatever you need. I can give you many tips on amazing places that will add to the traditional tourist itinerary.
house_rules: Espero que você se sinta à vontade como se estivesse em sua casa. Desta mesma forma desejo que os hóspedes sejam cuidadosos e zelosos para com o uso da casa. Respeitem a convivência harmoniosa entre os vizinhos. Não leve pra dormir em casa outras pessoas que não forem as combinadas. Use com consciência a água e a energia elétrica.

name: Apartamento Centro histórico

Inserida numa zona privilegiada com proximidade a várias atracções como o rio, museus, igrejas e monumentos. Dispôe de um quarto com duas camas individuais e caso seja necessário , até um máximo de 4 hóspedes, há duas camas desmontáveis prontas a instalar. Dispomos também de berço para bebés. Zona com estacionamento público.

name: Amazing Ocean View Condo in Wailea!
summary: This amazing 3 bedroom/2 bath condo has +1,700 sq ft of living space with a huge wrap-around lanai for enjoying whale watching, ocean breezes, and beautiful sunsets. The condo has a warm inviting homey feel that appeals to both adults and children.
space: Welcome to one of the best updated and unique 3 bedroom condos in Wailea. Not only does this ground floor condo have great ocean views; it has a cozy and comfortable interior that was designed to be both energy efficient (all new energy saving appliances), environmentally friendly (bamboo cabinetry and blinds throughout), and all new tile and carpet throughout that provides a warm inviting homey feel that appeals to both adults and young children alike. This 3 bedroom / 2 bath condo has approximately 1,500 sq ft of living space and a huge wrap-around lanai for enjoying whale watching, ocean breezes, and beautiful sunsets. Each room has its own flat screen TV, ceiling fan, and AC unit. The huge master bedroom has a California King bed with beautiful hand carved mahogany furniture, a double-sink master bath with a travertine shower, a walk-in closet, and a private lanai for enjoying a cup of coffee in the morning or a glass of wine in the evening. You will be hard pressed to drag the kid

Not only does this ground floor condo have great ocean views; it has a cozy and comfortable interior that was designed to be both energy efficient (all new energy saving appliances), environmentally friendly (bamboo cabinetry and blinds throughout), and all new tile and carpet throughout that provides a warm inviting homey feel that appeals to both adults and young children alike. This 3 bedroom / 2 bath condo has approximately 1,500 sq ft of living space and a huge wrap-around lanai for enjoying whale watching, ocean breezes, and beautiful sunsets. Ônibus na porta  tanto para ir ou voltar da zona sul(Copacabana,Leblon,Ipanema,Rodoviaria. Novo Rio, etc...)As maiores e melhores casas de shows da cidade ficam na Barra da Tijuca como Metropolitan, Barra Music, Arena HSBC, teatros,etc.
notes: Não permitido mais de quatro pessoas no período de hospedagem ,animais domésticos e  fumantes.
transit: Transporte urbano em frente ao prédio para Copacabana,Ipanema,Leblon,etc.  pela orla ida e volta. Ônibus ida e volta para Rodoviaria Novo Rio na porta do prédio. Ônibus direto do Aeroporto Galeão para o Terminal Rodoviario BRT que fica 15 minutos a pé do prédio. O bairro tem também Metrô para Zona Sul que leva em torno de 15 minutos.O prédio possui garagem para o hóspede.
access: Acesso a todo apartamento inclusive aos utensílios de cozinha como loucas,pratos,cafeteiras, fogão geladeira. No banheiro , aquecedor à gás,secador de cabelo ,sabonete, papel higiênico e toalhas.Garagem e piscina com a apresentação do atestado médico.

house_rules: O Hóspede não poderá levar mais de tres pessoas além  dele ,pois o apartamento só comporta 04 pessoas confortavelmente. Na chegada ele assinará um Termo de Estadia da Administração do prédio e nele constará o nome das 04  pessoas que serão hospedadas, caso haja uma quinta pessoas , não será permitida a entrada dela, por esse motivo que não é cobrada a taxa extra para hóspede a mais. O preço da diária  é só para 04 pessoas.

neighborhood_overview: A Barra da Tijuca dispensa comentários, e a localização do apartamento na minha opinião sincera é a melhor possível, realmente na rua da praia em um ponto central e muito bem frequentado entre os postos 4 e 5, um dos mais tradicionais condomínios da Barra da Tijuca O Bairro calmo e imponente, a Barra da Tijuca é uma das zonas de maior interesse no Rio de Janeiro, e o condomínio em questão é tradicional e de alto padrão, vizinhança tranquila e não barulhenta.  O fato de ser na frente da praia é um atrativo à mais para quem curte da aquele mergulho, as águas são maravilhosas, e sem tubarão é claro! Sua proximidade ao parque olímpico e à maioria das instalações das Olimpíadas Rio 2016 foi um atrativo à mais para quem veio por causa do evento internacional. E também para você que pretende vir e curtir o melhor do mar do Rio e ao mesmo tempo estar perto do seu objetivo na Barra da Tijuca o mais lindo bairro do Rio de Janeiro.
notes: Queremos que o hospede se sinta em casa e sejam cuidadosos ao utilizar os utensílios que estarão lá para melhor servi-los, itens como panela de pressão elétrica e de arroz também elétrica estarão disponíveis para vocês cozinharem com muita praticidade, se precisar de ajuda para utilizar ajudaremos é só falar, também temos disponíveis panelas convencionais e fogão de 6 bocas à gás.
transit: Transporte publico na porta do condomínio (praia da Barra). Tem ponto de Taxi convencional dentro do condomínio, e serviço de táxi executivo funciona ao lado no Hotel Sheraton, e o UBER chega super rápido aqui. Região de fácil acesso a toda a cidade e fica perto da maioria dos locais onde as Olimpíadas Rio 2016 ocorreram! Como alternativa temos também o transporte fluvial nos fundos do condomínio, onde é possível pegar balsa para atravessar ou mesmo pode agendar um passeio pelo canal que percorre todo o bairro da Barra da Tijuca, uma bela forma de se conhecer melhor esse paraíso que chamamos Barra ---------------------------------------------------------------- TRANSPORTE PARA A BARRA DA TIJUCA ---------------------------------------------------------------- DICAS DE TRANSPORTE: ***** SEMPRE PERGUNTE ANTES DE EMBARCAR, SE O DESTINO É A ALVORADA na Barra da Tijuca ou se o ônibus vai passar pela praia de nome Av. Lúcio Costa para você poder descer na nossa porta:  ***** Para transporte d
access: *Quarto é privativo com tranca na porta, você fica com as chaves! *Maquina de lavar disponível para uso de forma compartilhada! *Utensílios de cozinha disponíveis para uso de forma compartilhada! *Utilizar todo o apartamento de forma compartilhada, A SUÍTE É SUA!  Todo o condomínio,  Incluso quadras de futebol, tênis, basket, e volley, piscinas adulto e infantil, saunas seca e vapor, acadêmia, quadras, Academia do prédio, Salões de Jogos, Parquinhos,  etc. Vagas de estacionamento ilimitadas no condomínio. Ônibus de luxo exclusivo do condomínio que sai de segunda a sexta-feira para Centro, Botafogo e Tijuca, a grade dos horários e itinerários está disponível no apartamento e o passe deve ser solicitado ao anfitrião. __ Kit Beach (Free): **No apartamentos temos cadeiras de praia e barraca que disponibilizamos para uso coletivo.   __ Kit Bike ( Pago ) ***  Tem ponto de retirada de bike alugada que fica ao lado do condomínio, é um programa do governo em parceria com o Itau, você aluga pelo
interaction: Me chamo Assunção de Fatima e sou a anfitriã. Sou uma senhora sozinha, meu filho Israel está sempre por perto para ajudar mas não mora comigo. Não saio muito, adoro cozinhar, jogar candy crush e ver Tv. Vocês vão ter a Suíte disponível com banheiro privado integrado, Tv a cabo da operadora NET com canais HD e digitais , Ar Condicionado Digital com controle remoto, cama Queen com colchão de Molas Ensacadas, Sofa-cama e opção de até + 2 colchões de solteiro de verdade da Ortobom no chão e tudo o mais incluindo a chave da porta da suíte. A cozinha fica também, de forma compartilhada, à disposição caso queiram cozinhar. Você sempre vai encontrar a cozinha super limpa e arrumada e apenas deve mante-la organizada e limpa como encontrou.
house_rules: Check-in e Check-out no Quarto no horário do anuncio. *(Bônus)  Se precisar nós permitimos chegar *antes ou sair ** depois, vocês podem deixar suas coisas aos cuidados de sua anfitriã e permanecer no condomínio até o horário de entrada no quarto / partida (* 09 às **18 Horas) caso queira aproveitar a manhã do primeiro dia e a tarde do último. Porem no dia da sua partida o quarto e banheiro devem ser devolvido até no máximo 11 da manhã e no dia da sua chegada só podemos garantir o ingresso no quarto após as 13 horas. Durante o período que guardarmos suas bagagens vocês poderão utilizar os banheiro masculino e feminino e usar os chuveirões unisex que ficam junto à nossa sauna no pavimento térreo (chuveirão sem portar, deve usar roupa de banho). *Solicite sempre na sua reserva o "late check out" se for sair depois das 11 horas, e por favor informe se vai chegar mais cedo que 13 horas para tudo estar perfeito na sua chegada! name: Kiahuna 307: Corner Condo Over The Moir Gardens
summary: Kiahuna 307 Beautiful one bedroom condo at the wonderful tropical Kiahuna Plantation. Wonderful interiors, sleeps 5. Short walk to beaches. Free midsize rental car.
space: *Free mid-size car while cars are available. Not valid with any other special offers. Car can be upgraded for minimal fee, unlimited mileage and taxes included, and is picked-up and dropped-off at the airport. Cars are on a 24 hour basis so if flight arrival and departure times exceed the number of days reserved, there will be an additional charge. KIAHUNA PLANTATION 307 Experience a rare slice of tropical serenity when you stay at this one-bedroom plantation condo with room for five. Not only are you steps away from fun in the sun at Kiahuna Beach, but you’ll also have exclusive balcony views of world-class Moir Gardens. Wake up to the sounds of exotic birds, then sip morning coffee on your private lanai while admiring rare cacti, orchids, and succulents in the botanical gardens below. With lively island décor, comfy furnishings, and a breezy, open living space, it won’t take long to settle into vacation mode. The chef of the group will love cooking in the perfectly appointed kitchen.

With lively island décor, comfy furni
neighborhood_overview: Located on the gorgeous island of Kauai on the south shore Poipu. Gorgeous sunny sandy beaches. Awesome shopping and restaurants.
notes: Start your day off with a latte from local favorite Little Fish Coffee across the street, then pop into a few boutiques for an island souvenir at Poipu Shopping Village. From there, the world is your oyster. Tee-off at Kiahuna Golf Club a half a mile up the road, or grab a towel and some sunscreen and make the short 5-minute walk to award-winning Poipu Beach for paddle boarding, snorkeling, or sunbathing. Depending on the season, you may even spot some breaching whales! Once you’ve soaked up enough rays, head to Plantation Gardens Restaurant & Bar for a handcrafted cocktail and some regional Pacific Rim cuisine while watching the sun sink into the ocean. If you’re looking for a resort-style stay, we have you covered. You`ll receive complimentary access to the Poipu Beach Athletic Club, home to a fitness center, hot tub and sparkling pool with a waterslide and sand-bottomed kiddie section – everything you need to work out, cool off or wind down, just across the street.
transit: 1. Family-Friendly: At Kiahuna 307 you`ll be within a few minutes walk to family fun: Stop by the beach activity center to choose your water sport for the day, check out the live entertainment at Poipu Shopping Village, or make a splash in the pool at Poipu Beach Athletic Club. 2. Plantation Perks: Not only does your rental come with a vacation membership to Poipu Beach Athletic Club, but a free midsize car rental for exploring the island too! 3. A Rare Retreat: Along with offering a rare view of Kauai`s famous botanical gardens, very few properties on the island have such a rich history dating back to Hawaii’s sugar plantation days and front an award-winning beach. Public transport is limited. Rental car is recommended.
access: BBQ area Beach Hut On site coin operated laundry facility Poipu Beach Athletic Club across the street for pool, hot tub, gym and more
interaction: Text us at (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
house_rules: 1. Great Vacation Retreats is not affiliated with the onsite management. Please contact us directly with any questions, maintenance issues or concierge requests. 2. Hawaii has a new smoking law which allows smoking only in designated areas outside of any building, 20 feet away from doors. Our units and lanais are all non-smoking. Please use the designated areas if you wish to smoke. They are usually located in the parking lot of the building. There is a $300 fine for smoking in our properties and the State of Hawaii may also impose a fine for not smoking in the designated areas. 3. Please wash off all sand from beach gear and your body before re-entering the units. Outside showers are available at most beaches and outside of most properties. Please do not hang beach towels, swimsuits, etc. from lanai railings.  4. Because we are in a tropical environment, there are insects. Please keep all food covered and stored properly. This will help to discourage roaches, ants, geckos and spiders

space: O apartamento é grande e aconchegante além de contar com uma estrutura incrível. A existência de piscina, sauna e academia no condomínio torna a sua experiência de hospedagem ainda melhor. name: Ranch Abode Loft in Bushwick
summary: Simply appointed and centrally located 1st floor apt with 20 ft. ceilings, a loft bed, and exposed brick in the bathroom.
space: The space is an open layout with amazing natural light, 22 ft. ceilings 1 brick wall and 1 stone wall which keeps things extra quiet (a rarity in NYC!).  There is a private bathroom (shower and bathtub), full kitchen, 1 full sized sleeping loft with an air mattress and extra pillows/blankets and 1 full size bed downstairs. You will arrive to fresh linens and a clean, functional space, perfect for artsy travelers and working creatives. The Kitchen is small but functional with a working stove and oven, microwave, full set of cookware, dishes, flatware and basic cooking supplies (oils, vinegars, and basic spices). The Bathroom has basic amenities and plenty of fresh towels.  There is a gym, game-room with a pool table and ping pong table, television with full cable, dance/ yoga studio, and private rooms for music practice in case you decide to bring your clarinet, as well as coin operated washer and dryer- all downstairs. neighborhood_overview: THE NEIGHBORHOOD,  ART:  Bushwick has been described as the new Williamsburg or what the East Village of Manhattan was in the early 90's. The New York Times recently described the area as "The Next Gallery District in New York."  FOOD: Anyone still invested in framing Bushwick as a scrappy outsider in New York's food scene'll need a new axe to grind: the 2014 Michelin Guide for New York is out, and includes almost all of Bushwick's major restaurants. The Vietnamese restaurant Falansai, the French bistro Mominette, the eclectic eatery Dear Bushwick and the addition to Roberta's pizza Blanca — all of which have opened in the last year — landed in this year's guide of recommended city spots. Also on the list were the more established Northeast Kingdom, El Mio Cid and Roberta's. FASHION & FILM:  Bushwick is rich with turn of the century architecture and hosts a thriving film community. The characters of HBO's "Girls" attended a warehouse party here and the show regularly shoots in apartmen
notes: One train ride from JFK airport on JMZ subway lines (Myrtle Ave station). Check-in after 2pm Check-out by 12pm (noon) Note: other times can be pre arranged, please just ask! The Myrtle Ave. stop on the JMZ line. It is a five minute walk from the apartment. The J and the M trains stop every 10 - 15 minutes on weekdays. During evenings and weekends the trains may take a bit longer. Also, both the Montrose and Morgan stations on the L line are a 10-15 minute walk away. The total ride time into downtown Manhattan from any of the stops is 15 minutes. It takes 45 minutes to get to Times Square.

name: Mahalo Aina Sanctuary, Dreamtime Room
summary: Epic views and Peaceful setting allow for deep, dreamy, restorative sleeps.  The Dreamtime room is an ocean view room that shares a bathroom and balcony with the Banyan room. See Mahalo Aina Sanctuary, Banyan room listing for Photos and more info.
space: We block off dates when the whole house/sanctuary is booked for retreats and events.  If you are staying in just one or two of our rooms, you will have shared access to the public areas within the main house as well as over 5 acres of gardens, orchards and walking paths.  We set out breakfast for our short term guests, we offer locally harvested coffee and teas and you are welcome to gather seasonal fruits and vegetables and herbs from our orchards or gardens for your own personal consumption. In the kitchen, there is designated shelves in the cupboards and refrigerator for each room and plenty of space/cookware/blenders/vitamix/juicers/cutting boards for up to 5 people to be cooking comfortably at the same time, so if there happens to be others staying in rooms when you are here, there is no shortage of space or tools for you to have a comfortable and convenient stay.  The owners suite is independent of the main area of the house and at the farthest end from the guest rooms.

neighborhood_overview: Papaaloa is a creative farming community utilizing many organic, biodynamic and farm to table practices...Papaaloa Country Store and Cafe is just down the road from us and has everything you need from groceries to breakfast to the best pizza on the island to gifts made by local artists to music nights every Friday and friendly service. Papaaloa is lush and tropical with breathtaking views of the ocean and a central location to visit some of the most breathtaking locations on the planet. From our home you can watch Hawaiian Hawks (io) surfing our air currents and teaching their young aeronautics. You can see whales breaching and epic sunrises and moonrises a and you can watch our horses grazing, playing and sleeping.  Though we have pets, our house is very clean and, even those with strong allergies have not had reactions while staying here.
transit: There is a bus route less than a mile,away from our home that will take you anywhere on the island.  Also we can recommend car rental agencies that usually offer better discounts. Mahalo
access: Guests have access to all rooms except the Master Bedroom. We have organic gardens, orchards, horses, and small hike to a beautiful waterfall.
interaction: One of us is always available for any guests interactions.

name: Premium Exclusive house & garden Rua Almada
summary: In the historic center, this XIX century exclusively renovated house keeps the traces of historical Porto. Brightness and design make it an exceptional place. Terrace and garden are a haven of peace in the vibrant city center, at the top of Almada street. It has a sunny and elegant living-room, a modern fully equipped kitchen with a terrace and access to a private garden. In the 2nd floor, two suites provide the comfort for a perfect stay. A premium place for an extraordinary experience!
space: On the first floor of the house, a 36 sq m (388 sq ft) living room, bright, combines a sofa with a chaise longue and a large table with chairs and bench with a book shelve. On the other side of the interior staircase, the kitchen (26 sq m or 270 sq ft) is custom designed by a local master carpenter. The kitchen block, with a dishwasher and a ceramic hob integrated, is covered with Silestone (natural quartz) and illuminated with a hanging lamp created by designer Christian Haas. An oven integrated, a washing machine and a dryer are housed in the main cabinet. Porcelain tableware is also designed by Christian Haas. The kitchen is extended by a 10 sq m (106 sq ft) terrace overlooking a small private garden (50 sq m or 540 sq ft) accessible by a wide metal staircase. You can take your meals in 4 different spots: in the lounge, around the kitchen block, on the terrace or in the garden. On the second floor, two bright bedrooms are displayed on either side of the central staircase. Each is eq

Terrace and garden are a haven of peace in the vibrant city center, at the top of Almada street. An oven integrated, a wa
neighborhood_overview: At the top of Rua do Almada, this renovated house keeps the typical atmosphere of the historical center of Porto (stone, interior shutters, ceiling height...), classified as a World Heritage site by Unesco. The district is in the heart of downtown : shops, design or vintage boutiques, bars and restaurants and metro are all nearby. In a few minutes walk, you can reach emblematic historical places of the city re : Praça da Liberdade, Rua das Flores, Sé Catedral, Clérigos, Lello bookshop ... The Douro river is about 10 minutes walk.
transit: From the airport, it will take you around 20 minutes by taxi to reach the house. We may book a taxi for you is wished, and the driver will wait in the arrivals area with the guest's name (fixed price 22€). The metro runs every 20 minutes, and takes 30 minutes to arrive. Each guest needs to buy an Andante Card, and charge with a Zone 4 (Z4) trip. Don't forget to validate before entering the metro. Please take metro line E, direction Estadio Dragão/Campanha and exit at Trindade metro station.  Then, you just need to climb the street Alferes Malheiro until Almada street, and turn to your left. The house is a couple of meters down, on the left side.
access: From 1 to 4 people, you have the entire house for you! Equipped for cooking, resting but also to work quietly (fiber optic internet connection), this charming place is a source of inspiration.
interaction: The house is managed by Alexandra Oliveira which will organize your welcome. She will provide you with valuable information to make your stay in Porto a memorable trip.
house_rules: Availabe in the house

name: Eco Hale Hawaii in the Rainforest Lots Of Aloha
summary: Experience your own Private Cottage in lush native Ohi'a trees, hapu'u fern & tropical gardens.  Enchanting romance, solitude, "Old Hawaii" style Aloha. NO CLEANING FEES. Uniquely designed for the INTREPID & Adventurous on the Road Less Traveled.  Eco Hale enkindles nature lovers, romantics, retreat seekers, adventurers & kind souls.  1 Acre, Secure, gated, solar power comfort & peace. East Hawaii, Puna triangle, no 4-W needed nature, hikes, hot tub, stars, birds & sun. Rates vary.
space: Hale (pronounced ha-lay) is the Hawaiian word for dwelling/home.  Eco Hale is a separate standing cottage; cozy, comfortable studio ensuite layout with separate enclosed indoor bathroom and Japanese Soaking Tub on the covered deck.  Accommodates no more than 2 INTREPID travelers or the Solo adventurer. NO additional cleaning fees. -Your retreat is surrounded by lush manicured native vegetation providing a sense of closeness to our natural ecosystem, seclusion, privacy and magic.  Windows are positioned to allow the surrounding rain forest view and morning sun rise/evening glow to light and enhance your stay.  A chorus of birdsong announces the day and the soft chant of frogs serenade the night.  Hawaiian rains provide the comforting patter upon the roof. -Delight in a small footprint designed and furnished with special comforts; sustainable bamboo flooring, custom tile work, re-purposed materials and lots of personality. -On demand H2O provides hot showers. Please see the reviews. This

neighborhood_overview: The Puna district is a huge triangle area encompassing territory between Hilo, Volcano, Pahoa and Kalapana.  Kilauea's latest eruption began on May 3, 2018 with lava flowing continuously until August 6, 2018.  The affected Puna area, in the southeast corner of the island comprises ONE PERCENT of the island of Hawaii, which is larger than all of the other Hawaiian Islands combined.  We are in UPPER PUNA and had No Lava.  Pele will determine her future timeline, longevity and destination path.  View new lava fields by air or by hiking to our newest black sand beach, Pohoiki.  We have additional information on the Kilauea Flow in our Profile.   The area also contains the largest remaining untouched Ohia forests in the islands, currently being threatened by Rapid Ohia Death as scientist scramble to discover the source and cure.  This is a unique area and is relatively undeveloped maintaining it's origin.  Agriculture is still a large part of the subsistence economy.  We are located close e
notes: Broadband fiber provides Internet to our rural rain forest location and is currently at No Charge.  Media/Streaming limited to one device at a time.  Please conserve our resources.  Various free Hotspots in Hilo, Volcano and the greater Puna area are additional options. Guest must bring their own lap top or NotePad. OFuro Soaking Hot Tub is strictly limited to use between (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) hrs and (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) hrs, operating within our solar powered system. Last Pour is at (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) hrs. As a rural development "off-the-beaten track" your Holiday can be one of a kind but please remember, this is a Country Living location-Hawaiian style.  Read our Getting Around Section for additional details. This is a tropical climate. We co-exist with the frogs, birds & bees, chickens and watch animals. Items Left Behind will cost $40 of my time, plus appropriate postage & insurance if you require.  Payment will need to be before mailing with a ca
transit: Normally distance/mileage matches drive time in East Hawaii Island due to the smaller population base and distinctly less traveled paths; with the exception of early morning drive time, 6am-8am. Hawaii Island public transportation bus service is limited to the major roadways around the island and as such does not service this neighborhood; 5 miles off Hwy 11. 15-20 miles in any direction from Eco Hale you typically will find much different weather patterns and vegetation growth.  Eco Hale is HALF WAY between Hilo and Hawaii Volcanoes National Park.  Hawaii Island is larger than ALL of the other Islands combined therefore a consideration for those with limited time.  Historic Hilo offers shopping, memories of days gone by, history, provisions and mostly three to four star dining at two to four star pricing.  HVNP offers inspiration, unmatched landscape, skies,adventure and 3-4 Star dining at 4-5 star pricing. Stargazers info: a 4-wheel drive is required to visit the Observatories atop M
access: This 1 acre slice of Paradise is located 1/2 way between Hawaii Volcano National Park (reopened Septemb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and historic Hilo town; 20 miles either way.  Our rural neighborhood is designed on one acre lots in upper Puna with access 5 miles off Hwy 11, asphalt 1 and 2 lane entry roads and graveled roads  This is an option for eco-travelers, trekkers, hikers, glampers and gampers or tenting.  Farmers markets weekly and weekends: Kea'au Village Farmers Market-Mon thru Sun, Makuu Farmers Market Sundays in Pahoa, Hilo Farmers Market-Mon thru Sun and Volcano Village Market Sundays.   Check-in is between 3pm and 7pm. Hawaii Does Not observe Daylight Savings Time so 6pm can be DARK.  Other times can be arranged prior to arrival via email although we prefer no check-ins past 8pm.  We understand Kona flights are late arrivals. Please research Saddle Road, south via South Point or North thru Waimea and the Hamakaua coast. We recommend each as a Unique Beautiful Day dri
interaction: Privacy is mutually respected. We are familiar with the Island of Hawaii and are passionate about the lifestyle and culture. Let us know pre-arrival of your special interests.  We certainly have our opinions post arrival for destinations and activities; although our active lifestyle may not allow for daily commentary.  Retirement eludes us.
house_rules: -NO additional guests at any time.  We REQUIRE your travel partner's name. -You MUST receive pre-approval from us to smoke Outside in designated area on the Property. -Check in is between 3pm-7pm.  Special instructions are required for check in after 7pm.  We prefer no check-in after 8pm; HOWEVER Kona flight arrivals can be late so please let us know what time your flight is scheduled to arrive. -We REQUIRE your ETA/estimated time of arrival 48 hours In Advance. -Complimentary evening pupu? You MUST advise us of Dietary restrictions 48 hours pre-arrival. - Hot Soaking Tub Hours are ONLY between 3pm-10pm.  No exceptions. -Quiet hours are 9pm-8am, although you may come and go as you wish.  You have your own private driveway/parking. -Nightly rates Do Not include HI State tax of 14.31% which is Payable On Arrival. -The honor system is observed in regards to conservative electrical, wifi and hot water use. -Special rates apply during the two week holiday of Christmas and New Years. -Secure

name: Tamarama Penthouse apartment
summary: If you want to be close by Tamarama and Bondi, this is the Beach Pad for you. Tucked away in a quiet cul-de-sac and only a stone's throw to the beach they call "Glamarama" and minutes walk away from Bondi and Bronte Beaches.
space: This unique penthouse apartment hosts colourful flavours of Morocco, is situated across the road from Tamarama Beach and has a spacious living and dining area opening to a verandah with spectacular views. Relax in the 1930's Huon pine boat daybed in front of floor to ceiling windows or just BBQ on the verandah. The kitchen combines elegance, functionality and a touch of Spanish. It has a double oven, Ilve stove top, steamer oven, dishwasher and microwave. The main Moroccan style bathroom has a double sink and combined bath/shower. The main bedroom has a queen size bed and build in wardrobes, the 2nd bedroom has a queen size bed and ensuite, the 3rd bedroom and study has bunk bed (double on bottom & single on top). There is one off street car park and the apartment is walking distance to local shops, Bondi and Bronte beaches.

neighborhood_overview: Nestled between two rugged headlands, Tamarama is a small coastal neighbourhood  that sits in the middle of the great coastal walk from Bondi to Coogee. Tamarama Park, which flows down to the much loved beach, is regarded by locals as their private reserve. Tamarama Beach has plenty of cosy barbeque spots, a playground and a café.
notes: HOUSE RULES - JUST A FEW THINGS TO GET OUT OF THE ROAD & THEN PLEASE ENJOY YOURSELVES. Please treat this apartment as if it were your own home and treat it with respect.  Please leave the apartment in the state you found it in. We will take care of washing, standard cleaning and vacuuming. If you would like to leave the last load of dishes washing in the dishwasher, that is fine. Please transfer all rubbish to the outside bins. *red/general rubbish, yellow/bottles, plastic & tin cans, blue/paper &cardboard). Please leave all dirty linen on each bed so we don’t get it mixed up. Dirty towels can be left in the bath. Please do not leave any acquired goods on the property (e.g. scooters, children’s toys, surf boards etc without consulting owner).  Any excess cleaning or rubbish removal will be charged. If you have an animal travelling with you please ensure they do not sleep on the beds and do not leave them for long periods alone and let them bark. There is a small patch of grass just to
transit: Street parking available (it can get busy on hot summer days), close to transport and walking distance to Tamarama, Bronte and Bondi beaches.
interaction: I am happy to assist you during your stay. Just give me a hola on the mobile should you need anything.
house_rules: Respect our neighbours (no parties or loud music late at night), smoking on only the balcony only and keep the apartment clean and tidy. Treat the place as if it were your own.

name: Bondi Apartment with Stunning Views
summary: Stay at our beautiful two bedroom apartment, which has superb views over the Eastern Suburbs of Sydney. Perfectly located in a quiet dead-end street, in front of Waverley Park & near Bondi shops and beaches. Best location!
space: Our two bedroom apartment has superb views over the Eastern Suburbs of Sydney. Perfectly located in a quiet dead-end street, in front of Waverley Park and near Bondi shops and beaches. Best location for short commute to city via easy bus or train. Bright sunny top floor apartment with panoramic views in a great location! The apartment is fully furnished with everything you need to complete your holidays in Sydney! Every room has amazing uninterrupted panoramic views!! Equipped for short or longer stays, perfect for two couples or a family.  This two bedroom apartment is on the top floor of a quiet secure building with every room having amazing uninterrupted panoramic ocean and harbour views, large balcony, decent sized family and dining area, and newly renovated separate kitchen (with everything including dishwasher) and new modern bathroom with shower and bath, along with separate laundry with washing machine and dryer.

neighborhood_overview: Happy to give you the ins and outs of Sydney from a local perspective.
transit: Great location! Less than 1 minute walk to Bondi Road, where there is a bus stop for the 333 and 380 - which go directly to the City centre and Circular Quay (where the famous Opera House & Harbour Bridge are located), these buses also go directly to Bondi Beach & Watson Bay on the other direction. Only 5 mins walk to Bondi Junction Interchange where there is an array of cafes and restaurants, and the famous Westfield Bondi Junction Shopping Centre. Right in front of Waverley Park, and a 15 minute stroll to Bondi and Tamarama Beaches; as well as the beautiful Centennial Park. Free off-street parking is also available though may not be needed with great accessibility to public transport!
access: Guests will have access to the whole apartment and building facilities.
house_rules: You will be staying in our home so please treat it how you would like your home to be treated! We only ask that you keep the place tidy and you are welcome to cook and use everything in the place freely just clean up after yourself. The house is carpeted with light coloured carpet so you must take your shoes off before entering the apartment. Smoking is not permitted in the apartment or on the balcony.

Located on-site are a 24-hour convenience store, laundromat, tour desk, surf shop and public parking are available on-site. Thi
neighborhood_overview: Location, Location, Location! We are in the middle of it all. Much to see and do in Waikiki. The World's most famous beach is just two short blocks away. Watch the sunsets from nearly any vantage point along the beach and see the Friday night fireworks from the Hilton Hawaiian Village. The nearby neighborhood includes several major hotels and numerous large and small restaurants and nightclubs that cater to every nationality. Ask the kamaaina (locals) for their tips. The Royal Hawaiian Shopping Center and other “World Class Shopping" may be found on Kalakaua Avenue (the street fronting the beach). A few blocks away you will find famous Kapiolani park and the Waikiki Shell, Honolulu Zoo, Waikiki Aquarium, Diamond Head, golfing and many tennis courts.
transit: For Parking, you can park below building.  Their rates are $25/24 hours, and lessor amounts for shorter time.  You need to pay yellow box and get white ticket.  Must put White ticket on your dashboard, or car will be towed.  With this ticket, you have THREE places to park, if lot is full. 1- underground parking on Kuhio Ave.  2- underground parking in back of building on Prince Edward St (identical to Kuhio ave. parking).  3- at the tall condo (Pacific Monarch) on corner of Kuhio and Uluniu St. A block away is Waikiki Banyan, their rates are $20/24hours (entrance on Kuhio Avenue).  There is also Free street parking along Ala Wai Canal 2-3 blocks away. Towing on canal is 2 days, Monday and Friday 6-10am. But who needs a car in Waikiki? Everything is in walking distance. But if you have an itch to venture out, the island's bus transit system is awesome.
access: Located on-site are a 24-hour convenience store, laundromat, tour desk, surf shop and public parking are available on-site. This property is elevator accessible with trash chutes are located on each floor.
interaction: We live in building, with Keoki and Tsuki in the store, and are accessible 24/7.   They are happy to help you anytime you need, and to hold bags if early arrival/late departure, at $4/bag..
house_rules: No smoking  Not suitable for pets  No parties or events  Check-in is after 3PM  Per community house rules, all guests must register with the on-site resident manager or security. A photo copy of valid government issued identification is required for all guests in the unit.  All residents are required to sign-in their guests at the Security Desk in the main lobby for every visit. Guests are not permitted unescorted above the lobby level and may not be in possession/and or use of key set. Use of key set is reserved for the express use of residents only and may not be used to allow access to anyone other than the resident and guest. In general, all guests are asked to be a good neighbor and to also comply with the following: -Loud music or TV playback is generally not allowed. -Trash chutes are located on all floors. Please adhere to posted signing. If you have items too large for the trash chute, please use the dumpster in the garage. -Items may never hang over or from a lanai ledge. -In

name: 710A -Bamboo Beauty!! Ocean view!
summary: This is a great studio on TOP floor! Very conveniently located with Large, Queen bed and great Kitchenette equip, with built-in cook-top, pots & pans, microwave, coffee maker. All the basics you need! As well as Free BEACH GEAR!:) Enjoy the Hawaiian beaches with the stocked Boogie Boards, Snorkel equipment, Beach chairs/Beach umbrella!:) Relax with FREE WIFI!! This has a Large Queen bed, and Large cooking area, with stove, pots/pans/coffee maker/microwave and large fridge.Cable TV available on large 32" flatscreen. Outdoor balcony can sit 1-2 people. More information PARKING Parking is available onsite and is located in the below street level garage. Daily parking fees are approx. $25 per 24 hours. Payment options may be selected at the vending kiosk located at the bottom of the ramp. Please remember to put white ticket on dashboard, or car will be towed. Also, White ticket is good for both front and back parking lots (they are identical). Free Parking is available along Ala Wai Canal
space: COMFORTABLE! Cozy BAMBOO room!:) place, just a block from beach!  There is a Queen size bed. Cable TV is available on large 40" flatscreen TV, mounted on wall for easy viewing. New, large, Ceiling fan.  The bathroom is equipped with extra towels and toiletries. The balcony can sit 2-3 people. This is great for people who want to be steps away from beach and heart of Waikiki.- Also- Free Continental Breakfast for ALL guests, everyday 6-9am (available downstairs at 24hour Mini Mart).

neighborhood_overview: Location, Location, Location! We are in the middle of it all! Much to see and do in Waikiki. The World's most famous beach is just two short blocks away. Watch the sunsets from nearly any vantage point along the beach and see the Friday night fireworks from the Hilton Hawaiian Village. The nearby neighborhood includes several major hotels and numerous large and small restaurants and nightclubs that cater to every nationality. Ask the kamaaina (locals) for their tips. The Royal Hawaiian Shopping Center and other “World Class Shopping" may be found on Kalakaua Avenue (the street fronting the beach). A few blocks away you will find famous Kapiolani park and the Waikiki Shell, Honolulu Zoo, Waikiki Aquarium, Diamond Head, golfing and many tennis courts.
notes: There will be additional charge of USD  for Parking and USD  for Internet, collected during the time of stay.
transit: For Parking, you can park below building.  Their rates are $25/24 hours, and lessor amounts for shorter time.  You need to pay yellow box and get white ticket.  Must put White ticket on your dashboard, or car will be towed.  With this ticket, you have THREE places to park, if lot is full. 1- underground parking on Kuhio Ave.  2- underground parking in back of building on Prince Edward St (identical to Kuhio ave. parking).  3- at the tall condo (Pacific Monarch) on corner of Kuhio and Uluniu St. A block away is Waikiki Banyan, their rates are $20/24hours (entrance on Kuhio Avenue).  There is also Free street parking along Ala Wai Canal 2-3 blocks away. Towing on canal is 2 days, Monday and Friday 6-10am. But who needs a car in Waikiki? Everything is in walking distance. But if you have an itch to venture out, the island's bus transit system is awesome.
access: Located on-site are a 24-hour convenience store, internet cafe, laundromat, tour desk, surf shop and public parking are available on-site. This property is elevator accessible with trash chutes are located on each floor. Interaction with Guest Interaction with guests is generally limited to welcoming upon arrival. I try to respect my guest's boundaries and allow them their experience without interruption. However, I am always available when my quests have requests, need for directions or information about what to see and do. Location, Location, Location! We are in the middle of it all. name: Artsy Downtown Studio!
summary: Downtown, convenient, cosy and bright semi basement. It is both my home and art studio. Perfect for one but could fit 2 people. Near museums, bars, atwater metro and guy-concordia station. One street away from St-Catherine but surprisingly calm! Also; an equipped, separate kitchen + wifi is included.

Artsy and cosy; a live-in studio Whole Studio; main room, seperate kitchen and bathroom with bathtub I won't be in town, but a friend will be my ambassador :) On the western edge of downtown in the lovely Shaughnessy Village, this neighbourhood is a street away from busy St-Catherine. Less than a kilmoter away from many museums, bars, restaurants, two different metro (subway) stations, parcs, bike paths, cafes, Concordia University and all the expected downtown shopping, movie theaters, as well as grocery stores, pharmacies, laundromats, banks and more. 2.5 kilometers to Mount Royal, 1.5 kilometer to the Lachine Canal and its amazing bike path and Atwater Market. Very close to Atwater Metr

notes: There is no laundry within the building, but a laundromat is 1.5 streets away.
transit: Very close to Atwater Metro (subway) station, also Guy-Concordia station, Georges-Vanier station (one station from train station). Various bus routes, bike paths and bixi stations as well as taxi lines.

neighborhood_overview: Many restaurants and cafés are situated just around the corner from Berk Hotel. Grand Bazaar is a 15-minute walk away, while Hagia Sophia can be reached in a 3-minute walk.  The Old Peninsula ( Sultanahmet ) is a great choice for travellers interested in museums, monuments and architecture. This is our guests' favourite part of Istanbul, according to independent reviews. (Website hidden by Airbnb) berkguesthouse
notes: Smoking is forbidden inside the Hotel. Check Out Time is 11 am sharp please.  24 hours luggage storage as required.

name: Rustic Gaudí - Sagrada Família
summary: New, modern, bright and fully equipped. Has two bedrooms, one bathroom, living and kitchen,  a terrace and a balcony. Metro in 1 minute and Sagrada Familia at 5. Speed WIFI. Up to 5 people. Fully refurbished! You rent the whole apartment, not shared.
space: Modern, new and fully refurbished. Ideal location, 1 minute from the metro, 10 minutes from the streets of Gracia, and 5 of the Sagrada Familia. Walking distance to Paseo de Gracia (main monuments of Gaudí) in just 20 minutes and Plaza Catalunya in 30! The apartment is bright and comfortable, perfect for families, small groups or couples. A double bedroom with two single beds with private balcony and one single bedroom. The sofa bed in the lounge is new and wide! The kitchen is fully equipped with coffee machine, microwave, oven, ... and a NESPRESSo coffee machine also! You will also have hair dryer, iron and washing machine. Ah! and a large TV with DVD and some movies. We have Guides (also LONELY PLANET SPAIN!) Maps and Tourist Information. We understand cleanliness and guest service as the most important things. Me and my wife we are always available and we try to advice you the best on eating places, visits, ... Before your arrival, we always go over every detail. We are avid travel

neighborhood_overview: In our opinion is the perfect place to stay in Barcelona! Crowded of shops, wineries, spanish ham shops, supermarkets just close tot the apartment; also close to the main tourist attractions and the Metro stop (just one block!). Also a bit apart of the most crowded and noisy areas. Be sure it's a perfect place to stay!!
notes: Somos un apartamento legal :) , con licencia turística HUTB, es por este motivo que los huéspedes que se alojen en nuestro apartamento deben abonar una tasa de 2,50€/persona/día (2,25€+IVA).  Dicha tasa no está incluida en el precio del alquiler y debe abonarse a la llegada al apartamento. Ley 5/2017 de la Generalitat de Catalunya, para estancias con entrada a partir del 1/4/2017.
transit: The Metro stop (Sant Pau Dos de Maig) is just at one minute walking. You have direct access to the Tourist Bus, and the main local Bus lanes (The beah, The Barceloneta, Camp Nou, ...); also served by night buses. But you can reach the most important places by walking!!
access: Al apartamento se alquila entero, y no se comparte con ningún otro viajero.
interaction: We'll get in touch some days before of your arrival, and we'll give you our 24h phone to help you on making your stay in Barcelona unforgettable!!
house_rules: Recordar que esto no es un hotel y que no hay señales ni carteles de ningún tipo en el exterior. Es un edificio en el que vive gente y familias, y donde algunos espacios han sido adaptados para turistas. Es por éste motivo que os pedimos amablemente que simplemente lo tengáis en cuenta! POR FAVOR ENVÍANOS TU HORA DE LLEGADA AL APARTAMENTO por demos adaptae-mail a (EMAIL HIDDEN) para saber cuando esperar vuestra llamada. La hora de llegada estándar (Check-In) es a las 15:00h. La hora de salida estándar es a las 11:00h. Somos flexibles peor si la llegada es mas tarde de las 10 de la noche tendrá un cargo de 30 euros

name: Luxury Apartment in Instambul
space: Raven Istanbul Apartments are convenient, cozy and specially designed apartments located in the heart of Istanbul - Taksim.  Location : Apartments are located on Süslü Saksı Street which is the parallel of always busy pedestrian Istiklal Street ( the most famous Street of Istanbul ) . Also there is just 2 minute walking distance to Taksim Square and all transportation points like metro station, tram and bus station.   The apartments overlooks ; - Istiklal street with plenty of live music cafe ,  restaurant and shopping options. Moreover , there are rich mixture of antique shops and craftmens work places. - Cukurcuma where become known as  Art Walk" from Istiklal via many small galleries to Istanbul Modern on the banks of the Bosphorus which is a short walk down the hill from the apartment, where the tramway to Sultanahmet (Hagia Sofia) and beyond to the airport is located  -Cihangir where is   local and elegant area to walk around and explore.  Facilities : Raven Istanbul Apartments

name: Honolulu 1 BR/1Bath Condo - Hilton Hawaiian
summary: At heart of Waikiki. It is located at the Hilton Hawaiian Village and access to all amenities. Resort view suite w/ balcony features a master bedroom with two double or a King bed, 50" D TV and spa-like bathroom with a sleek shower, a deep soaking bathtub, private water closet with bidet seat and elegant vanity area. It includes a generous living room with dining area, 55" HD TV, DVD player, and queen-size sleeper sofa, as well as a fully equipped stainless steel appliances w/ washer and dryer.
space: This is a timeshare I own and it is a full condo with kitchen and laundry. You no longer have to pack for every day you and your family will wear. You have a washer and dryer, refrigerator, stove and microwave. You don't have to do the dishes because you will have a made that will clean every day for you.

access: Want to treat you and your family like a royalty? To start, you will not have to wait the long line to check in like the Hilton Village. You will you have your own lobby and will be treated with a lei. You will have access to all the amenities at the Hilton Hawaiian Village like a water slide for the kids and many different pools. Plenty of restaurants onsite like Benihana's, Kobe Steak, Kali Steak House. Need something? It has 2 ABC stores on site that will have basically anything you might need and many more stores on site.
interaction: I won't interact with you as I will just let you check in on your own as if you were the owner of the timeshare while your stay.
house_rules: • Check-in time is 3PM. • Check-out time is 11am(This may vary depending on the location). Like any other place you stay, please be mindful that you will be responsible for any damages caused by your group.

Close to city's Convention Center (Riocentro) & Citibank Hall (best show house in town; Few minutes to Barrashopping / New York City Center (Largest Latin-american  stores / cinemas / restaurants and entertainment complex) and to  Downtown Shopping Center. 3 minutes walking to Pepe Beach Hut - famous surf e kite-surfing point  in Barra da Tijuca.
access: Comfortably accommodates up to four people with complete privacy and full access (wheel-chair friendly building). Price is for double occupancy only, with each extra guest increasing the cost by 50%.
interaction: Fluent Portuguese, Spanish and English telephone guest support, as needed. Especial assistance by experienced international airline personnel available upon request.
house_rules: A 2 day advance notice for booking is not mandatory, but preferable.  Offered rates are for two occupants at a time, with price increasing 50% for each extra guest. For your safety and comfort, this is a No Smoking place. Enjoy your stay.

name: so homey and spacious and comfy room!

neighborhood_overview: Multicultural community, many expats living in area, quiet and decent neighborhood, several good restaurants to cater for international taste buds. Grocery shops. Closest MTR subway is Causeway Bay station, can walk to get there, takes about 20 mins but there are several mini bus to get there. Takes about 5-10 minutes
notes: We are glad to note that all our guest has been satisfied in their stay. They made it their home and had created good memories, in their HK and apartment stay. Also to note that the apartment also has been hired to shoot commercial videos,  so Dont be surprised if you happen to see it in your television!
transit: Very close to Wanchai and Causeway Bay, just 5 minutes by mini bus which comes too often, can even walk to get there (though takes about 20-30 minutes walk. To The Peak and Repulse Bay ls 5 minutes by taxi, also to Central. There are also busses to get to  Central and North Point. For those who enjoy walks, we are close to Bowen Road. Happy Valley Race Course which are just 5-15 minutes walk.
access: Easy access to public transport, main road is just across to where building is located. Car park is also available, on hourly to day rate.

name: Park Slope Apt:, Spacious 2 bedroom
space: Imagine a quiet, spacious apartment, with beautiful sunlight, just steps from the terrific restaurants and shops of this wonderful neighborhood.  Near many subway stops (including the R train 1/2 block away), easy to get to Manhattan; four blocks from Prospect Park; near to the Brooklyn Botanic Garden and Brooklyn Museum.  You'll have the best of both worlds: you'll be in a fun, hip, laid-back neighborhood, but close to the sights and action of Manhattan! The apartment is a duplex with two large bedrooms, two full baths, terrace, fully stocked kitchen, dw, wi-fi.   Note: On dates the apartment is marked unavailable on the calendar, one bedroom/bath in the apartment often is available (view my related listing, "Sunny, Large, Park Slope Bedroom").  You would be sharing the place with me - and my cat. Extended stays and a willingness to take care of my wonderful cat yield a discount! I'd greatly appreciate it if you would make an inquiry so we can e-chat for a bit before sending an offer.
