Features: - FULL futon in the living room - Laundry in the basement of the apartment  - Bathroom - Wireless High Speed Internet - Kitchen  - Apartment Elevator  - Privacy

Great for Photoshoots and more! 5 min walk to 2/5 NYC Transit Subway Flatbush Ave/Brooklyn College Station (bars, local restaurants, Target), 2/5 subway, many Local and Select buses Welcome to the best space in Brooklyn. Our bright airy UNFURNISHED one-bedroom apartment is open and airy with lots of light lots. Features: - FULL futon in the living room - Laundry in the basement of the apartment  - Bathroom - Wireless High Speed Internet - Kitchen  - Apartment Elevator  - Privacy Guests will have access to the entire apartment. It will be empty except for you and your friends. There are many local and chain shops and restaurants within 5 minutes walking distance. There is a Dunkin' Donuts/Baskin Robbins and a local pizza shop just on the corner at Nostrand Ave. Turn south from that corner and you'll see Key Foods and Wolf's grocery stores do
neighborhood_overview: There are many local and chain shops and restaurants within 5 minutes walking distance. There is a Dunkin' Donuts/Baskin Robbins and a local pizza shop just on the corner at Nostrand Ave. Turn south from that corner and you'll see Key Foods and Wolf's grocery stores down the block. You'll also find a florist, a Dollar Tree, the US Post Office, and a local sneaker shop all on the same block. Turn north and see a huge Nike store, Target, local eateries, corner bodegas (that stay open late), Applebees, Home Goods, David's Bridal, AT&T, Duane Reade, local food shops, wine/liquor stores, restaurants, hardware stores, department stores and much, much more. Everything is close by!! The area is FANTASTIC and provides everything you'll need for your stay.
notes: Great News! My fiance and I have purchased our dream home!*Cheering* But our lease for our one bedroom apartment in Brooklyn is over on February 1st!  We have moved all the furnisher and have left our Full Size Futon and wifi for happy and humble guests who would like to use it. For the whole month of January we are opening our lovely doors to YOU!
transit: It is easy to get to and from the apartment via public transportation. Subway 2/5 trains to Flatbush Ave/Brooklyn College Station (5 min) B44 Select and Local busses (5 min) Dollar cabs take you up and down Flatbush Ave for just $2 cash/ride (3 min) Zip car (5 min)
access: Guests will have access to the entire apartment. It will be empty except for you and your friends.
house_rules: • No parties or events • No smoking

space: SMART CHARTER DOURO HOW IT WORKS THE SLEEPING MODE: *Short term boat stay Start times for full nights  are on request, though usually between 21:00 till 09:30 with breakfast include. For sleeping the 2 nights is cost the price on the site 385.00€ This is one of our most popular boats.  It has an open plan cabin, as well as fully functioning bathroom.  On top of this it has large sun beds at both the front and back of the boat making it a great choice for soaking up the rays in style! HOW IT WORKS DAY CRUISING: Each day charter is an 8 hour day. name: Casa da Porta Amarela
summary: Pequeno apartamento, alegre e encantador, situado num genuíno bairro portuense, muito perto de restaurantes típicos e comércio tradicional. Tem um pequeno pátio privado. A 20 minutos do centro é um excelente espaço para férias.
space: Tem um quarto com uma cama de casal, outro com duas camas de solteiro e um sofá cama na zona comum.  A sala de jantar com sofá comunica directamente com a cozinha que está bem equipada e funcional. O pátio com ligação à cozinha e à sala, é ideal para relaxar ao ar livre.
description: Pequeno apartamento, alegre e encantador, situado num genuíno bairro portuense, muito perto de restaurantes típicos e comércio tradicional. Tem um pequeno pátio privado. A 20 minutos do centro é um excelente espaço para férias. Tem um quarto com uma cama de casal, outro com duas camas de solteiro e um sofá cama na zona comum.  A sala de jantar com sofá comunica directamente com a cozinha que está bem equipada e funcional. O pátio com ligação à cozinha e à sala, é ideal para relaxar ao ar livre. O apartamento fica num 1º andar sem elevador (Rua Coutinho de Azevedo, 79 - 1ºAndar (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Porto) Há sempre lugar para estacionamento grátis nas redondezas, porém a 200 metros existe estacionamento pago privativo . Estamos disponíveis para qualquer contacto ou esclarecimento e queremos dar todo o apoio durante a vossa estadia. Situa-se num bairro tipicamente portuense, muito sossegado e seguro. A vizinhança é tranquila, cordial e simpática.  Esta zona essencialmente freq
neighborhood_overview: Situa-se num bairro tipicamente portuense, muito sossegado e seguro. A vizinhança é tranquila, cordial e simpática.  Esta zona essencialmente frequentada por portuenses tem excelentes restaurantes de cozinha de gastronomia portuguesa e é muito próxima de todo o tipo de comércio tradicional: frutarias, cafés, supermercados, etc.
notes: Este apartamento faz parte de um conjunto de 3 pequenos apartamentos que compõem o mesmo edifício – Casa da Porta Amarela (1º Andar), Casa da porta Vermelha (2º Andar) e Casa da Porta Azul (3º Andar).
transit: O apartamento fica na Rua Coutinho de Azevedo 79-1º- (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Porto. A 20 minutos a pé do centro da cidade, tem transportes públicos (autocarros) a 50 metros. Fica a 10 minutos de duas paragens de metro – “Marquês” e “Campo 24 de Agosto” - esta última tem ligação directa com o aeroporto Francisco Sá Carneiro e com a estação de comboios de Porto-Campanhã.
access: O apartamento fica num 1º andar sem elevador (Rua Coutinho de Azevedo, 79 - 1ºAndar (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Porto) Há sempre lugar para estacionamento grátis nas redondezas, porém a 200 metros existe estacionamento pago privativo .
interaction: Estamos disponíveis para qualquer contacto ou esclarecimento e queremos dar todo o apoio durante a vossa estadia.
house_rules: Só é permitido fumar nas zonas exteriores da casa.  Durante a noite deve evitar ruídos e respeitar o descanso dos vizinhos. A casa deve ser deixada nas mesmas boas condições em que é entregue.

If the named guest is under the age of 21, the resort will not allow you to check in, and you will not receive a refund! name: Peaceful Apartment near Casa da Música
summary: Our apartment is in the city center and one of the noblest areas of Porto. It is next door (about 50m) to Casa da Música of architect Rem Koolhaas authorship where you can see building uniqueness as well as benefit from quality, diverse and constant programming . It is very close to public transport, shopping and access to and from the city. Despite being very well located and central it is extremely quiet and peaceful, ideal for vacation for two or for a some family days.
space: The apartment is extremely well located, close to the Casa da Musica Metro Station and bus stops. It is also 50 meters from the Casa da Musica, 200 meters from restaurants and shops and 500m shopping areas. It is approximately 1 km of access to and from the city!

name: Modern Luxury-Family Friendly Condo
summary: This stunning condo is family friendly and modern. It boasts vaulted ceilings, beautiful furnishings and is stocked with all the convinces of home. The property is impeccably maintained and is conveniently located across from an amazing beach.
space: Extensively renovated with modern new flooring, all new paint, all new furniture, lighting, three flat screen TVs with cable and dvd players, wireless internet, and a bluetooth speaker. The kitchen and dining area are beautiful with new cabinets, granite, stainless appliances and lighting. Stunning views of the ocean, pool, and mountain from lanai. Two floor design includes main floor with living room, dining area, kitchen, bathroom, and bedroom. Main floor bedroom includes beautiful mahogany king size bed and furniture with closet, large dresser for guests and air conditioning. Room also includes flat screen TV with cable, dvd player and  alarm clock. Bathroom includes a walk-in shower. Kitchen is fully furnished with a new dishwasher, fridge, stove, and microwave. Kitchenware, glassware, toaster, blender and coffee maker included in the completely outfitted kitchen. notes: Rates include a one-time linen & towel setup. An initial supply of soap and paper products is provided.  The unit is professionally cleaned before you arrive and after you leave for the next guest. Daily maid service is not provided.  You will have access to an in the unit washer/ dryer for your personal use.  Upon check-in at the front desk guests must pay a $61.46 resort fee WHICH IS NOT INCLUDED IN THE RENTAL FEE. This fee includes a swipe pass to access gated parking and access to the pool, sundeck, and hot tub area and exercise facilities.  It also includes free lobby cyber café access, free wifi in the lobby and pool areas, access to the complimentary Wednesday Mai-tai party, free local telephone calls and 1-800 access.
access: The Kamaole Sands property  is a great place for both active or relaxing vacations! The pool and kiddie pool with hot-tubs and sun-deck are great, and the 15 acre grounds are the nicest in Kihei with fountains, waterfalls, fish and turtle ponds, and convenient bbq areas. The fitness room is a nice touch, and the immediate area is perfect for cycling, snorkeling, kayaking, surfing, boogie boarding, running, and walking. The beautiful Kamaole 3 Beach is directly across from the Kamaole Sands.

name: Room in apartment with beautiful view, in Botafogo
summary: Large apartment, comfortable room with TV. Separate bathrooms, but complete. TV room. Beautiful views of Guanabara Bay. A place near malls and easy transportation by both bus and taxi. Bakery close by. Next to the bakery called "Pão de Açúcar."
space: I live in the apartment, but there is total privacy. Great infrastructure.
description: Large apartment, comfortable room with TV. Separate bathrooms, but complete. TV room. Beautiful views of Guanabara Bay. A place near malls and easy transportation by both bus and taxi. Bakery close by. Next to the bakery called "Pão de Açúcar." I live in the apartment, but there is total privacy. Great infrastructure. Guests will be allowed to access the apartment in general, except for my room. There is a place for drying and washing clothes. I offer sheets, towels, etc. I live in the apartment and I usually go out. I have two cats that will not enter in your room. In Botafogo. Next to the Urca, Pão de Açúcar and Praia Vermelha (Red Beach). Near Copacabana. Easy transportation to Ipanema and all the South. Nice atmosphere and great view! Positive energy! There is not easy parking for those coming by car. It is best to use taxi. There are bus stops nearby. The subway is less than a kilometer.

Usar a cozinha apenas para refeições rápidas ou lanches. Não é permitido cozinhar todas as refeições usando fogão , panelas e serviço da auxiliar para cozinhar. Há micro ondas que pode ser utilizado para aquecer refeições ou alguma coisa necessária.  Há café da manhã .  Há TV no quarto. Não se pode desliga-la da tomada . Idem o aparelho da NET. Isto desconfigura o aparelho . Basta não liga-la caso não deseje ver. Não grudar , pregar, imagens , figuras ou qualquer símbolo no mobiliário que é envernizado . Os objetos podem ser colocados nas mesas de cabeceira apoiados. Jamais colados.

name: Artist Home by the Sea - a 4 minute walk to Beach!
summary: Our spacious comfortable 1 bedroom condo with original artwork is filled with peaceful and healing vibrations and surrounded by tropical gardens. It comfortably fits two and is in a small quiet complex of 18 units. Just a 4 minute walk across from the Ocean of Keawakapu Beach, listed as one of 5 best beaches in the world!  (Website hidden by Airbnb)
space: Across the street from the exquisite Keawakapu Beach ocean with its long white sandy beaches.  We share our Maui Home with you. It's decorated with the owner's original artwork and is filled peaceful, healing, vibrations and surrounded by tropical gardens. We are located in a small quiet single complex with just 18 units, unlike the large, typical, noisy, busy multi-building complexes.   Discover Steps from the Beach enjoy the relaxing privacy of a small, quiet 18 unit condo is located on a lush, tropical garden including a bamboo grove.  It's an exclusive alternative to the noise, congestion and crowds of large complexes. Home is filled with original art by the owner.Ocean views from the Master Bedroom, Living Area and Lanai. It is a world class beach, with superb swimming and snorkeling, inviting long walks on its sandy shores. Mother Humpback whales rest with their young in these waters that are a sanctuary to Giant Green Sea Turtles as well. Spinner Dolphins can be seen in gracing

neighborhood_overview: We are the Gateway to Wailea, where the road turns country.  We are nested with Haleakala behind us and the Ocean in front with panoramic views of Kahoolawe Island, Molokini Crater, Lanai Island, and West Maui Mountains! Our property is set back in lush tropical surroundings.
notes: The entire  property is NON-SMOKING both indoors and outdoors Hawaii TAT ID  - W(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
transit: There are several options to choose from: Car Rentals can be made from the airport. There is an airport shuttle service. Taxi service and Uber are also available. The bus stop is conveniently located 1/2 block south.
access: Adjoining our beach is the Kihei Boat Ramp, where charters to whalewatch, snorkel and dive can be an enjoyable walk to daily departures!  Fine Dining abounds in this area, with choices ranging from Wailea's Grand Resorts to local digs that are all close by. Hike or walk the trails along the pristine beaches of S. Kihei and Wailea. Our beach offers great swimming and snorkeling. It is home to lovely Green Sea Turtles. Kayak, SUP, Bike rentals just across the street .
interaction: We are available to you during your stay via phone and email. We have contacts on island to assist if a special need arises.
house_rules: Please treat our Home with Love and Respect as you would yours!  Absolutely NO SMOKING anywhere on property. This is a complete no smoking property, inside and outside. No pets. All guests are required to complete Verified ID with Airbnb. Check in 4:00pm Hawaii Time Check out 11:00am Hawaii Time PARKING: Please use the Side Street to Park that is adjacent to our building. It is close,convenient and private. The custom here is to leave your shoes at the door, so you can enjoy your bare feet! Please rinse off all sand on yourself and beach gear before entering. A hose is at the walkway entry. Enter and leave our home using the sidewalk entry. Please do not walk in front of other people's lanai areas. It is considered private. Please be respectful of the other residents in the complex by keeping noise down at night and early morning.  Please remove trash OFTEN to keep ants outside. Trash bags are provided and the dumpsters for garbage and recyclables are located in the corner of the parki

name: Huge duplex apt. up to 8 in Taksim
summary: Our flat is located in the heart of the city. Istiklal Avenue and Taksim Square are 3 minutes away. The flat is all yours. Feel free to relax and enjoy our magnificiant city.
space: From Taksim Square you`ll have access to all public transportion opportunities. But it's also possible to reach most of the sights by a nice walk.  The flat is located in an old neighborhood, where Armenians and Greeks lived before. It's perfect for tourists because of the nearness to the sights, but in the same time you live between native inhabitants and see different colours of turkish culture.We are living nearby and love this colourful and diverse neighborhood.  The flat was recently completly renovated and provides you three sleeping rooms with double bed, a living room with a sofa bed where two guest can sleep, a kitchen with all stuff you need for cooking, a terrace where you can watch the sunset and two bathrooms with hairdryer and towels.  We will provide you with any information you need.

name: Studio on main entertainment street
summary: Cozy studio with very high ceilings - room with a double bed, big enough for travelers planning on doing a lot of exploring! Right between St-Denis and St-Laurent - the two lively restaurant and bar streets in the entertainment district of Montreal.
description: Cozy studio with very high ceilings - room with a double bed, big enough for travelers planning on doing a lot of exploring! Right between St-Denis and St-Laurent - the two lively restaurant and bar streets in the entertainment district of Montreal. You'll have the whole studio to yourself. It's not huge, but it's enough for 2 people (you have one double bed though!). There's a bathroom with a shower and toilet. You're free to use the kitchen - the fridge, stove and microwave. I will be out of town - but always reachable via phone or online communication. I know my place well, so don't hesitate to reach me if you need anything :) The apartment is located in the heart of Montreal downtown/the plateau - it's perfect for a weekend getaway to this beautiful city. Some of my favourite places around are: - La Distilerie - fancy cocktails across the road - Nexus Smart Bar - video game bar downstairs - Cinko - retro bar with $5 food! - Sushi St-Denis - all-you-can-eat sushi restaurant (remembe
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the heart of Montreal downtown/the plateau - it's perfect for a weekend getaway to this beautiful city. Some of my favourite places around are: - La Distilerie - fancy cocktails across the road - Nexus Smart Bar - video game bar downstairs - Cinko - retro bar with $5 food! - Sushi St-Denis - all-you-can-eat sushi restaurant (remember, lunch is cheaper than dinner!) - Cafe Gitana - cigar and shisha bar - Les Trois Minots - karaoke bar with a fun atmosphere and cheap drinks, open till late  - Moosebawr (a little bit further away but worth it) - super Canadian bar with large beers and wonderful sangria jugs
transit: Location is perfect - walkable everywhere. But if you want to go further out of downtown, it's a 5 minutes walk to metro Berri-UQAM (orange & green lines), Sherbrooke (orange line), and St-Laurent (green line). There's also night busses from all directions that go all night (metro closes at 12 or 1, depending on the night!).

name: Inner City Spacious Loft- City View
summary: This beautiful, sunny loft room is on the top floor of a three storey free-standing terrace in Redfern. The room is very spacious, private, quiet and open. We are a family of 4 adults and will give you as much privacy or company as you would like.
space: We are located in cafe, bar and restaurant heartland. Choose from a wide and eclectic range of eating and drinking holes from the very reasonable to the 3 star. Similarly you will have ready access to: - the CBD by bus ( (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ) or train or on foot;  - the universities of Sydney, NSW and UTS by bus or on foot; - Bondi Junction or Newtown / Marrickville (352/355 bus) - Coogee (372 bus) - Maroubra (393, 395 bus)

neighborhood_overview: Our neighbourhood is unique by its closeness to facilities interesting to a traveller. As well it is a wonderful sociopolitical mix of the young and old, the professional, the retired and the student of all sexual preference. If it's the Gay Pride Mardi Gras you're here for, this is a perfect space.
notes: Please note that we live in the Inner city where public transport is excellent and more cars are not encouraged as there are already too many. There is limited free parking close to the house but most parking is restricted to 2 hours between 8am and 8pm. At night however there is unlimited parking and mostly available fairly close to house except if there is an event at the nearby sporting venues.

neighborhood_overview: LOCALISATION de la Maison Dolbeau:  située dans la Côte-des-Neiges, le quartier est maintenant joint à Notre-Dame-de-Grâce au sein de l’arrondissement Côte-des-Neiges-Notre-Dame-de-Grâce depuis 2002. Son origine remonte à l'époque de la Nouvelle-France, aujourd’hui  il est l'un des quartiers le plus multi-ethniques et populeux de la ville. La diversité ethnoculturelle de Côte-des-Neiges est le reflet du Montréal d’aujourd’hui, il est situé au pied du Mont Royal.Le Sudio Dolbeau est adjacent à Outremont, on qualifie l’arrondissement de quartier étudiant car il vit au rythme des sessions scolaires en raison de sa proximité avec le campus de l’Université de Montréal et de ses écoles affiliées la Polytechnique et HEC Montréal ainsi ses collèges privés de grande réputation (Notre-Dame, Brébeuf, Saint Nom de Marie. Ses cafés et restaurants sont populaires auprès des étudiants qui s’y donnent rendez-vous. On y retrouve de nombreux restaurants et commerces ethniques. Plusieurs stations de métr

name: Unit 310 Hawaiian King condo Waikik
space: Unit 310 is a 455 sq ft apartment in the Hawaiian King condo building. It has one bedroom, a living room, a full size kitchen, a small dressing room, bathroom, and additionally a 90 sq ft lanai. It is on the third floor of an elevator building. There is a queen size bed in the bedroom and a double size fouton in the living room and a small love seat. Located in the heart of Waikiki, one long block from the beach and ocean. Expect comfort, proximity to stores, restaurants, night life, golf, zoo, aquarium, parks, bus stops, conference center, Ala Moana Shopping mall, and easy, casual Hawaiian style living.
description: Unit 310 is a 455 sq ft apartment in the Hawaiian King condo building. It has one bedroom, a living room, a full size kitchen, a small dressing room, bathroom, and additionally a 90 sq ft lanai. It is on the third floor of an elevator building. There is a queen size bed in the bedroom and a double size fouton in the living room and a small love seat. Located in the heart of Waikiki, one long block from the beach and ocean. Expect comfort, proximity to stores, restaurants, night life, golf, zoo, aquarium, parks, bus stops, conference center, Ala Moana Shopping mall, and easy, casual Hawaiian style living.
house_rules: No more than 4 people in unit. No loud parties. Must be quiet after 10 pm. No roughhousing in unit. No jumping on beds.

name: Quarto simples, centro do Rio.

name: Hibiscus Hideaway in Kihei
summary: This beautiful one bedroom one bathroom cottage is completely brand new and is kept immaculate. Tile floors throughout, granite counter tops in the progressive yet traditional fully appointed kitchen and state of the art appliances.
space: The artistically designed bathroom has details like a granite counter, a beautifully artistic tile shower and so much more! The wall mounted flat screen TV/DVD/CABLE in the living area makes watching a movie after a day at the beach very comfortable. There is also a fabulous new BBQ for those nights when you just want to stay in. name: Affordable and close to the city!
summary: Comfortable room in a modern apartment near city.
space: This is a split level apartment with 2 bedrooms.  The master room and laundry room are located downstairs.  Upstairs is your room + bathroom, kitchen, dining and living area and 2 balconies. Your room has a built in wardrobe, balcony and own private bathroom. It is equipped with a queen size bed, ceiling fan and wifi.  Located on the borders of Alexandria and Redfern, the apartment is an easy 5 mins stroll to the Redfern train station. From the station, you're only 1 stop away from Central station where you can catch direct trains to the airport and 2 stops away from the heart of the city. Commuting to the city is quick and convenient either by train or bus. The nearest bus stop is 200m from the apartment and there are regular buses to the city.  The bus ride should only take 10-15 minutes. A taxi ride from the airport takes about 15 minutes and costs less than AUD30 with Uber. name: A1 Tradewinds Ranch House (2 story)
summary: Tradewinds Ranch is a 30 acre ranch that resides in the quiet rural community of Punalu'u, the Ko'olauloa  Mountain District on the island of O'ahu. The ranch sits Mauka (mountain) side in front of Sacred Falls and is about 2 blocks (walking distance) from the iconic beaches of the north eastern shore of Oahu. Tradewinds Ranch is a ranch with farm animals:  cows, horses, chickens, ducks, sheep, goats, dogs, cats, frogs... etc.!  We are excited to share our slice of country with you!
space: We offer a very private Hawaiian country abode, free from crowding in urban centers in Hawaii that is truly a tropical-country style experience.  Our 30 acres working ranch features horses, dogs, cats, cattle, goats, sheep, chickens, donkeys, pigs, and peacocks. Our animals are apart of our family and roam free among us and there land. We hope our guest feel free and comfortable to enjoy our beautiful mountain views and walks down our country road.  We are a working ranch that is located in the mountainside of the jungly, rainy side of the island.  This can mean at times we'll have ants, termites and other critters or pests that are above and beyond the norm.  We do routinely exterminate and if ever there's a problem, you can give us a call. FULL DISCLOSURE: ABSOLUTELY NO EVENTS OR PARTIES CAN BE HELD ON THIS PROPERTY. Only the number of guests noted on the contract and the registered vehicles are allowed on the property.

neighborhood_overview: The property is located on a 30 acre land and has amazing mountain views, farm animals, gorgeous sunsets and a true love of animals can be found here!
notes: There are beautiful beaches just down Kamehameha Hwy that you can walk to. The nearest grocery store, Tamura's Market, is located about 4 minutes up the road. The shopping center also has the following: Domino's Pizza - and they do deliver to the ranch Papa Ole's - amazing Hawaiian food Post Office Longs Drugs Hauula Clinic
transit: A rental car is STRONGLY recommended.  There is a bus stop off Kamehameha Highway in front of Puhuli Street. The bus service in Hawaii is very reliable.
access: To access the ranch:  Drive to the nearly the end of Puhuli Street.  On the left-hand side you will see a large Palm tree and American Flag.  The ranch is surrounded by a white fence.  Turn left just before the flag.  You will come to the main ranch gate that says "Tradewinds Ranch" on the posts above the gate.  Just prior to arriving, I'll be sending you detailed instructions on how to navigate to the ranch house once on-property.   The home is free standing and you will be the only people staying in the house. It has a private driveway with a gate you can close behind you to keep the farm animals at bay if you choose.
interaction: I also live on the property down the road and can assist you with whatever you need during your stay. Just shoot me a text or give me a call!
house_rules: FULL DISCLOSURE: ABSOLUTELY NO EVENTS OR PARTIES CAN BE HELD ON THIS PROPERTY. Only the number of guests noted on the contract and the registered vehicles are allowed on the property. The main ranch gate MUST BE CLOSED UPON EVERY ENTRY AND EXIT OF THE PROPERTY Smoking is allowed outside only. Please use the ash trays provided. Turn off all lights and power (such as fans, appliances, etc.) when leaving the house. People other than those in the Guest party per the reservation agreement may not stay overnight in the property.  Any other person in the property is the sole responsibility of Guest.  Guests are not allowed to exceed the occupancy limit agreed to above. Guests should not create excessive noise at a level that disturbs neighbors; Code-enforced neighborhood quiet hours are from 10:00p.m. – 8:00a.m. All of the units are privately owned; the owners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries or illness that occurs while on the premises or its facilities. neighborhood_overview: The area is extremely safe with five 24 hour doorman buildings on the block. Only a seven minute walk to the metro / subway and 2 blocks from the United Nations. Located at the crossroads of some of NYC's finest and most convenient neighborhoods including Turtle Bay, Beekman, Sutton and Midtown East. Prime location, safe and accessible to everything. In walking distance, you will find some of the finest restaurants and shopping in NYC. The ease of access to Broadway Shows and Times Square just across town makes this unit a wonderful starting and ending point for any holiday or business trip. Whole Foods is just 7 blocks away and 2 local supermarkets are within 2 blocks. The East River Promenade is 1 block away, having one of the city's best dog runs, water views and running paths. We look forward to your stay!
notes: or your additional comfort, we have also supplied a HEPA Air Purifier with UV-C which offers multiple levels of cleaning to help improve the indoor air quality. It features multiple levels of cleaning including HEPA, UV-C and charcoal. This air purifier captures 99.97% of particles down to .3 microns in size.
transit: This furnished apartment is only 4 short blocks from the 6, E and M subway lines. The crosstown bus is located on the block just a few steps from the apartment.
access: We try to personally greet each and every guest and help them enter the vacation rental unit. In the rare instances that we are not available, keys are made available for easy, worry free access.
interaction: We would love to meet you ;)

name: Beautiful Apt, Tropical Resort, Steps to the Beach
summary: Our nightly rate includes already the mandatory Hawaii State Tax of 14.42%. Spacious 2BR/2BA Vacation Rental Condo in a Beautiful Resort with well-manicured Japanese zen garden. directly across the street from the beach.
space: Beautiful and spacious describes this 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo at the Kihei Resort. This 1000+ square-foot, fully furnished condo has all of the amenities of home and overlooks the pool and spa areas. This Condo is just minutes away from restaurants, shopping and many other first class South Maui beaches. Kihei Resort is a small intimate complex of only 64 units that is lushly landscaped to give you a true tropical Hawaiian experience. The Resort offers a very nice Pool, Hot Tub & BBQ Area. Highlights of the Condo: - Fully equipped kitchen - Washer and dryer. - AC in the living room and upstairs bedroom - Ceiling Fans in all of the rooms - Queen size sofa-sleeper in the living room - Tub/shower in both bathrooms - 32" Flatscreen TV - DVD player - Free wifi - Free parking spot - Pool, hot tub and BBQ area on the common grounds Maximum occupancy of 4 people. We do not accept 3rd Party bookings.

space: This freshly renovated, bright two bedroom flat located right in the heart of Barcelona is very modern, suitable for up to 6 people. The flat has a fully equipped open concept kitchen opening up to a spacious living and dining area with fantastic views of the most impressive sights of Barcelona. The apartment has two bathrooms, each with a  rain shower, an environmentally friendly dual flush toilet and natural light. As for the bedrooms, there are two double bedrooms and the leather sofa in the living area opens up to a confortable double sofa bed.
description: Enjoy your holiday in super bright apartment in the centre of Barcelona. The apartment has two bathrooms, each with a  rain shower, an environmentally friendly dual flush toilet and natural light. As for the bedrooms, there are two double bedrooms and the leather sofa in the living area opens up to a confortable double sofa bed. There are two subway lines (L3 (green) and L2 (purple)) both at about 50m from the apartment. The apartment lies in the heart of Barcelona city center. Raval, the Barri Gotic, La Ribera (El Born)
neighborhood_overview: There are two subway lines (L3 (green) and L2 (purple)) both at about 50m from the apartment. The apartment lies in the heart of Barcelona city center. Raval, the Barri Gotic, La Ribera (El Born), and Barceloneta can be explored on foot from the apartment. The L2 line brings you directly to La Sagrada Familia. Business travellers visiting the Fira Montjuic or the Fira Grand Via can reach their destination within 10min to 25min. Next to the apartment you can find the beautiful Montjuic Gardens, the best museums such as MNAC, Fundació Joan Mirò, Caixa Forum... “Las Ramblas” and Plaça Catalunya are just a stone throw away and the beach 20 minutes walking. In addition, for shopping lovers, there is a shopping mall called “Las Arenas”, Las Ramblas and Portal de l'Angle at walking distance.
notes: HUTB-7864
transit: Parallel (L3, L2), Sant Antoni (L2)
house_rules: *  NON Smoking apartment!! *  Please be aware that noise after 21:00 / parties are strictly forbidden in this building. *  Groups of young people below 25 years are not allowed due to earlier experiences. *  It is not under any circumstance allowed with more people in the apartment than what is stated in the reservation. Violation of the rules will result in immediate evacuation without any refund of remaining nights. *  After 21:00 there is a late arrival fee of 20€, and 50€ after midnight. *  A local touristic tax of 2,48€ per adult and night needs to be paid and is not included in the price. neighborhood_overview: This flat is a aditional flat located in Barrio Gracia. The good thing about Gracia is that it feels like a bustling little village within a city. There are lots of cool plazas, bars, cafes and restaurants to hang out in, as well as as plenty of fresh fruit, veg and bread to buy. There are a lot less tourists compared to the centre, which gives the Barrio a more authentic feel. Around there there re a lots of fresh fruit and veg, bread, cafes, bars, plazas and restaurants in the area! A perfect hub from which you can explore an amazing city!
notes: Well connected by public transport like bus and metro (15 minutes to the centre) but walking anywhere in the city is easy. You can walk to the centre in about 20 minutes and 10 min to La Sagrada Familia. Nearest Metro station are Joanic, Verdaguer.
transit: From the airport the Best way to the aparment is the tube Line 9 to collblanc, change to Line 5 untill Verdaguer, afther that 5 minutes wolk to the aparment

notes: The deadbolt on the top is currently disabled (the key needs to be replaced). Stick to the little button on the doorknob and you'll be fine.  The price charged, excluding the Airbnb fee of which we play no role in, includes GST, QST as well as a local lodging tax. There will be NO extra charges upon your arrival. If you require a detailed invoice listing these taxes exactly, don't hesitate to ask!
transit: Metro Guy-Concordia is about a four minute walk from the front door, Metro Atwater is seven. And if you need to head up to the Plateau or into NDG or CDN, Georges Vanier on the Orange Line is a six minute walk away. It's almost an embarrassment of riches.
access: Guests have exclusive access to the apartment and the deck.
interaction: I will do my best to greet my guests if they would like upon their arrival. In case I cannot make it, however, I of course will ensure sure to be available by communication (either through Airbnb or phone) should they have any needs to be addressed and/or questions!
house_rules: Check-in time is 3:00pm, check-out is 11:00am. Please remove your shoes while inside. Please don't use our towels to remove makeup - you'd think this was obvious and not worth mentioning, but you'd be wrong. And of course, no smoking inside the apartment; kindly head onto the patio (and use the ashtray).

name: Shangri'La by the Sea, Kapoho Beach
summary: THIS FAMOUS WATERFRONT PROPERTY has been a Vacation Rental for over 12 years. Over 70 Five Star reviews are posted on other sites, but we are new to Airbnb. The property has appeared on many television shows, been featured in international publications, and leased by world-renown celebrities. Here is a retreat with a beauty and atmosphere unmatched anywhere on the island. Voted 9th in the World by Islands Magazine! Please do not request a discount.
space: THIS FAMOUS PROPERTY has appeared on many television shows, featured in international travel publications, and leased by world-renown celebrities. Here is a Retreat with a Beauty and Atmosphere unmatched anywhere on the island; an Irreplaceable Sanctuary to Soothe the Soul and experience Old Hawaii Living at its Best!   As SHANGRI'LA has been a popular vacation rental for over a decade, we have many repeat visitors and want every guest to have the experience of a lifetime. This is why we offer a 100% REFUND POLICY if you come to the property, don't like what you see and don't check-in. Review our Rental Agreement for details. HIDDEN ALONG THE SUNNY SHORES OF KAPOHO BEACH, Shangri-La's four enchanting Bali cottages rest on your own PRIVATE, CRYSTAL CLEAR BATHING LAGOON. Beneath lush coconut and tropical palms, THE HEALING WATERS AVERAGE 90º year-round and are perfect for swimming, snorkeling, or therapeutic bathing. neighborhood_overview: FAQ’s 1.Why Shangri’La?   Along with the uniqueness of this property, a one of a kind, Shangri’La offers “Old Hawaii” at its best with a Balinese flair.  The privacy, the lagoons, the 4 separate pavilions, the waterfall, endless palm trees, and 90 degree volcanically heated ocean water, the friendly fish, with 2 private islands, lend itself to the description we most hear from guests: “It’s Heaven on Earth!”  The indoor/ outdoor design makes you feel like you’re on a private island somewhere and completely one with the tropics.  It’s a magical place, as we continue to hear over and over again from our guests that it was “The vacation of their lifetimes.”  We also hear that the magic of Shangri’La brings families and couples closer, and they often credit Shangri’La for this bonding experience and how they wish they could stay there together forever. 2.Why is this area of Hawaii the only location that has 90-degree ocean water? Access to the Pacific Ocean is just outside the Compound and less than a one-minute walk. The average temperature at Shangri’La is 75º day and night throughout the year. name: Exellent spot; light room w-balcony
summary: Beşiktaş is a great & very central district with a huge selection of cafes-restaurants, bars. shops & nightlife. Walking distance to the the Bosporus, the best parks, mosques, museums, PALACES and 6 km from Sultanahmet.  Public transport 100m away
space: The flat is well illuminated, peaceful and cosy, specially at night with the Thai lamps and candles. A 90 sq meter space,  ample and sweet, no clutter with a good balcony to chill out.  I'm a decent cook and sometimes we can share meals. No TV bcse in this city, there's too much to do and enjoy!
description: Beşiktaş is a great & very central district with a huge selection of cafes-restaurants, bars. shops & nightlife. Walking distance to the the Bosporus, the best parks, mosques, museums, PALACES and 6 km from Sultanahmet.  Public transport 100m away The flat is well illuminated, peaceful and cosy, specially at night with the Thai lamps and candles. A 90 sq meter space,  ample and sweet, no clutter with a good balcony to chill out.  I'm a decent cook and sometimes we can share meals. No TV bcse in this city, there's too much to do and enjoy! You can access all areas except the other bedroom. I work from home as a private language tutor and a therapeutic masseuse. On rare occasions there might be someone for lessons or therapy, there shouldn't be a problem, you can still go around your own business, just a bit more sensible and quiet in this case. I'm helpful and quite knowledgeable about the city and its intricacies. As long as I'm available, I'll be happy to assist you and give you tips
neighborhood_overview: I live between 2 of the best districts in Istanbul: Beşiktaş and Nişantaşı.  While the first is more bohemian, very lively, famous for its night-life and  next to the Bosporus, the later is much more affluent, elegant and full of specialized restaurants and internationally renown designer shops. Both are pretty, safe, very central and share an exiting lifestyle.  Everything is steps away or very nearby; gorgeous parks, mosques, Taksim and the TOP TOURIST ATTRACTIONS.  I'm surrounded by a huge array of cafes, restaurants, shops, bars and live music venues; all this contributes to making Beşiktaş one of the most sort after districts in Istanbul. Yet I live at a quiet and safe street. Witin 1 to 2 min walk: a hospital and pharmacy (at the corner) 3 supermarkets, including the cheapest chain in all of Turkey. The Saturday bazaar/farmer's market with very fresh and some organic products, only 150 meters away.  My street is quiet and with a line of trees. The Bosporus is a short walk away, f
notes: For avid walkers; the walk to TAKSIM trough Maçka park it's wonderful and it only takes about 25 min to reach Tksm. Or if you take the CABLE-CAPSULE ("teleferik") you can cross the park and have a gorgeous view from above and save a few min walk. You could even walk further to GALATA tower within 50 min (20 from Taksim square) and keep going down to Karaköy, only 5 min from Galata and another 10 min to Eminönū to the wonderful Spice bazaar and the Yeni mosque. All together you can walk from home to Eminönū in a bit more than 1 hr.
transit: **There are 3 bus routes that pass by the corner of the flat (130m) They go to TAKSIM, another to EMINÖNŪ (Spice bazaar) Karaköy & Yeni Kapı (very near the Blue mosque). 5 min walk there's the dolmuş (collective taxi) that goes to Taksim  in about 5 min. **Osmanbey metro is 15 min walk. This metro can lead you to Atatūrk airport within one hour with a short-easy change at Yeni Kapı. **Kabataş tram that leaves you at the door of the Blue mosque, Aiğa Sofia,  the spice and Grand Bazaars is 25 min walk or 1 bus ride away from this corner. Optional; taxi to Kabataş in 6 min and costs about €2.5 ** The ferries to Ūskūdar only take 5 minutes to reach ASIA! Or 20 min by luxurious ferry to Kadiköy (only 70 euro cents) From Beşiktaş centre there's another dolmuş to Taksim (5-7 min ride) and a huge selection of buses to go all around and mainly the most beautiful palaces in the city and near the Black Sea at Sarıyer!
access: You can access all areas except the other bedroom. I work from home as a private language tutor and a therapeutic masseuse. On rare occasions there might be someone for lessons or therapy, there shouldn't be a problem, you can still go around your own business, just a bit more sensible and quiet in this case.
interaction: I'm helpful and quite knowledgeable about the city and its intricacies. As long as I'm available, I'll be happy to assist you and give you tips on how to move around more efficiently, saving time and money with transport and eating out or bargaining like a pro at the bazaars! Being Mexican gives me a more unbiased view on Turkey, it's culture, traditions and life in general. I might be able to share some of my Mexican cooking or tips on how to prepare a great tasting guacamole or salsa. Also, could teach you how to play tavla (backgammon) if you already know, then we could have a fun match.
house_rules: No smoking inside, only outside or on the balcony. No shoes inside, specially bcse the carpets are very light. Respectful, tidy, independent, easy going.

You'll receive our detailed written guide to Rio, welcome food, benefit from our local knowledge and feel at home before you even arrive! CARNIVAL NOTE:  Please note that our minimum stay for Carnival is 4 nights.  So, please don't use Instant Book for Carnival if your stay is less than 4 nights.  Carnival 2019 prices are already in the calendar, so just enter your dates! We do hope you will come and stay -  we'll do all we can to make your stay special! Our beautifully-designed and renovated studio is located in a lovely, tree-lined, residential street in Copacabana with no heavy traffic and only 5 mins walk from the beach.  The walk t
neighborhood_overview: Everything is on your doorstep here: local shops, supermarkets, the original 'City of Copacabana'  Shopping Centre, great cafes, bars and restaurants.  Every Wednesday morning there's a lovely fresh food market 3 minutes walk away at the end of our street.   When you see all the marvellous things in our neighbourhood set out in our guide you will see why we think we are in the best area and best street in Rio!   Copacabana Beach for us is much more interesting, day and night, than Ipanema and the range of shops and quality of life in Copa somehow seems much more real-world...a fantastic experience living like a true Carioca (native of Rio)! We have everything on hand, but perhaps what we love most best is the ease of just a 5-minute walk home to our residential tree-lined street feeling you are escaping from the lively beach area, or the big parties at New Year and Carnival!
notes: No more than two people can stay here - we can put an airbed in if the two people do not want to share the double bed.  For short stays we can make an exception if the third person is a child but only by prior agreement using the airbed.   Our street is residential and quiet compared to the busy avenues nearby - there is some background sound of Rio traffic and street life.     We don´t notice it, but you may if you are a light sleeper. Please think twice before using the aircon in order to be more environmentally friendly and to keep the costs down!  The ceiling fan is very effective and more gentle.  Please turn both off when not in the studio.
transit: We are only 3 minutes from the Siquiera Campos stop on the main metro line which connects us to Ipanema  (two stops - 5 minutes) and to the centre of Rio (8 stops - 12 minutes).  There are many buses nearby as well, and we are five minutes walk from the airport bus drop off/pick up point at the Marriot Hotel.   There is also a safe and reliable taxi rank within 100 metres, and we have our own driver contact for personalised airport transfers or trips to other towns like Paraty or Buzios. It's also a lovely walk to Ipanema - about 30 mins along the beach front.
access: What you WILL find: internet - cable and wifi air conditioning ceiling fan and light fridge microwave toaster filter coffee machine kettle single ring cooker stove fan heater tap water filter (so no need to buy bottled water) flat-screen TV with international cable channels plentiful wall sockets, all 110 volts (like most of Rio). All modern appliances automatically adapt to this voltage (including laptops). quality bedding and towels (towels for the shower, not to be used for the beach please) large bathroom cupboard with good storage space tea towels (for the kitchen) cutlery plates, storage jars and boxes glasses, cups and mugs pots, pans and cooking utensils small, light hairdrier full-size sofa bed - very comfortable as sofa and bed (see review on this) comfortable designer armchair wall mounted folding table  two chairs modern desk with lamp and drawer unit full-length wardrobe with full-length mirror with good hanging space chest of drawers (6 drawers) two 3-drawer units beside
interaction: Before your finalise your reservation we are available to answer any questions you have, and then are in close contact helping you prepare your trip sharing all our local knowledge as you wish, and also sending our written guide which covers great places to eat and transfer arrangements etc.   Our welcomer is Hugo who is a close, multi-lingual friend of ours and we are always available at any time during your stay to help with questions.
house_rules: No visitors - the 24 hour doormen will not allow non-guests to enter the building.

name: Gorgeous Ocean View 2BD/2BA 106
summary: Menehune Shores Resort is centrally-located in Kihei, one of south Maui's most popular destinations.
space: It's prime location offers convenient access to other areas of Maui, such as the airport in Kahului, the charming town of Kihei, beautiful Wailea, historical Lahaina and Ma'alaea Bay, famous for whale watching, turtle sightings and The Maui Ocean Center.   Adjacent to the resort is the Hawaiian Islands Humpback Whale National Marine Sanctuary, along with the historical 16th Century Alii (Royal) Fish Pond of Kalepolepo.  Protected by offshore reefs, the pond provides a safe swimming area for children and those who prefer a gentle surf.   Our spectacular ocean-front resort offers beautifully maintained and manicured grounds lined with majestic palms, a beach-front swimming pool with large sundeck, shuffleboard, two adjacent beaches, on-site restaurant and lounge, free and convenient parking, and an incredible roof top barbeque area with seating, lounging and amazing 180 degree views of The Pacific Ocean, the West Maui Mountains and the slopes of Haleakala. name: Cosy Home at Galata
summary: Sumahan (building name) is a friendly Oasis in the heart of Istanbul.
space: Sumahan is a friendly Oasis in the heart of Istanbul, where creativity can flourish through support and collaboration between artists. Made up of a number of offices, art studios, residences, and common rooms, Sumahan is home to a wide range of activities and boutique events. As important as the spaces themselves, are the community of people who occupy them and add to the character of the building. A place where we can be free to express ourselves; free to think, create, and share; to inspire and be inspired. We need this place, because we are stronger together than we are alone.

neighborhood_overview: Pyrmont is just 2km from the Centre of Sydney's business district, a leisurely stroll across Pyrmont Bridge and Cockle Bay.    The Jones Bay and Cockle Bay wharf restaurant precincts are within walking distance offering access to some of Sydney's best restaurants and nightclubs, including Flying Fish, Pontoon and Home, while event centres such as Doltone House and Dockside are nearby. Also located in walking distance are The Star casino, Sydney Fish Markets and IMAX.   The Sydney Aquarium and Maritime Museum are both just over the bridge. Several lovely parks are also in the local area.
notes: There is construction going on in this building between the hours of 7am and 5pm. We have reduce the rates because of the potential for noise. Late check-out and early check-in is available where possible. When you arrive at the property you will find a kitchen and bathroom welcome pack with travel size amenities to ensure you do not need to head to the shops on your first day. We also provide top quality linen and towels. Cleaning services are available during your stay at additional cost. Your host has chosen to use the services of MadeComfy to ensure your requirements are met. A MadeComfy concierge service is available to help you with transport, theatre tickets, food and grocery deliveries or any special requests.
transit: A Pyrmont location makes Sydney easy to get around. Walk to the City centre, Glebe, Fishmarkets, restaurants and Darling Harbour.  Or grab an Opal card and you can get around Sydney and it's surrounds easily, Central Station, light rail and Sydney's bus network all located within a few minutes walk. We highly recommend using ride sharing service Uber.  Check out the TripGo app for transport timetables.
access: Guests will have access to the entire property.
interaction: You'll have the full support of the team at MadeComfy, a Sydney company helping hosts provide the best quality stay even whilst they are away from their home. A team member will organise your arrival and will continue to provide any assistance during your stay.
house_rules: You are staying at a friendly and peaceful neighbourhood area. Your help in keeping noise to a minimum is much appreciated between 10pm-8am. Excessive noise such as amplified music, vocals will cause neighbours to complain to the Building Manager or Council Rangers or Police. This could lead to an on-the-spot AUD200 fine and/or eviction of the property. This can all happen very quickly so your cooperation is very much appreciated. Please treat our home with the same love and care you treat yours. We have the following house rules whilst you stay with us: 1. Please be mindful of sound levels after 10:00PM to avoid neighbour complaints. 2. If you break something please let us know to replace it. Please leave your beds unmade Kindly clean up your dishes and put them away In case you have rearranged furniture, please put it back to the original location We would highly appreciate if you could take out the trash Please ensure all appliances and lights are off and doors and windows are close

description: Flat with a complete bedroom for 2, a living.room with more 2 twin beds. Independent kitchen,hall, wc,marquee, balcony. Apartamento C/1 quarto completo para 2 dois e 1 sala/quarto com 2 duas confortáveis e  grandes camas individuais . Esta sala possui também 5 sofás p/ um bom relax e  área para refeições. Um wc completo, cozinha equipada,marquise  para fumadores, fazem também parte deste apartamento, servido por dois elevadores.   A 1 min. (pé) do supermercado,farmácia,bus e táxis à porta. O espaço é luminoso e  arejado. Pensado para ser vivido confortável e descomplicadamente. Os hóspedes têm acesso exclusivo, o apartamento é independente. A casa será habitada exclusivamente por eles, com total privacidade.  Poderão ter acesso por elevador a estacionamento directo à garagem, mediante consulta. Neste caso, obedece a um depósito de €30 garantindo um comando electronico,(devolvidos no dia do check out) e um pagamento € 5 de diários para o estacionamento em garagem privativa do edíficio.
neighborhood_overview: A localização do apartamento é uma mais valia atendendo á proximidade com os pontos importantes da cidade e com o mar. O viajante, pode optar por dias culturais ou por dias de relax, sem ter de se movimentar muito. Estará a 10 minutos de autocarro, ou até menos, destas duas hipóteses, sem ter de se programar.
notes: -Sempre que a reserva seja efectuada para o próprio dia, o hóspede deverá avisar o proprietário qual a sua hora de chegada com 3 horas de antecedência, para que este se desloque para o receber.  -Após a hora que o hóspede defina como hora de chegada ao apartamento, terá uma hora de tolerância de atraso grátis.  Após 1 hora hora de atraso, o hóspede deverá pagar 6 euros em cash, por cada hora completa ou incompleta à pessoa que o aguarda. -O lugar de garagem privativo dentro do edifício, tem um custo de 6 euros/dia e uma caução de 25 euros para o comando da garagem, a ser devolvida no final da estadia. -Os hóspedes que fiquem alojados por mais de 15 dias, deverão entregar uma caução de 100 em dinheiro no momento do check-in. Serão devolvidos no check-out, após a verificação do bom estado do alojamento.
transit: Transportes públicos constantes e táxis,  na traseira do edifício  para o centro da cidade, para a praia, para o aeroporto e estações de comboio e metro .Poderão comprar um cartão 'Andante" por 0,60 e carregar com viagens para circular pela cidade durante, 1hora, por (URL HIDDEN) compararem no bus o preço é  1.85 euros,  o máximo a pagar para qualquer um destes locais. Durante a noite, aconselho o táxi para duas ou mais pessoas, uma vez que o preço ficará equivalente e o Bus, tem menos opções.  Desde o aeroporto, a linha do metro é a violeta e deverão sair na CASA DA Música, onde podem no local, apanhar um bus para LORDELO DO Ouro, cuja paragem fica nas costas do apartamento. O táxi é também uma opção rápida, pois, demorará apenas 6 minutos e não custa mais de 6 euros.
access: Os hóspedes têm acesso exclusivo, o apartamento é independente. A casa será habitada exclusivamente por eles, com total privacidade.  Poderão ter acesso por elevador a estacionamento directo à garagem, mediante consulta. Neste caso, obedece a um depósito de €30 garantindo um comando electronico,(devolvidos no dia do check out) e um pagamento € 5 de diários para o estacionamento em garagem privativa do edíficio.
interaction: Os hóspedes poderão contactar-me via sms,  ou email para qualquer apoio ou informações. Poderão também obter transfers pessoais, refeições típicas caseiras confeccionadas no apartamento,  tours diurnos e noturnos na cidade ou arredores, consoante disponibilidade e taxa a  acordar.
house_rules: Regras: lavar a louça;  Despejar o lixo diáriamente; Fumar apenas na cozinha e marquise,  Check in disponível com aviso prévio de 3 horas, uma vez que não dispomos de recepção.  Animais de pequeno porte grátis, após consulta e só admitidos para reservas do apartamento na totalidade. Não são admitidos animais  em  reservas de quartos privados. Apenas aceites nas reservas de apartamento na totalidade.

There's a large rooftop with patio furniture for picnicking or just lazing outside and reading. There is wifi, of course. It's a walk-up, which may not be to everyone's taste, and there are two cats. Guest will have access to both bedrooms, the bathroom, kitchen, sitting room, dining room and roof. We will be out of town during this rental, but our helper will be available when needed and we will leave details for a friend in the neighborhood who can answer basic questions. Tai Hang is a charming neighbor
neighborhood_overview: Tai Hang is a charming neighborhood full of low-rise buildings and quiet lanes. Small local restaurants as well as plenty of foreign options line uncrowded streets. The apartment is located on the edge of the neighborhood and equally close to Tin Hau, which boasts even more good restaurants, cafes and small shops. We are across from Victoria Park and very close to the Causeway Bay Sports Ground and the Central Library.
notes: We have two cats, who will stay elsewhere, and we will clean the place thoroughly before we go, of course. But those who are very sensitive to cat dander should be aware that there is some around.
transit: This is a very central location with great access to transit. The E11 airport bus goes right by us, and the MTR is right on the corner. The free Airport Express courtesy shuttle drops off at the Metro Park hotel, which is next door. There are also a number of other buses and trams, and plenty of cabs.
access: Guest will have access to both bedrooms, the bathroom, kitchen, sitting room, dining room and roof.
interaction: We will be out of town during this rental, but our helper will be available when needed and we will leave details for a friend in the neighborhood who can answer basic questions.

name: Independent room in Rio - Carnival and Rock in Rio
summary: Great room in family residence. Fully independent, it can have up to 2 guests. Private bathroom, minibar and microwave. Cul-de-sac providing parking nearby. Quiet neighborhood, with access to the BRT that connects to the Rio de Janeiro International Airport, the Olympic Village / Riocentro (Rock In Rio) and the beach and the Barra da Tijuca subway.
space: It is a neighborhood, not far from Barra da Tijuca and an interesting place to stay if you want to see the Olympics. However, you need to take a bus to get to the BRT station, or 20 minutes walking, connecting to the Carnival and Rock in Rio area. It is a residential home, where also live my mother and sister in apartments next door.

notes: Há possibilidade de solicitar o serviço de comida caseira e café da manhã.
transit: Há disponibilidade de linhas de ônibus que interliga à Estação Taquara do BRT, que fica a apenas 2 quilômetros de distância. O BRT interliga o Aeroporto Internacional do Rio de Janeiro, praia e metrô da Barra da Tijuca, Vila Olímpica/Riocentro/Rock in Rio.
access: O acesso é totalmente privativo dos hóspedes desse quarto, por meio da área externa.
interaction: Estarei disponível para orientar no que for necessário, caso os hóspedes solicitem. Minha filha e irmã residem em apartamentos anexos e também poderão ser solicitadas a ajudar em algo.
house_rules: É um studio com acesso somente por escadas. Não é interessante para idosos ou pessoas com mobilidade reduzida. Terminantemente proibido acesso de pessoas além daquelas identificadas como usuárias na locação, ou para encontros fortuitos e namoro. Ambiente familiar.

This is a legal requirement to those who provide the accommodation to guests, including nationals of other member states of the European Union. Please note that check in and check out times are flexible, please let me know in advance the estimate time of your arrival and departure.

This will ensure that the suite remains clean and our valued guests like you can enjoy a clean environment. - We cannot be responsible for lost or stolen items. Subletting the property is strictly prohibited. -

name: Private room (Kurtuluş/İstanbul)
summary: Hi!  I'm 30 years old working as a kindergarden teacher in a public shool. I live with my girlfriend. We like to host open-minded, anti-racist, gay-friendly people in our comfortable and warm house.  Let's be friends! :)
space: Hi! I am 30 years old working as a kindergarden teacher in a public shool at Beyoğlu. I live with my girlfriend. Her name is Fatima and she is studying in the same department at Boğaziçi University. Our 3-room apartment is in the third floor in the building located at Kurtuluş/Şişli, 15 minutes walking distance from Taksim Square. We like to host open-minded, anti-racist, gay-friendly people in our comfortable and warm house. Let's be friends :)

We like to host open-minded, anti-racist, gay-friendly people in our comfortable and warm house. Let's be friends :) Our guests can use bathroom, kitchen, living room with a small balcony. - 24 hours wi-fi - 24 hours hot water - Hair dryer, Iron, laundry hanger, washing machine, - Fridge, Gas cooker, oven, kettle. - In your room, there are a double bed, wardrobe, mirror, nightstand, floor-lamp. I am working and my girlfriend is going to schoo
neighborhood_overview: Kurtuluş, (formerly known as Tatavla meaning "horse stable" in Greek) is a cosmopolitan safe neighborhood of Şişli whose population consists of Turks, Greeks, Armenians, Kurds, and Jews. Our apartment is very near to a big main street named Kurtuluş Caddesi, where you can find a lot of markets, pharmacies, shopping malls, cafes, cake shops, banks, hospitals, groseries, exchange offices.
transit: You can reach to bus station (named Kurtuluş Son Durak) in 3 minutes. There is a direct bus every 10 minutes to Taksim (the heart of the European Side of Istanbul) and Eminönü (the historical center). Also, there is subway station (named Osmanbey metro durağı), so you can reach anywhere you want. However, we suggest you to walk to Taksim, Mecidiyeköy, Nişantaşı. So you can enjoy the city on the way!
access: Our guests can use bathroom, kitchen, living room with a small balcony. - 24 hours wi-fi - 24 hours hot water - Hair dryer, Iron, laundry hanger, washing machine, - Fridge, Gas cooker, oven, kettle. - In your room, there are a double bed, wardrobe, mirror, nightstand, floor-lamp.
interaction: I am working and my girlfriend is going to school in the daytime. When we are free, we like to chat, hang out, cook together etc. Also, if you need any help during your trip, we are ready here.
house_rules: We dont have strict rules as long as we show mutual respect.

name: Country Oasis Retreat
summary: A perfect country getaway nestled in a gated country farm on the North Shore of Oahu. Large Kitchen, one bedroom, one Bath, walk in closet. Built in 2012 very clean and modern. Majestic mountain views overlooking old Hawaiian wetlands.
space: The property is quintessential North Shore country living, quiet sunsets and quiet mornings. Little to no street light pollution makes the night sky stand out. Trade winds cool the property and close proximity to the beach and Haleiwa town, make this an Ideal getaway with convince close at hand. The property has 7 mango trees, 6 large coconut palms, a large banana patch, small citrus orchard, small (but deep) tilapia pond and a small farm animal pen.

notes: Onsite laundry Gas Appliances Solar hot water WIFI and cable included (not responsible for connectivity issues) Just updated the Wifi network with an extender (due to guest reviews)...Now excellent signal in all rooms.

name: Clean, comfortable and convenient
summary: Great apartment centrally located within 5 mins walking distance to Causeway Bay and Tin Hau MTR's.  Times Square, SOGO Dept store and various other shops within walking distance. Lots of restaurants to choose from in the area.
space: Our apartment offers 2 large bedrooms both with queen size beds. A sofa bed is also available that can sleep 2 guests. Fresh linen and towels will be provided during your stay. Cozy living area with 45" TV and Apple Tv. Wifi access available. Separate dining area with table and chairs. Kitchen provides fridge, 2 gas stove tops, oven, toaster, and Nutri Bullet. Although no  hot water in Kitchen, there is a kettle for boiling water to clean dishes. There is also a hot and cold Bonaqua water cooler avail in the flat. Shower and bath tub available in the bathroom with hot water. Washing machine is also provided in the flat.
description: Great apartment centrally located within 5 mins walking distance to Causeway Bay and Tin Hau MTR's.  Times Square, SOGO Dept store and various other shops within walking distance. Lots of restaurants to choose from in the area. Our apartment offers 2 large bedrooms both with queen size beds. A sofa bed is also available that can sleep 2 guests. Fresh linen and towels will be provided during your stay. Cozy living area with 45" TV and Apple Tv. Wifi access available. Separate dining area with table and chairs. Kitchen provides fridge, 2 gas stove tops, oven, toaster, and Nutri Bullet. Although no  hot water in Kitchen, there is a kettle for boiling water to clean dishes. There is also a hot and cold Bonaqua water cooler avail in the flat. Shower and bath tub available in the bathroom with hot water. Washing machine is also provided in the flat. Guests can easily access the apartment by Bus, Taxi, MTR or Tram. There is an elevator in the building. Although will not be in Hong Kong at the
neighborhood_overview: Our flat is located in a convenient part of Causeway Bay. Easily accessible by all modes of transport. Hong Kong Central Library is just across the road where there are many bus stops that can take you all over Hong Kong. The flat is within 5 mins walking distance from Causeway Bay Exit E MTR and Tin Hau Exit B MTR. Guests coming from Airport can take either A11 or E11 bus getting off at Victoria Park. Victoria Park is a great place for guests coming with children as there are lots of playgrounds within the park.  Many shops and restuarants within walking distance including Times Square, Hysan Place and SOGO department store. There is a 24hr Wellcome supermarket located 5 mins walk from the flat as well as a 24hr 7/11 located downstairs. Starbucks and McDonalds are also just around the corner.  Wanchai, famous for its bars and nightlife is a short bus/taxi drive away. Lan Kwai Fong and Soho, also famous for great restaurants and nightlife is also a short taxi ride or easily accessible
notes: Tea and Coffee will be provided.  There is a small room with a dehumidifier used for drying clothes after washing. Alternatively there is a laundromat located in the street. Garbage can be taken to the large garbage bin in the stairwell.
transit: Getting around Hong Kong from our flat is very convenient. As mentioned above, lots of bus routes passing by and close to the MTR. Please feel free to ask about a specific route.
access: Guests can easily access the apartment by Bus, Taxi, MTR or Tram. There is an elevator in the building.
interaction: Although will not be in Hong Kong at the time of your stay, I will be available via email or (Hidden by Airbnb) for any queries/questions you have during your stay. Key will be given to you on arrival by my sister and then collected at the end of your stay.
house_rules: Please be clean and respectful and treat home as if it were your own. No parties or events. No smoking inside the house Please remember to turn off air conditioners when not in use.

name: Comfy Studio with private entrance,  awesome views
summary: The studio ohana is located at 4000 ft and has awesome sunsets and views of the southern most tip of the US on a clear day. The studio is furnished with a queen size bed, linens, fridge, 2 gas burners, fully equipped kitchen, hot water, shower & flush toilet. We stock the frig with eggs picked from our chickens, bagels or bread, cream cheese, cream & butter. Local grown coffee, and tea. A cooler with blue ice is available for guests to use while enjoying  our beautiful island attractions.
space: The studio ohana is located on a one acre Ohia lot  On a clear day guests can view the southern most tip of the US, Southpoint. Cool evenings and nights!
description: The studio ohana is located at 4000 ft and has awesome sunsets and views of the southern most tip of the US on a clear day. The studio is furnished with a queen size bed, linens, fridge, 2 gas burners, fully equipped kitchen, hot water, shower & flush toilet. We stock the frig with eggs picked from our chickens, bagels or bread, cream cheese, cream & butter. Local grown coffee, and tea. A cooler with blue ice is available for guests to use while enjoying  our beautiful island attractions. The studio ohana is located on a one acre Ohia lot  On a clear day guests can view the southern most tip of the US, Southpoint. Cool evenings and nights! Guests have their own entrance, space, outdoor seating areas and on site parking.   Experience nature with the garden hot shower with privacy enclosure adjacent to the ohana entrance and in your own private garden setting. The ohana is powered with solar, batteries providing 110 power, and back-up generator. The Ohana is located in the lower level wi
neighborhood_overview: Very peaceful! Beautiful night skies. Because of our elevation cool evenings.  Tip: Bring warm clothes! There are activities in our immediate area from hiking trails, cavern tour's, green sands, farmers markets, swap meets and more. Kau is famous for it's coffee. We promote local businesses and stock the ohana studio with fresh roasted coffee beans. Just minutes away in the Town Center are 6 restaurants, 3 gas stations, 2 grocery stores,  one convenience store (Kahuka County Market - also selling gas), Ace Hardware, A nice Gift Shop (by Spirit Gas), Barber/Stylist Salon, a Business Support Center, US Post Office and a Auto Parts Store, a vet office, a great chiropractor and more!
notes: OCEAN VIEW is one of the largest sub divisions, with 11,000 one acre parcels. The sub division also known as HOVE has privately owned paved roads. There are 6 Eateries within 25 minutes of the Ohana.  The studio ohana is in the lower level. Cool nights and beautiful skies!  TIP:  Bring a warm sweater, jacket, etc.
transit: The studio is located up slope approximately 8 street crossings off the main entrance road to the sub division, Aloha Boulevard. All the streets in the sub division are privately maintained and are all paved. The town of Ocean View has two grocery stores (open until 8 pm), 3 gas stations (close by 8-8:30 pm), a laundromat (closed in Wednesdays), a coffee/sandwich shop (open for breakfast and lunch),  3 restaurants,  2 pizzeria's, Ace hardware, a business center, a thrift store, post office,  chiropractor  and several other businesses. On Saturday (7 a.m. to 1 p.m.) there is a  swap meet with food vendors,  local produce, and crafts.   The Ohana is approximately 60 miles from the Kona airport in the village of Ocean View, also known as HOVE.   Hilo is approximately the same distance. Guests need to have some type of rental vehicle; car, truck, motorcycle, etc.  to get to and from the Ohana and to explore our beautiful island.
access: Guests have their own entrance, space, outdoor seating areas and on site parking.   Experience nature with the garden hot shower with privacy enclosure adjacent to the ohana entrance and in your own private garden setting. The ohana is powered with solar, batteries providing 110 power, and back-up generator.
interaction: The Ohana is located in the lower level with it's own entrance, kitchen with a 2 burner cook stove, refrigerator/freezer, flush toilet, shower and garden seating area.  Experience nature with the garden hot shower with privacy enclosure adjacent to the ohana entrance. The host lives in the main cabin on property. Texting is the best. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions.
house_rules: - Smoking in outside designated area. - Quiet after 10 pm. - No shoes\slippers in house.

name: Aloha, Kihei Bay Surf, New Pool and BBQ
summary: Welcome!  Amazing unit across the street from the ocean, an ancient Hawaiian fish pond, small park, the Hawaiian Islands Humpback Whale National Marine Sanctuary, and an awesome Indian restaurant.    Great BBQ area, pool, tennis courts,  and relaxing hot tub.   You will also be near the beginning of the longest uninterrupted white sand beach in all of Hawaii!  Come for the vacation of your dreams.  There's a 15% vacation tax that will be collected before getting the keys.

Don't hesitate to contact us.   Aloha, Johnny (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)   Airbnb does an excellent job of censoring contact information, but don't worry, I can give you these numbers before you arrive, and they are listed on the information in the unit.
neighborhood_overview: 1/30/2018 I'm adding the Haleakala notice and swimming cautions because we want you to have a safe and joyous vacation.  Look below this information for the tips on where to go and what to do.    Haleakala Sunrise – change:  No longer can you just get up in the dark of night and drive a couple of hours up to the top of the crater to stand in the cold and hope to see the sunrise over Haleakala.   Now you need reservations: “The one-day, non-transferable $1.50 sunrise reservation is only available online at  at least 60 days in advance of a planned visit.  To address last-minute requests, the park releases 30 tickets at 4 p.m. two days before a planned sunrise visit.  (For example, the last 30 tickets for a Saturday sunrise are released at 4 p.m. on a Thursday).  Currently, these sell out in less than 10 minutes online.“ If you are lucky, you can possibly see the Haleakala sunrise that many hope to see Be sure to take something warm with you. No food or gas is available in the park.  An
notes: You will be able to do self check-in.  So if your plane arrives at 11pm, you don't have to worry.  You can get into your unit and have a legal parking spot even when most places are closed.
transit: The public bus, the Kihei Islander, does stop right in front of Kihei Bay Surf, but the places you can go on it are limited.  It runs from 5:50 am going south until 7:50pm going south.  Be sure to check the schedules.  (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN): Maui Bus. Although KBS is right on the bus line and there are taxis and Uber and buses, it's a good idea to have a car while you are here so you can get around easily.  Here are some good options (Airbnb filters out URLs, e-mail addresses, and phone #s from my messages, so you will need to look up the websites).   The car rental companies offer airport shuttle and toll-free numbers:  1) Ohana Rental Car: Ask for Sandee Crossland  2) Maui Cruisers  3) Kimo’s  Parking is open and free at Kihei Bay Surf for one vehicle for each unit.  You will need to have the parking pass from our unit for overnight parking.
interaction: Sometimes I work in isolated areas of Maui and don't have good Internet connection.  But I have two reliable backup people who are happy to help if I'm unavailable.  Just call or text:  Renée - my mom at (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) or our friend Lacey at (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN).  Don't hesitate to contact us. Si te apetece una comida hecha en casa, la cocina remodelada está completamente equipada con todos los electrodomésticos y aparatos que puedes desear. El exterior de la casa con un terraza increíble , dan a la propiedad una sensación acogedora y romántica.

house_rules: The parties are not accepted inside the apartment. Smoking is allowed only on the terrace. The check in later than 21 a clock has an extra fee of 35€ and the check in later than 23 a clock has an extra fee of 50€.

name: ABEL'S IN DOWNTOWN - THE PLACE TO BE 1 OF 2
summary: As easy as it gets: 1- Located at Praça Carlos Alberto, in the heart of Porto´s downtown  2- Everything you need at your fingertip: cafes, supermarket, pharmacy, ATM, etc. 3- All main attractions within walking distance (5 min). 4- Livraria Lello and Torre dos Clérigos just around the corner Be literally my guest Abel
space: This luxury open-space 2-bedroom apartment is located at the charismatic "Praça Carlos Alberto", in the heart of Porto’s downtown known as "Baixa". Just 100m from the city’s main iconic attractions: "Torre dos Clérigos", "Livraria Lello" and "Galerias de Paris" – the jam-packed new nightlife neighborhood. Restaurants, bars and boutiques, as well as pharmacy, cafés and Oporto´s fine bakeries are all around the corner. You´re close to everything. This apt has 115 square meters, 2 bedrooms, 1 big bathroom and 1 living room with a fully equipped kitchenette. It is set on the 2nd floor of a recently entirely refurbished building that combines architectural environment and heritage with a functional and contemporary design. Both rooms have stunning views of the main square, whereas the living room is directed towards a common interior yard. The large windows give it an enormous transparency and brightness.
