neighborhood_overview: Vocês irão vir para uns dos lugares mais lindo do mundo , e o melhor não é uma viagem cara , graças principalmente ao Airbnb , para se divertir num lugar paradisíaco desse e fácil , uma pedalada de bicicleta em volta da Lagoa por exemplo , compra uma água de coco e fica ali só admirando, os barzinhos TB no Leblon a noite são muito legais , a Lapa , são muitos lugares bacanas dá para escrever um livro , e lógico os clássicos Cristo Redentor , Pão de Açúcar , só sei te falar o seguinte tudo. E muito lindo até às pessoas são bonitas e muito receptivas venham vcs vão amar
transit: Vamos às dicas , não vale a pena alugar carro aqui , primeiro tem poucas vagas , e sempre complicado para estacionar , e segundo tem as famosas leis secas , tem noites q chegam a ter 9 blitz pela cidade ,e além da multa ser cara vc perde a carteira, terceiro o táxi e Uber são baratos até porque os melhores lugares ficam em distâncias curtas para vcs não serem enganados basta pedir para eles seguirem o Wize . Outro transporte muito gostoso aqui que além de ser ecológica mente correto , ajuda a emagrecer só trás benefícios e a Bicicleta , vc pode alugar uma no (Hidden by Airbnb) ou aquelas do Itaú , vc começa pedalando em Copacabana vai pela ciclovia até o Leblon 6 km , depois lá no Leblon tem Ciclovia TB vai para Lagoa e dá uma volta mais 7 km , e muito bom , se vc não for atleta faz isso com calma sem pressa , para no Leblon da um mergulho , almoça etc ,mas vale a pena é um cenário lindo .
access: Tem vaga de garagem com porteiro manobrista 24 hrs
interaction: Primeiramente podem me mandar mensagem a vontade ,estou sempre solícito para responder é tirar as dúvidas , após fecharmos aqui no Airbnb  vocês terão meu Zap , facilitando ainda mais nossa comunicação, e a parte boa que qualquer dúvida quando vcs chegarem no apartamento , eu.estou a 2 quadras do apartamento ,moro em Copacabana , nasci e fui criado nesse bairro , posso ajudar bastante com dicas TB , fiquem a vontade estou sempre a disposição.

name: Experience Dolphins Frolicing on the Kona Coast
summary: Our home, Hale Honu, is 800 feet above sea level on the Kona Coast of the Big Island.   It has a spectacular sunset view of the Pacific and is a short drive to the beach and Place of Refuge Historic National Park. Sleeps 8 in 2 bedrooms, living room and family room. It is surrounded by tropical gardens in a beautiful and restful location.  Ten minutes south you will see dolphins frolicking at Hookena Beach Park. Ten minutes north is wonderful snorkeling and the home of beautiful sea turtles.
space: A newly remodeled kitchen provides service for eight guests.  This is a totally functional kitchen with basic cooking utensils all the way down to standard condiments. We provide DIRECTV with premium channels and recording capability.  Our spacious Lanai is an excellent place for meals and entertaining.

It has a spectacular sunset view of the Pacific and is a short drive to the beach and Place of Refuge Historic National Park. Sleeps 8 in 2 bedrooms, living room and family room. Our spacious Lanai is an excellent place for meals and entertaining. A key to the front door is located in a coded lock box adjacent to the front door. This is a fully functioning home located on a half acre of tropical garden including fruit trees (papaya, mango, av
neighborhood_overview: While our mailing address is Captain Cook, our home is actually located in a rural setting within the village of Kealia, which is the center of a large cattle ranch.  There is nothing between us and the ocean but the ranch land comprised mostly of  tropical forest.  While we have neighbors on both sides, Hale Honu is very private with many plantings and trees on the property lines.  We are mid-way between Hookena Beach State Park to the south, and Place of Refuge National Historic Park to the north, which is adjacent to "Two Step," one of the best snorkeling locations on the Big Island.  The Hookena Beach bay area is also the play ground and resting place for a pod of dolphins that are often seen during early mornings or evenings. It is a ten minute drive to either of these locations, and a short walk to a small convenience store in the central village.  We are 70 miles from Volcano National Park - a 90 minute drive of spectacular scenery.
notes: There is a land telephone line available for local use and toll-free numbers but calling cards are needed to place long distance calls.  The quality of cell phone access depends on the provider.  We use Verizon but that service is often not as firm as we would like.  Our Wi-Fi service is through Hawaiian Telcom.
transit: Hale Honu is 20 miles south of Kailua-Kona and 27 miles from the Kona International Airport.  A rental car is essential.
access: A key to the front door is located in a coded lock box adjacent to the front door. This is a fully functioning home located on a half acre of tropical garden including fruit trees (papaya, mango, avocado and tangerine when in season). Pine-apples are also available for guests to harvest when ripe.
interaction: Bob and Nancy live in Arvada, CO, but our Hawaii next door neighbors, Gina and Abby, serve as caretakers of the property.  Gina is also the house keeper and landscaper and will be available during your visit to answer questions or help with any problems that might arise.
house_rules: Hale Honu is a smoke-free home.  We ask that guests needing to smoke do so outside.

We are in the middle of it
neighborhood_overview: Location, Location, Location!  We are in the middle of it all. Much to see and do in Waikiki. Waikiki Beach, Honolulu's most famous beach is just two short blocks away.  Watch the sunsets from nearly any vantage point along the beach and see the Friday night fireworks from the Hilton Hawaiian Village at 7:45pm. The nearby neighborhood includes several major hotels like Moana Surfrider, numerous restaurants, and nightclubs that cater to every traveler. Ask the kamaaina (locals) for their tips. The Royal Hawaiian Shopping Center  and other “World Class Shopping” may be found on Kalakaua Avenue (the street along the beach).  A few blocks away you will find the memorable Kapiolani Park and Waikiki Shell, Honolulu Zoo, Waikiki Aquarium, Diamond Head, golfing and many tennis courts.
notes: Hawaii Taxes included in the nightly rate! Hawaii Taxes are (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) % (TAT# GE (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Hawaii Dream Realty LLC RB (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: Parking onsite is a PUBLIC GARAGE and is located in the below street level garage stairway access only.  Daily parking fees are approx.  $25 per 24 hours.  Read the signs by the machine or you will get towed.  Payment options may be selected at the vending kiosk located at the bottom of the ramp.    But who needs a car in Waikiki?  Everything is in walking distance.  But if you have an itch to venture out, the island's bus transit system is Number #1 at only $2.50/ticket. The major bus stops going in both directions are easily accessible from Kuhio Village.

summary: Experience Stunning Views in a large 2 bedroom private Oceanfront condo in Maui.  Property amenities include:  Beautiful Beach, 2 Pools, Hot Tub, Restaurant, Board Rentals, Tennis Courts, Mini Golf, BBQs, Washer and Dryer, 2 Gyms, and Concierge.
space: THIS CONDO HAS IT ALL:  Stunning views of the ocean, swimming with turtles, whale watching while sipping a glass of wine on the balcony, being able to hear the waves while you sleep, good property amenities, and large space for the family. STUNNING VIEWS:  Leave your busy lives behind.  Kick back and relax on the balcony that has breathtaking views of the ocean and surrounding islands, watch whales and dolphins passing by, and chill while listening to the ocean.  Maui keeps delivering breathtaking sunsets that you can watch right from the condo.  Fall asleep to the sounds of the waves and let the island bring you its magic.   THE CONDO SPACE:  The Condo is unit 283 at the Sands of Kahana and is nearly 1600 sq ft of oceanfront awsomeness that has enough space for 6. Haleakala 5) Go Golfing at the world class golf courses 6) Take in a Luau 7) Take a helicopter tour 8) Take a sufing lesson 9) Go on one of Maui's amazing hikes 10) Get some "shave ice" at Ululani's

house_rules: Check-in is after 4 PM.  We have a Front Desk check in that is open 24 hours. ABSOLUTELY No Smoking.   Early check-in is available for free when previous guest checks out the day before.

name: Hawaii by the Sea~Walk
summary: AMAZING location in Kailua Kona. *taxes included* Free Parking. Walk to great snorkeling beach, best Kona coffee shop, fun places to eat and lots to do in Kona. Fully equipped kitchen, large fridge.  Enjoy eating meals on the lanai. This lovely one bedroom has queen size bed and a comfortable queen size pull out sofa bed.
space: This clean and bright condo is in a central location on the Big Island. This is home to the famous Ironman race and we are right up the street from the starting line. There is super snorkeling in the bay, paddle boards, kayaks and bike rentals are available at the beach hut "Kona Boys" also right here in front of the Court Yard Marriott. You can visit the Marriott on the weekend for "All you can eat" crab Buffett, or go to the outside bar for cocktails, or the luau if desired. The sunset dinner cruise on the Body glove boat, the submarine and glass bottom boat are located at the pier as well. There is a jet ski island and para sailing here, something for everyone in this part of town.  The famous Splashers bar and grill is right there on the corner.  Enjoy meals on the "lanai" seating for four around the bistro set and the hanging swing. The super markets are convenient, and the farmers market is near and it is opened everyday from 7am-5pm except Mondays.  We have great weather for wal
description: AMAZING location in Kailua Kona. *taxes included* Free Parking. Walk to great snorkeling beach, best Kona coffee shop, fun places to eat and lots to do in Kona. Fully equipped kitchen, large fridge.  Enjoy eating meals on the lanai. This lovely one bedroom has queen size bed and a comfortable queen size pull out sofa bed. There is super snorkeling in the bay, paddle boards, kayaks and bike rentals are available at the beach hut "Kona Boys" also right here in front of the Court Yard Marriott. The sunset dinner cruise on the Body glove boat, the submarine and glass bottom boat are located at the pier as well. There is a jet ski island and para sailing here, something for everyone in t
notes: *Free parking for one car *No pets *No children *No parties or events *The washer and dryer downstairs takes quarters. *The tv is for DVDs, I have some here or redbox movie rental is one block away at KTA or Sack in Save for about a dollar. *Wifi password sent when you book the condo. *Hawaii taxes Included.*  Mahalo, Adrienne and Christopher
transit: There is an open air trolly for $2. It's two dollars each way.  Exact cash. There are two different routes. One to the beaches and the one to the stores make sure you get on the one the one you want. The beach travel takes you to Magic Sands, Kahaluu which is amazing snorkeling and they rent equipment there all the way to the Sheraton where the manta rays are at night.  Located straight down the hill in front of the abc store. I am not sure of the pickup schedule.
access: Entire apartment with balcony, full kitchen, out door laundry, pool.
house_rules: *Please remove shoes its the  Hawaiian way and we want to keep the new carpet clean. *Keep kitchen clean right away. It's Hawaii and we want to avoid all bugs.  *No candles or incense *No aerosol spray's or spray sunscreen in the house or on the lanai. *Please hang all wet clothing and towels on rack and hooks provided. *Please leave bath towels here at the unit and if using a beach towel make sure all Sand is removed before entering *Remove all trash to the dumpster daily. *No smoking in condo or on lanai to avoid losing security deposit. This is a smoke-free unit. *No pets *No parties or events *No excessive drinking or drugs *No spray sunscreens in the house or on the lanai. Thank you Mahalo, Adrienne

name: * Room Taste of Real İstanbul
summary: This is a cozy private room with ensuite bathroom, located in the quiet part of Sultanahmet area. You can easily reach the main square within 5-6 mins on foot, and have the chance to visit all the major attractions of the Old City. We serve local style breakfast plate in the mornings at our rooftop terrace. Also, we have a 24/7 front desk agent to assist you with anything you might need.
space: The room has one French bed, satellite TV, mini fridge, internal phone, A/C (for summer) and central heating (for winter).  Free Wi-Fi connection is available throughout the building for our guests’ use. You can buy water, snacks, and other items you might need from the grocery store nearby. Upon request, we can provide airport transfer service to/from both Ataturk and Sabiha Gokcen Airports. For pricing and service details, it will be enough to send us a message. Our place is located in a pretty quiet and safe area of Sultanahmet, so you don't have to worry about most of the grossly exaggerated news you hear on media. There are also many restaurants and cafeterias in the area, which are usually open until 1 AM. If you will be travelling with your own car, we usually have free space in front of the building. If not, there is a parking lot with reasonable fees, where you may leave your vehicle until some space becomes available.
description: This is a cozy private room with ensuite bathroom, located in the quiet part of Sultanahmet area. You can easily reach the main square within 5-6 mins on foot, and have the chance to visit all the major attractions of the Old City. Our place is located in a pretty quiet and safe area of Sultanahmet, so you don't have to worry about most of the grossly exaggerated news y
neighborhood_overview: The building is situated at a very convenient location, it is just a few minutes of walk to Sultanahmet Square Just a few steps to historical places in walking distance as below; Blue Mosque – 5 mins Hagia Sophia Museum – 8 mins Topkapi Palace Museum – 12 mins Basilica Cistern – 8 mins  Roman Hippodrome – 5 mins Gulhane Park – 15 mins Grand Bazaar – 25 min Egyptian Market – 35 mins on foot, 15 mins by public transit Eminonu & Karakoy Districts – 35/40 mins on foot, 15-20 mins by public transit
notes: Definitely no extra guests from outside allowed in the rooms. You may have your guests in the front desk area.
transit: The nearest public transit is the tram stop of Sultanahmet, which can be reached through 8-10 min stroll. With the tram, you can easily reach Beyazit, Eminonu, Karakoy, Kabatas, and Taksim (with connection). Grand Bazaar is located in Beyazit district. On one side of Karakoy, you may find all types of industrial shops, selling tools, machinery equipments, building materials, etc. and on the other side, there are many newly opened chic restaurants, bars, bistros, through its tiny streets. Taksim is famous for its shops in day time and its nightlife until the morning :) One tip about Taksim, only go to places that has good feedback. From Eminonu, you may take a ferry across Bosphorus, either to Uskudar or Kadikoy, both of which are residential districts of Istanbul on the Asian side. Kadikoy is more lively usually until late evening with its cozy coffeehouses, restaurants, bars, etc.  Apart from those places nearby, here are the ports of entry into Istanbul for you: Ataturk Airport – 20
access: All rooms are private in the building. The rooftop terrace and the front desk area is always available for our guests’ use.
interaction: Me and my colleagues at the front desk are always available for your assistance on directions, calling a taxi, ordering food through restaurants’ delivery, sightseeing tour arrangements, etc. It will be sufficient to stop by the front desk.

space: Hotel Kumkapi Konagi is in the historic Kumkapi district, which is also famous for its many fish restaurants. The hotel features luxurious interiors, modern rooms and an open-air terrace with views of the Marmara Sea and Blue Mosque.

name: Artsy 4BR in Plateau by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the bright and airy decor, expansive living area, and beautiful fully-equipped kitchen with modern appliances. Located in the Le Plateau, known for its assortment of delicious restaurants and relaxed cafes.
space: Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay.
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the bright and airy decor, expansive living area, and beautiful fully-equipped kitchen with modern appliances. Located in the Le Plateau, known for its assortment of delicious restaurants and relaxed cafes. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay. Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay. Le Plateau has plenty to offer within walking distance. Try out Ramen Ya Restaurant or Café Névé for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping head over to Le Centre Eaton de Montreal on Saint-Catherine St W. To discover the rest of the city just hop on the metro at Saint-Urbain/Rachel station. For an authentic Montreal exper
neighborhood_overview: Le Plateau has plenty to offer within walking distance. Try out Ramen Ya Restaurant or Café Névé for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping head over to Le Centre Eaton de Montreal on Saint-Catherine St W. To discover the rest of the city just hop on the metro at Saint-Urbain/Rachel station. For an authentic Montreal experience, skip downtown and hang out with the locals in Le Plateau. Nestled at the foot of Mont Royal, Le Plateau is the epicenter of entertainment and culture in this diverse city. Day or night, the streets of Saint Denis, Mont Royal Ave, and Saint Laurent Boulevard come alive with residents and tourists alike. Eat your way through a variety of restaurants, and adventure through countless shops, cafés, and bars. Save some time to explore Saint Laurent Boulevard, where you'll find all sorts of unique urban art installations on every turn, thanks to the annual Montreal Mural Festival.
notes: This Sonder has seasonal air conditioning available from June 1st to September 30th. Air conditioning units are removed in the off-season. This Sonder is a 2nd floor walk-up with stair access only, and no elevator. Your Sonder's keys will be found in a lockbox and we'll be sending you detailed access information three days before your stay. If you need any help just give us a call. This Sonder comes with an HDMI cord so that you can connect your laptop to the TV and log in to your personal streaming accounts, but it does not have cable.
transit: Drivers can find free and paid street parking nearby, but please be mindful of street signs.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

space: With our special low nightly rates, you will get a beautiful 4-bedroom beach house located on the Northeast Shore on the island of Oahu. Situated in a small and friendly local town, where everybody knows your name. Private access to white sandy swimming beach, known only to the locals. Disney movie with Even Stevens filmed right here on location. Ask your kids, they'll know. For more space and privacy, at an additional cost, we have an separate Studio unit with full bath and kitchenette to add on to our 4-bedroom home. What's the difference, you ask?  Well, the 'size' is. The 4BR home sleeps up to 10 comfortably, depending on size and age. The separate Studio unit can sleep 2 people on one sofa bed with the luxury of an extra full bathroom. Where else can you find paradise fit for the whole family? We are two houses away from a secret white sandy swimming beach, a favorite spot for the locals in the area. neighborhood_overview: Endangered sea creatures call our beach 'home'.  If you fish, dive or snorkel, there is good food in the water here. Bring your gear! A little further down the beach is a local favorite surf spot, Pounders. We are also minutes to famous attractions such as Polynesian Cultural Center, Kualoa Ranch, Chinaman's Hat, Crouching Lion, Haleiwa Town, Turtle Bay Resort Health Spa and Golf Course, just to name a few.  Walking distance to grocery store (food, liquor, supplies), eateries and post office. Minutes to Polynesian Cultural Center (a must-see for visitors and locals alike). Steps to bus stop that will take you around the island. We are on the ocean side, NOT on the main road or across the highway!!! You can relax and unwind, sipping mai-tais near the beach or take a scenic drive to Haleiwa Town at the North Shore or Windward Mall in Kaneohe. Either way is only a 30 minute drive.  Walking distance, across the street, is our grocery shopping store, some eateries and our local post office.
notes: Max amount of registered guests is 10 people.  However, if your headcount is over 10 people and your group is comfortable with the size of accommodations, please check with owner for approval of head count.  If approved, there will be a one-time (for the entire stay) fee of $50 per person (no matter the age) over the 10 person count.
transit: Reserved parking is included with your stay but if you prefer not to rent a vehicle, the circle island bus (public transportation) is conveniently located at the beginning of our road.
interaction: As homeowners, we are here to please.  If you need anything while you're here, for your convenience, we are just a cell phone text away.
house_rules: No smoking in the home and no pets please.  Our home is not suitable for parties or events involving more than the number of registered guests.

The neighborhood has a great number of places to eat, including Italian, Peruvian, Thai and Chinese food, and the typical American Diner (COURT SQUARE DINER) thats open 24 hours. The LIC CORNER CAFE, around the corner, serves homemade pastries and sandwiches. LIC MARKET serves the freshest most innovative food in Queens. Film & TV crews are always filming on our block. Time-Out Magazine rated it "The 3rd Best Block in all of NYC!" We are a 12 minute walk to the new Gantry State Park, a $30 million Riverwalk Park with stunnung views of Manhattan.
notes: Towels, Hairdryer, Soap, Shampoo provided.

Majestic Café (7 minutos); 4. Via Catarina Shopping (7 minutos); 5. Mercado do Bolhão (8 minutos); 6. Estação São Bento (12 minutos): conexão trem, metro, autocarros;  7. Rua Galeria de Paris (14 minutos): onde ocorre a 'Movida do Porto'; 8. Ponte Luiz I (15 minutos): ícone da cidade do Porto; 9. Torre dos Clérigos (16 minutos): vista estonteante da cidade.
access: Tu podes usar todo o apartamento, tendo total privacidade.
house_rules: Pedimos que, por favor, zelem pelo espaço como o fazem com sua própria casa. É permitido que fumem apenas na varanda do apartamento, mas não dentro dele.  Respeitem o tempo de repouso e descanso dos vizinhos, mantendo total silêncio entre às 23h e às 7h durante a semana e aos sábados, domingos e feriados entre às 20h e às 8h. No restante do tempo deve haver ponderação e bom senso na administração do barulho.  Não levem para o apartamento pessoas que não tiveram reservas previamente agendadas.   A hora da saída é sempre às 11h, mas um atraso nesse horário é negociável desde que solicitado com antecedência. Ao saírem deixem as chaves dentro do apartamento pendurada no quadro de avisos e entreguem o espaço arrumado como o encontraram.

name: 3bd/2ba Valley House Near Kaimuki, Upstairs
summary: Brand New construction, in valley neighborhood off of Kaimuki 10th Ave.  Surrounded by lush greens and mountains, 3 bed/2 bath house built in 2015.  You have the entire upstairs of a house, with a private entrance and assigned parking.  Private washer/dryer in unit.  Only 10 min drive to Waikiki.  If you have a big family I also have the downstairs unit (2 bed/1 bath, accomodate up to 8 people) available for rent.

Two rooms have work desk, and another work desk in the living room, providing a good place to put your laptops.  We have cable and fast wifi there.  The unit comes with assigned parking (fits 1 -2 cars). This brand new house is a country oasis away from the city with easy access to Waikiki and Honolulu downtown (10 min drive to Waikiki, 15 min drive to downtown).  The house is off of 10th Ave in Palolo neighborhood.  10th Ave in Kaimuki is a main street with great local restaurants, shops, bars and parks. Portable crib (pack n play type) available upon request (please request in advance).

neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is where the locals live, surrounded by lush greens with a mountain view.  Commuting into the city is very easy.  10 min drive to Waikiki, 15 min drive to downtown.  Close to H1 highway entrance.
notes: There are stairs to get to this unit, 37 steps to be exact.  If you have a large family or family reunion, I have both upstairs unit (3bed/2bath) and downstairs unit (2bed/1bath) of this house available for rent.    Because of how the house has two units, you may hear the noise, footsteps or feel the presence of the people in the other unit. If you need complete silence and privacy, this house may not be for you. A colony of wild chickens live in the neighborhood, and they can make noise in the morning.  Please do not park across the street where "No Parking" signs are, or you may get parking tickets. Do not use or block the driveway going up on the left side of the house as this belongs to a different property owner. This property is in a tropical environment, any food you leave out will attract ants. We provide ant sprays and traps upon request. If this bothers you, this unit may not be right for you.
transit: There are bus lines that runs on 10th ave in Palolo/Kaimuki, but having a car is recommended for this location.
access: You have your own assigned parking to park your car with private entrance to your unit.  You have your own washer/dryer in this unit. There is another unit downstairs (2bed/1bath) which is similar to this unit, also available for rent.
interaction: The owners live about 5 min away in the neighborhood so we are available to answer your questions or help in any way.  Texting is the best way to reach us, but please feel free to call.

access: Located on the brink of both the Mile End and Little Italy areas, home to numerous live music venues, bars, parks and great restaurants. Two depanneurs are located right downstairs, with one being a small grocery store (packaged meat, fresh produce, toiletries, beer, among other things) and more grocery stores down Beaubien street. The Plateau area of Montreal is within a 20 minute walk, and downtown is easily accessed via either a 45 minute walk or public transportation (metro Beaubien is a 10 minute walk, bus number 55 is located around the corner, and bus number 80 is a 7 minute walk). Options for Bixi (local bike rental) are located nearby as well.
house_rules: The house is shared with two other people both in their early 20s. They are both currently in school and working, but are easy going people and easy to get along with. The apartment is relatively quiet, but the room is separate from the other two rooms.

transit: - Uber and Lyft are available in Honolulu and Waikiki - 'Biki' bikeshare is available throughout Waikiki & Honolulu - Try out 'Segway' tours of Waikiki, using their stand-up scooters  - Convenient public transportation options include 'TheBus' and the 'Waikiki Trolley' - Taxis are another great way to travel when in a group and the cost can be shared. You can find taxi stands at hotels, most major shopping malls and at the airport. Note that using taxi stands and calling for pick-ups by phone or via hotel concierge is the norm in Hawaii rather than hailing a cab.

name: Bragas House - Porto Center 2C
summary: Bragas House is an old house rehabilitated nineteenth century to modern times, with a youthful style in the Center of Porto. The kitchen is open and common with the living room, where guests can cook and eat in a group or alone.
space: Bragas House is an old house rehabilitated nineteenth century to modern times, with a youthful style. It consists of 15 rooms, and has 8 toilets and 7 showers. The kitchen is open and common with the living room, where guests can cook and eat in a group or alone. Guests should expect a peaceful and comfortable stay, sharing experiences with other cultures. The house also has a garden with barbecue where guests can peacefully enjoy the wonderful nights of Porto, accompanied by good food and good drink. In addition, the house has a laundry room (free) for guests who want to wash and dry their clothes. Bragas House is situated in the historic center of Porto, 5/6 minute walking from the main avenue of the city (Avenida dos Aliados) and the whole night area - bars and nightclubs. In this zone are also the best bars, clubs, restaurants and shops in the city, offering a plural choice for everyone. Very near the house there are metro lines, bus and train. What makes this place unique is its p

neighborhood_overview: Located on Kauai`s beautiful South Shore. The world famous Poipu Beach offers a beautiful beach perfect for swimming, snorkeling or laying out in the sunshine. Poipu Beach Athletic  Club includes a pool, waterslide, hot tub, gym, fitness classes, sports courts, restaurant and more! Memberships available for purchase thru Great Vacation Retreats.
notes: Just 30 minutes from the airport, this condo puts you near Kukui’ula Shopping Center’s upscale grocery store, restaurants, shops, galleries, and a weekly farmers market (11-minute walk). Drive to the National Tropical Botanical Gardens and Spouting Horn Park (4 minutes) for hiking through native plants and to a stunning waterspout. If you’re looking for a resort-style stay, we have you covered. For an additional fee you’ll have uninhibited access to the Poipu Beach Athletic Club, home to a fitness center, hot tub and sparkling pool with a waterslide and sand-bottomed kiddie section – everything you need to work out, cool off or wind down. For more information on the Poipu Beach Athletic Club: (Website hidden by Airbnb) MEMBERSHIPS ARE LIMITED, PLEASE LET US KNOW  IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO SECURE A MEMBERSHIP PRIOR TO YOUR ARRIVAL.
transit: Public transport is limited. Rental car recommended.
access: Oceanfront Split-system A/C in the Living Room - there are no split systems in the bedrooms so you may have to keep the doors open on the hot days. Overhead fans usually keep the rooms comfortably cool. Seasonal Whale watching (Dec. thru Mar.) Fantastic snorkeling next door at Lawai Beach View turtles from your lanai No Washer & Dryer in the Condo but there is a Coin-Operated Laundry Facility on Site - we provide the laundry soap Wireless Internet Cable flat screen TV Elevator - it`s about seven condos down the hall. The stairs are closer if you would enjoy the exercise On the Second Floor No Pool, but you can join the Poipu Beach Athletic Club for a fee (memberships are limited) or jump in the Ocean Fully equipped kitchen Beach chairs, a beach umbrella and a cooler are provided. There could be more beach equipment, too! Twin Bedroom has the Shower opening up into the Bedroom with separate toilet and sink en-suite Complimentary Island Soap and Candle Works toiletries  Starter kit of Ka
interaction: 1. Unobstructed Ocean Views: Sky and water collide along the horizon and you get a front-row seat to the action! The private lanai affords unobstructed ocean views while the Pacific breezes blow across your face. From January through March, you can often see whales swimming and year-round, you’ll catch glimpses of sea turtles playing in the waves. 2. Lawai Beach Next Door: Walk out the back door and in just a few steps your feet are in the sand. Stunning Lawai Beach is your backyard, with opportunities to sunbathe, surf, snorkel and swim in the waves. 3. Convenient Location: When the chef needs the night off, the Shops at Kukui’ula has lots of great restaurant choices. Only a 15-minute walk away, it also houses all kinds of different stores and shops. Don’t miss the farmers market every Wednesday afternoon!
house_rules: 1. Great Vacation Retreats is not affiliated with the onsite management. Please contact us directly with any questions, maintenance issues or concierge requests. 2. To avoid towing of your vehicle during your stay. Please make sure you display your parking pass in vehicle in plain sight. You must sign the Security Parking Pass book in lobby to obtain pass, which security will deliver to your room.  3. Hawaii has a new smoking law which allows smoking only in designated areas outside of any building, 20 feet away from doors. Our units and lanais are all non-smoking. Please use the designated areas if you wish to smoke. They are usually located in the parking lot of the building. There is a $300 fine for smoking in our properties and the State of Hawaii may also impose a fine for not smoking in the designated areas. 4. Please wash off all sand from beach gear and your body before re-entering the condo. Outside showers are available at most beaches and outside of most properties. Please d

space: The day rate is for the whole condo, not just the bedroom!, and INCLUDES ALL TAXES! neighborhood_overview: My condo is located in Waikiki. Waikiki is a lot of fun and I would invite you to  Go---le it as there are just way too many things to say about it!  It has hundreds of restaurants and stores. Waikiki beach is regularly in the top 10 most beautiful beach in the world. Waikiki alone has 5 different beaches. The famous "Waikiki beach walk" is on Lewers street. My condo is on Lewers street!. (430 Lewers street). the "walk" starts 2 blocks down. (4 minute walk). Go___le it. Waikiki beach (Website hidden by Airbnb) Please click on the map and you will see that you will be right in the middle of all the fun!  Waikiki is a really unique place. You could easily spend your whole vacation here. That's what a lot of tourists do. No need to travel anywhere, just walk down the street!. There are hundreds of activities you can do in Waikiki alone. You will see pamphlets in the condo itself. Just name it and they have it. Dinner cruise, catamaran rides, surf lessons of course!, parasailing,Several te
notes: I will respect your space and privacy. After the original first meeting, you should not see me unless there is an emergency of some kind or there is a problem with something inside the condo. If you need something, I will drop it off in front of the door and send you a text. If for some reasons I need to come in, I will do so with your authorization and in writing through Airbnb's website only. I do not leave in the building or even in Waikiki. If you prefer self-cheking, that is also fine!. Just let me know before you arrive! Also, the kitchen is a full kitchen with plates, glasses, pans, etc. The fridge is really big and the stove is gas. There is also a big microwave, blender, rice cooker and so on. There is no dishwasher though (Sorry!!!). There is a washer and dryer in the bathroom that works very well.  I do provide beach mats, beach towels, soaps, toothpastes, beach umbrellas... even boggy boards at no extra charge. Other than that, you will not see me day to day, either in the
transit: I would recommend renting a car for 2 to 4 days maximum. You may rent it directly at the airport or you could take a cab to my condo for about $28.00 to $35.00. You may also take U---R, that would cost you around $20 to $25.00. I would NOT recommend the Waikiki shuttle from the airport as it will cost you $18 per person! If you want to rent a car but not right away, you're in luck!! "Enterprise Rent a car" in Waikiki is at 445 Seaside Avenue which is exactly one block from my condo. There are really good! and their prices are competitive. I would check out the weather forecast first before renting a car!... We never know!!! We occasionally get a storm if you can believe that... Going around the island is soooo much nicer by a beautiful day!  :) The Must see with a car are:  Circling around the island! go to the north shore to see those huge waves!! (only the winter though),  Hanama Bay (watch out, not open everyday), Pearl Harbor Museum, Ala Moana Shopping Center (one of the biggest in
access: And of course, you have free access to the pool, Sauna, Jacuzzi and Barbecue areas anytime until 10 pm daily. (located on the 5th floor of the building). Sorry there is no gym! But there is a 24 hour fitness a few blocks from the condo just across Kuhio beach which is just before Waikiki Beach. (about 12 minutes of a very nice walk!). The parking space is also free as well as Wifi high speed internet in the condo. There are also several guests parking available on the 1st and 2nd floor if you have friends in town that would like to visit!
interaction: I will be there for you 24/7 if you need anything! I am quick at answering emails and will get all your questions answered in a matter of hours if not minutes! If you need something, I will quickly get it for you within a few hours. I will respect your space and will NEVER show up at the condo unexpected!!!! I will drop what you need in front of the door and will shoot you an email after it is done. It will usually be in the evenings after 8 pm or after 10 pm as I sometimes have rehearsals until 9:30 pm... (I'm a musician...). Again, I am going to show you quickly the in's and out of the condo when we first meet and then it is yours for the duration of your stay unless you email me for something or if there is an emergency of some kind!... but then again there is a fire extinguisher in the condo so ....  (I am joking about this).
house_rules: Please take your shoes off every time you come in my condo as the carpet is of a light brown color and is sensitive to shoes! ... It is also traditional to take the shoes off before entering someone's home in Hawaii. Also, please do not throw food down the kitchen sink, especially coffee ground! (it acts like sand and does not go down!). Throw garbage daily down the trash chute and do not leave food on kitchen counter or dirty dishes in the sink.  Mahalo!

name: Haena to re-open in 2019! Ocean Views! Newly added A/C in all rooms! - Haena Kai
summary: Across single land bridges that traverse Kauai's North Shore rivers and streams, nestled in the wild, pristine jungle country side is Haena Kai.
space: Kauai's North Shore has been a frequent backdrop for countless movies due to its incredibly lush beauty and phenomenal beaches.  Nestled within this gorgeous, pristine expanse, lies Haena Kai.  Set back just thirty paces from a soft, deserted, coral sand beach, this three-bedroom, two-bath, elevated home awaits your family retreat.  If you want to escape the crowds and let the soothing surf wash your cares away, welcome to your piece of paradise. Surrounded for privacy by a lava rock wall, towering coconut palms, and lush landscaping, Ha'ena Kai’s elevated position, wall of windows, and wraparound lanai capture superlative views of the reef and fringing mountains. With the newly added split unit air-conditioning system in all rooms, you are sure to stay cool after a day of adventure!   The home’s open architectural design creates an inviting gathering space while also allowing for breezy trade winds to cool the sanctuary naturally.  Additional ceiling fans are strategically located thr

Easy access to historic center by bus

neighborhood_overview: There are several shops in the area (30m-300m) such as supermarket, bakery, pastry shops, pharmacy and a variety of restaurants where you can enjoy Portuguese food. There are also several banks and ATM machines nearby. The apartment is very close to the sea (200m), and to several very nice beaches for bathing. Less than 2 km away, there are several surf schools, on a beach ideal for children, in which the sea is shallow.  The avenue that follows along the sea has a wide promenade, ideal for walking, running or cycling. There is a bike path, which runs from the apartment area along the river to the historic city center, and also along the beaches.
transit: From the location, you do not need a car to move around in the city. The area is served by several bus lines, the bus stop is right outside the door. The most interesting bus line (500), follows the course by the sea and river to the historic city center. In the historic city center it is possible to rent bicycles.
house_rules: It is not allowed to make noise after 10p.m. The apartment is inserted in a building of exclusive habitation use. After confirmation of the booking, the SEF accommodation bulletin will be sent. It must be obligatorily completed with the data of all the guests and returned before check-in. The SEF accommodation bulletin is intended to monitor foreign nationals in the country. This procedure is required by nacional law, Lei 63/2015. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.

name: Hip 2BR in Downtown Montréal by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the sleek decor, spacious living area, and beautiful kitchen with modern appliances. Located in downtown Montreal, known for its lively bars and delicious restaurants.
space: Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay.
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the sleek decor, spacious living area, and beautiful kitchen with modern appliances. Located in downtown Montreal, known for its lively bars and delicious restaurants. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay. Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay. Downtown Montreal has plenty to offer within walking distance. Try out Le Taj or Eggspectation for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping head over to Rue Saint Mathieu on Saint-Catherine St W. To discover the rest of the city just hop on the bus at Sherbrooke/De La Montagne station. Downtown Montreal is the center of Canada's Francophone business community. Bu
neighborhood_overview: Downtown Montreal has plenty to offer within walking distance. Try out Le Taj or Eggspectation for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping head over to Rue Saint Mathieu on Saint-Catherine St W. To discover the rest of the city just hop on the bus at Sherbrooke/De La Montagne station. Downtown Montreal is the center of Canada's Francophone business community. Bustling with activity, the neighbourhood is full of restaurants, shopping, and is within walking distance of Montreal’s historic old port and Mount Royal. Downtown Montreal is also home to the city’s universities and museums, and you can catch a concert or a hockey match at the Bell Centre.
notes: Due to renovations inside the building, you may encounter some construction that will be audible from your Sonder Monday - Friday from 8:00AM - 5:00PM. Your Sonder's keys will be found in a lockbox and we'll be sending you detailed access information three days before your stay. If you need any help, just give us a call. This Sonder comes with an HDMI cord so that you can connect your laptop to the TV and log in to your personal streaming accounts, but it does not have cable.
transit: Drivers can find free and paid parking options nearby, but please be mindful of street signs.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

My studio apt is newly renovated!  Enjoy a queen size Tempurpedic bed accompanied with modern Bo Concept and West Elm decor.  There's plenty of space to unpack and unwind.
space: Super sunny studio apartment!  Exposed brick, hardwood floors, stand up shower, & stainless steel appliences.

name: Direct Beach/Ocean front, 20 Steps to the Water!
summary: Please read entire listing prior to booking to ensure my unit is as good fit for your travel needs! :) Amazing location & view! Remodeled 2Bd/2ba condo located right on the ocean/beach w/ breath-taking ocean views. Relax by the ocean-front pool or walk down the steps to take a dip in the ocean for some  snorkeling! Located next to Honokowai Beach Park in West Maui, only a short distance to Ka'anapali, Kahana, Lahiana & Napili. Centrally located to many tourist attractions & local favorites.
space: This 2 bedroom 2 bath, ocean-view, Maui vacation home is perfect for a family vacations! The master bedroom is downstairs with a brand new king bed and there are two full sized beds in the loft bedroom upstairs in addition to full bath. Both baths have walk-in showers w/ etched glass. Remodeled kitchen with state of the art appliances and granite counter tops. The living room has a plasma TV and DVD player.  The master bedroom also has a flat screen TV.  We offer free Wi-Fi and free parking for one car (no additional parking is available).  The pool is the perfect place to relax and is just steps from the ocean.  Near the pool is a BBQ area where you can cook while you listen to waves come crashing in.  Conveniently located to a beach park, organic super market, restaurants, coffee shop and Farmer's Market.  There is no air conditioning in the unit, however there are fans in every room and since the unit is located so close to the water the trade winds keep the unit comfortable!  Pleas

Remodeled kitchen with state of the art appliances and granite counter tops. The living room has a plasma TV and DVD player.  The master bedroom also has a flat screen TV.  We offer free Wi-Fi and free parking for one
neighborhood_overview: The complex is located right on the beach and next door to a county park, which is great for families traveling with children.  The community is called Honokowai and is located south of Ka'anapali and north of Kapalua.  The neighborhood is a mixture of condominium complexes and residential single-family homes.  The complex is about 5 miles north of the town of Lahaina, a 50 minute drive from Kahului Airport.  Across the street there is there is a grocery store, a weekly farmers market, a deli and the well-known Maui roasted coffee shop "Bad Ass Coffee".
notes: In addition to the rental fee, Hawaii State mandated 13.42% GET & TA tax will be collected separately through Airbnb’s resolution center.  At the time of booking, I will provide you with the amount of tax that will be requested.  I will send a request to collect the tax 7 days prior to your arrival.  If the tax is not paid within 24 hours of sending the request, I reserve the right to cancel the reservation without a refund as it will be difficult to re-book the unit on such short notice.  Unfortunately, Airbnb does not have a feature to calculate and add the tax in automatically.  The tax will be assessed on the total nightly rental cost not including the cleaning and services fees.
transit: Maui has a public transit system that stops right next door at Honokowai Beach Park; it is convenient for all local travel within West Maui. However, to make the most of your time here, I highly, highly recommend renting a car. There are several taxi companies that service the West Maui Area.  Uber and Lyft are also becoming more popular but are not as readily available as they are in larger metropolitan areas.  To the best of my knowledge, Lyft and Uber are not permitted to pick up at Kahalui Airport at this time (the rules might have changed so you'll want to look into this if you are considering this option).
access: Guests will be able to access the entire unit, communal coin-op washer/dryer, pool, BBQ area, and one parking spot.
interaction: I am most readily available through the Airbnb messenger app (99% of the time I respond in less than an hour, please take into consideration time zone differences).  Airbnb encourages hosts to communicate through the app.  I provide my cell phone for emergencies.  I do not live on island.  My parents live about 20 minutes away and are available and happy to help if you happen to need anything during your stay.  You will access the unit with a key provided in a lock box.  I will provide you with access information 2-3 days prior to your arrival.
house_rules: Please read our House Rules thoroughly PRIOR to booking to ensure that our unit is a good fit for your trip.  By confirming your reservation, you are agreeing to our house rules.  Confirmed reservations will be subject to our cancelation policy.  No refunds will be granted due to guest failure to read the House Rules.  1. name: Grande maison avec jardin sur le Plateau
summary: Belle maison ensoleillée en plein coeur du Plateau-Mont-Royal, à deux pas du parc Lafontaine, à quelques minutes à pied du centre-ville et du Vieux Montréal, des cafés, des restaurants, des boutiques, etc.. Vous apprécierez notre grande maison, située sur une rue tranquille mais très centrale, pour son confort, son vaste jardin ombragé, sa terrasse, ses grandes portes vitrées. Notre logement est parfait pour les familles et les couples.

name: Lovely Room In Cool and Vibrant Mile End Area!
summary: Come stay in our beautiful, spacious, and ideally located apartment!  The space is located in the heart of the cool and artsy Mile End neighbourhood, home to the best coffee shops, bars, restaurants, book stores, and vintage boutiques in Montreal! Enjoy complimentary coffee and tea, speedy and reliable WIFI,  a fully-equipped kitchen, and a cute and cuddly kitty!
space: Our Mile End apartment is the perfect place to stay while visiting Montreal.   The apartment includes one master bedroom, a beautiful and sunny office, a cozy living room, large fully equipped kitchen,  front and back balconies,  and of course a guest bedroom!  The guest room has a very comfortable double bed, night stand, large wooden desk, book shelf, and a big sunny window overlooking the front balcony.  Fresh sheets, linens, towels and soaps are provided :)  We love animals, and have a cat named Navy.  He is very sweet and friendly.  If you are traveling with a pet, let us know, and we will try to be accommodating :)  The apartment is non-smoking, but you are welcome to use either of our balconies.

neighborhood_overview: We live in the heart of the coolest neighbourhood in Montreal!  We are half a block away from the famous St. Viateur Bagel shop.  The apartment is walking distance from tons of cute and unique shops, great restaurants, several parks, fun and fashionable clothing boutiques, and charming cafes.
transit: We are a ten minute walk from the metro station, and there is a bus stop to take you downtown right at the corner of our street!  25 minute bus ride to the centre of downtown!
access: Guest room, laundry facilities, kitchen, living room, game room, office, wifi, balconies.

name: Very special island bed and brunch
summary: A  new exquisite guest bathroom for you to enjoy, a king sized heated waterbed, air conditioning or heating or 3/4 single bed with innersprung mattress.  Both beds have sheepskin overlays - cosy or cool - your choice.   Experience the Hawkesbury River first hand. Hire a tinny, orwith a licence, a  fishing boat.  Bed, shower, brunch $140 per night, per person. This includes a lavish Brunch, with local fare, provided by the owner, who stays to look after you.   Customer happiness is paramount!
space: Here is your unique opportunity to stay in a delightful heritage home loved by the owners for 44 years, reflecting over 125 years of history, but with modern conveniences.  Enjoy your food on a veranda overlooking the river and listen to the local birds.  There are two bedrooms, compact but charming.  Clean, comfortable beds and somewhere to store your belongings.  There is a Snug with TV and a wide choice of dvds and cds.  Sparkling new bathroom just for you - you have big fluffy towels.  Stroll onto the verandas, lounge around inside, loll in bed late - no pressure to do anything.  Your hosts are a retired opera singer and an author, who will chat to you or leave you in peace, as you wish.   You can be waited on and enjoy a delicious brunch..  Ann will give you a 20 minute history talk and tour of the house only if you request.  This traffic free island is usually peaceful except for the multi coloured birds that are encouraged in the permaculture, award - winning garden. Brunch on t

neighborhood_overview: A mostly quiet neighbourhood of different nationalities, used to tourists and friendly and helpful with one village shop which has very good coffee and light meals. Some Friday nights there might be a party at the club - if it's noisy, sorry this is out of our control.
notes: Our house is not a museum, however we have carefully preserved the centre as a heritage showpiece with original furniture, rare photographs and documents.  Ann Howard has written for books about the island history and made two short films.  She is happy to give you a talk and walk at your request as part of your memorable stay.  The majority of people come to Ann's place to 'crash' but there are some enthusiastic history buffs!
transit: Car or train to Hawkesbury River Station, then ferry or taxi across - usually straight to Dangar Island, sometimes to Wobby Beach first. Details on request. very special island bed and brunchDangar Island, NSW, AustraliaA new exquisite guest bathroom for you to enjoy. If you'd like to experience the Hawkesbury River first hand, you can hire a tinny, or if you have a licence, a party pontoon or fishing boat. Be...
access: You are welcome to all of the garden and most of the house. We have a large varied library, dvds, dartboard, games and a light show of our own.  We are next to the park and a few minutes walk to two beaches. You can swim in the river at high tide.Wind down and listen to the rhythms of nature or walk, paddle, fish, bush walk or catch the River Postman upriver.
interaction: I offer English lessons by the hour - conversation, cooking or formal English by arrangement.  I am a highly qualified and experienced teacher.   It's a great location for sketching and photography.  Beautiful sunsets.   Guests caVn be as quiet as they like, play music, darts or dvds or chat with us - it's their holiday!  So they choose. Get up when they like, go to bed when they like.
house_rules: We want you to enjoy the fresh air, so no smoking in the house or garden please.  Occasionally there are mozzies.  There is a net over your bed in this case. You are welcome to read the books and magazines, just replace them when you are done.

name: Vacances de reve à Espinho (Porto)
summary: Amoureux du nord du Portugal, nous avons acheté cet appartement à Espinho, station balnéaire à 15 kms au sud de Porto (20 minutes en train). Idéalement situé, dans le quartier des Pêcheurs, à 250 m de l'océan (vue mer depuis le séjour) et à 5 minutes du coeur d'Espinho et des commerces.  La plage d'Espinho est un des 10 meilleurs spots de surf du Portugal.
space: Nous avons aménagé ce logement pour qu'il soit convivial et agréable à vivre. Spacieux, avec 3 chambres, une salle de bains et un cabinet de toilettes, il convient parfaitement aux familles. En hiver, nous facturons le chauffage sur la base de 0,20 cts le kwh. Nous sommes particulièrement attentifs à la propreté de ce lieu pour que chaque hôte s'y sente comme chez lui. C'est pourquoi nous assurons le ménage à la fin de chaque séjour.

neighborhood_overview: Nous sommes situés dans le quartier des pecheurs, quartier populaire et typique, l'ancien coeur historique d'Espinho à 250 m de l'ocean.  Le golf de Paranos est situe à 1 km environ. Le centre ville d'Espinho est à 10 minutes environ à pieds et les commerces à 5 minutes environ. Acces facile aux supermarchés. Endroit ideal egalement pour les ballades à velo (piste cyclable jusqu'à Porto) et pour le surf.
notes: Nous apprécions le coté authentique et populaire de notre quartier avec ses restaurants typiques. Espinho est une station balnéaire réputée de la côte Nord du Portugal.  C est l'un des 10 meilleurs spots de surf du Portugal. Pour les amateurs de velo, une piste cyclable longeant l'ocean permet de circuler jusqu'à Porto tres facilement. C'est le point de départ idéal pour visiter le Nord et le centre du Pays.  Nous sommes à 250m de l'ocean et à environ 1km du golf de Paranos.
transit: La gare d'Espinho (à 20 minutes de Porto) se trouve à environ 10 minutes à pieds de notre appartement. Compter 1€70 par personne pour se rendre à Porto en train. L'aeroport de Porto se trouve à 30 minutes en voiture et 40 minutes par les transports en commun avec des rotations toutes les 15 minutes environ en journée.
access: Les hôtes sont les bienvenus. Ils ont accès à l'ensemble du logement composé de 3 belles chambres. Nous faisons notre maximum pour que nos hôtes passent un séjour agréable. Vous trouverez dans le logement tout ce dont vous pouvez avoir besoin pour passer d'agréables vacances. Les enfants sont les bienvenus. Vous trouverez dans l'appartement un lit BB ( lit  parapluie),   quelques jouets pour enfants, des jeux de plage ainsi qu'un parasol.
interaction: En cas de besoin, mon amie Maria (qui parle français, portugais et anglais) est disponible sur place pour vous apporter toute l'aide nécessaire.  Elle vous donnera de précieux conseils pour votre séjour.  Nous sommes nous mêmes disponibles par téléphone tout au long de votre séjour.
house_rules: Nous vous remercions de ne pas fumer à l'interieur de l'appartement.

name: Perfect Williamsburg Summer Haven
summary: Beautiful, charming, light filled 1.5 bedroom apartment in the heart of happening Williamsburg, one block from the train and steps away from great restaurants, bars, parks and shops. Enjoy a the coolest part of NYC from a haven full of character!
space: Enjoy summer in NYC while staying in our lovely, light drenched Williamsburg, Brooklyn walk-up. Simply and artfully decorated with two bedrooms (one is used as a nursery), the charming apartment  also has a full size living room, eat-in kitchen, and lovely bath and is available for a couple or a single person. No roommates, please. Bedroom has luxury Queen size Keetsa eco-bed and the apartment includes Wi-Fi, 2 AC's, coffee maker, gas stove and lots of plants and art to keep you company. We are in a busy and extremely safe area - just one short block from the 'L' train (whisks you into Manhattan in under 10 minutes), and in the middle of happening Williamsburg with loads of bars, excellent restaurants (mexican, indian, fine dining, turkish, french, juice bar, thai, chinese, korean, vietnamese, italian, all within 5 min walk), coffee shops, boutiques, wine shops, yoga studios, laundry, 24 hour organic groceries, nearby McCarren Park (with giant pool/ice skating rink) and charming Cooper

neighborhood_overview: This is THE place to live/stay/explore in NYC right now. Anything and everything you could want is happening in Williamsburg these days. From fine dining, to night hotspots, to charming cafes, parks, galleries, boutique shopping, great food and the best people watching in NYC....we've got it all.
notes: Since our second bedroom is now a nursery, we think the apartment is best suited for a couple sharing the bedroom or a single occupant.
transit: The very reliable "L" train (which intersects Manhattan) is just one block away. It's such a busy area that we feel comfortable taking it even late at night.
access: The whole apartment is yours to use; please be mindful that the nursery is for hanging out/storing your things, but no sleeping or extra guests, please.
interaction: Happy to call, text & email to arrange the stay. It is important that our guest feels comfortable and that we trust the person staying in our home. If we are not in the city when you arrive, we'll arrange a trusted friend to let you in and show you the apartment.
house_rules: Please respect our apartment as our home and leave it as clean and tidy as you found it. We have a number of art objects and books close to our heart that you are welcome to peruse, but please treat with respect. NO smoking inside!! Please, no pets as well. We simply ask that you leave the place as neat as you found it. Bonus points if you want to water our plants:) Thank You.

name: A GEM IN THE HEART  OF BYZANTINE  ISTANBUL
summary: The apartment is 94 squared meters on the third floor of an apartment building. It is  300 meters away from İstiklal Cd, the well known pedestrian walkaway of the City, and 500 meters from the Metro station of Sishane on Istiklal. This is a lovely place with an excellent view of the Golden Horn waterway and the entire Ottoman and Byzantine Istanbul. The apartment is a lovely retreat for business travelers, and families (with kids), and couples on their Honeymoon.
space: Its ideal location, its proximity to all public transportation, museums, and all the sites that one should not miss visiting while in Istanbul. Across the street there is a mini market open 24/7 where one can find from fresh fruit and vegetables to milk and other necessities. In the market one can request assistance with his luggage previously mentioned.

summary: Lovely apartment in a retro style, fully equipped, in the heart of Porto downtown, right next to one of the most iconic spots: Mercado do Bolhão. Very bright and comfortable with balcony. The Porto Concierge service available 24/7 for your convenience. Free luggage storage at our Welcome Center.
space: 1 bedroom apartment, with a big sofa-bed in the living room. The kitchen comunicates with the living room through an open window with a counter. Very bright and with a beautiful balcony where you can enjoy your breakfast in the morning, or a glass of wine at the end of the day!
description: Lovely apartment in a retro style, fully equipped, in the heart of Porto downtown, right next to one of the most iconic spots: Mercado do Bolhão. Very bright and comfortable with balcony. The Porto Concierge service available 24/7 for your convenience. Very bright and with a beautiful balcony where you can enjoy your breakfast in the morning, or a glass of wine at the end of the day! Guests will have access to all the amenities in the apartment. When you arrive you will be met by The Porto Concierge service that will receive you for check-in and share with you tips about where to find special places to eat, visit and have fun. The Apartment is located in the Downtown of the city, near the important monuments and interesting points that you can visit by walking. The center of all the everyday bustle i
neighborhood_overview: The Apartment is located in the Downtown of the city, near the important monuments and interesting points that you can visit by walking. The center of all the everyday bustle is Santa Catarina street, where you can find the older and typical coffees shops and pastries from Porto, such as the café Majestic, also the old bookstores that healthily coexist with large and modern libraries. Theatres and show halls like the Rivoli Theatre, Coliseu do Porto or São João National Theatre are also in downtown. Downtown - Baixa - is also known for the significant number of nightlife establishments, bars and cafés, in various restaurants from the most traditional to the more sophisticated. There is also a great number of alternative and specialized small shops, especially for art, gourmet, design, sewing, bookstores and antique shops.
notes: Extra Services upon request: •Transfer service to and from airport - 1 or 2 persons: 8€/trip each - 3+ persons: 6€/trip each • City tours with tour guide • Travel Around Northern Portugal (Private sedan will pick you up at the apartment) - Braga - Half Day - 40€ - Guimarães - Half Day - 40€ - Douro Valley - Full Day - 80€ - Braga&Guimarães - Full Day - 65€ - Aveiro - Half Day - 50€ - Santiago de Compostela (Spain) - Full Day - 95€ - Aveiro&Coimbra - Full Day - 80€ - Fátima&Coimbra - Full Day - 99€ • Home groceries delivery • Babysitting • Taxi • Other services as requested Please let us know at the time of the booking if you will be requesting any of the above mentioned services or other special services. Prices may vary according to the services requested and/or guests involved. Services are provided by business partners therefore are subject to availability.
transit: Direct connection to airport by metro. Take the metro at the airport and leave in station "Bolhão". Direct connection to train station "Campanhã". Just take the metro in metro station "Campanhã" and leave in station "Bolhão". All lines stop here.
access: Guests will have access to all the amenities in the apartment.
interaction: When you arrive you will be met by The Porto Concierge service that will receive you for check-in and share with you tips about where to find special places to eat, visit and have fun.
house_rules: Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment, only in the balcony when available or at the window-sill. Please leave all electric appliances turned off, make sure water taps are not running and close all doors and windows before check-out. We request that guests leave the dishes and the kitchen clean and empty out the trash, there is always a garbage deposit in the street nearby. The apartment is cleaned prior to each arrival. Please, keep the apartment tidy and clean as reasonably possible during all the time of your occupancy. If you require extra cleaning during your stay, please contact us - we will arrange it. PLEASE TAKE CARE of the decoration items, furniture, towels/linen and other apartment's equipment. Any doubts handling the apartment's appliances and equipment please call. The neighbors appreciate some peace and quiet as do our guest, please keep the noise level to a minimum between 22h and 8h. Use the place as if it where your own. neighborhood_overview: Front and centre for all this beautiful city has to offer. Sydney Harbour is one of the most beautiful in the world. Explore the many bars, cafes and restaurants that line the shoreline or take a stroll through the lanes to find one of the many hidden gems. In the city centre you will find large shopping centres with high end stores, Australia Department stores such as David Jones and Myer and many other well knows brands and Australian designers. Located close to the Central CBD is Hyde Park and the Botanical Gardens, both are a beautiful place for a stroll or picnic. The CBD area has many great areas to explore, from Circular Quay and The Rocks, to Barangaroo and Darling Harbour or China Town, there is always somewhere to see. Major Attractions Sydney Harbour Bridge Sydney Opera House Luna Park Art Gallery of New South Wales Bondi Beach Manly Beach Places to Eat Sake – The Rocks Mejico – Central CBD area Mamak – Central CBD area China Lane – Central CBD area Chefs Gallery – Town Hall
notes: This great 2 bedroom apartment is as central as it gets. Located in the centre of the city, only minutes walk from all of Sydney’s great sites such as the Sydney Opera House, The Sydney Conservatorium of Music & Circular Quay.  Your apartment, located in the historic heritage listed Cliveden building, boasts high ceilings & a newly renovated common room. The Cliveden also has a fantastic rooftop pool, which will provide a relaxing atmosphere.  With all your modern conveniences provided, this is truly your “home away from home” in Sydney.
house_rules: ** Key Collection ** Please note that if you are arriving outside of business hours (those being outside of Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm) key collection can either be made  - From our offices, which are located Cremorne - Or our property manager will endeavour to make other arrangements. Should a third party be required be to deliver keys to you outside of business hours then an additional fee of $50 may apply, but our property manager will contact you in advance of your check-in and discuss and confirm the most suitable arrangement with you.  Please note if stay is longer than 60 days there will be an additional $55 cleaning fee. ** Rental Terms ** Strictly no subletting without prior written approval from The Apartment Service

name: The charming blue suite - Copacabana
summary: Introducing the blue suite, a double room with en-suite bathroom, part of a newly rebuilt colonial  guest house, located in a private street in the heart of Copacabana. What makes it special? PRIVACY, I don't leave there, it's only for guests; SAFETY,  the house is in a gated community; UNBEATABLE LOCATION, very close to subway, shops, bars, beach; BEST ADVICE: insider's tips from a local host who loves showing Rio with safety; FULLY EQUIPPED; REALLY QUIET PLACE; HIGHLY APPROVED BY FORMER GUESTS
space: The blue suite is located at the front of the guesthouse, facing the small alley that connects it to the outside Pompeu Loureiro Street. It is very silent, a residential hub, an oasis in the middle of the non-stop frenzy of Copacabana. You have your own suite, consisting of a private bedroom for a couple, with its exclusive bathroom inside. But you also share a  kitchen, a TV room and a dining room with other guests. If you got a car, there is possibility to park inside the villa or at my house, at a five-minute walking distance, The bedroom has approximately 12 square meters, has large, old restored windows and is predominantly decorated in the blue color. There is a new and real double bed, with a 33-density mattress, meaning comfort for your nights. There is air conditioner and a small fridge where you can store your own supplies during your stay, Besides, you also find a furniture with empty drawers and another one to hang your clothes and a bedside lamp for night reading. Everythi
description: Introducing the blue suite, a double room with en-suite bathroom, part of a newly rebuilt colonial  guest house, located in a private street in the heart of Copacabana. What makes it special? PRIVACY, I don't leave there, it's only for guests; SAFETY,  the house is in a gated community; UNBEATABLE LOCATION, very close to subway, shops, bars, beach; BEST ADVICE: insider's tips from a local host who loves showing Rio with safety; FULLY EQUIPPED; REALLY QUIET PLACE; HIGHLY APPROVED BY FORMER GUESTS The blue suite is located at the front of the guesthouse, facing the small alley that connects it to the outside Pompeu Loureiro Street. It is very silent, a residential hub, an oasis in the middle of the non-stop frenzy of Copacabana. You have your own suite, consisting of a private bedroom for a couple, with its exclusive bathroom inside. But you also share a  kitchen, a TV room and a dining room with other guests. If you got a car, there is possibility to park inside the villa or at my house
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is truly one of the very best in all Rio de Janeiro, Actually, you will be in the center of the Jewish quarter, just besides a synagogue, an area known for the high level of its inhabitants. Almost in front of the villa, you find a big and classy supermarket. The best restaurants are located at Barao de Ipanema Street, just in front of the outside gate. One block ahead, at Bolivar Street, lies the best nightlife of Copacabana, with many bars, pubs and restaurants that keep open after hours. All main tourist attractions (the Christ, Sugar Loaf, Botanical Garden) are easily accessible by subway, bus or taxi.
transit: Transportation is easy and abundant. The Cantagalo subway station is just one block away, allowing safe and cheap connection to downtown and western areas. At Pompeu Loureiro Street you find several public buses to touristic areas of your interest. Taxis are plenty, you do not spend more than 10 seconds waiting for one (well, not when it rains). From or to the Galeao international airport, a taxi will take about 40 minutes and will cost you no more than the equivalent to US$ 20. From the Santos Dumont domestic airport, it is only 20 minutes far and a taxi ride will cost you the equivalent to US$ 10.
access: In the kitchen, that you can use at your will and anytime, you find cups and glasses, plates of different sizes, spoons + knives + forks, a filter with potable water, a microwave oven to heat your food and a coffee machine, with coffee and sugar available for free. NO STOVE IS AVAILABLE. As other common areas, you find a TV room with Brazilian cable channels and a dining room with fancy table and chairs, located into a high lobby area, with a big chandelier falling over it. You have internet  Wi-Fi everywhere. You will meet only selected guests like you, who booked through online platforms and had their identities previously checked.
interaction: you may count on me as your host in Rio, doing all my best to help you to make this an unforgettable trip. I think that hosting is much more than simply giving you the keys for your bedroom. Soon after your booking, I’ll send you a guide with information on how to get to the guesthouse and tips on what to do in town and in the neighborhood. As you arrive, I’ll personally give you insider information on the city and the best programs for the days you spend here. Along your stay, I’ll invite you to join my family at my own home, located from a five-minute walk, for a pool party or a caipirinha lesson. You will get a friend here for everything, this is my commitment with you and also a pleasure for myself. Hope to see you soon in Rio!
house_rules: No big rules. You will be in a residential villa, so silence is the standard for your and your neighbor's comfort. You can use the kitchen anytime, but you should clean it after using it. Smoking is allowed only outside the guesthouse, never inside your suite. You are expected to help to save the planet and my pocket, by using power and water with no wastes, I'd appreciate if you would help to turn lights off when you are not in that ambient.

name: Rio Antigo, quarto aconchegante!

A 5 min. a pé da boêmia Lapa, 20 min. a pé min de Santa Teresa, 15 min do Sambódromo, 25 min. de ônibus de Copacabana. name: Chic Queen Bed in 5 Star Location!
summary: Spacious Rooftop Terrace in a Cosmopolitan Suburb. Close to Centenial Park, Right on Oxford st! Close to Paddington Pubs, Restaurants & shops, 15min walk to Central CBD &  15min bus to Bondi Beach. You'll love the apartment which is artfully decorated & the only one (1st floor of townhouse) so very peaceful & private.  I pride myself on giving my guests the best value for money, as that’s what I look for in my air bnbs when I travel too!  Can’t wait to welcome you to Sydney :)
space: Cute rustic apartment with modern interiors, Well styled room with sunlight and a super comfortable queen bed (electric blanket) with organic cotton sheets. Sunny & leafy balcony with French door entry, Split level single apartment. A maximum of 2 guests only. The location is EVERYTHING being right next door to the City or Bondi Beach! Our neighbours include 10 William St, Paddo Inn, The Paddington, Fred's, St Peter's & The London, these are all great venues for going out being on your doorstep! We are also 5min walk to shopping location "The Intersection"... I promise you will love Paddington as much as I do

Most comparable to London's, Notting Hill or New Yorks, East Village it really is a top cosmopolitan location with some of Australia’s BEST restaurants & fashion boutiques right next door! We also have a great local market across the road every Saturday & 5 minute walk from Sydney Vegan market on a Sunday. Not to mention only a minute walk away from Centenial park, and a 24hr Gym across the road too
notes: Smoking available outside only (balcony) Be kind to our pets (Cat) Kitty litter is kept outside I work full time so the apartment will be mostly free No more construction in the area  PLEASE NOTE- Large main bedroom will be on offer to guests as of December (currently decorating) at no extra cost!
transit: 1 mins walk from a 24hr bus line! (Bus # 333 Circular Quay to Bondi Beach) 10 mins from train stations. Taxi friendly or just walk.
access: Full access to all amenities- including NBN WIFI, Netflix, Apple TV  Also I have a Scooter  that is available for day hire if you have a valid International riders license! Our place is a 10min ride to the beach

notes: All linen and towels are included in the apartment. After one week stay (stays up to 7 nights), changing of linen/towels and general cleaning of the apartment, free of charge.
