name: Self-contained beach accommodation near Manly
summary: A beautiful room overlooking a sunny garden, just a few minutes walk to Curl Curl & Dee Why beaches & ideally located for tourist destinations in & around Manly, the northern beaches & the stunning city of Sydney.  You’ll love the Garden Room because it is quiet yet in a beautiful location, with close proximity to wonderful walks, beaches, restaurants & public transport.  Ideal for a couple or single female.
space: The Garden Room is a completely self-contained space within a quiet family home (we have 2 well behaved children aged 13 & 12).  As our welcomed guests you will have access to a well equipped kitchenette within your living space, a large private ensuite bathroom, plus your own spacious deck (with table & chairs) overlooking a peaceful, sunny garden.  If the weather is not so good you have a table & stools to enjoy using inside the Garden Room.
description: A beautiful room overlooking a sunny garden, just a few minutes walk to Curl Curl & Dee Why beaches & ideally located for tourist destinations in & around Manly, the northern beaches & the stunning city of Sydney.  You’ll love the Garden Room because it is quiet yet in a beautiful location, with close proximity to wonderful walks, beaches, restaurants & public transport.  Ideal for a couple or single female. The Garden Room is a completely self-contained space within a quiet family home (we have 2 well behaved children aged 13 & 12).  As our welcomed guests you will have access to a well equipped kitchenette within your living space, a large private ensuite bathroom, plus your own spacious deck (with table & chairs) overlooking a peaceful, sunny garden.  If the weather is not so good you have a table & stools to enjoy using inside the Garden Room. You will have your own independent access through the back entrance sliding doors (watch out for the friendly golden retriever), with a larg
neighborhood_overview: North Curl Curl, especially up on the headland, is unique as it's one of the quieter beaches with little development (except at either end of the beach).  North Curly has a superb surf beach (probably the best next to Narrabeen for keen surfers, yet safe enough for beginners too).  You can walk down to Curl Curl beach & Dee Why beach in minutes, & of course there are the superb restaurants along Dee Why beachfront to enjoy.  If you are reasonably fit you would enjoy the cliff top hike between North Curl Curl Surf Club & Dee Why beach, & of course you can also enjoy the superb walk from North Curl Curl to Manly (45-60 minutes walk), which meanders along beaches, through landscaped parks & a stunning boardwalk.
notes: FYI we do have a (very quiet) friend who stays in our cabin sometimes but she is hardly ever there!  We also have a golden retriever & 6 chickens/bantams (feel free to feed the chooks & take an egg or two if you find any there).  We also have a veggie patch so feel free to help yourself if there is an excess of any fresh veggies in there ; )
transit: Bus transport connections are superb for Manly, the city & Chatswood, which you can access at the bottom of our road.  No need to worry about finding a parking spot near the beach - you can just walk to either Curl Curl or Dee Why beaches from the Garden Room in just a matter of minutes!
access: You will have your own independent access through the back entrance sliding doors (watch out for the friendly golden retriever), with a large sunny back deck for your private use to enjoy leisurely breakfasts overlooking our garden while listening to our chickens.  You also have exclusive use of a large sumptuous & contemporary ensuite bathroom.
interaction: We will most likely be home but sometimes we are away - you may well not see us even if we are home as you have your own independent access to the Garden Room.  Of course if we are home, then please do wander upstairs to ask us any questions you may have.

I'm on the side of the new subway station that will be ready on August 2nd 2016. It's right next to the Leblon shopping mall, bus stops, shops, banks, pharmacy, restaurants and bars. You will love my space because of its comfort and location. My space is good for couples, solo adventures, business travelers and families (with children).

READ BELOW -No Smoking inside the building. This is non negotiable.  -We will need to know about any additional guests (outside of the agreed contract) staying in our home. It should be noted that we have a security camera system in place for our safety and the safety of our guests. - please be aware more than 4 adults is not advisable and needs to be approved by us before your stay.   -We ask that you treat the apartment like it is your mother in law's home. name: Bronte, Waverley - Large Apartment with pool
summary: My place is superbly located close to Charing Cross cafes and Bronte Beach. Minutes walk to Queens Park. Peacefully positioned well back from the street, this stylish renovated apartment reveals an open plan layout with modern, contemporary finishes. Bright and airy with open plan living and an additional office/study zone. Both bedrooms are doubles with robes and storage. The sleek bathroom has gorgeous quality fittings and a large bath. The apartment has a large internal laundry.

name: Enjoy! Your House during the Olympics!
summary: This is your place for the Olympic Games. You will have no problem for moving around, since the condo is 500 m from the Alvorada Terminal which will have direct connection with the Olympic Park. In addition to also make connection with the Galeão International Airport by the BRT Transcarioca. Next to the condo there are several leisure options like Shopping Rio Design, OutBack, Cervantes and Barra Shopping. The condo has parking, swimming pool, sauna, barbecue and exclusive ferry to the beach.

summary: Wind down in an elegant designer apartment just steps from the beach. Indulge in the laid back lifestyle of this space featuring thoughtfully curated furnishings and decor, soothing earth tones throughout, and a private balcony.
space: The top quality of all the furniture, beds, sofas and appliances, and the detailistic decoration, which combines design and contemporary pieces with antiques, makes this a unique apartment. You have a lovely terrace with a table and chairs where relax taking a drink or breakfast, wifi, cable TV...and all the details you can imagine, like first-aid kit, sewing kit, trolley for going shopping, high chair, cot, an office table, rain shower, air conditioned and heating, dishwasher, washer, dryer, several coffee machines...anything you need for a long or short stay.

notes: The apartment atmosphere and the service I will offer you will make your stay unforgettable!!!. This is a legal apartment, with License Number HUTB (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: In the apartment street itself, C. Provençals, you have an underground (Metro) stop only 3 blocks away. Station name "Selva de Mar" line 4 (yellow). This is 5-7 minutes walking to the station. In example to go to the cathedral from the apartment by underground it takes only 10-to-15 minutes ( 7 stops: Selva de Mar- Jaume I). The public transport system in Barcelona is at the highest level in Europe. You can buy a “T-10” transport card for less than 10 euros valid for 10 travels for both bus or underground (not valid for Airport "airbus" shuffle to city) at any underground station. There are automatic machines that sell them in all stations. Otherwise a single ticket's cost is 2€ so it's really worth buying the card, that you can share (it's not individual). Also bus stops only 50m away, and the access by car to “ronda litoral” which is the internal “motorway” that goes underground in the city center is only 100m distance. Also you have three touristic “hop on – hop off” bus stops betwe
access: Guest can access of course the apartment in exclusive, terrace, and the garage.
interaction: I answer fast when asked by email, or I'm always easily reachable by mobile. I am always looking forward to answer to my guests questions!!. I live close to the apartment, and have family same block, so I am around the apartment area often, and might come to see you and check how you are, if you agree. I will ask you during your stay if you need anything!!!

notes: Hotel has swimming pool, picnic and bar-b-que area, exercise room, and great open-air lobby. The condo is located next to the Food Pantry which is the only large grocery store in Waikiki. There is also a cafe in the lobby of the Aloha Surf where you can enjoy breakfast for $6, all you can eat lunch for $ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , and all you can eat dinner for $ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) You can dine and visit with all the other guests staying in the hotel and make lasting friendships. Owners State of Hawaii Tax ID# TA (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: - Uber and Lyft are available in Honolulu and Waikiki - 'Biki' bikeshare is available throughout Waikiki & Honolulu - Try out 'Segway' tours of Waikiki, using their stand-up scooters  - Convenient public transportation options include 'TheBus' and the 'Waikiki Trolley' - Taxis are another great way to travel when in a group and the cost can be shared. You can find taxi stands at hotels, most major shopping malls and at the airport. Note that using taxi stands and calling for pick-ups by phone or via hotel concierge is the norm in Hawaii rather than hailing a cab.

name: ORM - Chã 02 Apartment
summary: Studio on the 2nd floor of a 4-storey, fully rehabilitated for touristic rental due to its prime location in the historic center of Porto, within the limits of the wall "Muralha Fernandina", 1 minute walking from the Cathedral and Luís I Bridge.  It has 2 single beds, 1 bathroom with shower, fully equipped kitchen, living room with sofa a double bed and a balcony with a wonderful view of Sé, Porto's Cathedral. Ideal for 1 - 4 persons. Prices vary according to the seasons.
space: If this apartment is not available on the required dates, check out our other apartments through our profile. See also our list of additional services, which will elevate your experience in our city. This apartment is located on Rua Chã, whose name designates the fact that it is a flat street, with records of its existence as far back as 1293. It has gone through several phases, from the place of sale of electrical appliances, now passing through the great amount of  multi-cultural supply store. There are, however, still tenuous shopkeepers, from another era, old houses of buttons and cobbler articles. It has as points of interest the Cathedrall of Porto and the D. Luís I bridge . Ideal for families wishing to book several apartments in the same building, or for couples or groups up to 4 people who prefer to stay in the heart of the historical center of Porto, within walking distance of the main points of interest of the city.

name: Bright studio in the heart of the east village

Stylishly decked out and fully equipped, this is Sydney apartment accommodation at its finest. Please note, this is a duplicate listing, set up to attract longer bookings with weekly and monthly discounts.
space: Discover inner city living at its best in this brand new 1BR luxury apartment. As with all Uptown Apartments, linen and towels are provided and wi-fi access is free of charge. There is ample storage, with a European laundry located in the entrance corridor.

neighborhood_overview: The location is perfect - just five minutes from Sydney's CBD, Kings Cross and Potts Point, and two minutes from Oxford St. Bus stops that service Paddington, Bondi Junction, Bondi Beach and beyond are right on your doorstep. Darlinghurst is a cosmopolitan suburb, with busy cafes, restaurants, bars and nightlife venues along Oxford, Crown, Victoria and Stanley Streets. The Darlinghurst Village is a heritage precinct where the majority of buildings are early 20th century terrace houses. It comprises 20 blocks bounded by Barcom Avenue, Forges and Oxford Streets and Taylor Square. Oxford Street is Sydney’s most famous shopping street, where you will find everything from supermarkets and gift shops, to alternative clothing boutiques, late night bookshops and music stores. Darlinghurst is home to a range of exceptional designer and home wares outlets, as well as a great selection of various ethnic cafes and restaurants, from basic to up market. Oxford Street' exclusive cinemas, the Chauvel
notes: We have 3 apartments in this block, but only one car space. Parking can be provided on a first-come-first-served basis for $20 per night. Street parking is restricted and limited, though there is a multi-storey car park next door to the building.
transit: There is no shortage of public transport options surrounding this apartment. Catch a bus from any number of bus routes with numerous stops within a 1 minute walk. You can get to Museum or Kings Cross train stations in a 5 to 10 minute walk, or you can walk into the CBD in the same length of time.
access: You will be provided with instructions for self-check-in once we process your booking. Once you collect your keys from the property, you will be able to access the apartment via the lift after you enter the building through the front glass security doors. interaction: We leave you to enjoy the apartment in peace, but we do live nearby and are able to discuss any questions you have over the phone, or we can get to the apartment in around 20 minutes to attend to anything urgent.

If you are in any doubt as to this policy, please contact us immediately. Following these rules will ensure your security bond is returned to you in full and on time. Breaking these rules may result in charges being incurred as detailed in our terms and conditions. If you respect the apartment as you would your own home, you can relax and enjoy your stay.

name: AVAILABLE, Poipu Beach, NEW OeanView Deck House
summary: WIFI & NETFLIX!, BRAND NEW Ocean-view Deck House directly across the street from the Pacific Ocean and the Grand Wyndam Resort. Home on a FULL ACRE for privacy.Along with the close proximity of the OCEAN, the standout feature is the massive SUN-DECK. We can direct you to; SNORKEL WITH SEA TURTLES, photograph rare HAWAIIAN MONK SEALS (only 1,100 left), Outrigger Canoe Race, BOOGEY BOARDING & SURFING!  Spend your time lazing at the beach or up in the jungle hiking. ENJOY LIFE!!!
space: Any house on a full acre is a very rare commodity in the Poipu Beach Area on Kauai's Sunny South Side. The house offers privacy the hotels & condos can't offer. The area itself is extremely popular with visitors and thus all the hotels, resorts, condos and vacation rental homes. Our house is unique because we are situated one property from the Ocean the surrounding land is also open space that affords wonderful vistas. We welcome you to a truly private experience during your Holiday, with plenty of elbow room. A much more private experience than staying at a crowded hotel or condo. We are a completely registered rental: IAW Hawaii State Act 204 our TAT Registration Number  is advertised & displayed herein: #TA-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN). Our G.E. number is #GE-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN). * Note...for some unknown reason, AIRBNB won't display rental tax registration numbers.

We welcome you to a truly private experience during your Holiday, with plenty of elbow room. A
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood, Poipu Beach, is one of the newest and priciest sub-divisions on Kauai. It is in a safe area and within a short walk to all kinds of things to do. Beaches, Shopping Boutiques, Restaurants, Snorkel and Surf-board rentals, Bike rentals, Pubs, and Grocery Stores,...are all a walk away. There are even more of everything a short drive away also. The best thing about where our place is in the neighborhood is...we are the closest property to the Ocean. A walk through the Grand Wyndham resort (which also has restaurants and pubs), finds you at the shoreline.   Perfect location.
notes: Our subdivision is sensitive to the well being of the rare sea birds who nest in our jungles and must make their first hazardous flights to the ocean from the nest. We don't have street lights to allow the birds every chance to safely make it to the dark ocean at night (when these nacent flights occur). The young fledgling Shearwaters leave the nest and fly till they see moonlight or starlight reflected in the ocean. They then will land and rest for the night to begin their life as a denizen of the sea. So,...the open and dark skies at the house, not only assist the Shearwaters, but make for wonderful stargazing at the property. City dwellers can reacquaint themselves with the Milky Way, the North Star, Orion (in Winter) and Scorpio (in Summer) and other clearly visible constellations & stars.  After all the best experiences are free!!!
transit: Really you don't need a car at our place. Everything you could want is a walk or quick bike ride away. However, if you want to explore the entire island we recommend a rental car. The island does have a great bus system and taxi cabs.
access: The entire $2.5 million dollar home and garden are yours for the holiday!!! Fly a kite, run through the sprinklers, Stargaze (the Milky Way is easy to see here)...Pick a papaya or gather a bunch of bananas. Conduct a Wedding ceremony or Wedding Reception... Lay out on the lawn or the sun-deck...the place is your Kauai home!!! ALOHA.
interaction: As longtime residents of Kauai...we know lots of great hikes, super snorkeling & surfing spots. We can direct you to any tour operators, including Na Pali Boat Tours, horseback riding, ATV tours and more.

name: A Dorm Bed In the Best Location
space: If you are looking for a clean, quiet , comfy and central place where you can chill and have fun, this is the right place in Istanbul. We  have  the perfect location to reach any destination in Istanbul with ease, as its right in the centre of Istanbul and very close to main bus routes and the Istanbul Underground and the Airport shuttle. Another advantage of our location is that we're only 15 min. away from most of Istanbul's famous tourist attractions(old town), we're also only a short walk from Sirkeci international train station. Want to relax? We have big and really nice terrace where you can chill and meet other travellers to share your story. Want to cook? We have well equipped kitchen to cook and use tea /coffee facilities for free. Want to sleep? ? We have really comfy beds where you can have good sleep. Need help or info? All staff that work in our hostel welcome you and hope to offer you a service that leaves you with fond memories of your stay. We offer you all the informat

name: Porto.arte downtown apartment 3PAX
summary: This Porto´s typical apartment, on a classical house, has recently been restored and is fully equipped (including Air Conditioning and Wifi). It was decorated to comfortably accommodate couples and travelers (up to 3 people), either on recreation or business. The atmosphere is warm and serene, with a remarkable natural light in every room. The location is privileged, in the city center, the designated "Arts District", which is a quiet pedestrian area with everything at a walk distance.
space: This is a fully equipped apartment, that comfortably hosts 3 adults. The bedroom has a double bed, and a sofa bed is also available. A functional and aesthetic balance was achieved in the living room, where a kitchenette is included. The historial details of the apartment were  preserved, such as the living room's ceiling.
description: This Porto´s typical apartment, on a classical house, has recently been restored and is fully equipped (including Air Conditioning and Wifi). It was decorated to comfortably accommodate couples and travelers (up to 3 people), either on recreation or business. The atmosphere is warm and serene, with a remarkable natural light in every room. The location is privileged, in the city center, the designated "Arts District", which is a quiet pedestrian area with everything at a walk distance. This is a fully equipped apartment, that comfortably hosts 3 adults. The bedroom has a double bed, and a sofa bed is also available. A functional and aesthetic balance was achieved in the living room, where a kitchenette is included. The historial details of the apartment were  preserved, such as the living room's ceiling. The building has a private garden, in the back. I do not live at this building, but very close to it. Thus, I am able to quickly  assist the guests and also provide flexible check-in/c
neighborhood_overview: The building is located in a privileged pedestrian block of the city, which is safe and quiet. At the same time, it is close to all the major points of interest of the city, as it is located right in the city center. This is the ideal place to rest, recover and enjoy the city at its fullest. Only a few steps away, there are multiple interesting locations, from modern art galleries and antiques restoration workshops to  acknowledged restaurants. A 15 minutes walk will take you to several locations of interest such as the City Hall, Casa da Música (House of Music), Douro river banks and the romantic gardens of Palácio de Cristal (Cristal Palace). All the while going through medieval streets and buildings, churches (old and new), synagogues, museums, art galleries and faculties.
notes: The apartment is cosy and homing, decorated in such a way that a harmony between the past and the indispensable functionality of modern live may coexist. The apartment is fully equipped. There was special care to providing a comfortable stay, which led to the  use of good mattresses, quality bed lining, air conditioning, Wi-Fi, large screen HD LED TV, cable TV, kitchen appliances and safe, among others. In short, everything that is a must in well living. On the exterior there is a pleasant private garden to which the guests have free access. There is also a laundry room, that guests may use.
transit: In terms of transportation, at less than 100 meters, there are multiple bus stops that can take you all around town, as well as taxis.  At a 10 minute walk, the metro system is also available.  If you have a car available, it is only a 5 minute drive to the high way that can take you to the north, south and east (Spain).
access: The building has a private garden, in the back.
interaction: I do not live at this building, but very close to it. Thus, I am able to quickly  assist the guests and also provide flexible check-in/check-out schedules.
house_rules: Taxa Municipal de 2€ / pessoa / dia. Cobrada no momento do check-in.

name: Mouzinho 244 Ap4 by RUA Apartments
summary: Ap4 is  located at Mouzinho da Silveira Street, in downtown, and in the heart of the UNESCO World Heritage Center. This apartment is on the 2th floor  and it's an apartment full of light. For privacy windows don't allow outside visibility. It has 1 bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, a dining area and a cozy living room. whith TV cable and free wi-fi. São Bento's Train Station and the Subway are just a 2 minute walk away You can see and choose  other apartments "cliking" on myprofile page.
space: The apartment has 1 bedroom with a double bed of 140, 1 bathroom,  a kitchen, a dining area and a cozy living room with a confortable seat that can becomes a double  bed of 140. The full bathroom is equipped with hair dryer and complimentary toiletries.
description: Ap4 is  located at Mouzinho da Silveira Street, in downtown, and in the heart of the UNESCO World Heritage Center. This apartment is on the 2th floor  and it's an apartment full of light. For privacy windows don't allow outside visibility. It has 1 bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, a dining area and a cozy living room. whith TV cable and free wi-fi. São Bento's Train Station and the Subway are just a 2 minute walk away You can see and choose  other apartments "cliking" on myprofile page. The apartment has 1 bedroom with a double bed of 140, 1 bathroom,  a kitchen, a dining area and a cozy living room with a confortable seat that can becomes a double  bed of 140. The full bathroom is equipped with hair dryer and complimentary toiletries. The building where the apartment is located , belongs to the 19th century but was completely rebuilt  in July 2016.  The building has a common laundry room with washing machines and dryers that can be used for a modest sum . Personal check-in is done till 8pm
neighborhood_overview: With a privileged location, you can visit the old city on foot , without any means of transport .In Mouzinho da Silveira Street you can find diversified traditional stores  and many handicraft products and plenty of restaurants. A few minutes walk , you will find : Aliados avenue,  Ribeira, Arts district,   Clérigos tower, the Porto Cathedral , Lello bookstore, Stock exchange palace, S. Francisco Church and others. The property is 300 meters from Rua Galerias de Paris , a lively spot for nightlife with numerous bars and restaurants.  Ribeira is one of the most vibrant place in the city,It is located 200 meters from the apartement. Crossing  the bridge you can visit the famous wine cellars of Porto where wine tasting and tours are available.
notes: The building did not have an elevator , so it is not advised to reduced mobility persons. The apartment has large windows that let in plenty of light, but without visibility to the outside.
transit: São Bento's Train Station and the Subway Station with a direct connection to the airport (São Bento – yellow line) are just a 2 minute walk away. Starting from the station of São Bento you can visit several bordering cities of Porto, very charming like as: Braga , Guimaraes, Aveiro , etc.
access: The building where the apartment is located , belongs to the 19th century but was completely rebuilt  in July 2016.  The building has a common laundry room with washing machines and dryers that can be used for a modest sum . Personal check-in is done till 8pm. After that hour you can access the apartment by an access code that we will provide you. We can provide with extra-cost a personalized transfer from the airport to the apartment.
interaction: Sheets and towels are available at no additional cost The apartments have fully equipped kitchens , but if you prefer to eat out and taste the local cuisine , there are many dining options within walking distance ,from traditional restaurants to ones with Michelin stars.
house_rules: - check-out till 12:00 - check-in after 3 pm

name: Duplex in the heart of Williamsburg
summary: Beautiful modern duplex in the heart of Williamsburg . Short walk to L Train Bedford stop . Plenty of great restaurants & nightlife within walking distance
description: Beautiful modern duplex in the heart of Williamsburg . Short walk to L Train Bedford stop . Plenty of great restaurants & nightlife within walking distance Roof deck access BBQ area with table & chairs -  Washer / Dryer I'm available 24/7 to provide assistance of any kind - I'm never too far away The apartment is situated in the middle of where you want to be in Williamsburg. Everything is within walking distance . Close proximity to Williamsburg bridge , bushwick inlet park & Mccaren Park . I recommend walking or you can rent a city bike for a few bucks The air mattress is a queen size- "SoundAsleep Dream Series Air Mattress". It is not a conventional camping air mattress. name: Spacious & Cosy 1BR apt in Gramercy with balcony!
summary: My place is located in Gramercy, the most elegant neighborhood of downtown manhattan. Very close to the 6,N,Q,R trains Gramercy park, Madison Square park, Flatiron building, Union Square and East Village.  I've put a lot of effort to make it cosy. You’ll love its style, the private outdoors space, the location, the ambiance and the neighborhood.  I recently bought a piano, feel free to play and practice during your stay.
space: Experience NYC in style! If you've ever wondered what it would be like to live in an authentic NYC midtown apartment, wonder no more! The building is in the heart of downtown Manhattan, just minutes from upscale shopping, world class restaurants, museums, galleries etc.  The apartment has: - A queen size beds - Huge corner sofa - Equipped kitchen (coffee machine, stove/oven, kettle, cookware) - ACs and central heating - 55" 3D TV with Roku/Netflix/Amazon/Hulu & a  - Playstation 4 - Wifi - Piano

name: Confortable Guest House
summary: Guest house with independant entrance. A nice living room with a sofa bed, a full bathroom (prepared to accomodate people with special needs). Full open kitchen, a large bedroom with aadjoining room( that could be used as a bedroom) and another full bathroom. Send me a message. Better pics soon.

Full open kitchen, a large bedroom with aadjoining room( that could be used as a bedroom) and another full bathroom. Send me a message. Better pics soon.
transit: 2 blocks away from metro (Uruguai), 200 metres from bus stop, supermarket, fruitmarket and bakery (that surves lunch-dinner) at walking distance. We are close to the tijuca rain forest and 30 minutes away from the beach (without traffic or by taking the subway). Drugstores, coffeshop and nice restaurants. It's a traditional neighborhood, no nightclubs around the house. But you can find pubs by taking the bus (15 min) or the metro for the nightclubs (20 min). I'll be here to give you more tips! :) Near maracanã!!!
access: Full guest house, wi-fi, tv, towels, bedding, fridge, stove, a double bed, a single bed, a sofa, microwave, some kitchen appliance (if you need something else let me know-maybe we have it in the main house). We also have a dog :) but she does not have acess to the guest house, don't worry.
interaction: The guest house is (obviosly)!at my place. You can talk to me whenever you want. If you want a bed and breakfast experience we can offer that (with a additional fee). Laundry can be taken care of too (with an additional fee- we don't have a dryer so the clothes take longer to dry, but it works for us brazilians). You can come and go as you want, just be sure to be kind and respectfull. Will be nice having you here. :)

name: Huge room in the heart of Ipanema!
summary: Great room super close to Praça General Osorio in the heart of Ipanema. Very safe neighbourhood with a great view to the surrounding favelas and the ocean. Tons of restaurants, shops, supermarkets, banks and all you need to enjoy your stay in Rio. The room has a very comfy double bed and a sofa bed. It can accommodate easily 3 or even 4. You might listen roosters in the mornings, if you are light sleeper bring ear plugs :).

name: Private Room in beach apartment in Bondi
summary: Hi there, while I am traveling, I am offering my room in a beautiful 3 bedroom apartment, just a short 5 min. stroll to Bondi Beach. It's a sun-filled,bright,  semi open apartment with a spacious living room, gorgeous balcony (where you can see the beach) & kitchen. Its located in a quiet street but is also ideally close to cafes, shops and transport. Only two blocks to Bondi Beach and Campbell Pde, and one block to the trendy Bondi Rd cafes, restaurants and bars.  Not a party house.

name: Condo tout équipé, 2 ch., paisible, près du métro
summary: Mon logement est à moins de 10 minutes de marche du métro Radisson, de la place Versailles (centre commercial) et d'une immense épicerie et société des alcools. Vous apprécierez le condo pour la luminosité, la tranquillité, la climatisation, le lit confortable et l'équipement complet incluant laveuse sécheuse. Mon logement est parfait pour les couples, les voyageurs en solo, les étudiants et les voyageurs d'affaires.
space: -Il faut environ 30 minutes pour vous rendre au centre-ville, en voiture ou en transport en commun. Une excellente façon de découvrir Montréal loin de la vie trépidante de la ville tout en restant dans la ville! -Grand parcs (athlétisme, parc pour enfants et espaces verte en face du condo) à quelques pas du condo.  -Je suis située au carrefour des grands axes routiers, des autoroutes 25 et 40, à la sortie du tunnel H- Lafontaine, du Jardin Botanique et des stades Olympique et Saputo.  -Près de 2 centre commerciaux: place versailles (10min à pied) ou galerie d'Anjou (10min en auto) -La Cuisine est entièrement équipée, réfrigérateur, cuisinière et four, micro-ondes, grille-pain, des herbes et l'assaisonnement de base et plus encore ... - Laveuse et sécheuse avec un détergent prévu -Serviettes, savon, shampoing, revitalisant sont fournis

notes: La tranquillité des lieux doit être observée par respect pour le voisinage. Bien qu'on entend pas parler, le voisins d'en bas peut vous entendre marcher si vous marcher du talon. La musique forte peut être entendue.
transit: 700 mètre du métro Radisson et plusieurs autobus
access: Accès complet sauf cour arrière.
interaction: Je suis disponible en tout temps par courriel, texte ou téléphone.
house_rules: - Fumer est permis sur le balcon couvert à l'arrière. - On demande aux occupants de respecter la tranquillité des lieux en évitant toute musique forte ou bruits excessifs après 22h00. - Smoking is permissible on the covered balcony at the back. - Out of respect for the neighbors and in line with the peaceful environment, we kindly require that you avoid loud music or excessive noise passed 10pm.

name: 26/3 rd Casa da Música
summary: Apartamento situado em Cedofeita, à Boavista. Casa com as comodidades essenciais e  traços minimalistas, é um espaço de cidade.  Situa-se numa área habitacional, fora da zona turística.  Verifiquem por favor a localização antes de reservar. Caminhar até à baixa demora 25 min, como alternativas metro "Casa da Música" a 7 min do alojamento são 3 paragens até ao centro ou 10min há também o bus nº 602 a 1 min do alojamento para a Cordoaria (15m)
space: Esta casa fica perto da Praça Mouzinho de Albuquerque.  Localiza-se fora da zona histórica. Antes de reservar confirmem que a localização e que as comodidades do alojamento vos são convenientes.  Verifiquem as condições e confirmem o local antes de reservar. Pode acomodar até 3 pessoas (quarto com cama de casal e sofá-cama na sala).  Ideal para casal ou amigos à procura de um local simples para  uns dias na cidade.  O apartamento tem 65 m², constituído por hall, quarto, sala, wc, cozinha e varanda. No exterior há espaços ajardinados e estacionamento gratuito. A poucos minutos encontramos várias atrações e curiosidades como o Monumento aos Heróis da Guerra Peninsular, Casa da Música, Casa Marta Ortigão Sampaio, Edifício Parnaso, Mercado do Bom Sucesso, escultura de Pedro Cabrita Reis, Jardim Botânico, Sinagoga do Porto, Igreja do Carvalhido, Cemitério de Agramonte, Casa da Prelada e o Caminho de Santiago, que passa aqui ao lado. A zona tem acessos facilitados a toda a cidade.  É um loca

neighborhood_overview: Na zona da Boavista tem acesso facilitado a transportes, restaurantes, supermercados, serviços, lojas variadas, museus e entretenimento.  A "baixa" da cidade localiza-se a 25 minutos a pé, a partir da estação de metro "Casa da Música" com três paragens de metro até à "Trindade"  (10 min) ou Bus 602 ( 15 min).  A zona é habitacional e por norma tranquila.  Confirmem a localização quando escolhem este espaço, terei todo o prazer em esclarecer qualquer dúvida.
transit: A "baixa" da cidade localiza-se a 25 minutos a pé, a partir da estação de metro "Casa da Música" com 3 paragens de metro até à "Trindade" (10 min de viagem) ou Bus 602 a 1 min do alojamento (15 min de viagem) para a Cordoaria. Acesso facilitado a todos os pontos da cidade, com vários interfaces de transportes e saídas da cidade, via VCI ou Circunvalação. O estacionamento na zona circundante é gratuito.  Os hóspedes que chegam de carro não devem deixar qualquer pertence no mesmo (mochilas, rádios) para evitar situações desagradáveis.
access: Acesso total
interaction: Podem enviar mensagem ou qualquer pedido de informação. Estou disponível para sugestões ou ajudar em qualquer situação.
house_rules: NA RESERVA, por favor, INFORMEM SOBRE O HORÁRIO aproximado de CHECK IN e CHECK OUT. Os hóspedes devem comunicar de forma clara o horário de entrada e saída. Em momentos de maior ocupação é provável que só possam fazer check-in depois das 14h30. LEIAM COM ATENÇÃO AS COMODIDADES. Fumar na varanda é permitido. Por favor deixem o espaço como o encontraram inicialmente (disposição dos móveis, paredes sem danos...) Silêncio depois das 22h00, pois é um edifício  RETIRAR O LIXO da casa, há um contentor geral e reciclagem em frente ao alojamento. Os hóspedes têm que fornecer ao anfitrião alguns dados pessoais (ID) Respeitem a minha casa e aproveitem a estadia.

name: Penthouse with stunning 600 sq ft roof terrace
summary: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
space: Beautiful views over Hollywood Park - balcony in the apartment as well as 600 sq ft roof terrace.  Contemporary but warm and stylish furnishings.  Roof terrace has dining area with barbecue and sitting area with sofas and armchairs.
description: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. Beautiful views over Hollywood Park - balcony in the apartment as well as 600 sq ft roof terrace.  Contemporary but warm and stylish furnishings.  Roof terrace has dining area with barbecue and sitting area with sofas and armchairs. You are welcome to use the whole space as your own when you are my guest. I am happy to give you dining tips in the neighborhood and always free to have a coffee. My corner of Sheung Wan combines the old and new in HK - lots of wonderful restaurants, cafes and bars.  Art galleries and antique shops, quirky clothing and designer shops too. Very easy to get taxis outside the flat and the no. 26 bus is right across the street.  5-10 minute to the MTR and a 15-20 minute walk into Central.

interaction: I am happy to give you dining tips in the neighborhood and always free to have a coffee.
house_rules: No smoking inside the flat as there is a balcony and roof terrace. No more than 2 guests. No loud music on the roof terrace after 11 pm as the police will attend. No parties.

Mon logement est parfait pour les couples, les voyageurs en solo, les voyageurs d'affaires et les familles (avec enfants). 10 min du centre-ville Easy access on your own thanks to a key in a lock box at the back. Arrive and leave at your best convenience Phone and email anytime Métro/Subway is easiest. There are a few bus lines that are close and convenient. Bixi (public bikes) are just around the block and are very easy to use during the summer. Taxi/Uber are very common as well

There is absolutely NO PARTYING allowed and NO OUTSIDE GUESTS permitted. Please do not download excessively; my contract is not an unlimited one. Check-in is at the earliest 5 pm.

name: Double/single room, bathroom & garage in Poblenou
summary: My house is a perfect, new and beautiful flat for staying some days in Barcelona. It’s 10 minutes walking to the beach, and 15 minutes walking to two shopping centers (Diagonal Mar/Glories), Agbar tower, Forum or CCIB. It’s well communicated with the rest of the city by tram (Fluvià station) bus (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) (in front of my home) or Metro (Selva de Mar). There is a Touristic Bus Stop near: 300m. And It is 10 minutes walk to one of the most typical streets for eating and drinking: Rambla Poblenou
space: The bedroom (double room or single) has a private bathroom only for guests. There is natural light in all flat and the bedroom has a window to the street. The floor is made of parket and it’s impeccable. In the room you have a closet for your belongings. There is an iron in the closet and towels for the beach. if you need any other item please let me know and I will try to bring it. I am always happy to help you make you feel comfortable. The private bathroom (will be only for you as I have my own) has a shower. There are fresh clean towels, shampoo, body gel as well as hairdryer. There is also a cabinet in the bathroom for you to store your toiletries.

transit: Very well connected. In front of may home (1 minutes walking): TRAM line 4 (T4 tramway Station Fluvià), Bus (number 7, B25 or 40 that take you straight to city center in 15 minutes, V27 that takes to the beach and night clubs) and Metro is 5 minutes walking (Selva de Mar, 15 minutes to the port and center ). There are also plenty of taxis all day and night long as there are so many hotels too in this area.  In your stay you can use my bicycles for visiting the city. I recommend visit the seaside promenade and Ciutadella Park with them. You can use them when you want. I will be happy for hosting you :)
access: There is a beautiful balcony where you can have your morning coffee, coffee with milk or tea that I do provide you on complimentary basis. We have available for you a parking spot in our garage in case you come by car or rent a car and its included in the room price already. In your room you will find the Wi-Fi password, Barcelona maps as well as  The flat has air conditioner for be comfortable in summer or heating in winter. The house has 2 rooms and I use the other one.
interaction: I respect the privacy of my guests and I am happy as well to interact as much as needed or to let them be independent as they might wish. I will always welcome you on arrival and explain you the facilities so that you are comfortable and well settled and same will apply on departure time. If your flight doesn’t fit the check in and out timings do not worry and do let me know as I can always help you further and be flexible in order to help you. While you are here you can always whatssapp me or use messenger if you have any questions on how to get around or simply for recommendation. I have printing facilities for your boarding pass or online purchases of your tickets for shows, etc so only let me know and I will happily print them for you!
house_rules: - No se aceptan fiestas o eventos - No se aceptan acompañantes sin aviso previo o pago de suplemento - Prohibido fumar en todo el piso

name: Rushcutters Getaway
summary: Spacious sun-filled 100m two bedroom apartment moments walk to Kings Cross, Potts Point, Paddington and Sydney CBD.  Reverse cycle air-conditioning & heating, secure underground parking, Intercom access, visitor parking and fibre to the building wi-fi. There are buses towards the City, Circular Quay, North Sydney, Chatswood and Bondi next to the apartment, there is also Kings Cross train station 6 minutes walk away. Perfect for couples, business travellers and families.

name: In the heart of Copacabana - Bolivar 4-5 guests
summary: Apartment in the heart of Copacabana. Close to the main restaurants and bars in the neighborhood. Close to the metro and a few meters from the beach. Photographs taken by Airbnb's own photographer, reflecting reality. Copacabana is a classic and central district, with easy access to great restaurants and services. The apartment is very nice and comfortable, and can receive families and groups.
space: Excellent location, residential building, cozy! Good neighborhood. Excellent price. The apartment has 1 bedroom and can accommodate 5 people.  The bedroom has a double bed and the living room has a sofa bed which can sleep two people. The other guest (fifth) could use the extra mattress, as needed.

neighborhood_overview: Copacabana, little Princess of the sea ... One of the most important neighborhoods in the history of the city. It has a vast network of services for tourists and visitors.  The neighborhood never sleeps.  Because it is a tourist neighborhood, policing is reinforced, and the transport network is optimized. There are many choices of restaurants, supermarkets, bakeries, and bars.  The beach has kiosks that work until dawn, as well as the bars with live music. The area that the apartment is located has 2 bakeries and 3 markets in a two-block radius. Ease of access to amazing.
transit: Near the Cantagalo subway station and bus stops, as well as taxi stands, on the street.
access: The apartment will be fully available to you.

house_rules: Sejam bem vindos  Por se tratar de um prédio residencial a síndica solicita dados dos hóspedes, é compreensível, assim é possível maior segurança para todos. Após a conclusão da reserva eu gostaria que você me enviasse seus dados e dos outros hóspedes que virão com você. Nome completo, estado de origem e número de identidade. --> Lembre-se o check in é após as 15h e o check out antes das 10h. Não é permitida a entrada de animais. Quando sair desligue o ar condicionado e os demais eletrônicos. Sei que o calor do Rio é forte, mas por favor tenha esse zelo. Por favor, não fume dentro do apartamento. Não faça barulho de 22h às 07h. Lembre-se da lei do silencio. Não faça festas, não incomode os vizinhos. Coloque saco nas lixeiras ao utiliza-las e lembre-se sempre de colocar o lixo na lixeira. Sejam bem vindos a Cidade Maravilhosa! :)

name: Chic City Pad with Leafy Outlook
summary: Recently renovated and truly spacious studio apartment in the heart of Potts Point. Within walking distance to some of Sydney's best attractions and an easy 8 min walk to Kings Cross Train Station. Beautifully renovated and appointed, you will have access to free Wi-Fi, the new kitchen with cooking facilities, washer & dryer and the building's stunning pool!  The space works for solo adventurers and business travellers, with the comfortable queen sized bed making it perfect for couples.
space: My studio apartment is beautifully renovated and spacious, with a super comfortable queen sized wall bed, making it perfect for a relaxing stay in Sydney. There is a full sized kitchen with cooking facilities, if you feel liked a home cooked meal and coin operated clothes washing and drying facilities on every floor of the building.  Access to the apartment is hassle free, through the gorgeous new entry foyer and up the newly refurbished lifts. The apartment has free wireless internet and a HD TV, with access to online movie rental services, if you feel like staying in. I know you will love the space and the city views from the large windows, as I have endeavoured to see to every detail, to make your trip and stay as comfortable and convenient as possible.

neighborhood_overview: Potts Point is one of Sydney's premier suburbs. Its tree lined streets, beautiful old apartment blocks and easy access to Sydney CBD, Royal Botanical Gardens, Woolloomooloo Wharf, Circular Quay and all of Sydney's best attractions, make it one the most desirable places to live and visit in Sydney. You'll love the local cafe and restaurant scene and the gorgeous boutique shopping that is literarily on your doorstep. A perfect place to base yourself for your stay in Sydney.
transit: Kings Cross Station is an 8 min walk straight down Macleay and Victoria Streets, where you can directly access all of Sydney and the Airport. Potts Point is a popular suburb close the CDB, so there is also a multitude of bus services on your doorstep and there is never a shortage of taxis.
access: You will have full access to all the facitilities of the apartment, such as kitchen, bathroom, laundry, wireless internet etc.  The building also features a swimming pool, which you are welcome to use at your leisure.
interaction: I will be available 24hrs each day during your stay, just phone or email me. I will also most likely be there to check you in and show you around the apartment when you arrive in Sydney.

name: Clarence House Apartment 1
summary: My place is fantastic for couples, solo adventurers and business travellers.
space: Clarence House Apartment in the heart of the stunning metro, showcasing the city's highlights (including the Harbour Bridge and the Sydney Opera House).  The unit is situated on Level 1 of Clarence house in Clarence Street  Other features are: Combined lounge & dining area with Air Conditioning An open plan kitchen  A fully appointed modern bathroom A double-sized bedroom with 1 x queen bed, plus built in robe  Lounge area 1 x double sofa bed  This is a vibrant and cosmopolitan area with plenty to do and see.  Attractions include: The Australian Museum: The Australian Art Gallery: Sydney Opera House: Botanical Gardens: Hyde Park: War Memorial: Sydney Fish Markets: The Rocks: Luna Park: Sydney Harbour and Harbour Islands: Bondi and Harbour Beaches: The Aquarium: Taronga Zoo: VMax and the Ferry to Many. Don’t forget the Sydney Festival and The Bridge Climb. Keen shoppers will enjoy a variety of shopping experiences from weekend markets to High End Designer Outlets. Bedding 1 x Queen bed

notes: Small convenience store right across from the building. All long weekends are a minimum 3 night stay, all public holidays are charged at the Weekend Tariff and Easter is a minimum 4 night stay. We have a one week minimum stay with any New Year's Eve booking.
transit: The apartment is a 5 minute walk to Wynyard railway station and then a 3 minute train ride to the city centre. There are also local buses, light rail, Taxi's & Uber available.
access: There are 1 set of keys available which are picked up via the lock box at the front door so those in your party can come and go easily during your stay. Ground level entry for easy access with suitcases, groceries etc and a lift to the 1st floor.
interaction: We won't be around to interact with you, however Joanne does live locally and is on hand if required. We will be available to help with check-in, check-out and any questions you have during your stay.

Deposit of 50% non-refundable is required to secure the booking. Payment of the rental deposit constitutes the clients acceptance of these Terms and Conditions. Balance of the rental amount must be received in full 28 days prior to occupancy. If not the owner has the right to cancel the booking and attempt to re let it.  Cancellation if caused by the client, money paid is not refundable unless the house is re-let for the entire period. If it a refund is made due to the property being re-let then a $100 cancellation fee will apply.  The owners will make every effort to ensure the property is available as booked. name: Contemporary Remodeled Ocean View Villa in Kapalua
summary: Experience the Kapalua  lifestyle by staying at our tropical, spacious and contemporary remodeled townhouse style villa. Our romantic retreat is situated in a quiet and well appointed cul de sac at the top of The Ridge at Kapalua. Enjoy imposing direct views of both the Pacific Ocean and the internationally famous Kapalua Bay golf course. Please note these nightly rates include the 14.4% hawaii tax.
space: What makes this condo unique from most of the condos in Kapalua and at the Ridge villas , is that this is a town house style corner unit situated on 2 floors , meaning living area , kitchen and then bedroom upstairs all share the breathtaking ocean views of Kapalua bay .

name: **YOUR ROOM IN OPORTO**
summary: A

Also, we are within a walking distance to two subway stations. space: Blue Escape is a large modern 2 storey home located in beautiful Freshwater on Sydney's northern beaches. Just a 5 minute drive to world famous Manly Beach and 3 mins to Freshwater or Curl Curl beaches. Walking distance to the charming Freshwater Village and around the corner is a lovely group of local shops  including a liquor store, coffee shop, chemist, newsagent etc. There is security off street parking for 2 cars and a fully enclosed child friendly yard with a sparkling inground pool with built in spa. name: Elegance and Peace in Potts Point
summary: My beautifully renovated Art Deco studio apartment is in the heart of Kings Cross, yet so peaceful and quiet. New bathroom and modern kitchen, in the Art Deco tradition, are stunning to be in. A Sleeping Duck queen bed which is absolutely fabulous, 4G unlimited wifi, high quality washer/dryer and dishwasher. Fully self contained!
space: Meticulously restored studio with attention to detail. Australian Blackbutt solid timber floors, classy and comfortable. One floor up from street level in a 1930's three story building with views of the harbour from the common area roof top. Totally self contained with all new appliances, Meile dishwasher and cooktop, and Bosch combo washer/dryer. Fully equipped kitchen. Sleeping Duck new queen bed. Tastefully renovated Art Deco bathroom with large shower/bath. Samsung smart TV and 4g high speed wifi with unlimited internet. It's simply beautiful! The space is dreamy to be in. I know you will love it!

neighborhood_overview: This spacious studio has good neighbours. When you walk out of the building there is a bright, tree lined cul de sac which leads you directly to the heart of everything great in Sydney! I adore this place! And the common area roof have clothes hanging space and a nice view of the surrounding buildings and the harbour.
notes: Sleeping here is divine, and the space is especially peaceful to be in. There are no views as it looks into the light well, but it is airy and quiet. There is roof access for hanging clothes if you wish with a view of Sydney harbour. I have a floor fan to move the air in general as well as a whisper quiet Hunter ceiling fan over the bed. Then in winter I have a small but toasty heater. It does not really get too cold or that hot.
transit: Super convenient location with level access to buses and the train only meters away. And of course the ever available taxi.
access: A safe, security building located only 100 steps level access from Kings Cross fountain. You have access to everything in the apartment. There is also a roof top laundry and drying area with a nice view of the Harbor. Woolworths grocery store is across the street with a bus stop to central station and the City in front. Minutes from Wilson Parking Station and 200 meters to the Kings Cross train station. Minutes to Harbourside parks ... Beare Park and Rushcutters Bay park to name a few.
interaction: Either I or my partner Don will meet you with the keys and show you the apartment and how to use the appliances. Please ask us any questions about the area and we are not far away if you need anything.
house_rules: Please enter and leave the building quietly. This is a non smoking home. Be respectful of my home with care and consideration. Please take your trash out to the bins in front of the building and leave my place as you found it!

name: Artsy 3BR in Plateau by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the modern architectural details, beautifully exposed brick walls, and stunning fully-equipped kitchen. Located in Le Plateau, known for its assortment of delicious restaurants and relaxed cafes.
space: Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay.
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the modern architectural details, beautifully exposed brick walls, and stunning fully-equipped kitchen. Located in Le Plateau, known for its assortment of delicious restaurants and relaxed cafes. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay. Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay. Le Plateau has plenty to offer within walking distance. Try out Icehouse or Big in Japan for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping head over to Le Centre Eaton de Montréal on Saint-Catherine St W. To discover the rest of the city just hop on the bus at Des Pins/Saint-Laurent station. For an authentic Montreal experience, skip downto
neighborhood_overview: Le Plateau has plenty to offer within walking distance. Try out Icehouse or Big in Japan for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping head over to Le Centre Eaton de Montréal on Saint-Catherine St W. To discover the rest of the city just hop on the bus at Des Pins/Saint-Laurent station. For an authentic Montreal experience, skip downtown and hang out with the locals in Le Plateau. Nestled at the foot of Mont Royal, Le Plateau is the epicenter of entertainment and culture in this diverse city. Day or night, the streets of Saint Denis, Mont Royal Ave, and Saint Laurent Boulevard come alive with residents and tourists alike. Eat your way through a variety of restaurants, and adventure through countless shops, cafés, and bars. Save some time to explore Saint Laurent Boulevard, where you'll find all sorts of unique urban art installations on every turn, thanks to the annual Montreal Mural Festival.
notes: This Sonder has seasonal air conditioning available from June 1st to September 30th. Air conditioning units are removed in the off-season. This Sonder is a 2nd floor walk-up with stair access only, and no elevator. This Sonder comes with an HDMI cord so that you can connect your laptop to the TV and log in to your personal streaming accounts, but it does not have cable.
transit: Drivers can find free and paid street parking nearby, but please be mindful of street signs.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

name: M&M Space MM2  Apartamento no centro da cidade
summary: O apartamento fica perto de arte e cultura e dos mais belos monumentos da cidade. Belos jardins e paisagens da cidade e do rio Douro ficam perto e podem ser apreciadas.  Existem restaurantes típicos e de comida internacional ao redor do apartamento.   O espaço fica numa rua típica da cidade, cheia da sua magia e magnetismo e é muito pratico e confortável. O espaço é excelente para quem pretende visitar e conhecer a zona histórica e turística do Porto. Transportes públicos ficam próximos.
space: Excelente apartamento, extremamente confortável e muito prático. Um espaço onde existem todas as comodidades necessárias para uma estadia deveras confortável.  Tem dois quartos para dormir com total privacidade. Um deles tem cama de casal e outro é uma sala de estar com sofá-cama que se converte numa excelente cama de casal. Tem as dependências com espaço suficiente para poder desfrutar de conforto e sossego. Tem incluído as roupas de cama, casa de banho e cozinha necessárias para a estadia.

neighborhood_overview: Excelente apartamento que está localizado numa das ruas mais antigas da cidade do Porto, cheia de magia e magnetismo típico da cidade. Apesar de estar no centro da cidade, o local do apartamento é muito calmo e sossegado. Ao redor existem vários tipos de mercados, quer de pequeno comércio local, quer grandes supermercados, onde se pode comprar tudo o necessário a preços acessíveis. Restaurantes, cafés,bares e diversas lojas comerciais encontram-se  ao redor do apartamento.
notes: Para as primeiras necessidades encontrarão disponível água mineral, café, chá, açúcar, rolo de cozinha, sal, detergente de loiça e roupa, papel higiénico, gel e shampoo. Não é acessível para hospedes com cadeiras de rodas. É necessário subir 2 pequenos lanços de escadas.
transit: O apartamento está localizado a cerca de 1 Minuto de uma estação de Metro, com acesso directo ao aeroporto Francisco Sá Carneiro. O acesso a qualquer outro ponto distante da cidade, ou de outras cidades do país é  muito facilitado. As grandes estações de comboios, S. Bento e Campanhã, por onde podem ir visitar outras cidades do Portugal, ficam a cerca de 500 Metros. Tem também acesso a transportes públicos de autocarro, na Estação rodoviária 24 de Agosto, a cerca de 150 metros do apartamento. Podem estacionar a viatura nas ruas circundantes do apartamento, mas tem que pagar taxa.  Pode também estacionar em parque publico/privadas a custo reduzido. O proprietário tem contratos com garagem publico/privada, onde os hospedes podem estacionar o carro, ao preço de € 7,00 por 24 horas.
access: É um espaço único. Os hospedes podem usufruir da casa por inteiro, tendo só o especial cuidado de não utilizar alguns artigos de stock da casa que não serão necessários para a sua estadia.
interaction: Será prestada ajuda aos hospedes, 24 horas por dia, desde que solicitada.
house_rules: - Devem respeitar o restantes hospedes a morar no prédio evitando barulhos excessivos. - Animais de estimação: Questionar o proprietário. Podem ser permitidos a um custo extra a acordar. e em casos excepcionais. Fumar: Podem fumar na varanda desde que cumpram as regras de segurança necessárias. - Ter cuidado com o manuseamento dos equipamentos existentes na casa. Dão-se informações se solicitado. - Levar o lixo utilizado para os contentores no exterior. São fornecidos sacos extra para o feito. - Ter uma boa estadia.

name: Habitación centro de Barcelona
summary: Mi piso está en el centro de Barcelona. Cerca del metro, las ramblas, los museos, el Portal del Ángel, Plaza Cataluña. Mi alojamiento es bueno para turistas, aventureros, y viajeros de negocios....y tiene ascensor.
description: Mi piso está en el centro de Barcelona. Cerca del metro, las ramblas, los museos, el Portal del Ángel, Plaza Cataluña. Mi alojamiento es bueno para turistas, aventureros, y viajeros de negocios....y tiene ascensor. Pueden usar la cocina y el baño. Estaré disponible para cualquier duda o problema que se os presente. Conozco muy bien la ciudad y os puedo recomendar sitios. El piso queda en el centro de Barcelona. Entre Plaza Cataluña y Plaza Universidad y entre los barrios Raval, Sant Antoni y Example. Es un barrio muy animado, en donde están los principales museos, restaurantes y vida nocturna de la ciudad. Está muy cerca de la línea roja, lila y verde del metro. También del tren de cercanías y las paradas de autobús al aeropuerto. Desde el piso se puede llegar a los principales puntos de la ciudad caminando. Es un edificio familiar y tranquilo. Por favor, respetad la tranquilidad de los vecinos.

name: Cute studio with Sydney Harbour Bridge views!
summary: This bright and airy studio apartment offers a fabulous balcony view of the iconic Sydney Harbour Bridge and is conveniently located near buses, trains and the ferry. Just one train stop to the city, or a 30 minute walk across the Harbour bridge. Restaurants, cafes, bars & grocery stores within 10 minutes walk. Apartment has fully equipped kitchen with fridge, microwave, gas stove & oven, dishwasher and espresso machine. Free wifi (ultra fast NBN) and complimentary tea & coffee.
space: Despite it's relatively small size, this studio has a bright and airy feel that makes you feel right at home. The balcony is equipped with table & chairs, so you can enjoy your breakfast or evening glass of wine with views of the Sydney Harbour Bridge.  You will have access to full kitchen facilities and desk space. The TV is also equipped with an Apple TV for complimentary Netflix & Stan - plus DVD player for a collection of near 200 movies to choose from.

You will have access to full kitchen facilities and desk space. The TV is also equipped with an Apple TV for complimentary Netflix & Stan - plus DVD player for a collection of near 200 movies to choose from. Guests have access to the entire apartment - Make your
neighborhood_overview: This studio is located only 10 minutes walk away from Kirribilli Village, a suburb that not only houses our Prime Minister but offers a variety of lovely cafes, patisseries, bars and spectacular waterfront harbour views.  From Kirribilli, you only need to walk 5 minutes further to visit Sydney Luna Park, or take a walk across the iconic Sydney Harbour Bridge, taking you to the city in just under 30 minutes.  Also 10 minutes walk away is North Sydney CBD, a bustling business district offering supermarkets, cafes, restaurants, shopping malls, hair dressers, gyms, dry-cleaners... as well as the dry-cleaner located right next door to the apartment itself!
notes: The great thing about my apartment is it's location, however being so close to the city means whisper quiet surrounds are not guaranteed. The road outside my apartment can get a little busy during peak periods such as the morning and evening commute. If you are particularly sensitive to noise, this is something you should consider when staying at mine. It can get very warm in Sydney during the summertime. Although I don't have full air-conditioning installed, I provide a portable air-conditioner for my summertime guests. For taller guests 6 foot and over, my bed might be a bit of a squeeze. For couples I recommend putting the taller person on the pulled-out section of the bed where at least there's no frame hindering the feet! ;)
transit: Getting around is ridiculously easy from my place. Walk 5 minutes down the road for North Sydney Ferry wharf, 7 minutes to Milsons Point Train station, 10 minutes to North Sydney train station and bus stands.    From Milsons Point station, it's only one stop to the city. Should you want to explore a little more of the Northern side of Sydney, the bus stop right outside the apartment complex will take you to the suburbs of Neutral Bay and Cremorne, home of Australia's most beautiful independent cinema The Hayden Orpheum Picture palace; built in 1932 and restored to its amazing former Art Deco glory... for all you movie buffs out there, it's definitely worth a visit!
access: Guests have access to the entire apartment - Make yourself at home! ^_^
interaction: Although you might not see me in person, I'll be available for any questions or issues via mobile or Airbnb message!
house_rules: Please use coasters for glasses, and use a tray or tea-towel if you're resting plates on any furniture that's not a table. If there's any spills, breakages or other accidents, please let me know as soon as possible - accidents do happen, but the sooner I'm notified the more likely we can come up with a fix ^_^ The only people who should be residing in my apartment are those listed as my guests on Airbnb - if you intend on having visitors please do me the courtesy of clearing it with me first.  Thanks! ^_^

name: Gorgeous Designer Decorated 2BR Loft
summary: Designing this apartment was a two-year passion project -- every object and piece of art has been carefully considered. The apartment features two stunning bedrooms, a large, open living space and a fully-equipped kitchen. Ideal for your family or friends. Located in prime Williamsburg, you'll enjoy top flight food, the best shopping, immaculate parks, nightlife and East River Park sunsets with Manhattan silhouette. We take great joy in hosting you and cannot wait to meet you.
space: Experience luxury living in the gorgeous 2 bedroom 2 story loft in vibrant, creative, modern Brooklyn. Surrounded by local artists and entrepreneurs, not only will you be able to enjoy the stunning art work in the apartment, but you will be able to truly immerse yourself in trendy, free-spirited Williamsburg. The apartment is very spacious and has a completely open layout. All of the appliances in the loft are brand new and very modern. The large kitchen, bar dining table that comfortably seats 6, and 2 couches in the living are all perfect for entertaining guests. The floor to ceiling windows allow for lots of natural light to flood the loft. The second story has 2 large bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. The first bedroom features a king sized bed, large windows from wall to wall, as well as access to the patio. There is a beautiful, green view from the patio, in addition to the seating area where you can sit and enjoy a quiet, peaceful morning. The second bedroom features a queen sized

neighborhood_overview: Williamsburg is the epicenter of the art world and New York creative energy. You can't walk a single block without seeing large, incredible murals on varying building walls and facades. It hosts frequent pop-up shopping, new restaurants, and events. Our loft is in the heart of Williamsburg - Dozens of restaurants, boutiques, coffee shops, and the like are found just blocks away.
transit: The apartment is located the following distances from these main attractions:  One World Trade Center - 3.6 miles / L to the E Trains Chelsea Market/Highline - 4.2 miles / L Trains Empire State Building - 3.9 miles/ L to the 6 or N, Q, R Trains Grand Central - 3.9 miles/ L to the 4 or 5 Train Rockefeller Center - 4.5 miles/ L to the N or Q, R,  F, M Trains Museum of Modern Art - 5.8 miles/ L to the E or F, M , N, Q , R Trains Central Park - 4.1 miles/ L to the C Trains American Museum of Natural History - 7.5 miles/ L to the 1 or C Trains Guggenheim/MET - 5.5 miles/ 6L to the 4 or 5, 6 Trains JFK  (John F. Kennedy Airport) is located outside of Manhattan and is around 1 hour car ride or 1 hour subway/train ride.  NWK (Newark Liberty International Airport) is located in New Jersey and is around a 1 hour car ride or 1 hour subway/train ride.  Laguardia Airport is located near Manhattan and is around a 30 minute car ride or 1 hour subway/train ride.
access: Guests are welcome to the apt and all its amenities: 120" theater projector, two porches, coffee, honor bar and high speed wifi-- everything but a downstairs closet where we store our personal belongings.
interaction: While Todd is out of town, the apartment is managed by Happy Host, a luxury AirBnB concierge service.  Happy Host will greet you on arrival, tour the apartment with you and provide local tips and event recommendations. Prior to arrival, Happy Host will ensure you’re provided fresh linens, a clean apartment and fully-stocked essentials. In the event of an emergency, Happy Host will respond 24/7.

neighborhood_overview: Surry Hills is a foodies haven - there are heaps of great coffee places and restaurants all within a short walk. Taxis to and from the airport take around 20-30 mins depending on traffic - an uber to the airport is usually the best way to go.

neighborhood_overview: The Area Located near Botany Bay, the area where Captain Cook initially landed when exploring Australia, Monterey neighbours Brighton Le-Sands (10 Min walk away) providing ample dining and entertainment options. There is a beach half a block away that stretches for kilometres on end, a perfect destination to relax and a great swimming beach for children as no strong waves. With a plethora of restaurants to choose from, you will never be bored from the variety of cuisine available.
notes: Please be aware that my son is only 7 so is not always quiet (we are up around 7am), we are out a lot through the week (working/school) but in the weekends/holidays we are home and in the daytime it can be a little noisy at times. Also I need the house to be reasonably quiet after he goes to bed (8pm).
transit: Public Transport Situated around the corner to the bus stop, whether you're heading to the CBD or local train station, Rockdale (bus 478), there are plenty of options to take when planning to visit the city or suburban Sydney. The train trip to the CBD takes around 25 minutes while a bus ride usually takes 45. Please feel free to get in touch if you have any questions. Looking forward to meeting you.
access: Bedroom, main bathroom, kitchen, dining room, balcony and laundry (baskets on top of laundry cupboard to put your dirty washing in, I will return it outside your bedroom door when dry).

house_rules: If using - please hide the key safe numbers for security. If you could keep the noise level to a minimum after my son goes to bed, closing the bedroom door when making phone calls, chatting or watching tv and closing hallway doors quietly (they are noisy doors and the handles need to be pushed all the way down to close quietly) that would be great. After 11pm please refrain from using the shower, running the bathroom taps for too long, loud phone calls or banging doors as I am a light sleeper and these do wake me. Turn off  bedroom/bathroom ceiling fan and lights when going out to conserve electricity. Keep kitchen tidy, dishes washed etc.I have recently had new wood floors in the apartment, please be aware they cannot get wet so if an accident happens please wipe up asap and ALL laundry/swim wear to be dried on the clothes lines outside. name: Fresh, Simple Sleep in Brooklyn!
summary: A budget traveler's DREAM! Queen bed, shared bathroom, subway access, and SEVEN YEAR/FIVE STAR Superhosts, all for a very reasonable price! Plus, 2 dogs to call your best friends for the duration of your stay :)
space: :) FIRST THINGS FIRST! :) Airbnb has a COMMUNITY VIBE. We invite strangers into our home and welcome you as family, while giving you the SPACE AND RESPECT you need on your vacation. As such, we have a few requests when inquiring so that you get a QUICK AND POSITIVE acceptance! 1. PROFILE: Have a PHOTO of YOU, along with a BIO to let us know a little bit about you! (Where you're from, what you do, etc.) Please, VERIFY YOUR ID! 2. TRAVEL: Tell us about your TRIP (travel plans TO NYC, duration, etc.) and any special requirements you may have. 3. AGREEMENT: Confirm you have READ THE TERMS of stay, POLICY on check-in and check-out, and the very few house rules. 4. GET HAPPY!: If we have the space and you've done #1,2,3, we WELCOME you gladly! Hosting people from the around the world is awesome and you've chosen the BEST VALUE anywhere! **** Our home is a BUDGET TRAVELER'S DREAM!! A peaceful oasis to crash at while you're out all day exploring the city. Easy subway access to Manhattan on two

Hosting people from the around the world
neighborhood_overview: About the NEIGHBORHOOD:::      The neighborhood is Flatbush, bordering Ditmas Park and Prospect-Lefferts Gardens. This is NOT hipster paradise, and it's NOT gangster's paradise either!  Our neighborhood is very residential and typically quieter than most urban cities. The summertime is louder on the block because very few people have air conditioning and enjoy hanging outside. The neighbors are friendly, so say hello as you pass! The ages of the neighborhood are very diverse (young children to elderly homeowners who have been here for 40 years). Flatbush has a lot of local charm and people with hearts of gold.  Jamaican food is plentiful (jerk chicken- yeah!); there is also a local donut shop nearby, Subway, Thai, sushi, pizza, and Indian food for delivery or a 5-15 minute walk to the restaurant, as well as many chain stores like Dominos, Dunkin' Donuts, IHOP, and Walgreens drug store. There is also a Planet Fitness (handy for Black-Card members!) Just a 10 minute walk down the road is
notes: **NOTE: Though our CHECK-IN and CHECK-OUT times are VERY FLEXIBLE, it is important to understand that many times, we have guests back to back.  CHECK IN: This means, if you are coming in on a red-eye flight and are arriving early in the morning, the previous guest may still be occupying the room until after we have both left for work meetings. As we work and are not a full-time business (just a couple renting out a room to meet awesome travelers), we may not be able to change the sheets and thoroughly clean the room until later in the evening, sometimes as late as 7pm. You are welcome to drop your bags at any time on Check in Day! This is usually no issue 90% of the time. CHECK OUT: Additionally, because of time constraints, we may ask  that you be packed up and OUT of the apartment on the morning of your checkout. You are always welcome to leave your bags, especially for those guests who have late evening flights (Who wants, or COULD, drag all that gear around?!). Thank you so much in
transit: We are located three blocks from the 2,5 trains at Church Avenue. We are also a 5 minute walk from the SBS 44 bus to Crown Heights, Bed-Stuy, Clinton Hill, Fort Greene, and Williamsburg. We are near B35 bus, which takes you across Church Avenue. The B,Q trains (south to the beach, north to Manhattan) are a mile (20 minute) walk away.
access: Use of the... -SHARED bathroom with tub and detachable shower-head -parlor/living room -kitchen to eat in and cook (we must show you how to use the stove and toaster oven) -occasional use of clothes washer and dryer  (once we give a briefing on the appliances)
interaction: WE LIVE HERE so we are usually home in the evenings.  Zach mostly works from home in the day, so he is available if guests are in need of anything, but mostly keeps quiet to himself on his laptop or in his basement studio. Christa works out of the home and is usually available via text messaging on What's Ap or iMessage for iPhone.
house_rules: - Most importantly to us, please take your shoes off before entering the apartment. - This is a non-smoking property. All smoking must be done at the curb due to asthma and allergies.  - Absolutely NO GUESTS who have not been previously approved through Airbnb reservation or in person. Please do not bring anyone into the house. - AIR CONDITIONING: This window unit costs a large amount of money for us to run, so we want to make sure we can afford to keep providing it. The room is rather small and well insulated, and cools down within 7 minutes of turning it on. ...Please, do not raise the level over 4. It should be cool in your room, not frigid, which would likely be about $10/day to run it (yikes).  ...There is no energy saver mode, so please remember to turn it OFF when you leave. ...Please keep your door closed at all times when the unit is in use. - Be courteous to other guests staying: leave the bathroom as you found it by cleaning up hair and any spills.
