neighborhood_overview: L'arrondissement est le cœur même de la métropole et l'un des secteurs les plus vibrants de celle-ci. On y trouve des églises, des gratte-ciel, des centres commerciaux, des commerces sur la rue Sainte-Catherine, ainsi que des restaurants et des cafés.
transit: Depuis l'aéroport, prendre le bus 747, puis le métro ligne verte jusque la station "Papineau". Taxi - il y a des aires de taxis un peu partout et à la sortie de l'aéroport. C'est bien indiqué. Depuis la gare routière, prendre le métro ligne verte, jusque la station "Papineau". En voiture, arrivée facile par le pont Jacques Cartier ou l'autoroute Ville-Marie. Stationnement gratuit sur une partie de la rue. From the airport, take the 747 bus, and metro, green line, get off at "Papineau" station. From the main bus station, by metro, take the green line and get off at "Papineau" station. By car, easy arrival by the "Ville Marie" highway or the "Jacques Cartier" bridge. Free parking on part of our street.
access: Accès à la chambre, à la salle de bain, à la salle à dîner, à la cuisine et au balcon. Possibilité d'utiliser la cuisine et les ustensiles, Tv avec les canaux localt et netflix. Pas de souliers dans la chambre, les garder sur le tapis à l'entrée.

name: Casa charmosa em Vargem Grande natureza e paz!
summary: Vargem Grande fica localizada na zona oeste do Rio de Janeiro à apenas alguns minutos do Rio Centro, Cidade do Rock, Arena HSBC e Instalações das Olimpíadas de 2016. É um bairro com esplêndida paisagem natural e vida ao ar livre. Perto das praias mais nativas do Rio de Janeiro, é reconhecida por suas trilhas, cachoeiras, passeios a cavalo, esportes e aventura. Famosa também por seu centro gastronômico com diversas opções de restaurantes.
space: A casa é geminada e fica em condomínio com boa estrutura – piscina, quadra, parquinho, sala de ginástica, churrasqueira, etc. Muito aconchegante e charmosa, tem sala, lavabo, cozinha e área de serviço no térreo. No piso superior, banheiro, 2 quartos com ar condicionado e frigobar (no quarto principal). Os preços são para 2 pessoas podendo adaptar para até 04 pessoas. Conta também com fogão, geladeira, micro-ondas, utensílios de cozinha, roupa de cama e banho, TV a cabo, wi fi e TV de tela plana 32".

neighborhood_overview: Praias: - Praia da Macumba: Excelente para a prática do surf. É possível subir no Pontal durante a maré baixa, em um caminho formado na areia, o esforço é compensado pela linda vista. Seu entorno conta com boa infra-estrutura de atendimento aos freqüentadores, com quiosques. Na sua orla há um calçadão bem arborizado junto com uma ciclovia. - Prainha: É um santuário ainda preservado, conta com pouca infra-estrutura com apenas com dois quiosques e um estacionamento. Tem aproximadamente 150 metros de extensão, areias claras, e águas cristalinas próprias para o banho. É conhecida também como paraíso para os surfistas. Cercada por morros cobertos por Mata Atlântica , tem um manancial de água doce e está localizada em área da Proteção Ambiental. - Grumari: Mantém seu aspecto agreste com muito verde e águas (Website hidden by Airbnb) acesso feito de carro, tem aproximadamente 4 km de extensão e é com toda a certeza, uma das mais belas praias do Rio de Janeiro. A paisagem é formada por morros
transit: Como Chegar / Ônibus para Vargem Grande RJ e Vargem Pequena RJ: 810 A – Curicica / Pontal ( Integração ao BRT na estação Praça do Bandolim (Transcarioca) 809 A – Curicica / Recreio via Vargem Grande ( Integração ao BRT na estação Praça do Bandolim (Transcarioca) 827 – Recreio / Vargem Grande (Benvindo de Novais/ Gláucio Gil) 817 – Recreio / Vargem Grande (Gláucio Gil / Rio Morto) – Não passa em Vargem Pequena Integrada 9 – Piabas / Rio Sul (Via Av. das Américas / Av. neighborhood_overview: Harlem is a diverse residential neighborhood in upper Manhattan that is home to the famous Apollo Theatre, Red Rooster restaurant, numerous green spaces and gospel churches. Our house is located in a leafy, hilly, and quiet part of the city.
notes: There are several nice coffee shops around the corner and many good restaurants within walking distance.
transit: 145th St subway station is 3 minutes walk away, giving you access to the A and D express lines (takes you downtown in 10-15 mins) and the local B and C lines that stop at all the local stops down Central Park West. There is also free street parking.
access: You will have the entire bottom two floors of the house and the back yard through your own private entrance. Note that you go down stairs to get into the apartment and there are stairs within the apartment. Therefore, the apartment may not be suitable for elderly or disabled people.
interaction: We live on the top two floors of the house so will be available should you need anything.
house_rules: Shoes off in the house. No smoking in the house (you will forfeit your deposit if you do). No parties. No noise outside after dark. No guests other than those listed in the booking.

neighborhood_overview: There's plenty to offer within walking distance. Try Bouillon Bilk or Restaurant Boustan for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping, head to Rue St. Catherine and take a stroll along the storefronts. To explore the rest of the city, head to the Saint Laurent metro station.  Quartier des Spectacles was designed as a center for Montreal's cultural events and festivals, with world-class entertainment taking place year-round in Place des Arts. The area is a great starting point to explore the city. It’s within walking distance of Chinatown, the Old Port, the Plateau, Downtown, the Village, and metro lines.
notes: This Sonder comes with an HDMI cord so that you can connect your laptop to the TV and log in to your personal streaming accounts, but it does not have cable.
transit: Drivers can find free and paid parking options nearby, but please be mindful of street signs.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

Source: Wikipédia Depuis les années 1980, le Mile End est connu comme un quartier à vocation largement artistique, peuplé par des artistes, des musiciens, des écrivains et des cinéastes. On y retrouve de nombreuses galeries d'art, des ateliers de designers, des boutiques et des cafés. L'entreprise de logi
neighborhood_overview: Source: Wikipédia Depuis les années 1980, le Mile End est connu comme un quartier à vocation largement artistique, peuplé par des artistes, des musiciens, des écrivains et des cinéastes. On y retrouve de nombreuses galeries d'art, des ateliers de designers, des boutiques et des cafés. L'entreprise de logiciels d'infographie 3D Discreet Logic a marqué le quartier en rénovant un étage d'une ancienne usine de textiles au début des années 1990. En 1997, cet espace devient les nouveaux studios montréalais du développeur de jeux vidéo Ubisoft, agrandis par la suite pour occuper la majeure partie de l'immeuble. Le Mile End est nettement plus fortuné et plus populaire depuis le milieu des années 1990 : l'augmentation des loyers et l'apparition de nouvelles boutiques haut de gamme en témoignent. Récemment, le Mile End fut considéré par plusieurs magazines musicaux spécialisés, notamment Spin et Pitchfork, comme le cœur de la scène musicale indépendante de Montréal. Plusieurs salles de spectacle
notes: Il est possible de fumer sur le balcon. You can smoke on the balcony
transit: De l'aéroport/ From Dorval airport  1) STM: Autobus vers la Station de métro Lionel Groulx : 10$. Comprend une passe de 24h pour l'accès à l'ensemble du réseau. Bus to Lionel Groulx metro Station : 10$. Good for 24h on the STM transport network. 2) VIA RAIL : Train vers la station Bonaventure : 14$. Train to Bonaventure Metro : 14$. J'habite près du métro Outremont.
access: Accès à la cuisine (four grille-pain et frigo) et à la salle de bain. Pour les réservations plus longues, possibilité d'augmenter l'accès pour plus de confort. Thé et café sur demande. Access to kitchen (toaster oven and fridge) and bathroom. For longer trips, we can arrange other access for your confort. Coffee and tea available.
house_rules: Le logement est non-fumeur, mais il est possible de fumer sur le balcon. Je permets d'utiliser la cuisine. Vous pouvez utiliser le four grille-pain seulement. Si vous désirez garder des aliments au frigo, vous êtes les bienvenus, je vous ferai un espace désigné. Il y a des épiceries tout près et un dépanneur au coin de la rue. SVP nettoyez votre vaisselle. Ne pas laisser de la nourriture et de la vaisselle sale dans la chambre. Lorsque vous quittez, apportez votre nourriture avec vous. Du thé et du café sont disponibles sur place, vous pouvez en prendre. Je fournis le savon et le nécessaire de toilette. Le bain est grand et il est possible de prendre un bain ou une douche. Vous pouvez connecter votre portable, votre chargeur, un réveil et le nécessaire de toilette (fer, séchoir) sur mon réseau électrique. Aucun appareil électrique énergivore ou bruyant ne sera toléré.  Je désire louer la chambre à des personnes qui ont majoritairement des occupations à l'extérieur, le jour. Mon logemen

name: Sea Sight Apartment Vila Chã/ Mindelo
summary: Apartamento novo, muito bem situado a 30 metros da praia de Vila Chã. Quartos espaçosos com belas camas. tem uma varanda muita larga , com a vista maravilhosa para o mar. Pode tomar lá as suas refeições e banhos do belo sol de Portugal, que os irá revigorar para todo o ano Sala muito acolhedora com TV, Cozinha bem apetrechada. Bela Casa de banho com ótimas condições  Garagem privada para 1 carro. Belo espaço verde ,possui grelhador, para cozinhar peixe fresco da nossa bela costa marítima
space: Apartamento muito bem situado a 30 metros da praia. Quartos espaçosos com belas camas. tem uma varanda muita larga , com a vista maravilhosa para o mar, onde poderá tomar as suas refeições e apanhar os seus banhos do sol maravilhoso de Portugal, , que o irão revigorar para todo o ano.  Sala muito acolhedora com sofás, TV e Wi-Fi grátis.  Cozinha bem apetrechada com Fogão, Micro ondas, Torradeira e Máquina de café Nespresso ( Devem trazer as cápsulas). neighborhood_overview: Vila Chã é uma pitoresca terra piscatória, com gente simpática e afável.Possui um passadiço junto ao mar, com Kms de comprimento para fazer as suas caminhadas ou andar de bicicleta.  Inúmeras praias com extensos areais de areia fina e branca. O mar com uma tonalidade tão bonito, como as pinturas de Monet ou Van Gogh, Vila Chã tem vários restaurantes , onde pode apreciar o maravilhoso peixe do nosso mar. Tem supermercados e cafés. Terá umas férias com muito descanso. Grande extensão de costa marítima com bares e restaurantes onde poderá degustar o nosso peixe fresquíssimo. Se preferir animação tem a maravilhosa cidade do Porto ( a sul), a Póvoa de Varzim( a norte) a escassos Quilómetros, com Casino e vários locais de diversão.
notes: Não devem adormecer ao sol , pode causar queimaduras. Use sempre protector. Não devem tomar banho após as belas refeições. Agradeço que tratem com carinho o Apartamento
transit: Tem ( a poucos Quilómetros ) o Metro que vem e vai  Aeroporto , pode sair ou entrar  na Estação de Modivas ou Mindelo .
access: A casa está práticamente toda  disponível. Quartos, casa de banho, sala , Cozinha, varanda, Jardim e um lugar de garagem
interaction: Basta um telefonema para comunicar-me algum problema que possa surgir Agradeço que nos indiquem a hora prevista da chegada para estarmos à vossa espera para vos receber Caso tenham alguma dificuldade com a localização do apartamento, por favor,  digam e peçam informação
house_rules: A proibição de fumar é dentro da habitação. Poderá fazê-lo na varanda.

name: Bright and comfortable 1 bedroom apartment
summary: This lovely 1 bedroom is perfect for a couple or even a family of 1 or 2 children since it has an additional sofa bed in the living room, even though it is specially thought for a couple. The living room offers plenty of space and is very bright, directly communicating with the american type kitchen and its double bedroom.  The location is perfect to move around the city, having the metro station Diagonal around the corner and La Pedrera and Batllo on a parallel street.
space: The city tax 2,48€ per person per day is not included (children under 17 years old are not paying this tax). An extra charge of 20 euros will have to be paid in cash upon arrival for check-ins after 21:00. Arrivals after 23:00h, will have an extra charge of 40€ and arrivals after 01:00 will have a charge of  50€.

neighborhood_overview: The location is perfect to make the most of your time in Barcelona. Metro station Diagonal is around the corner, La Pedrera in Passeig de Gracia is only one street away and Plaça de Catalunya is a short 15 minutes walk. You’ve got a wide variety of restaurants, coffee shops and stores within the surrounding streets.
notes: We do have a strong policy of no parties in the apartment. We want everyone to have a great time in our beautiful and sunny Barcelona, but we are also be mindful about everyone's rest.  We welcome, families, couples and friends and take pride in making everyone feel like at home. This is why we ask everyone to treat our apartments like their own
transit: Metro station Diagonal is only few steps from the apartment. There you will be able to take the green and blue line, easily connecting with Sagrada Familia, Plaça de Catalunya o La Rambla.  Train station Passeig de Gracia, is 3 streets away and Plaça de Catalunya is just a 10/15 minute walk.
access: The apartment is fully equipped with all the necessary appliances and amenities. From towels, bed linen, to complimentary shampoo and shower gel, fridge, cutlery, pots and pans. Dishwasher, washing machine/dryer combo are also in the apartment. Do not miss the opportunity to try our delicious breakfast!  Find here the different options we have:  All you can Eat Buffet 20€ The most typical and delicatessen food from the Mediterranean area. A wide variety of fruits, cakes, pastries, cold meat, juices, salads, omelettes, pancakes, nuts and more. Omelette Menu 14€ Delicious, soft and tasty, the omelette is a typical dish. The Spanish one, with potatoes and onions is the most traditional, but you can customize your own Omelette with an in nite options. As well, you will enjoy of our sweet table and drinks. Pancake Menu 12€ As many pancakes as you desire. With chocolate, yogurt, cream, nuts, coconut, red berries and more. Vegetarian and vegan options available upon request. BREAKFAST TIME: F
interaction: Our reception is open from 8am to 21pm. The apartment will be guaranteed by 3pm, but if you arrive earlier we can store your luggage so you can start exploring our beautiful city!

name: 2BR, Walk to the Beach, 2 Lanais, Stunning Views!
summary: Come visit beautiful Kihei! We're located at the Maui Sunset, close to family-friendly activities, public transport, and Kihei nightlife. You’ll love the complex amenities, renovated kitchen, walking distance beach access and the open, airy and light decor. This 4th floor condo has 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (both with showers, no bath), wifi, and 2 lanais that are perfect for watching sunsets and sunrises. Great place for couples, friends who want a home away from home, and families (with kids).
space: Our condo is located at the Maui Sunset in Kihei which is the sunny side of Maui. It's on the 4th floor facing the central garden and ocean. It has amazing sunset views from the lanai off the living space, as well as bonus sunrise views from the master suite! Only 8 units in the entire complex have a front and back lanai for these views! Our condo has two bedrooms, two bathrooms (both recently remodeled and both have tiled showers, no baths), a large living room, dining area, fully accessorized kitchen and front and back lanai with views of the garden, ocean (front) and Mountain (back) , perfect for watching sunsets. The master bedroom has a queen size bed. The second bedroom has two twin beds. And the living room has a pull-out sofa. There's a washer and dryer in the kitchen, appliances, dishes, towels, flat screen TVs and DVD players in each bedroom plus the living room, etc.  Our condo is located in a great part of the complex with two lanais, giving a view of the garden and ocean f

Great place for couples, friends who want a home away from home, and families (with kids). Our condo is located at the Maui Sunset in Kihei which is the sunny side of Maui. It's on the 4th floor facing the central garden and ocean. It has amazing sunset views from the lanai off the living space, as well as bonus sunrise views from the master suite! Only 8 units in the entire complex have a front and back lanai for these views! Our condo has two bedrooms, two bathrooms (both recently remodeled and both have tiled showers, no baths), a large living room, dining area, fully accessorized k
neighborhood_overview: We are close to shops, restaurants, Lahaina, highway access and excellent beaches.
notes: The beach in front of the Maui Sunset is great for walking and for enjoying sunsets. This part of the ocean is great for kite and windsurfing. It has a shallower beach and is not necessarily the best for sandcastles and long extended play times. The Kama’ole beaches are a very popular set of beaches for locals and visitors. (less then one mile away) Beautiful, long, 1.5 mile sandy beaches with incredible views of Molokini, Kaho’olawe and Lana’i islands. Kam III has one of the most regular South Maui shorebreaks for boogie-boarding. Snorkeling opportunities are plentiful. Full facilities and family friendly.
transit: There is a large parking lot at the Maui Sunset.
access: You will have access to the condo, parking spaces in the lot, as well as the shared pool, lawns, tennis courts, shuffle board courts, BBQs and beach.
interaction: Your keys will be waiting at the main office when you arrive. Check in time is 3pm, check out time is 11am. Our local property managers are available for any concerns that come up during your stay. I am available via AirBnb messenger at all times.
house_rules: - Check-in is after 3PM -Check-out is by 11am - Follow property rules - Quiet hours from 10PM (when pool closes) to 8AM - Do not remove bedding or supplies from unit

name: Modern NYC Studio Apartment Near Central Park!
summary: This apartment features a fully equipped kitchen and a spacious floor plan.  Residents can enjoy an array of fabulous onsite amenities that this community has to offer. Symphony House is located in a very desirable neighborhood just one block from Carnegie Hall, two blocks from Columbus Circle, three blocks from Central Park and close to many theme restaurants along 57th Street, as well as not too far from Times Square and the Theater District.
space: Thanks to its proximity to some of the world’s leading cultural destinations, this building is one of the most desirable residences in Manhattan. Guests can spend the day perusing the high-end Shops at Columbus Circle, and then enjoy an evening performance at the world-famous Lincoln Center, Carnegie Hall, or one of the many venues in the Theatre District. Each beautifully furnished apartment includes spacious walk-in closets, marble bathrooms, and a fully equipped kitchen with granite countertops. The building has numerous amenities for its guests to enjoy, including a playroom for children, private fitness center, indoor swimming pool, outdoor jogging track, and sundeck.

The best of New York City’s restaurants and shopping are at your door. Major Attractions •	Restaurants – McGee’s (.1 mi), Marea (.2 mi), Per Se (.2 mi) •	Whole Foods (.2 mi) for groceries  •	Carnegie Hall – .2 mi •	Theatre District – .5 mi  •	Columbus Circle – .2 mi •	Grand Central Station  – 1.1 mi •	Yankee Stadium – 9.7 mi •	Madison Square Garden – 1.2 mi •	Museum of Natural History – 1.3 mi •	Metropolitan Museum of Art – 1.7 mi •	Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts – .5 mi •	Times Square – .5 mi •	Rockefeller Center – .6 mi •	Empire State Building – 1.5 mi •	Central Park – .5 mi

A cute, old "Montreal-style" gem in the middle of it all!

transit: South Metro trains near me are the N,F,Q,D which travel in and out of Brooklyn to Manhattan and Queens. Also Express Bus X28 and X38 are available few blocks from The Parachute Loft also travel to Manhattan. There are many ways to get to the Metro train station on Stillwell Avenue. It is the closest and last stop on the N,F,Q,D train lines.  One can get from Stillwell Station to the Loft, by making a straight walk on Mermaid Ave or Surf Ave or the Boardwalk. It is about a 10 to 15 min walk. The Boardwalk is the best to stroll through from the station to the Loft. This walk is about 20 min, since the Boardwalk is a little curved. Yet, another way getting around can be by taking the Green Taxis.  They can be seen lined up in front of the Train Station on Mermaid Avenue and are only 2 dollars per person to the Loft.  In addition, using a metro card can be purchased and used for public bus #74 or #36 they come with a free transfer from train to bus or bus to train.  Also bus to bus free tr

If you need an early check-in but can't wait till 24 hrs before your booking commences to find out if this is possible, we recommend booking for an additional night prior to arrival so you can check in at your leisure on the day you arrive. name: Spacious Room/Private entry and Great Views
summary: Beautiful, clean and fresh private room in the heart of the Kona Coffee Farmlands.  Our property is great for couples, solo adventurers, and small families. Room has one large King Bed, another room can be made available with two single beds and 3/4 Bath.    Great views of the ocean and the mountain.  Four wheel drive, all wheel drive or higher clearance vehicle is required.  I do have a great Jeep for rent too, let me know if you're interested...
space: A small fridge and coffee pot is in the room.  There is a shared fully stocked kitchen and BBQ are available for your use during your entire stay. A Private back lanai and yard for your enjoyment. Their is also a wonderful shared large front Lanai and yard.

Their is also a wonderful shared large front Lanai and yard. Shared Kitchen  BBQ Private Full room  Private Full Bath Private back lanai and yard. great for yoga, mediation and relaxing. Beautiful private suite. Additional private bedroom with half bath available. Will accommodate one additional guest or two children for minimal cost. Shared Front y
neighborhood_overview: Captain Cook is a small, quaint area.  Two hours to Volcano National Park, 15 miles to Kona, 20 minutes to the shore line, and other great restaurants, shopping and beaches are all within minutes.
notes: You MUST rent a vehicle with high clearance, All-Wheel Drive or four wheel drive.  Our road is private, steep and not completely paved.  It is not 'challenging' though. You will find many areas of the Island require high clearance or four wheel to have the ultimate experience.  A lot great dining close by, grocery store within a mile, hiking, snorkeling, beaches, swimming and more, all close by! The State of Hawaii requires us to collect taxes. There isn't a great way to do this on Airbnb site. It is a total tax of (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) % (4% GET, 9.25% Accommodation). We can add this via a 'special offer' when booking or you can (Hidden by Airbnb) or check upon arrival.  Our License number is TA (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  While not all hosts are doing this, we want to support Hawaii and be a legal business, keep our prices as low as possible and also want you to know where your money is going.
transit: There is an Island bus to accommodate travelers if needed.  Although slow, the bus does go around the entire Island. A good 4x4 vehicle for the Island is really my recommendation though.
access: Shared Kitchen  BBQ Private Full room  Private Full Bath Private back lanai and yard. great for yoga, mediation and relaxing. Beautiful private suite. Additional private bedroom with half bath available. Will accommodate one additional guest or two children for minimal cost. Shared Front yard and lanai for sunsets and relaxation. Shared Washer and Dryer
interaction: We are available for questions, guidance and whatever else may arise.  I can be as involved or not as you like. The Big Island is a magical place and we want you to experience as much of the Island as possible while here.
house_rules: - Smoking outside is ok - Pets may be considered, inquire - Thera are small stairs to room and kitchen

Download UBER & Lyft for easily accessed rides around the city. Green Taxis can be hailed on the streets in Brooklyn and will take you anywhere in the city. Yellow Taxis can be hailed on the streets in Manhattan and will take you anywhere in the city.

TV with Chromecast and Roku box in your room as well as in the living room.  We are 2 blocks from the F/G @ Church Ave and Foodtown Supermarket Hardwood Floors - well heated in the Winter & air-conditioned in the Summer. We have AC's in the kitchen, living room and your room. Towels, hair dryer, iron and a new pair of slippers will be in your room upon arrival. We wash all pillow cases, bed sheets, towels and blankets between EVERY reservation.  Pets must be fully housebroken, licensed and fully up to date on immunizations. Pets MUST be approved before booking.
interaction: Guest/Host interaction is mainly up to you. Though we are around, we tend to have minimal interaction unless you have questions. We're happy to help with directions, recommendations and whatever else you may need during your stay.  We will always try our best to be here to greet you. When we are not, we will provide you with detailed instructions to enter the house and a list of great tips to make your stay the best it can be. We are always available by phone or email. Please be assured you can contact us anytime for any reason and we will respond and do our best to make your stay as comfortable as possible.

There is NO SMOKING anywhere inside the building. - NO DAILY MAID SERVICE - Daily maid service is not included in the rental rate however is available at an additional cost. - Please note: This is our home. Please be mindful of shared spaces. The apartment will be cleaned before your arrival. We expect guests to clean up all shared spaces after use. This includes washing dishes or placing them in the dish washer, disposing of garbage, tidying up dining table after eating and removing hair from shower drain. - Pets are not permitted in the apartment without prior approval. NO EXCEPTIONS. - INCLUSIVE FEES - Amenity fees are included in the rental rate. neighborhood_overview: Located in Manhattan, just north of Morningside Heights and southwest of Harlem with a variety of restaurants, bars, convenient stores and is located within walking distance. The neighborhood is safe, friendly and lively. The neighborhood is filled with Columbia students.  The apartment is centrally located between 2 subway lines which makes getting nearly anywhere in Manhattan easy. In addition, there's an app that allows you to travel to anywhere within Manhattan and certain areas in Brooklyn and Queens for just $6. Ask me for more information.
notes: Laundry: There's no laundry in the unit, but there's a free pick up/drop off (usually takes 1 day to wash, dry & fold) laundromat just two blocks away. It costs $1.25/pound. I can give you the contact if you need.
transit: • 7 min. walk no. 1,2,3 (Red) Train line/ A,C,D,E (Blue) Train line • 2 stops, or 17 mins walk to Central Park! • 5 minutes walk to Riverside Park • 3 minutes walk to Manhattan School of Music • 5 mins walk to Columbia University • 3 stops express train (C/D train; 20-30 min) to Times Square Subway Train: The apartment is on West 123 street between Broadway and Amsterdam. It is centrally located between 2 subway lines which makes getting nearly anywhere in Manhattan easy. The two station names are "125th Street”, which are both 7-8 minutes away from the apartment. Please refer to the map that I uploaded in the photo album.  Parking:  There are street parkings just beneath the apartment. Please refer to the street signs on NYC daily street cleaning.  In addition, apart from Uber, there's an app that allows you to travel to anywhere within Manhattan for $6 that I usually use. Please ask me for more information!

interaction: I am originally from Hong Kong. I'm a pre-medical student at Columbia and working part-time at two hospitals as a medical interpreter and research assistant. I am a friendly, reliable host and am always available to answer questions and offer advice on anything.

name: Spacious Sunny Bedroom near JMZ Subways
summary: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. This brand-new renovated space has all the comforts of home with 2 full (shared) bathrooms, lockable private room, fully-stocked kitchen, and is only a 15 minute subway ride to downtown Manhattan
space: Welcome to Brooklyn! For rent is a lovely and private bedroom in the second floor of a recently renovated townhouse. You will have access to two full bathrooms, wifi throughout, and use of the stainless steel kitchen.  The bed is brand-new and is a memory foam Queen bed; super comfortable! The room also contains a small dresser, lamp, and plenty of closet space. The house is located a 3 minute walk to the Myrtle Ave stop on the J/M lines which will whisk you to Manhattan in 3 stops. It gets great sunlight and is on a quiet street.  Nearby are many shops, delis, restaurants, and transportation. It is a very hot, up-and-coming area of Brooklyn, so more artsy and creative types are moving in everyday. This apartment has been renovated from top to bottom and it is practically brand-new.  My calendar is always up-to-date. Contact me to get a reservation started. I hope you enjoy your stay in NYC!

neighborhood_overview: So many cute shops and delis nearby. Coffee house down the block. Great juice and deli place near the subway. And Williamsburg, with all its awesome restaurants and bars, is just a short bus ride or walk away, about one mile west -- can't beat the location!
transit: I am as close to the subway as you can get, without the awful subway noise. The J train runs express during rush hour, and the M will take you straight to midtown / near Times Square / Union Square. If you want to visit Williamsburg, we're just a short Uber ride away (about $8). In warmer months, we also have CitiBike stations nearby so you can easily bike there or even into Manhattan via the Williamsburg Bridge.
access: This apartment is a 4-bedroom, 2 full bathroom space. The other 3 bedrooms are rented out to international young professionals and students, some here for several months at a time. They are all very respectful and quiet people. We have a lovely backyard space with lots of seating and string lights. There's also a washer and dryer in the basement (coin operated). We have a cleaner come 2-3x per week to clean the common areas (kitchen, bathrooms, and living room) to ensure a clean space. However, we do ask everyone to clean up after themselves and leave the space as they found it, as it is a shared space.
interaction: I prefer to be a hands-off host but am always available if you need anything. Happy to provide any recommendations nearby. I live on the floor downstairs from this apartment and often hang out in the large backyard area, which you're also more than welcome to use!

name: Room in penthouse with 2 terraces
space: Hi chic@s, I rent a spare room of approx. 10m2 with own access to a large terrace with an outdoor shower. It has a single bed, a desk, a large and a small shelf and wardrobe with 2 doors. The flat is a very sunny penthouse with 2 terraces and access to the roof top terrace and its spectacular views. Fully furnished and equipped it has ADSL wifi, air conditioning, heating, cleaning service 2 times a week!! :) It is just 2 minutes away from the metro station Parallel, green and purple lines, as well as a few meteres away from Bicing and Montjuic. To Las Ramblas it takes just 10 minutes walking. There is a lift and community services. I am German-Italian of 30 years, living in Barcelona for several years. Apart from studying and working I like to have fun and have a good vibe in the house. For more details, please send a message.

notes: The property is fenced and gated, please keep the gates closed when not in use. This is a residential neighborhood, the neighbors are not on vacation. Quiet time after 9 PM before 8 AM. Feel free to use Beach chairs, boogie boards, Cooler, and Beach toys. Please rinse sand off before storing.  There is an outdoor shower and available, please rinse out sand before showering inside. There is a washer and dryer and clothes line available for your use. Please shake sand from towels and clothes before laundering.
transit: We highly recommend getting a rental car. We do have great bus service on the island, but having a car gives the most flexibility and ease.  We are half hours drive from the airport, Pearl Harbor, and Waikiki.  There is great swimming snorkeling and body boarding here in Waimanalo, as well as Sea life Park and Chief’s luau. Sometimes the conditions are perfect for stand up paddle boarding, beginning surfing, and kayaking.
interaction: I am available by phone, text and email and I live just around the corner. Please let me know what you need to have a five-star stay.
house_rules: No unregistered guests without prior approval. Please rinse off sand in outdoor shower before showering indoors.  Please keep gates closed when not in use.  Residential neighborhood - quiet hours 9pm to 8am.  Please let me know if you need anything to make your stay fabulous!

name: Oceanfront Paradise Condo in Lahaina Towne
summary: Do you need a well-deserved break? Come experience our little piece of Hawaiian paradise! Our beautiful, recently-renovated oceanfront condo has everything you need for a perfect vacation in Lahaina, Maui. Right on the ocean, you can fall asleep listening to the sound of the waves, and awaken to see marine life, the island of Lanai and sailboats moored offshore.  Just north of Lahaina town, the condo is within walking distance of a multitude of shops, restaurants, art galleries and more.
space: This gorgeous condo features:  Fully-equipped custom kitchen with new refrigerator and microwave Spacious bedroom with new furniture, an energy efficient ceiling fan, new blackout shades and a king size bed with Tempurpedic mattress topper Roomy bathroom with ample counter and storage space as well as a large tiled walk-in shower Comfortable living room with an energy efficient ceiling fan, new Averte window shades, a sizable couch and a queen size murphy bed with Tempurpedic mattress topper Furnished lanai with new ceramic tile, a new railing and new sunshade All new luxury Coretec flooring throughout High speed wireless internet The most incredible ocean views in all of Maui Our fourth floor condo overlooks a lovely, heated pool which is just steps from the ocean, where you can snorkel and experience sea life at its best. Surrounding the pool are chaise lounges for relaxing in the sun, tables with umbrellas and chairs, and gas barbecues with picnic tables for dining outdoors by the w

neighborhood_overview: Ideally situated just north of Lahaina town, the condo is within walking distance of a multitude of shops, restaurants, art galleries and more. The Cannery Mall is a 5 minute walk away, featuring Safeway, Longs, several shops and a food court. Just across the street from the mall is the highly acclaimed Old Lahaina Luau, and some of the best dining in West Maui. Stroll a few minutes past the Cannery Mall to Baby Beach for swimming and sunning. You won’t find a better location than this!
transit: Car rentals or shuttle service from Kahului Airport (OGG) Taxis galore all along Front Street Local buses pick up in front of Safeway and transport you anywhere on the island

name: TPC - Antero Quental Residence - Amalia Apartment
summary: Set in a traditional centenary building, with Portuguese tiles, this second floor apartment, with one bedroom, offers a balcony with views of the back garden, right in the heart of Porto .  With an extremely good location, we provide our guests an excellent local staying in the center of Porto. Portugal Tourism number: 31508/AL
space: Near the Church of Lapa, right in the heart of Porto, it was completely renovated in 2016, respecting the original features and its history.  The property includes 7 modern furnished and fully equipped apartments. It has an unusual layout and modern furnishings, providing comfort for our guests. The bedroom has a double bed and the living area has one sofa bed, a dining table and a flat-screen cable TV. The bathroom comes with a shower and there is also an equipped kitchen with a washing machine.  All units include a fully equipped kitchen with Fridge, freezer, oven, stove, coffee machine, microwave, crockery and cutlery. The apartment also comes equipped with WIFI. Linen and towels are also provided. Please keep in mind that this is a second floor with no elevator.

All units include a fully equipped kitchen with Fridge, freezer, oven, stove, coffee machine, microwave, crockery and cutlery. The apartment also comes equipped with W
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood of Lapa is charming and ideal for those looking to stay overnight or live very close to the historical city center but also in a quiet place near the authentic side of Porto. In the center, near the metro station, at only 15 minutes walk from downtown but far from the prices, crowds and nocturnal confusion of the “Porto movida”, there are still some old ladies who go to church, the young, anxious and smiling or the grandfathers with their berets in the local cafes. Its most important era began with the construction of the Church of Lapa. Rococo and neoclassical building, the Church of Our Lady of Lapa began to be built in 1756 and finished in 1863. Beginning only with a Church, were added a College Seminary, a cemetery, and later, at the beginning of the twentieth century, a hospital. Inside the church, the pipe organ is one of its most impressive pieces, but one of the main attractions of the church is the heart of King Pedro IV, who, since 1837, has been inside an al
notes: Also I would like to inform that Portuguese immigration services, SEF, require that all non-portuguese guests fill a form with some personal details such as passport number, nationality, etc.. This form will be sent through a certified program or given to you on the check in.
transit: With a local supermarket just in the other side of the street, bakeries, restaurants, shops, and cafés can be found within walking distance. Located 20 minutes walk from Avenida dos Aliados and Torre dos Clérigos and 25 minutes from the Bolhao City Market.  It is nearby Faria Guimarães Metro Station, just a 5 minute walk away (400m), with easy access to all places of interest in Porto. Estádio do Dragão / F.C.Porto Stadium - 2,8 km (13 min de carro/ 13 min by car)  Aeroporto/Airport - 13 km (20 min de carro, 28 min de metro - linha E/ 20 min by car, 28 min by Metro - line E)
access: Guests have access to all the facilities of the apartments and a shared outdoor space where can sit and relax while enjoying the sun after their experience in Porto. Although there is street parking, at check in, you can request access to a nearby private parking (+/- 400m) with a 50% discount. (€ 7.5 / 24h). interaction: When you arrive you will be met by The Porto Concierge service that will receive you for check-in and share with you tips about where to find special places to eat, visit and have fun. The Porto Concierge Service will be 24/7 available for you during all your stay.

My neighborhood is one of only a few neighborhoods in Hong Kong that you don't see crowded peoples and heavy traffic on the roads.
notes: -The neighborhood can be a bit humid during the rainy season and winter in Hong Kong. Since this apartment is close to the shore, certain level of humidity is expected during such time. name: Stylish apartment A in city center
space: Luxury stylish apartment in the city center, in València Street, between Paseo de Gracia and Rambla Catalunya. Only 7min walking from Plaza Catalunya and las Ramblas. BEDLINENS and towels included. An extra terrace door isolates acusticly the apartment from the street, all  perfect for having a wonderful time in Barcelona. Well situated in a old century house, with high ceilings, approximately 3mts and moldings in all the rooms, typical of Eixample Neighborhood, The apartment has one comfty bedroom and one bathroom, and also one sofa-Bed that makes the apartment up to 4 people. the bedroom is situated in the corner of the house and it is really luminous with 2 balconies. The Stylish large bathroom has 3 big translucent windows that lets pass the light, but not possible to see from the outdoor. The apartment has a typical Gallery where you can have your Breakfast while you are looking at Valencia st and Paseo de Gracia just on the corner. Open kitchen with everything that you could need

name: Stylish, spacious, central, shared rooftop terrace
summary: Stylish, spacious two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment, located in the central Eixample neighbourhood, just a short walk from the Old City and from the gorgeous Art Nouveau district. Elegant contemporary design, high ceilings and parquet flooring are combined with modern comforts: Wi-Fi, satellite TV, and a fully-equipped kitchen. The apartment is decorated with bright colours and is full of natural light. A shared rooftop terrace is open to all guests and offers great views over Barcelona.
space: Two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment, ideal for groups of six people and families. The main bedroom has got a double bed, the second bedroom has two single beds. Moreover, there is a sofa bed for two people in the living room. It is located in an a Art Nouveau building in the central Eixample neighbourhood. The apartment offers an elegant and contemporary design. Original architectural details such as the high ceilings and parquet flooring are combined with modern comforts.  There is a large shared terrace which offers amazing views over the city. It can be used by all guests who stay in this building. There is Wi-Fi, satellite TV, AC and heating, as well as other modern appliances. This apartment has a spacious, comfortable combined living room-dining room, and a well-equipped kitchen.

The apartment offers an elegant and contemporary design. Original architectural details such as the high ceilings and parquet flooring are combined with modern comforts.  There is a large shared te
neighborhood_overview: The Eixample is the Catalan Art Nouveau centre of the city. The area was built in the late 19th and early 20th century. The architecture of the neigbourhood is stunning, with some real gems to explore. A few steps from your apartment you’ll be able to feast your eyes on amazing buildings such as Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and the lesser-known but stunning Casa Amatller. The area is one of the cultural and shopping heart of the city. You’ll find designer stores and high street brands next to all sorts of great restaurants and bars. A short walk (5 minutes) will get you to the bustling old city, where you’ll have another great selection of shops, markets, museums, art galleries, restaurants and bars ro choose from. The area boasts great transport links and you’ll be able to get to all ends of the city in a few minutes by underground, overground, bus and taxi.
notes: City tax is not included (2.48€ per person per night) and is payable upon arrival. Touristic license: HUTB-004930
transit: The apartment has great access to the rest of the city thanks to the metro stations of Urquinaona (L1 and L4 - Red and Yellow lines) and Arc de Triomf (L1 - Red line and regional train station). Both of them are just 5 minutes away. There are also several bus stops around.
access: All you have to do in order to check in is let a member of our team know exactly when you will arrive, so that he or she can come to the apartment and help you with everything you need.
interaction: Our team will be there for you whenever you need it. You can give us a call 24/7. If necessary, a member of our team will come straight to the apartment in order to help you with your questions.

name: Maui Beach House Chic Style with Tropical Views
summary: Aloha Maui vacation planners,  Welcome to beautiful Wailea. Grand Champions Villas is located in the heart of Wailea and nestled between The Wailea Blue Golf Course, ranked among America's best resort courses by Golf Digest and The Wailea Tennis Club ranked as one of the country's 50 best resort tennis facilities. Across the street from the Villas is The Shops at Wailea where you will find luxury shopping and fine dining as well as the luxury hotel properties linked by a beach walk.
space: Both bedrooms are very large and private as they are located on opposite ends of the condo, linked in the center by the kitchen and living room. Each bedroom has a private ensuite bath with double sinks. Each bedroom contains large double mirrored closets for hanging clothes, shelving for folded clothes and a dresser. The living room furniture has been upgraded with down fill for comfort.

neighborhood_overview: The condo is located in Wailea, a master planned community, which means all green areas and roadways are meticulously kept and high rise/dense buildings are not allowed. Maui's 5 world class beaches are located in our neighborhood, with free beach parking, all within a few minutes drive of the condo in both directions north and south. The closest beach to the condo is Ulua/Mokapu beaches which are a 15 min walk across the street. There is also fine dining, shopping and a grocery store within a 10 min walk across the street at The Shops at Wailea.
notes: I check in with all guests within 24 hours of their arrival via email to inquire if the condo was properly cleaned and prepared for their arrival and to ensure they arrived safely. We are able to offer complete guest satisfaction as housekeeping will come back out and remedy any cleaning issue that does not meet expectations.
transit: The island and area is serviced by Uber and also a local open air shuttle service, Turtle Tracks

interaction: Guests have access to my Property Manager in person, by phone and by email. Guests also have my cell phone number and email. I am able to assist guests in their requests/needs/vacation planning and suggestions at all times.

name: A lovely cozy apartment near HKU
summary: A very lovely cozy apartment with high profile equipment and property management. Super convenient to everywhere in the city and quite close to HKU university.  PS: The fat cat is excluded so she will be not at home during your stay :)
space: It's an all-included studio with one bed room and one shower room. High quality electronic appliance are available. More generously it has two tiny cute balconies which offer you a space to breathe the nature's fresh air. There's also paid TV programs for entertainment.    There's one double bed and one sleeping sofa being capable of hosting 3 persons to stay. You can easily get access to everywhere of the central city as it's only a 5-min walk to the HKU MTR station. Moreover it's definitely a great place to enjoy either artistic or local HK life as all those wet markets, convenience store, restaurants and coffee shops are within walk distance. Last but not the least, HK university is just 10 min walk away which absolutely makes your life easier if you would like to take a visit or just randomly hang around the campus.

Spacious and renovated three bedrooms Apartment in the magnificent district of Barcelona, with a capacity of a group up to 8 people. This recently refurbished apartment is perfect for a family or a large group of friends travelling together. In one of the most beautiful areas of the city, Eixample, the apartment has recently been renovated with an eye for comfort.  It has three bedrooms, all with closets, a toilet and a bathroom. It is equipped with everything you need to make your stay comfortable. The decoration is modern and practical, suitable for making your visit enjoyable.   The living room contains a comfortable double sofa bed, a flat screen TV, a dining table and two comfortable single seating sofas. The kitchen has been re-designed and comes complete with an oven, a hob, microwave, a fridge, coffee machine, a toaster and a kettle. There are three bedrooms, tw
neighborhood_overview: Our apartments are located in the architectural wonderland that is Eixample, beside Hospital Clinic, about 15 minutes walk from Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia and walking distance from most tourist attractions in the district. Take a stroll along the majestic tree-lined streets of this historic area and marvel at the curio shops, stunning houses and numerous local bars and restaurants. Around us are: recommended restaurants, the second fresh market in Barcelona-Market Ninot. We have all types of services in the area: pharmacy, hairdresser, supermarkets, internet cafes, tobaccos and Clinical-Hospital Center world-renowned University of Medicine and School of Industrial Engineering.   All these buildings are modernist. A 10 minute walk away you can find a very popular area of nightclubs and clubs.

transit: In our district is very easy to move by public transport and also by walking. From the Airport you can reach our apartments by Aerobus T1;T2 (bus stop GranVia Urgell) or by bus line 46 to Pl. Espanya. It is also an option to get into town by train to Pl. Sants or by taxi, it takes about 25-30 minutes and cost between 30-35 EUR. If you are planning to drive around the city you can find parking space around the apartments.
access: Our Clients can enjoy a 24 hour customer service, counseling, special laundry and dry cleaning service, fully equipped Housing, separate fully equipped kitchen, air-conditioning, free Wireless Internet and ADSL, dryer, sheets and towels in the room, public parking in surrounding. The Apartments are spacious with large and bright rooms that will make you feel comfortable.
interaction: We are a small company specialized in apartment management service in a gorgeous building of a beautiful district of Barcelona. A familiar and personal contact with our clients is fundamental for us. To make the communication easy, our team speaks 5 languages: Spanish, English, Russian, German and Hungarian. You are always welcome if you have any question or just need an advice where to go to shopping or eat the best tapas in the city. During the day we are personally present in the building and we are also available in 24 hour in case of urgency.

The celebrations of any kind are severely prohibited. name: ➳ Logement  4 1/2 Rosemont ❤️
summary: Chers Glob-trotteurs, travailleurs, vacanciers ou qui que vous soyez :)  Notre demeure est au dernier étage d’un petit immeuble (3 étages), situé à 20 min du centre ville.   L’appartement possède un salon double avec chambre ,balcon donnant sur une rue passante, deux chambres dont une fermée, une salle de bain ainsi qu’une cuisine avec un second balcon donnant cette fois sur une vue panoramique.  Les rues Beaubien et Masson regorgent de petits cafés, restaurants et commerces en tout genre !
space: Notez qu’il y a deux chambres, la première étant en fait dans le salon double ainsi qu'une seconde isolée. La configuration est parfaite pour un couple avec enfants, travailleur ou groupe d’amis. Envie de vous promener dans le quartier ? Les rues Beaubien et Masson regorgent de petits cafés, restaurants et commerces en tout genre, très agréable l’été ! Il y a aussi beaucoup de parcs aux alentours. Si vous désirez vous rendre au centre-ville il ya plusieurs possibilités : Transports en communs : bus, metro  Vélos, Bixi (il y a plusieurs boutiques de vélos dans le quartier) Voiture (Parking sur la rue) Il y a un supermarché à 2min à pied pour faire vos courses et une station essence ouverte 24h juste a coté en cas de besoin.

Enrich your experience in Sydney, be it for work or for play! Explore the spectacular array of Sydney local attractions during your stay. The playground of Australia, Sydney boasts some of the country's most iconic landmarks and we're in the perfect location to experience the wide array of things to see and do in Sydney. Experience unique Aussie tours, check out some of the world's best restaurants and bars and, of course, take in spectacular views of the breath-taking Australian scenery… There are tons of things to do in the city itself which are mostly a quick stroll away. I've included most of my favorite places and more in my extensive "Local Recommendations Guidebook" on this listings page, so please feel free to check em' out for awesome things to do and eat in the CBD area.

description: Welcome to this beautiful and renovated "cobertura" 260m2 on  the popular Plaza São Salvador. View the Christ of Corcovado and large terraces.  All shops, bars, restaurants, subway nearby.  Ideal location between the beaches and the Centro. Wide atypical apartment (entire top floor of a old building with 4 floors) fully renovated; Rustic furniture and decoration typically Brazilian. Large kitchen (no dishwasher, but the possibility of providing a housekeeper and / or cook Brazilian, Daily rates in addition to the rent) Hot showers, WiFi, cable TV, washing machine, Air Conditionned in all 3 bedrooms. New beddings: 2 queensize beds + 2 single beds Cotton linen, tea towels and towels provided. Spacious closets in each room. 2 terraces, one overlooking the square with a view of the Christ of Corcovado and the other very large with hammocks and outdoor shower. Equipment access: In the central office: unlimited wi-fi internet and cable Living room: TV LED 32 "with Brazilian public + cable ch
neighborhood_overview: The "Praça" (square, plaza) São Salvador is a  popular and typical area in the neighbourhood of Laranjeiras, in the South Zone of Rio de Janeiro; It's ideally located between on one side by  Botafogo and Copacabana/Ipanema beaches areas and, on the other side, the "Centro" and Lapa. Supermarket 50m away, Pharmacy 100m, both open late. Many shops and restaurants nearby. 500m from the beautiful park of Flamengo (beautiful view of the Sugar Loaf), ideal for sports and walks. Closed to traffic on Sundays for even more space. Free musical and artistic entertainment from Thursday to Sunday on the very Plaza Sao Salvador. Many activities and many people on the site sometimes until dawn! But recently installed double glazing ensure your peace of mind.
notes: Caution: DO NOT THROW TOILET PAPER OR OBJECT OF ANY KIND in the toilet!  Unfortunately a common situation in Brazil, not by particular ecological awareness but often the lines are too narrow, and any omission of this detail can turn into a very unpleasant experience, not to mention a costly intervention at your expense)  110V electricity in the whole city! Please check that your adapters are bi-volts! Internet Wi-fi network is not very fast and limited to the central office. You can connect through Ethernet for better speed.
transit: For fans of running, the Rio Marathon  (July) and the  international semi-marathon (August), as well as many popular races and events arrive in the Flamengo Park, 500m from the apartment. Ideal to participate or support! Largo do Machado metro station 400m; Bus lines throughout the Zona Sul (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) permanent taxi in the street or on call. Beaches: Copacabana / Leme 10 minutes by taxi, Ipanema 30 minutes by subway or 20 minutes by taxi. Easy access to the Santos Dumont National airport (10 minutes by taxi) and Galeao-Internacional Airport (30 minutes by taxi through Tunnel Santa Barbara)
access: Equipment access: In the central office: unlimited wi-fi internet and cable Living room: TV LED 32 "with Brazilian public + cable channels (sports, cartoon, news ...) Access to all rooms of the apartment except the "closet" of the master suite. This piece containing personal business owners remains locked and inaccessible.
interaction: Monitoring and internet bookings (selected via (website hidden) connection) directly with the owner (based in Paris, speaks French, English, Portuguese); The owner has lived 15 years in Rio and really knows the city and its surrounding destinations (Ilha Grande, Buzios ...). Reception by bilingual host on arrival;  Booklet of instructions and detailed advices (FR, U.S., POR)
house_rules: Smoking allowed (but not in the rooms!). Pets not allowed in the building. The flat is on top of a quiet, family building with mostly families and kids, which means NO "SERIOUS" PARTYING ALLOWED, no use of drugs or escort services possible in the flat (but you have hundreds of people partying in the street in front of the building almost every evening and many places for such activities in the city!)

name: White House
summary: Single-family home in Barcelona with lots of charm. Living room, fully furnished kitchen, 2 triple bedrooms, 2 double bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms with showers. Accommodation for 10 people. Heating and air conditioning. Garden with barbecue grill and private pool.

house_rules: - El horario de entrada en los apartamentos será a partir de las 14.00 h. del día de llegada debiendo quedar libres las habitaciones antes de las 10.00 del dia de salida.  - Tarifa por registro de entrada a deshoras (después de 20:00): 40€ - El cliente se obliga a cuidar el apartamento amueblado, siendo de su cargo los deterioros o pérdidas que se produzcan en la misma. - Menores de 21 años, serán solamente admitidos en compañía de un mayor - Las HORAS DE DESCANSO son de 22,00 a 10,00 entre semana y de 00.00 a 10,00 los festivos, - Los apartamentos están dotados de un sistema de control de ruido, en caso de superar el máximo durante el periodo nocturno, un agente se desplazará hasta el apartamento. Si se vuelve a ocasionar un problema de ruido tras la visita del agente, será bloqueado el depósito - En el momento de la salida del cliente debe entregar la casa en buenas condiciones de limpieza. name: Sunny Bedroom in trendy Bushwick Apt. w/Rooftop
summary: My apartment is within five minutes to a ton of amazing bars (The Johnsons, Miles, Three Diamond Door ) and restaurants (Dear Bushwick, Forrest Point, and Robertas).  Perfectly centered between the L train @ Jefferson and the JMZ @ Myrtle Ave.  Grocery store on the corner. Laundry in the basement.  Bike rack out back. Cute little balcony off the living room, natural sunlight that comes through, and the giant rooftop that has a stellar view of the city.

name: Typique appartement Villerois
summary: Charmant 4 et demi avec pièce doubles (deux grandes pièces: chambre et bureau, salon et cuisine/salle à manger) avec boiseries et hauts plafonds dans l'un des plus beaux quartiers de Montréal. Lit queen douillet à souhait, laveuse-sécheuse, grand balcon ensoleillé, potager à votre disposition: le bonheur! Il y a même un divan convertible en lit double pour loger 2 personnes de plus Emplacement idéal, à 2 pas du métro Jarry (accès rapide au centre-ville) et 10 minutes du magnifique parc Jarry!
space: This is a one bedroom apartment with a lot of charm: a typical Montreal apartment with high ceilings and woodwork. Ideally located, it is a 3 minutes walk to Jarry metro station (easy access to downtown) and a 10 minutes walk from the legendary Jarry park. Perfect for one person or a couple, the apartment can accomodate up to 4  with the comfy sofa-bed.

name: Oceanfront 2 Bedroom House
summary: ON THE OCEAN, extremely private, CLEAN & protected from random visitors. Stunning views, great hikes, swim, surf & beaches! Kayaks, SUP board & snorkel gear avail at no charge. Well maintained grass yard with private stairs to water (you can walk around naked). Oceanfront dinning, fully equipped kitchen, outdoor bbq. Surreal sunrises! Hammock, very comfy beds, high ceilings, movie projector with surround system, original artwork through the house. Plenty of parking space. A true island paradise!
space: This is truly one of a kind location. You will never get tired of the views. You will have your own private entrance to the ocean. The property is gated and has  a spacious yard with lush vegetation. The house is new and clean and there are no bugs or any living creatures inside except for an occasional gecko. Very comfy,  new beds with mattress covers and high quality sheets. Fully equipped kitchen (with sharp knives)! Master bedroom has a movie projector with a large screen and surround system. Relax with a book in a hammock and enjoy  the oceanfront privacy of the outdoor bbq/dinning area.

neighborhood_overview: If you are looking to get away from the  hustles and bustles of a big city then this is definitely the place for you. Just close the gate behind  and  unwind to the sound of crushing waves and swinging palm trees. There is a great surf spot nearby and the ocean is very safe for swimming and snorkeling. You will be able to watch amazing sunrises without leaving your bed. Lots of options for day trips and hikes, beautiful and empty beaches close by. Take a drive to the famous North Shore or check out Kualoa Ranch for attractions such as Jurassic Park tour, horse back riding, zip line,  catamaran rides any many more.
notes: Not recommended for children due to a small,  unprotected cliff area on the property and easy ocean access. There is a busy road behind the house, be careful  pulling in and out. You will hear some noise during rush hour, however you can not see the road.
transit: There are some buses you can catch, but you will definitely need a car.
access: You will have the whole space to yourself - there are no other tenants or people  on the property,  just you and the ocean. Separate laundry room. Lots of parking in the driveway.
interaction: We will gladly be of help and answer any of your questions!
house_rules: - Please note there is a small, unprotected cliff area facing the ocean, which makes it dangerous for small kids. Adults should also watch their step, especially after consuming alcoholic beverages. - Respect the ocean. Use water gear with caution and at your own risk.  You will have to be able to carry kayaks and sup board down a few stairs. - You will enjoy the ocean breeze and be able to jump in the water to cool off, but please rinse your feet and wash off the sunscreen when back in the house. Salt causes corrosion, please cover the grill after each use and take any stainless steel kitchen equipment back inside.

name: Cute Attic room Beyoğlu, Istanbul
summary: This is a room in an Ottoman liberty style townhouse in Beyoglu. The location is very central, walking distance to istiklal street, one of the main centers in Istanbul. There are many cafes, restaurants, bars, and shopping, night life.
space: This sunny room for one person is on the same floor as the terrace, which is the third floor (three levels up from the entrance floor). It gets plenty of light. After entering the building, we have wooden spiral stairs that lead all the way up to the terrace on the third floor. The room is furnished and you have: - single bed - wardrobe - divan (couch) - desk - chair - shared bathroom (one floor below) I provide traditional turkish breakfast with homemade marmelades. It is 5 euro per person if you want to try it. You can use the washing machine free. I give traditional turkish cooking courses in my apartment. You can also join us as my quest. If you want to organise it for yourself for your group, whole program costs 50 euro. We buy ingredients together and cook together.

neighborhood_overview: Tarlabasi neighborhood was a middle class Greek neighbourhood when it was founded at the beginning of 19th century. The area is full of houses of eclectic Ottoman liberty style buildings and ours is one of them. By the 1950’s most of the greek population of the area had to immigrate to Greece because of political reasons.  The area was deserted and by the 1980’s got an internal immigration from the east part of Turkey mostly of Kurdish origin. In the neighbourhood very few Istanbulite Greeks remained, there is a big Kurdish community of rural origin, a gypsy community that settled down many years ago and work in the area as musicians, many transgender people, poor families from the East and the Balck Sea coast, expats who fell in love with decadent touch and reasonable prices of the area, young artists, old artists, students, and us.  We, in our extent, fell in love with the building and liked the spirit of the area that welcomes all the outsiders of the town. It is the gilded area in
notes: Please check out our other rooms in the house: Double room (biggest in the house, with "bow window") https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/1296050 Cozy single room (entrance floor, away from street side, quiet) https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/4119020 Cozy single room (1st floor, away from street side, quiet, more light) https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/1131124 Cozy single room (entrance floor, street side, lots of light) https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/1034587 Studio apartment (with bathroom and kitchen ensuite) https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/937206
transit: Walking distance to many of the touristic attractions and gourmet spots. Close to the bus, metro station.
access: - wireless internet connection - use of equipped kitchen (on the second floor, common use with the me and other guest of the house) - free use of washing machine - terrace that everyone can use - all bills included
interaction: I live in the same building, on the second floor, two levels up from the entrance (same floor as the kitchen). You are always welcome to have a tea or coffe with me or share my table if you happen to be at home while we eat.
house_rules: Please do not smoke inside the rooms, throw your own garbage. In Istanbul the tap water is not drinkable, please buy your own drinking water. Please clean the kitchen after you use, do not leave dirty dishes, left overs, vegetable remains that can stain the working space. ıf you use the terrace and want to move the chairs, please take them back to the original place after using. Do not throw cigarettes inside the plants. For long term stays please buy your own toilette paper. Please switch off the lights that you do not use. Close the door  of the terrace and switch the light off when you leave the terrace. Sorry if you feel like" why do you need to tell me such basic behaviors!". Not all but some people forget that it is not a hotel but a home. Thank you very much in advance.

name: SOOTHING WAVES WITH A 180* OCEAN VIEW
summary: Valley Isle Resort 306  We are located beachfront with an amazing view  of the ocean and sunset. We can look right down into the water and watch the turtles swimming. We offer a full kitchen including poolside barbecue grills. Within a block of our Resort are several restaurants and bars. Our condo has a comfy queen-size wall bed along with a small sofa bed.   The ambiance is soothing and relaxing. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and families (with one child).
space: We have a beachfront location that gives a 180 degree view of the water. Our Lanai offers a perfect viewing area to watch the turtles swimming in the water or the whales frolicking in the ocean, beautiful sunsets, and of course to enjoy your favorite cocktail or cup of coffee.

neighborhood_overview: We are in a quiet neighborhood where you will find many local residents visiting the same restaurants that you do. There are a few restaurants and bars within a short walking distance, along with a couple small grocery stores, Maui Baby Rentals, Boss Frogs Rentals, a bank, Maui Brewing Company , a coffee shop, and even a McDonalds.
notes: We offer 2 beach chairs, a small cooler, beach towels, a boogie board, several noodles, and a beach bag for your use. You will also find reusable shopping bags for your grocery shopping. (You can be charged for grocery bags if you dont bring your own.)
transit: There is a bus stop directly in front of our parking lot. Taxi service and Uber is nearby and always available for you. For our guests with rental cars, our Resort offers free parking.
access: You have access to all of the beaches on Maui, our swimming pool, barbecue grills , and an herb garden for your use.
interaction: We offer my phone number so you can call or text at any time. I will send you information on check in, obtaining your free parking pass, laundry information, and things to do and see in the area. We also offer a guest book with dining and happy hour suggestions.
house_rules: - Coin operated washer/drier down the hall from 8am to 10pm -Valley Isle Resort is a non-smoking Resort. There is a smoking area to the right side of the parking lot for guests. - Valley Isle is a pet free Resort, sorry but you will have to leave your four-legged family members at home just like we do! Service dogs are allowed however. - It is required that you relax to the soothing sound of the waves, enjoy the turtles swimming below you, and have an overall wonderful Maui Adventure. - It is Valley Isle's rule that beach towels and clothing may not be hung on the Lanai railings.  With the trade winds, your articles may end up on someone else's Lanai or down on the beach.

name: Cottage in Haiku
summary: Stunning secluded bay at the end of our road in a quiet area. 10 miles from Paia and 6 miles from Haiku. Close enough to town but far enough that you can enjoy the country jungle life. We share everything from our farm with our guests seasonally available liliko, coconuts, fruit trees, bananas, and Avocado. This area that reminds you of what Hawaii once was. The Cottage is situated to capture tradewinds keeping things cool. Perfect location where you won't deal tourists crowds.
space: Screened in Lanai with comfortable seating you likely find yourself spending most of your time on the Lanai. We have comfortable new beds with 400 thread count bedding. Kitchen equipped with everything you need to cook a full meal. Our guest all seem delighted that such a unique experience is available.

This cottage is on acreage you will enjoy exploring and identifying all the foliage. I am available throughout your stay, living on property with my family. Being a busy family
notes: This property is on water catchment. Meaning we catch the water off our roof store the water in tanks then pump it into the house for showering and washing dishes. A little off the grid type living. You will need to bring your own bottled water for drinking. We provide 5 gallon jugs that you can use to purchase water  in town.
transit: Parking for 2 cars. One car can park in the carport and the other car directly behind the car in the carport. You will need to rent a car.
access: Wonderful grounds and entire home. This cottage is on acreage you will enjoy exploring and identifying all the foliage.
interaction: I am available throughout your stay, living on property with my family. Being a busy family you might see us at home often or not see us at all; depending on our schedule and your schedule during your visit. However I will be available if you need anything, messaging me via airbnb is best way to reach me. If we see you we will happily chat and "talk story". There seems to be no rhyme or reason to our level of guest interactions some of our guests have joined us for dinner, or just sunset drinks on our Lanai, and some of your guests we never meet face to face. We are very easy going and follow our guests lead regarding interaction. Truly I believe it all depends on guests schedule and our schedule during that particular visit.

name: Waterfront Cabana
summary: Come stay with us in our beautiful cabana steps from the waters edge.  Walk through the tropical garden and enjoy some fruit from our edible garden(depending on season).  Imagine seeing the water from nearly everywhere in the cabana.  Eating breakfast out on the lanai (balcony) so close to the water you feel like you are on a boat.  Listening to the waves of the water and the serenity of the canal as the Hawaiian breezes envelope you.
space: Approximately 600 square feet. (400sf with 200sf loft). Enjoy the views with indoor dining or outdoor dining on balcony (lanai), and wall-to wall front and back opening accordion doors.  Have clothes washer/dryer located on the left side of the cabana (outside), hot water, wifi and internet TV.  Large shower and comfy beds for a good night sleep.  Air conditioning in loft is sufficient to cool house to 76 degrees at night but not for daytime use. Kitchenette has full-sized refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave and many small kitchen appliances, pots and pans, dishware, etc... for short or long stay.

neighborhood_overview: Quiet neighborhood -Located on the Koko Marina. - we highly respect our neighbors who are kind and friendly.
notes: You are welcome to use the snorkel gear, beach chairs, and boogie boards, but please clean and return to the front porch for future guests.  We also have paddle boards for your use. Adjacent house is occupied by a family with children that like to interact, swim, and play.
transit: convenient bus access on Lunalilo Home Road.   Within 2 miles (or less) - multiple dining options, shopping such as Safeway, Costco, Longs Drug, Ross.  Close to Post Office, hiking, movie theatre, and watersports rental.
access: The Cabana is a stand alone structure located on the back of the property steps from the waters edge.  Access to shared yard, shared pool, shared dock.  The adjacent house is private - no access. The Cabana has a downstairs that is used for storage - no access. you can access the dock, however the boat and boat lift are prohibited from use.  For safety reasons - children under 8 must be accompanied by adult when accessing lower side of cabana at waterfront as there are no handrails or guardrails to prevent fall an no lifeguard. For those with mobility issues, the cabana has about a 100' random rock walkway path on grass/stone pavers and stairs with 4 steps up leading to entrance.   Upper loft leading to queen sized bed has a steep ships ladder and head clearance issues (approx. 5 foot height at top of stairs).  Enter at your own risk. Bedroom Queen bed and pullout queen sized couch are for  those who may have difficulty with the head clearance in loft.
interaction: We will be on-site often as the cabana is located in the back of the property.
house_rules: - Quiet time from 9:00pm to 8:00am - Driveway parking for 1 vehicle.  Street parking may accommodate 1 additional vehicle, however not guaranteed.   - Property contains stairs and unguarded access to the water and no monitor or lifeguard.  Entrance to cabana has 4 steps and pathway leading to cabana includes a grass and stone walkway that is not an even surface.  - alert to those with mobility issues or small children under 8 - enter property at your own risk - this place may not be for you. - Be mindful of neighbors peace and quiet - Property is shared.  Driveway must not be obstructed.  Property is a shared yard, pool, and hot-tub. - Do not access boat or boat lift adjacent to boat dock. - Please be mindful of energy use- it is expensive in Hawaii. Air Conditioning is for your sleeping comfort.  Do not open doors and run AC.  The Air Conditioning is limited to nighttime only.  - Property is limited to 6 guests (4 staying and 2 visitors).
