neighborhood_overview: DEAR GUESTS, WELCOME TO HONG KONG!   Our rooms are located at the heart of Mong Kok, simply a must-go place during your Hong Kong trip with convenient transportation to all others places of Hong Kong and various distinctive restaurants, stores and shopping streets. We guarantee you an enjoyable and memorable stay in Hong Kong. 【Surroundings】 --5 minute walk from MTR Mong Kok-Exit E2 --5 minute walk to the Ladies' Market and Sneakers Street --Local food stalls and distinctive restaurants downstairs --Supermarkets, electronic stores, money exchange stores are around
notes: 【Check-in & Check-out Time】 Check-in after 3:00 P.M. Check-out before 12:00 P.M. *Early check-in or late check-out is not provided. *Late check-in is possible but please understand that Muriel and Ben cannot be reached by (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) or phone after 11pm. So if you need to check in late at night, please make sure you have the pictures we provide for you to find our place.  *Please take good care of your belongings, and we suggest you take your valuable belongings with you. Although our security is very safe, we cannot be sure and will not be responsible for your losses. Please understand.
transit: 【Transportation】 Located at the very heart of Mong Kok, the hostel has extremely convenient access to elsewhere of Hong Kong. Literally you can go anywhere in Hong Kong within 1 hour.  --Direct Airport Bus E21/A21, which can be taken downstairs, travels to and from Airport for only 60 minutes --Two lines of MTR and numerous bus routes pass through --10 minute to Tsim Sha Tsui --15 minute to Central, Exhibition Centre in Wan Chai and Causeway Bay --40 minute to famous spots Disneyland and Ocean Park
house_rules: -- Please turn off air-conditioner before leaving the room, and turn off the water heater after shower in order to save energy. Otherwise, the guest will be fined 300 HKD each time discovered. Please understand. --The room is passcode locked and you will do the check-in by yourself with the passcode we send you after successful reservation --Thorough cleaning will be done before guests check in. We don't provide everyday cleaning during guests' staying. Please keep the place clean. --There is a big garbage can next to the safe exit. Please take garbage out by yourself to keep the room clean. --No Smoking  --No Pets  --Check-in  after 3:00 P.M. --Late check in is ok --Check-out before 12:00 P.M.   --During your stay, in case the security guard or anyone else at the building asks, just say you are my friend because they don't like strangers getting into the building. Thanks!

name: YÜZME HAVUZLU VE DENİZ MANZARALI
summary: Adalar ve Marmara Denizi manzaralı, stüdyo,1+1 ve 2+1 tarzındaki 60 misafir odası ve 200 yatak kapasitesi ile odalarında hızlı internet erişimi, HDTV ve Vazo Özel Uyku Deneyimli yatakları ile lüks ve şık bir İstanbul deneyimi yaşatmayı vaat ediyor.  Vazo Suite Anadolu yakasında iş merkezlerinin yanı başında olan Maltepe bölgesinde otoyol bağlantısı, boğaz köprüsü, Sabiha Gökçen Havalimanı, Maltepe Sahil, E-5 ve Metro İstasyonuna yakınlığı ile sizlere bölge ulaşımlarında kolaylık sağlamaktadır.
space: Ev konforundaki dairelerinin yanı sıra, açık ve kapalı yüzme havuzları, spor salonu ve bay bayan buhar odalarında günün keyfini çıkartabilirsiniz. name: LUXURY SOHO 2 Bedroom Apt
summary: Ideal location!  Spacious and tastefully decorated In the heart of Nolita. Near great restaurants and shops.  Steps away from Soho--NYC's most popular spot for shopping, dining and sightseeing. Close to all subways.
space: I am looking to rent my luxurious and spacious (1000sq. feet), two bedroom apartment in Nolita, a very high-end and luxurious neighborhood in New York City, steps away from Soho.  The area is one of New York's most desirable locations and is filled with shops, restaurants, art galleries and museums.  It is in walking distance of Little Italy, Chinatown, Greenwich Village and The Lower East Side. It is also close to many subways and a short taxi ride way to Times Square and Central Park.   The apartment is beautifully decorated and newly renovated. It also has wireless internet connection, a 47" Plasma HDTV with cable, exposed brick, wood floors, skylights, etc., along with a beautiful outdoor garden area. It is also equipped with every amenity one could need in the kitchen and/or home. Its really a find for the city and is just a beautiful place.  Please let me know if you are interested and would like to learn more. Cheers!

name: Spacious Apartment + patio. Minutes to Manhattan.
summary: This rental is an entire 2 bedroom & 1 bathroom apartment that is located inside a boutique apartment building.  It is a fully legal short term residence. On a tree lined block, 5 minutes from the L train  (Manhattan in 20 min), sits this brand new, luxury garden apartment.    It is the entire 1st floor of a 3 story building.  It features a secluded garden area, washer and dryer, central AC, alarm system,  42" TV with Netflix, marble counters, stainless appliances, and comfortable furnishings.
space: This is a great apartment for short or extended stays.   It's a 2 bedroom, with one bedroom being flexible as a office.   The building has a landscaped back yard, rare in NYC, which is a awesome place to enjoy a drink or read a book.  In the neighborhood there are several bars, coffee shops and restaurants.  This part of Bushwick is the very up and coming, and is easy access to Williamsburg, Greenpoint, and all parts of Manhattan.   It's also a quick trip from both JFK and LGA.  Please reach out with any questions.

neighborhood_overview: The location in Bushwick is unbeatable.  There are many cafes, bars and restaurants.   Nowadays, a huge indoor/outdoor beer-garden, is a favorite in the neighborhood.   Or ride the L a few quick stops to explore Bushwick and Williamsburg.
notes: 1.We may ask you to verify the account by providing a photo of your government ID. 2. There are no security cameras inside the apartment. 3. There are security cameras located outside the front and rear of building. 4. Patio furnishings are made available seasonally and may be removed to prepare for bad weather.
transit: 5 minute walk to the L train at either Halsey Street or Wilson Ave. 13 minute walk to the J train at Halsey Street.   1 minute walk to bus service on Wilson Ave.  Street parking is easy to find in the neighborhood.  JFK airport is 20 minutes by car.  LGA airport is 30 minutes by car.  Uber and Lyft frequent the area.
access: New washer & dryer in basement, access through common hall of this 2-unit building. Garden/backyard has dedicated space for the apartment and also a shared space with 1 upstairs neighbor + their very friendly dog who is only in the yard occasionally and when supervised.   Private entrance with space for Indoor bike or scooter parking.
interaction: We are always available by text or email.  Please feel free to ask for help with directions or suggestions at any time.
house_rules: - Smoking permitted outdoors only  - Please do not entertain more than 4 non-staying guests at the apartment. - lost keys $100 fee - please bag all garbage and place in the black bins outside.  - separate cardboard and plastic/glass/metal recycling in the blue bins.

summary: Located 0.8 miles from Kailua Beach, has two comfy chairs on a lanai that overlooks the pool and spa. A King Bed with a top of the line A/C wall unit and flat screen TV in the bedroom. The bathroom features a tropical shower. This unit has a full kitchen, granite countertops, stove, fridge, microwave and shared BBQ. The salt pool & jacuzzi are set amidst a beautifully landscaped backyard. Free WIFI, bikes & shared laundry on site and one off-street parking stall. Nightly rate includes taxes!
space: Bask in the sun on the white sandy beaches of Lanikai Beach, named one of the top 10 beaches in the world by 2014 Travelers Choice on Trip Advisor! Only a 5-minute drive from our stunning one-bedroom, newly constructed on our quiet neighborhood street with no traffic or road noise on a 10,000 sq ft. professionally landscaped property. Breathtaking Kailua Beach is also only 0.8 miles away and will only take you 2 minutes to drive or 12 minutes to walk. Charming Kailua Town is also two minutes away where you will find Whole Foods, many top restaurants and shops, try a shave ice with local flavors at Island Snow or grab a coffee from Kalapawai Beach Café and walk the beach.  	Besides the great location, Lanikai Love’s best features include two comfy chairs on a lanai that overlooks the pool and spa. name: Quiet Stylish Mosman Apartment

My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. has its own private sunny courtyard. Guests will have access to the whole apartment apart from main bedroom. I'm in and out but love talking to people so if I'm home happy to interact or if guests would prefer to be left alone that's fine with me. I'm always happy to give advice on how to get around, things to do in the area and tips on places to eat and of course where the best coffee is. neighborhood_overview: Central Kihei is awesome. 2 blocks from Kihei Cafe for breakfast, Paia Fish Co. for dinner or downstairs for surf lessons you are literally in the heart of it all. Stunning beaches line the coastline of South Maui including the intimate and stunning coves across the street. Also, with Kalama Park across the street you can play volleyball, tennis or just watch the sunset from the shoreline night after night. 5 minutes from Wailea and 10 minutes from Makena where the string of beaches continue. 'Secrets' and 'Big Beach', 2 of my favorites, have the softest golden sand. Whale watching, boogie boarding and sunbathing at these 2 beaches are some of the many reasons why people return to Kihei year after year.  The Road to Hana, Twin Falls, The Bamboo Forest, Zip Lining, Whale Watching, Sunset Cruising, Hiking the Lava Fields or just lying by the pool downstairs you will have so many options during your stay.
notes: Restaurants:  Breakfast- Kihei Cafe and Nalu's  Lunch- Joys(downstairs) and Nalu's are my favorite for lunchtime. Dinner- MONKEYPOD, COCONUTS, PITA PARADISE and KOISO (best local sushi) are my favorites.  Surf lessons and scuba diving lessons are downstairs PET FEE- $75 Per stay
transit: Kihei Town is mostly walkable. You will need a car to see most of the island. Renting Scooters or bicycles are a fun way to get around locally too.
access: FREE PARKING!!! MY GUESTS WILL HAVE ACCESS TO ALL THE BEACHES ON MAUI, THE POOL AND THE CONDO ITSELF.
interaction: I interact with my guests as much as need be. I am very detailed oriented and love providing anything and everything my guests desire.
house_rules: My guests are free to enjoy themselves. A commonly used Hawaiian word PONO(to do what is right with others and respect of the land) is my basic house rule. We also have a tradition here of removing our shoes and sandals at the doorstep before entering to keep the dirt outside. Quiet time is 10pm-7am and to be mindful of our precious resources here on Maui like electricity and waste. Everything must be brought to Maui by ship and leaves by ship so it is very energy consuming. Tax ID Number AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST  *** PLEASE NOTE A 14.8% HAWAII STATE TAX WILL BE COLLECTED AT THE END OF YOUR STAY***

Many guests have told me this view is better than oceanfront views because of the top floor and expanse of the view. *Condo - 10 mins drive from Lihue airport *GREAT VALUE -top floor, beachfront amazing ocean view condo studio with kitchenette *CONVENIENT LOCATION - midway on the eastern coast of kauai.  30 minutes to north or south Kauai.    *DINNING and SHOPPING - Restaurants and dining all within walking distance of the condo. Coconut Market Place, an open shopping mall is directly next to the condo complex *BEACHFRONT RESORT - steps to white sand beach  *SAFE, QUIET, PEACEFUL, IMMACULATELY MANICURED GROUNDS Pool, Hot Tub, Pool side bar, BBQ grills, white sand beach, 5 acres
neighborhood_overview: Islander on the beach complex is a Beachfront property, you walk onto a white sand beach withing a few steps of the pool area. The complex is next to Coconut marketplace, an outdoor shopping mall, lots of restaurants and shops within walking distance.
notes: Islander on the Beach is a low rise complex fashioned after the Old Hawaiian Charm style of décor. In keeping with that décor, this complex does not have elevators. My unit is on the top, third floor which offers the best view. The steps to the condo are not at all steep and pictures will be forwarded to you upon request. Guests must be ok with no elevators. You do not pay an amenity fee and you get a tremendous savings on the rental rate when you book through me. As such, the laundry room and front desk will not be available for your use. Everything else on the complex such as the pool, hot tub, barbecue grills, common areas are available to you. All rates subject to 14.42% state tax 100% of payment due at time of booking Check out cleaning required Check in time is 3:00 PM, check out time is 10:00 AM Check in and check out times are not adjustable. If you have a late departing flight, please consider renting an additional night to accommodate really late check out times. If you hav
transit: You should rent a car on Kauai as public transportation isn't readily available.  You can bike or walk along the beach next to the condo.  Parking is free in the condo parking lot or else streets right outside the parking lot.  Driving up north to Hanalei/Princeville is about 30 minutes and the same distance south to Poipu.
access: Pool, Hot Tub, Pool side bar, BBQ grills, white sand beach, 5 acres of immaculate grounds, beachside pathway for bikes and walking
interaction: I am always available by text or email or facetime. I have on island contact person if you have any questions or problems.

name: Newly renovated studio in hip Bushwick near subway
summary: Our place is 15 minutes to Williamsburg, 20 minutes to Union Square in Manhattan. You’ll love our place because it is close to the subway, modern, clean, newly renovated and located in happening Bushwick. It's on a quiet, tree-lined street where you can find parking if needed.  Our place is good for couples and solo adventurers.   There is a very comfortable queen-sized bed, and a comfortable couch that can turn into a full size bed that sleeps 2 if necessary.
space: This is a spacious, renovated studio in the basement of a brownstone.
description: Our place is 15 minutes to Williamsburg, 20 minutes to Union Square in Manhattan. You’ll love our place because it is close to the subway, modern, clean, newly renovated and located in happening Bushwick. It's on a quiet, tree-lined street where you can find parking if needed.  Our place is good for couples and solo adventurers.   There is a very comfortable queen-sized bed, and a comfortable couch that can turn into a full size bed that sleeps 2 if necessary. This is a spacious, renovated studio in the basement of a brownstone. You have your own separate entrance to the basement studio.  It's completely private with a private entrance.  We would never enter without telling you first and without as much advance notice as possible. We would only enter if we need to access the utility room -- which is rare. For your (and ours) safety, there is a security camera outside of the building with a view to our entrance and the entrance to the studio. You can always text or call if you have any
neighborhood_overview: Our street is quiet but we are minutes away from galleries, unique bars, restaurants and clubs in a trendy and up-and-coming neighborhood.  Check out the Guidebook: we have recommended a number of places that are all within 20 minutes walking distance or less, and 10 minutes or less on the subway.
notes: We have a French press and an Italian (Bialetti) coffee makers, and single-cup manual drip filter, - but no drip machine. We have basic kitchen tools and supply pantry staples such as salt, pepper, sugar.
transit: We are a 5 minute walk from the Myrtle - Wycoff stop on the L and M subway lines.
access: You have your own separate entrance to the basement studio.  It's completely private with a private entrance.  We would never enter without telling you first and without as much advance notice as possible. We would only enter if we need to access the utility room -- which is rare. For your (and ours) safety, there is a security camera outside of the building with a view to our entrance and the entrance to the studio.
interaction: You can always text or call if you have any questions, need anything, or need any recommendations.
house_rules: We appreciate cleanliness.

name: The Porto Concierge - Baron Omega
summary: O meu espaço fica perto de o centro da cidade e arte e cultura. Vai adorar o meu espaço por causa de o ambiente, o bairro, a iluminação, ea cama confortável. O meu espaço é bom para casais, aventuras individuais, viajantes de negócios, famílias (com crianças), egrandes grupos.
description: O meu espaço fica perto de o centro da cidade e arte e cultura. Vai adorar o meu espaço por causa de o ambiente, o bairro, a iluminação, ea cama confortável. O meu espaço é bom para casais, aventuras individuais, viajantes de negócios, famílias (com crianças), egrandes grupos. There are some options for you to come from the airport to the apartment: - Private transfer to the apartment (Lux car): 9€/person 2 to 3 people (private driver pick up at Arrivals) - takes 20 minutes (can be used for 1 person but will cost 18€) - Transfer service in a private bus from Airport to the apartment (private driver pick up at Arrivals):    -  4  to 6 persons: 9€/person - takes 25 minutes - Metro (you should leave on Carolina Michaelis stop) - 2,45€ / each person - takes 35 minutes + 2 minutes walking Service is provided by a business partner therefore is subject to availability.

name: the shoebox, west chelsea
summary: At 180 sq ft, "the shoebox" is aptly named, but as they say in real estate "location. location. location."  Close to the highline, the whitney, the javits center, restaurants and west chelsea galleries, entertainment and business is at our door. Subways and buses are also nearby. The bed is comfy, the shower is hot (there is NOT a bathtub), there is an elevator (i'm on the 4th floor), vibe is cozy, and yes the ceiling is high.  My place is good for solo adventurers and business travelers alike.
space: a few more details.... there is no bathtub but the shower is strong and hot. please note you may need to let the water run a few minutes to get hot water. there is WiFi but there is NOT a TV

I am very responsive and just a text message away. IMO there is no better neighborhood in Manhattan
neighborhood_overview: IMO there is no better neighborhood in Manhattan. entrance to the Highline is on our corner. the best galleries in NYC are all within a few blocks. the new Whitney Museum in a 10 minute walk as are subways, buses and Penn Station. Restaurants, cool shopping, the Chelsea Market... oh I could go on and on!
notes: the hours for arrival and departure are a guide. i am always happy to be flexible and do my best to accommodate your travel needs. sometimes there's another  guest on either side of you that will dictate what is possible, but i try, so always ask! cheers, karen
access: upon entry of building there is an open staircase. do not fear, continue to the right and down a short hallway is a passenger elevator.  comes in handy and greatly appreciated by those guests with a suitcase!!
interaction: I am very responsive and just a text message away.
house_rules: please be discreet. Airbnb is controversial in New York and while my building is friendly to the usage, I ask guests to simply say they are my (Karen's) guests and nothing more. it is rare and unusual that anyone would ever ask.

name: Appartement lumineux , Terrasse privée sur le toît
summary: Notre logement est accessible en transport en commun via deux lignes de métro (orange et bleu),  du centre-ville de Montréal. Dans un quartier vivant, près de la plaza st-Hubert, du cinéma beaubien, du parc Molson, vous trouverez à proximité tout ce donc vous aurez besoin pour vous divertir et vous accommoder: pharmacie, épicerie, restaurent, bar, bixi, etc, et vous pourrez jouir des commodités offertes par notre logement et la ville de Montréal.
space: Situé au 3ième et dernier étage d'un triplex, le logement est très lumineux et possède une terrasse privé sur le toit. Il a de grandes fenêtre qui accueillent la lumière du soleil toute la journée et dans chaque pièce (puits de lumière dans la salle de bain). Vous aurez accès à la cuisine toute équipée, au salon, au bureau  et aux au 2 balcons. Situé Au cœur de "la petite patrie" , vous serez au centre d'un typique quartier montréalais chaud , vivant et jeune: café locaux, bistros de bière artisanale, cinéma répertoire , parcs et multiples restaurants. Nous sommes à 15 minutes du métro à pied , près d'une station bixi et des autobus vers le centre-ville . De la terrasse , vous pourrez admirer les nombreux clochers de l'île, la tour du stade olympique, les feux d'artifices (en saison) ainsi que les couchers de soleil.
description: Notre logement est accessible en transport en commun via deux lignes de métro (orange et bleu),  du centre-ville de Montréal. Dans un quartier vivant, près de la plaza st-Hubert, du cinéma beaubien, du parc Molson, vous trouverez à proximité tout ce donc vous aurez besoin pour vous divertir et vous accommoder: pharmacie, épicerie, restaurent, bar, bixi, etc, et vous pourrez jouir des commodités offertes par notre logement et la ville de Montréal. neighborhood_overview: Bien situé au coeur d'un tipique quartier Montrealais "la petite patrie" . Nous sommes entre deux stations de métro (Beaubien et Fabre), l'appartement offre toutes les commodités nécessaires aux voyageurs casaniers comme aux voyageurs plus aventuriers. Des espaces calme, une cuisine bien équipée ainsi que les balcons et la terrasses privée sur le toit permettra aux gens en quête de quiétude d'apprécier la ville dans un nid douillet. Les épiceries, fruiteries, pharmacies, parcs et cinéma sont tous à une distance de marche. Pour ceux qui préfèrent la fête, bars, terrasses et restaurants sont situés tout près, vers le parc Molson ou la petite Italie.
transit: Deux lignes de métro passent à 10 minutes de marche de l'appartement: station Fabre sur la ligne bleu ainsi que Beaubien sur la ligne orange. Des autobus vous emmènent dans toutes les directions au coin de la rue. Des bixi sont à votre disposition à moins de 5 minutes de marches. Des places de stationnement sont disponibles dans la rue, devant l appartement, sans vignette.
access: Vous aurez accès à tout le logement sauf à la chambre de Jonathan qui sera présent pour vous accueillir et répondre à vos questions.
interaction: Jonathan sera présent sur place pour répondre à vos question.

name: 2 Outdoor Pools | Tennis Court | Near the Beach
summary: Overlooking Anini Bay with lush landscapes that affirms Kauai's nickname "Garden Isle" the Ka 'Eo Kai resort offers a variety of water, golf and tennis pleasures. Enjoy beautiful views, exotic surroundings that pay tribute to Kaua‘i’s environment, picturesque pools, intimate nature trails, clubhouse activities and a golf lover’s dream spot between the number 3 fairway of the Makai Golf Course and Princeville’s historic tree lane.
space: Just look out your window or step out onto your lanai. You'll love what you see, whether you are gazing at the misty Hanalei Valley Mountains, breathtaking Bali Hai waters, or fragrant gardens and golf course vistas. Check out the resort's two gorgeous swimming pools. A secluded quiet pool...a charming spot for a quick dip. The second is far more elaborate: this large sculptured pool is a family treat with cascading waterfall, kiddie wading pool, and hot tub. Enjoy a quiet stroll down the historic tree lane to pristine Anini Beach. Fun activities await you at our elegant clubhouse: dancing, golf scrambles, bingo, luaus, and more.

Enjoy a quiet stroll down the historic tree lane to pristine Anini Beach. Fun activities await you at
neighborhood_overview: You’ll find botanical gardens dotting wondrous Kauai, yet those lovingly nurtured grounds are a mere hint of the island’s breadth. The landscape changes at every turn, meaning you’ll move from thick green foliage to otherworldly foggy landscapes to sunny beaches around every bend in the road.
notes: No air conditioning; units cooled by trade winds, ceiling fans in every room. All reservations are subject to Hawai'i's Transient Occupancy Tax upon check-in. Wireless Internet is free for up to 4 devices, ideal for emails and basic web browsing. For more streaming and surfing options on unlimited devices, Enhanced High-Speed Wireless Internet is available for $9.95 per day, $49.95 for 6-10 days, and $59.95 for 11-30 days.
transit: A rental car is highly recommended as there are limited public transportation options and most attractions and activities are not within walking distance.
access: Amenities     2 Outdoor Swimming Pools     Organized Activities Program     Outdoor Hot Tub     Outdoor Children's Pool     Tennis Court     Clubhouse
interaction: We strive to make your vacation planning and stay a great experience and give you great customer service. Feel free to email ResortShare with any questions.
house_rules: The reservation will be booked into the guest’s name as it appears on Airbnb. If this name does not match your photo ID or if a guest by a different name will be checking in, you must provide the first and last name at the time of booking.  Must be 21+ years of age at the time of check-in. All reservations are subject to Hawai'i's Transient Occupancy Tax upon check-in and the Studio is $1.84 per night.  This is a Wyndham Timeshare resort all sale presentations are optional.

name: Manly Harbour House
summary: Beautifully renovated, spacious and quiet, our 3 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom home is only a  10 minute walk to beaches in Fairlight or Forty Baskets,  or a 30 minute walk to Manly via the coastal promenade, or an Express bus runs every 20 mins at your door.
space: Our home is a thirty minute walk along the seashore promenade to Manly, one of Sydney's most beautiful beaches, with its village restaurants, cafes, and shopping.  If you prefer more variety, the Manly ferry will take you to the Sydney CBD in 15 minutes.   The residence is sited in a sought-after family-friendly street only a short stroll to nearby North Harbour reserve and Forty Baskets cafe and beach. It's a short walk further to express CBD buses, ferries, and Manly entertainment. Or there is a bus (#131 or #132) around the corner that drops you in Manly in 8 minutes.  Our home features a stainless steel galley kitchen, including Ilve oven and gas cooktop. We have two separate living areas on the ground floor. The front lounge enjoys P&O window surrounds with a fireplace, Grand piano and wall mounted TV.  The separate family/ dining room at the rear has two long white leather lounge sofas and a 65” wall mounted TV. The dining room table extends to seat 8 comfortably.  There is a cov

neighborhood_overview: Balgowlah Heights is one of the most prestigious areas on the Northern Beaches.  Filled with seaside character and a boutique way of living, this suburb offers everything you could need.   Located approximately 11km from the CBD, and only 2 kms from Manly, Balgowlah is surrounded by pristine water frontage including North Harbour, Forty Baskets, and Sydney Harbour.  Filled with a vast array of public parks, pools, marinas, beaches, sporting facilities and Sydney Harbour National Park. Local Amenities •Forty Baskets Beach, Reef Beach, North Harbour Park, 40 Beans Cafe, Clontarf Beach, Castle Rock. •Nearby Spit to Manly walking track that leads left along the promenade to Manly or right through scenic Sydney Harbour National Park around to Clontarf. •Balgowlah Heights shops, offering a supermarket, delicatessen, boutique shops, cafes and more •Nearby Stockland Mall offers a vast range of cafes, supermarkets, eateries, boutique fashion stores, home wares shops and Fitness First Gym •Array
transit: Balgowlah - Manly bus # 131 or #132  (Bus stop is 3 doors down, around the corner) takes you to Manly Ferry in 8 minutes.  Manly ferry gets you to Sydney CBD in 15 minutes.
access: Guests have access to whole house except locked basement and storage room. (Rear ground level studio not included.)
house_rules: Standard Terms and Conditions of Temporary Holiday Accommodation Note: Variances can be agreed on but only by arrangement with the owner in writing. Payment of booking constitutes the clients acceptance of these Terms and Conditions. Balance of the rental amount must be received in full according to AIRBNB policies. If not the owner has the right to cancel the booking and attempt to re let it. The owners will make every effort to ensure the property is available as booked. However the owners reserve the right to make alterations to bookings due to unforeseen circumstances. To maintain a good standard for our guests we require certain conditions to be complied with. We appreciate most will respect our property but the occasional abuse requires that we state the following conditions. Number of Guests should not exceed 6 adults or subsequently agreed in writing or email, and no more than 8 people in the house at one time. Fees will apply for excess guests not agreed with the owners in adv

name: Luxurious Tropical Beach Front Home in Lahaina
summary: The No Ka Oi Hale is the Tropical Beachfront home of your dreams. This idyllic plantation home is located on a beautiful white sand swimming beach on the North end of Lahaina Town. No Ka Oi Hale offers the best combination of quality, comfort, and luxury amenities for your Maui vacation. This tastefully rebuilt Historic Plantation home features 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, vaulted ceilings, tile floors, granite finishes, and breathtaking oceanfront vistas.

This tastefully rebuilt Historic Plantation home features 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, vaulted ceilings, tile floors, granite finishes, and breathtaking oceanfront vistas.

name: 3 Bedroom / Ocean views / Free Parking - Waikiki
summary: ** Book Now for 2019 ** The Royal Kuhio is located in the heart of Waikiki. Guests will find themselves within walking distance to hundreds of shops, restaurants and entertainment destinations.  The world famous Waikiki Beaches are just a 2 block walk away from this condo.
space: This condo is equipped with a full kitchen:  stove and oven, full size refrigerator/w Ice maker, dishwasher, cooking utensils, silver ware, and flatware for the convenience of our guests.   This condo provides a spacious living room furnished beds for 8 people (include a buck bed) and 2 sofa beds, 55’’ television and a lovely dining table that seats six.  The master bedroom is furnished with two queen size beds and 55’’ TV.  The second bedroom is furnished with one full size bed and a set of twin bunk beds with 45’’ TV. Two very large lanais are furnished for relaxation and enjoyment.  The fantastic ocean view and the Friday night fireworks from the first lanai off the main room; From the second lanai appreciate beautiful rainbows in the Manoa Valley.  From the un-believable colorful sunsets to the city lights that light up the night sky the view from this condo will provide you with a wonderful memory. It is convenient to everything you will want to see and do during your vacation. Outdoor activities are countless from this location. Restaurants and international shopping are bountiful nearby. Fast food to 5 star dinning is available. Enjoy the unique Kuhio Ave. for dinning and shopping with the locals. Hawaiian food, Hawaiian artifacts and Hawaiian clothing are all available withing walking distance.
notes: Confirmation and ID must be presented upon check in.  Names of people staying in the condo are required.  Check in time is any time after 3:00 PM and check out time is at ll:00 AM Owners State of Hawaii Tax ID #TA (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: TRANSPORT By Bus--One of the best deals anywhere, TheBus will take you around the whole island for $2.50 ($1.25 for children age 6–17)—if you have time. To get to the North Shore and back takes 4 hours, twice as long as a car. But for shorter distances, TheBus is great, and it goes almost everywhere almost all the time. If you’re planning on sticking to the Waikiki–Ala Moana–Downtown region, go with TheBus, which will save you a lot of car hassle and expense. The most popular route is no. 8, which arrives every 10 minutes or so to shuttle people between Waikiki and Ala Moana Center (the ride takes 15–20 min.). The no. 19 (Airport/Hickam), no. 20 (Airport/Halawa Gate), and no. 40 (Waipahu/Ala Moana) also cover the same stretch. Waikiki service begins daily at 5am and runs until midnight; most buses run about every 15 minutes during the day and every 30 minutes in the evening. By Taxi--Oahu’s major cab companies offer 24-hour, islandwide, radio-dispatched service, with multilingual drive
access: You will have full access to this apartment, plus access to the common area swimming pool, gym, BBQ's and other amenities located on the 7th floor
interaction: Our Guest Host will meet you at the property for your check-in, and a Property Manager is available by phone, text or email and 24 hour answering service to take messages, and alert for emergencies. You will also receive our Welcome Packet Email with all of the contact information needed, plus instructions to call our Guest Host when you arrive at the Honolulu Airport.

name: Cozy Apartment near Charley Young Beach in Kihei
summary: Enjoy the convenience of this cute apartment near the beaches! Hosted by an experienced Superhost, this comfortable one-bedroom first-floor apartment is a 1-block walk to Cove Park Beach and a 2-block walk to Charley Young Beach. Surfing, shopping, dining, bars, grocery stores are all just blocks away. The apartment's location is a convenient home base for many activities you can walk to in Kihei or drive to elsewhere on Maui. Includes AC, free Wi-Fi, free parking spot, full size washer & dryer!
space: Aloha, I'm Thomas your host! If you are looking for a comfortable easy place to stay in Kihei, this would be the spot for you.  Perfect for traveling couples or singles who don't need the hassle of a large condominium complex, but instead want a convenient location from which to explore Maui's beaches and activities! OVERVIEW This apartment is 500 square feet plus a patio in the back.  Includes air conditioners both in the living room and bedroom, full kitchen, King size bed in the bedroom, pull-out sleeper sofa in the living room, large flat screen TV, your own private full-size washer & dryer, free convenient designated parking spot, and free Wi-Fi Internet.  THE INTERIOR This cozy one-bedroom one-bath ground-floor apartment is located in a basic but charming older two-story apartment building that has a character that is more residential than busy resort complex.  The inside of the apartment features tiled flooring throughout, plus granite countertops in the kitchen and bathroom.  N

neighborhood_overview: This charming apartment building right on South Kihei Road in Kihei is perfectly situated within one and two blocks of scenic sandy beaches in either direction: Charley Young Beach on the south side, and Cove Beach on the north side.  Connecting these two beaches on the ocean side of Iliili Road across the street is a lovely green lawn elevated over the water providing a perfect setting for watching nightly sunsets.  Cove Park is the premiere spot in Kihei for surfing and stand-up paddling, and the entry area for this calm ocean inlet is also located a half block away at the north end of the street.  The neighborhood is well located for enjoying easy access to a large variety of fun activities, restaurants and shops all nearby within walking distance. Another block away is the large oceanside Kalama Park, which is the site of annual festivals such as Whale Day in February and Earth day in April. Kalama Park has jogging and bicycling trails, volleyball courts, tennis courts, covered gaz
notes: There is a free Wi-Fi internet connection for this apartment, (subject to rare but possible outages, like any other internet services that can go down...) The name of the wireless network and password are provided on a card inside the apartment.   In the living room there is a TV with a selection of streaming internet television channels and it is also useful for watching movies with streaming apps or the DVD player. The interior of the apartment is updated and modern, however the property is basically a no-frills older building with no pool or hot tub or landscaped grounds, but it has a private patio and the apartment includes its own designated parking spot, and it's in an awesome location!
transit: The apartment building is located right off South Kihei Road, right within very easy walking distance to scenic beaches, the best surfing and stand-up paddling spot in Kihei, plus excellent restaurants, bars, shopping, food stores, surfboard and paddleboard rental shops, bicycle rentals, scooter rentals, and more. Taxis and Airport Shuttles can easily find this road and the bus stop for public transportation on the Maui Bus is less than half a block away on South Kihei Road. Nearby are towns to explore including Wailea, Makena, or further away Maalaea, Kahului, and Lahaina.  La Perouse Bay, which features an impressive landscape dominated by Maui's 500-year-old lava flow, is also a great drive to take when driving past the resort areas of Wailea and Makena. To explore a wider range of destinations on the large island of Maui, a rental car is highly recommended for comfort and convenience, and parking is free in a designated spot that is for your exclusive use during your stay.
access: Guests have full access to all of the amenities of the apartment plus a designated parking spot.
interaction: Your experienced Airbnb Super Host ensures that apartment is ready for you prior to the check-in time, so normally there is no need for the host to interact with guests in person.  The host for this apartment is on call and available via text messaging or phone calls or Airbnb messaging for any issues that arise before, during, and after a guest stay.

name: Gorgeous Apartment with Balcony & Terrace
summary: Brand new and modern apartment on a quite street in Williamsburg. It is only a couple blocks from the L train which takes you to Manhattan in 10 minutes. Both the bedroom and the living room have floor to ceiling east facing windows. You will have tons of sunlight and bright mornings! There is a specious balcony and access to a rooftop with spectacular Manhattan views and a BBQ. If you plan on staying longer or have a different price in mind, please send a message with what you have in mind.
space: The apartment has a beautiful kitchen has a huge countertop, oven & stove, microwave and has all the basics for cooking and eating at home. We also a Nespresso machine, which you can use to whip yourself espressos. We'll be leaving a sleeve of capsules for you. Some other amenities provided or available: large smart tv with Netflix, Youtube, etc, hair dryer, fresh linens and towels. Last, but not least, the balcony has newer furnitures than the ones in the picture. There is a love seat and an Acapulco chair now, so it will be much more comfy than the wooden chairs you see in the picture. If you have any other questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. I want to make sure that you enjoy your stay!

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the best part (ok it's hard to be objective :)) of Williamsburg. You are close to the center of activity on Bedford street (about 15 minutes of walking or 2 stops on the subway), but you are remote enough that you have a quite space for yourself and a more spacious apartment. The neighborhood is an old Italian neighborhood, so you will have traditional Italian grocery stores, restaurants (il passatore is awesome) and pasta shops. You are also close to the best ramen places in Brooklyn like Okonomi or Suzume, or great Korean food in Greenpoint (Little Dokebi).
notes: The apartment is on the 3rd floor, so guests will have to go up 2 flights of stairs.
transit: The apartment is 5 minutes away from the subway (L line), which goes into Manhattan in 3 stops. So getting to downtown Manhattan doesn't take longer than 20 minutes. If you want to take an Uber / Lyft to anywhere in Manhattan or Brooklyn that will also be a decent option.  Street parking is very easy in my neighborhood. Guests with cars have not had any trouble finding a spot.
access: Either I meet you or I leave the keys for you in a lockbox out front. I send you the code prior to your arrival. To assist check in and check out, guests can arrive and depart anytime of day or night I usually give a quick orientation to the space and the neighborhood. I am always available for advice and recommendations for dining, shopping and other services.

name: Historic Home Retreat
summary: The historic home is 15 minutes down the mountain to Waikiki and Ala Moana Mall and close to central Honolulu without getting on the freeway, yet the house is in a rain forest with many well-maintained hiking trails nearby.  Home offers spectacular views of Diamond Head & ocean. Unique Craftsman style architecture with sunrise/sunset views. A book describes the missionary family who built the house and feel you are living a part of Hawaiian history. Three  bedrooms (2 Queen beds, 1 full bed).
space: This is a registered historic home.  The owner can share stories of the missionary family and the building of their cool summer home in the days before air conditioning.
description: The historic home is 15 minutes down the mountain to Waikiki and Ala Moana Mall and close to central Honolulu without getting on the freeway, yet the house is in a rain forest with many well-maintained hiking trails nearby.  Home offers spectacular views of Diamond Head & ocean. Unique Craftsman style architecture with sunrise/sunset views. A book describes the missionary family who built the house and feel you are living a part of Hawaiian history. Three  bedrooms (2 Queen beds, 1 full bed). This is a registered historic home.  The owner can share stories of the missionary family and the building of their cool summer home in the days before air conditioning. The lot is 3 1/2 acres of wooded rain forest and terraced gardens.  There is guest parking up a long private drive lined by a bamboo forest. The house is on a sloped lot with limited disability access and small children should always be accompanied around the property since the property is in a rain forest. The owner lives in the
neighborhood_overview: If you've ever dreamed of living in a real rainforest jungle, now is your chance.  There are many well maintained hiking trails through the surrounding hills and forest.
notes: 1) The house is located in a conservation rain forest district. Utility water is provided through a catchment system from the rain which is not potable but used for showers, cooking, laundry, brushing teeth, etc. Potable drinking water is provided through bottled water which is kept filled daily and left at the doorstep. 2) There is wireless internet connection via fiber cable for TV viewing and to connect to devices. The home has cable TV; DVD player; no phone landline is in the house.  3) The house has a security monitoring system. 4) The house and property are maintained for the historic quality. The grounds are on a hill with limited disability access; children are welcome but should be accompanied at all times because the property is located in a hillside rain forest. 5) Fireplace has an electric built-in unit that provides heat. 7) Small space heaters in two bedrooms. 8) Parking for 1 vehicle with additional parking negotiable. 9) A car is necessary to access the property because
transit: Waikiki and Ala Moana Mall are a 15 minute scenic drive down the mountain.
access: The lot is 3 1/2 acres of wooded rain forest and terraced gardens.  There is guest parking up a long private drive lined by a bamboo forest. The house is on a sloped lot with limited disability access and small children should always be accompanied around the property since the property is in a rain forest.
interaction: The owner lives in the home next door and can offer advice on where to go in Oahu and make your stay more personalized.
house_rules: Like most private homes  in Hawaii, guests are asked to not wear shoes or slippers in the house. Shoes can be left inside the front door at the entry foyer. The historic home is in a neighborhood therefore are requested to minimize noise after 10 PM. Children are welcome but because the property is located in a hillside rain forest, children should always be supervised. For parties and events, noise level should be kept to a minimum after 10 PM out of respect for the neighbors.

name: Unit 414 Luxurious Top Floor Condo Great Views
summary: If you prefer high-end living, this condo is for you!  It is fully renovated and gorgeous with amazing ocean and courtyard views!   Kana'i A Nalu is a quiet resort on the ocean front away from the road.  This complex sits  on a 3-mile stretch of white sand beach that spans almost the entire Ma'alaea Bay. Wonderful for romantic sunset strolls or for a beach run.   This property is located less than a mile walking distance to Ma'alaea Harbor and centrally located between South and North Maui.
space: The condo is elegant and luxurious in decor and comfort!  This property is stunning and the views are spectacular.  You may not want to leave the condo. Welcome to Kana'i A Nalu a quiet resort that sits on the ocean away from the road.  This complex sits directly on a 3-mile stretch of white sand beach that spans almost the entire Ma'alaea Bay. This setting is wonderful for romantic sunset strolls. For the more active person this is a great beach to run on as you can do so for miles in peace away from the crowds. The west end of the beach is Haycraft Park and Ma'alaea Harbor. If there is a big south swell, the wave off the harbor, "Freight Trains," can be one of the best in the world attracting expert surfers. Towards the east of Ma'alaea is a great spot for windsurfing, during both trade and Kona winds. This property is located less than a mile walking distance to Ma'alaea Harbor and it is centrally located on the island between South and North Maui. Three miles of quiet sandy beach w

neighborhood_overview: Hidden gem in terms of location and the long expansive beach!  This complex is quiet and away from the busy roads.  Plus it is only a 20 minute drive to Lahaina and 20 minutes to Wailea and 15 minutes to the airport. This lovely resort sits on Sugar Beach!  You can walk for miles on the soft sandy beach! There are other boating trips that depart from other harbors and Maalaea Harbor is less than a mile from our other beautiful rentals Kanai A Nalu and Island Sands. Many dive/snorkeling excursions and sunset dinner cruises take off from here.  Maalaea Harbor has wonderful dining experiences for all budgets and a variety of cuisine choices to whet the appetite!  There are fun activities for the kids and adults visit Maui Golf and Sports Park.  You can play miniature golf, X-treme trampoline, rock wall climb, and bumper boats.  If you want to venture under water and stay on dry land visit the Maui Ocean Center!  Named one of the Top 25 Best Aquariums in the U.S. by TripAdvisor, the Aquari
notes: A short walk down the quiet, tree-lined road will lead you to Ma’alaea Harbor with its great restaurants and shops, including the Five Star rated waterfront. Just steps away is the Maui Ocean Center Aquarium, a putt-putt golf course, rock climbing wall, trampoline and bumper boats. Fun for the entire family!    The lanai is the perfect place to enjoy morning coffee or tea as you watch the whales playing (December-March) or boats going in and out of the harbor. The ocean front heated pool is set in a tropical landscaped courtyard that will inspire you to relax.  If you’re not into swimming there are plenty of lounge chairs for reading and sunning. There are charcoal barbecues and a gas grill for you to use. This 950 sq ft condo has two bedrooms and two full bathrooms, both have identical walk-in showers one has an added bench for sitting.  This lovely home is a highend remodel suite  for guests who want to stay in luxury and comfort.  Enjoy the tropical décor, three flat screen TVs, and
transit: Maui offers public bus system less than a mile from the complex.  We also have UBER and taxis.  We include a reserved parking spot for your rental car.

There is a separate ohana (guest house) which can also be rented. Please ask if interested as it is not included and is rented out separately. Nestled right on the ocean in Maalaea Bay, the gentle sounds of the waves will lull you to sleep every night.  Sunrise and sunset views of Haleakala are directly in front of you. WE WILL WANT TO RECTIFY IT IMMEDIATELY SO YOU CAN ENJOY YOUR STAY. CHECK OUT TIME IS 11AM LATE CHECK OUTS CAN BE ARRANGED FOR A ½ DAY RATE CHARGE, JUST ASK US. IT WOULD ALLOW YOU TO RELAX AND STAY UNTIL YOUR FLIGHT WHATEVER TIME THAT MAY BE. PLEASE WASH YOUR SANDY FEET WITH ONE OF THE HOSES OUTSIDE BEFORE ENTERING THE HOUSE.  PLEASE DON’T PUT DIRTY FEET ON THE SOFA MASTER BATHROOM LOCKS BY LIFTING THE HANDLE UP, YOU CANT TELL FROM INSIDE ITS LOCKED BUT IT IS. DO NOT LEAVE THE HOME UNLOCKED WHEN YOU ARE NOT HOME. WE ASK THAT YOU LEAVE OUR HOME IN SIMILAR CONDITION AS DELIVERED All dishes, pots, pans, silverware and glasses returned to their places All opened food discarded, items in sealed containers may be left All trash is taken out to the trash bins.  	All air conditioners are turned of

name: OCEAN FRONT KA'ANAPALI DREAM GETAWAY
summary: Get ready to "Practice Aloha!" at our Hawaiian home away from home!  Whether you enjoy lounging by the pool, sunbathing on the beach, or watching whales, our space at the Westin Ka'anapali North Resort has something for everyone. This reservation comes with coveted access to ocean-front views and balcony, not to mention a spacious living, dining, and kitchen space. Combining the conveniences of a five-star resort with the comfort of home, we can't imagine spending time in Maui anywhere else!
space: Your reservation features an ocean-front view and balcony over the gorgeous Ka'anapali beach. In addition to the incredible setting, your room contains updated amenities, kitchen, living room and cozy king-size bed.

name: Stunning Queen bedroom with Balcony
summary: Our place is located in the quiet North Bondi, walking distance to local shops and cafes, and the famous Bondi beach! The apartment is decorated in a beach-chic style with all the modern amenities you would need. The bedroom has a queen bed, along with space in the wardrobe to hang clothes. From the bedroom you're able to see the sea, fall asleep to the sound of the waves, or sit on the balcony for morning/evening drinks and look at the blue!
space: Bedroom has queen bed, wardrobe and mirrors. Balcony off the bedroom has a small table and chairs and also a chaise long. Kitchen fully stocked with fridge, dishwasher, cooker and oven. Bathroom has shower and bath options. Laundry room in the apartment includes washer and dryer, along with iron and ironing board. WiFi is available throughout the apartment, living room has 2 sofas, and a dining table for meals. TV has normal cable channels, along with HDMI cable if you want to plug in laptop.

neighborhood_overview: North Bondi is the quiet end of Bondi beach, but has a bus stop, small supermarket, cafes, pharmacy, a few restaurants and liquor shop. The beach is 5 mins around the corner too ;)
transit: There is the bus station less than 5 minutes walk around the corner with buses which all go to Bondi Junction Train Station, and then onto the City.
access: Access to all rooms apart from 2nd bedroom.

name: Just Remodeled Studio Condo, Modern, Clean--View!
summary: This just remodeled modern studio is the perfect getaway spot to enjoy your Waikiki vacation!  On the 36th Floor, you have incredible views of the city, the mountains, the Ala Wai Canal, and even some ocean between the buildings.  The condo comes with a kitchenette that includes hot plate, full size refrigerator and utensils.  The location in the Hawaiian Monarch Hotel is perfect for exploring Waikiki, with the beach only about a 10 minute walk, and near shopping, restaurants, and night life.
space: SEE MY REVIEWS! Almost every guest raves about how CLEAN the condo is, the AWESOME VIEW and what a great LOCATION!  This private condo is for the discriminating traveler who wants to stay in a clean, cozy, and modern 212 sq.ft. studio with a kitchenette and an awesome view!  The furniture is new, with a queen bed,  and a new 40" flat screen TV. It's just a 10-minute walk to the beach and on the way you'll pass all kinds of fun stuff, restaurants, bars, shops! Our guests have described the view as 'Awesome".  The view is of the city, mountains, the Ala Wai Canal, and some ocean view also.  This condo is in the Hawaiian Monarch Hotel, just a few blocks from Waikiki Beach.  There is a pool, Jacuzzi, coin laundry, car rental, great restaurants, sports bar and a night club on the premises.  This is a privately owned and managed condominium and please be assured that all your needs will be met conscientiously and professionally.  We want to make your stay a happy one! neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood of Eixample is the best option for travellers interested in architecture, gastronomy and shopping. Nowadays Eixample is famous for being home to the majority of Barcelona's Art Nouveau masterpieces, and a high-class residential and shopping area. Passeig de Gràcia is the heart of Eixample, here you will find most of Barcelona's international designer shops such as Chanel, Louis Vuitton and MaxMara. Also along this road are located La Pedrera and Casa Batlló, two of Antoni Gaudí's characteristically dreamlike buildings. There are many interesting art galleries in the area, such as Fundación Antoni Tapies, which has a permanent collection of this Catalan artist's work. Eixample is a safe and residential part of the city but there is also a vibrant nightlife and a thriving café culture. Eixample is a beautiful “barrio” to wander round, take in the glorious architecture and watch people from one of the many terrace cafes. It is in Eixample that you will find some of the b
notes: IMPORTANT NOTE: The tourist tax is not included in the price of the accommodation and has to be paid upon arrival at the apartment. The cost is 2.52 euros per adult (above 16 years old) per night. It only has to be paid for the first 7 days of the stay. The amount of the stay for monthly rentals does not include expenses for supplies that are usually between 50 and 100 euros per month.
transit: You can easily walk to all tourist attractions in the city center. Subway: the subway station Passeig de Gracia is 50 mts. walk from the apartment (yellow line L4, green line L3, violet line L2). Aerobus: the stop of the Aerobus – Plaza Catalunya is 5 minutes walk from the apartment. The price of the ticket is 5.90€ per person per way and the duration of the trip is 25 minutes. (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Train: The train station of Passeig de Gracias (RENFE Cercanías) is 5 minutes walk away from the apartment and connects with Barcelona Airport- El Prat (Terminal 2) from 6 am to 11.30pm. There is a train every half an hour and the trip lasts approximately 40 minutes. For public transport we suggest buying the T-10 ticket, a ten trip ticket which is multi-personal and valid for all of the public transport, including the train that connects the city with the airport. For unlimited trips for 2 up to 5 days please check the travel cards HOLA BCN! Taxi: The price for a taxi from the airpor

The combination of antique and modern details as well as furnitures, creates a charming and unique atmosphere in the apartment. It has 1 spacious bedrooms (2 individual beds), 1 bathroom with a capacity of 2 people perfectly suitable for couples. The client has access to all the apartment. Our office, which is open Monday to Friday from 10am to 7pm is located in the same building as our apartments, this way we ensure an immediate response and personalised attention to all our clients. Feel free to contact
neighborhood_overview: Without any doubt, one of the main advantages of 1840 Serviced Apartments Barcelona is its unbeatable location. In Barcelona, our serviced apartments are where the backstreets of the old city quarter give way to the Meditarranean light. From our apartments you will revel in the sights that will take you beyond the Gothic quarters, with the backdrop of the Montjuic castle, or gaze at the sailing boats and luxury yachts in Port Vell and the quiet immensity of the Mediterranean, with the beaches on one side and the harbour at your feet. Within a 10 minute walk you will find many places of tourist interest, shopping areas, museums, parks and beaches. You can also enjoy a staggering variety of entertainment, nighlife and gastronomy.
notes: Price includes: utilities (water, electricity, gas), high speed internet, weekly cleaning with a change of bed sheets and towels, and maintenance.
transit: For an easy access to any part of Barcelona in front of the apartment there are several bus stops that go up Via Laietana, Paseo Colón and Las Ramblas. Among them buses V15, V17, D20… The other convenient option is to travel by metro which runs every 5 minutes, the closest stations are L4 Barceloneta or Jaume I in 5 minutes journey can take you to the sights such as Urquinaona Square or Paseo de Gracia. Despite the bus or underground, there is Estació de França train station which is 7 minutes away walking distance, and there trains depart every 15 minutes to the center of Barcelona (Sants or Passeig de Gràcia) as well as Sitges and many other destinations.
access: The client has access to all the apartment.
interaction: Our office, which is open Monday to Friday from 10am to 7pm is located in the same building as our apartments, this way we ensure an immediate response and personalised attention to all our clients. Feel free to contact us directly via email or our 24h telephone.
house_rules: To be refunded of deposit please follow our simple rules:  1) communicate to us if during your stay there is any breakage of the apartment belongings  2) Return the accommodation in a clean and tidy state or pay an extra cleaning.  3) Do not leave keys inside the lock or pay the locksmith 100€  4) Vacate the apartment by 11am (unless agreed differently) or pay 40€  5) Return all keys or pay 30€ for each key missing  6) Do not smoke in the apartment  7) Do not allow extra guests other than those in the booking

neighborhood_overview: For many, the Plateau is quintessential Montréal. Spiral staircases, bagels, Arcade Fire – it all started here in this rich and vast neighbourhood north of downtown. Hip, trendy and artsy, the Plateau – especially its famed enclave of Mile End – is known as much for its residential quaintness as its festive nighttime antics. By day, kids play in the parks and friends debate politics in cafés; by night, restaurants and bars teem with people.
transit: There is a Bus only a block away. Metro Mont Royal can be accessed from a 10 minutes walk away.

summary: One bedroom with a comfy queen sized bed, built within an old factory with a spacious common area.  The loft is located in up-and-coming Bushwick, a neighborhood for artists/latino community/young professionals.  Close to food markets, hip bars and restaurants, art spaces, loft parties, bookstores and cafes.  18 mins to Williamsburg and 27 mins to Manhattan via the L train.
space: The loft is located in an old factory built in 1931 with soaring high ceilings and large factory windows, which gives it a very unique feeling.  It features an interesting build out within, years of different residents here have left their mark on the space, as have I as well.  These contributions over the years lends themselves to a very creative and playful atmosphere.  I've filled it with green living things, beautiful textures, and wooden things - it's the Brooklyn loft home of my dreams, a place where I work (currently working on an album) rest and commune.   New York City is a place where the energy constantly drives you forward; my loft is a great place to slow things down and recharge between exploring the city, and you'll find me there writing and working on projects.  :) Your cozy room is situated within the main common area and is connected to the space via a door and a window that opens and shuts into the common area.  It's a uniquely shaped space with a full-size bed, a po

New York City is a place where the energy constantly
neighborhood_overview: Bushwick is a predominantly south/central american / puerto rican neighborhood, with an emerging presence of artists and young professionals from all over the world, which is shaping the neighborhood in new ways.  We have many cafes, vintage shops, bars, street vendors, clubs, restaurants, galleries, vinyl record shops - really, you name it, all within walking distance.  If you want to feel the real creative energy New York City has to offer, this is the neighborhood where everything is happening in the most dynamic way.   For green space, Maria Hernandez Park is just a few blocks away and it's full of life, trees, and locals hanging out and having a good time.   House of Yes is a super fun place to catch a unique show or dance party. Roberta's is a world-famous pizza place a short walk from my apartment. Cafe Bunna is a fun all-vegan Ethiopian restaurant and venue nearby.
notes: When I'm in town, I live, practice, and work out of this lovely sunny space and I like to keep busy, splitting my time between music, yoga, meditation, study, and work out in the city. My roommate Shiho is from Tokyo and is a yoga instructor.
transit: My place is a 3 minute walk to the Knickerbocker M stop and an  8 minute walk to the Dekalb L stop.  The L is notoriously fast and connects you to Williamsburg and all of Manhattan.   It's a very convenient train line that runs 24 hours a day.  The M train at the Knickerbocker stop is currently under maintenance and is therefore not currently running, but the L train leaves you fully connected to the city and getting around shouldn't be a problem.
access: - roof access -light-filled common space - kitchen - shared refrigerator - shared bathroom
interaction: I'm a social and giving person by nature, and I love equally to hold a conversation and to give space.  It all depends on the moment.  I keep busy when I'm at home - I'm a professional musician and I'm engrossed with various learning and creative projects, so please understand that this is a kind of zen environment conducive to creativity - but when I'm disengaged from that I'm happy to share conversation, a meal, a song, or a tea/coffee.
house_rules: - No guests.   - be mindful - This environment is a work/live space with a mixture of long term and short term guests (you, me and Shiho).   - Shoes off indoors, please.   - No smoking indoors.  You are welcome to make use of the rooftop or go outside the building to smoke.    - Wash dishes and wipe kitchen surfaces after use.

name: ORM - Cativo Apartment
summary: Apartment located on the 2nd floor front of a building totally rehabilitated outside and inside in 2016, maintaining the original facade. Located on Rua do Cativo, in the heart of Porto's historical center, the apartment is located near the Terço Church, within the Fernandina wall, 1 minute walking from the Sé and the Luis I. It has 1 double bed, 1 bathroom with shower, fully equipped kitchen and living room with double sofa bed. Ideal for 1 - 4 people. Prices vary according to the seasons.
space: If this apartment is not available on the required dates, check out our other apartments through our profile. See also our list of additional services, which will elevate your experience in our city. This apartment is located on Rua do Cativo, close to the Terço Church whose construction dates back to 1759. It has as main points of interest the Igreja da Sé and the National Theater São João. Ideal for couples or groups up to 4 people who prefer to stay in the heart of the historic center of Porto, within walking distance of the main points of interest of the city.

neighborhood_overview: Situated in a residential area, 140m (1 minute walk) from the Porto Cathedral (Sé) and the famous Luís I bridge where you can enjoy a breathtaking and unforgettable view of the historic Ribeira and modern Cais de Gaia, divided by the imposing Douro River. You can also visit on foot the main tourist points of the city, as well as the area where are the cafes, bars and places of entertainment. Points of interest: - Porto Cathedral (Sé do Porto) (140m / 1min walk)  - Luís I bridge (350m / 3min walk)  - Rua de Santa Catarina - Majestic Café (550m / 6min walk)  - Avenida dos Aliados (400m / 5min walk)  - Ribeira (650m / 7 min walk)  - S. Francisco Church (750m / 8 min walk)  - Mercado do Bolhão (1km / 15min walk / 5 min by subway/tram)  - Torre dos Clérigos - Lello Library(650m / 7 min walk)  - Nossa Senhora do Carmo das Carmelitas Church (900m / 12 min walk)

name: Vintage paradise
summary: Mon appartement est idéal pour un petit séjour à Montréal en solo ou en couple. Situé sur une petite rue tranquille de Rosemont, on retrouve une piste cyclable juste devant en plus de toutes les commodités nécessaires : épicerie fine, SAQ, pharmacie, fruiterie, borne Bixi ainsi que plusieurs restaurants et bars branchés de la ville.  Si vous voulez découvrir Montréal pour la première fois ou simplement y passer quelques jours, cet appartement est parfait pour vous.
space: Il y a beaucoup d'amour dans mon logis et on s'y sent automatiquement chez soi. L'appartement est personnalisé et très bien équipé (surtout si vous aimez cuisiner). Fonctionnelle et accueillant, vous profiterez de la vie de quartier comme de vrai Montréalais !

transit: Tous types de transports accessibles à moins de 15 minutes à pieds (autobus, métro et Bixi). Près de la ligne orange qui amène au centre-ville en 25 minutes de transports en commun.

name: LUXICO - Principino
summary: Sweeping views to the Sydney Opera House and Bridge will make your Sydney stay ever so special at Principino. Gated and private from the street, this beautifully presented home features 4 bedrooms, multiple living areas and pool and is just a short walk to the shops.
space: Set in manicured gardens, this home is ideal for families and designed over three levels to make the most of the incredible views. Upstairs is a large open plan living area with contemporary kitchen, extensive living and dining area and separate TV cinema room. An enormous terrace is ideal for entertaining. The middle level also boasts incredible views from the main and second bedroom. Two other beautifully furnished bedrooms are light and bright. The main bedroom is enormous and has its own ensuite while the second and third bedroom share a large two way ensuite. A large rumpus room or retreat sits on the lower floor and comprises a kitchenette and is fully contained. The space overlooks the pool and garden.  This property comes complete with secure off-street parking for two cars in a stunning Sydney location. Home Truths :  Bedroom #1: King Bed w/ ensuite bathroom (shower) + shared balcony w/ bedroom #2 Bedroom #2: 2x King Single Beds + shared balcony and large two-way ensuite bathr

neighborhood_overview: One of Sydney’s grandest suburbs, Mosman is located just 8kms from the CBD over the Sydney Harbour Bridge. It’s a suburb many aspire to live in and once you’re there, there’s little reason to leave, with plenty of shops along Military Road, stunning scenery and even the iconic Taronga Zoo to keep you amused. Balmoral Beach offers a more relaxed atmosphere, with parks, swimming and beachside cafes. It’s tempting to stay at home and get lost in the harbour view from your balcony, but at some point it’s important to leave the house. A walk through Mosman is an excellent workout due to the inevitable hill-climbing challenges. There’s a community bus for short trips and plenty of buses into the CBD; or the ferry if you prefer a water crossing. Small clumps of village shops include delicatessens, bakeries and specialty gift stores, while the major shopping precinct is located on Military Road.
notes: Bookings made via AirBNB are subject to the standard booking terms and conditions displayed on the Luxico Holiday Homes website.  You must be over 28 years old to book this property. Please contact us if the majority of your guests are aged under 28 to confirm suitability of this property.  Parties are strictly prohibited. Payment of your deposit constitutes acceptance of our terms and conditions. Please contact us if you would like a copy of these terms prior to booking.  For security reasons, a copy of your Australian Drivers License or International Passport is required prior to check-in along with confirmed names for all guests staying at the property along with a signed Booking Agreement before access details can be provided. This is not negotiable! Please don’t book with us if you are not comfortable providing this information.
access: All Luxico guests receive a bottle of bubbles in the fridge plus a gourmet welcome hamper including tea, coffee, jams, muesli, milk and some tasty treats.  We supply luxury toiletries and towels and our beds are made up with top quality linen ensuring a comfortable stay.
interaction: One of our superhosts will meet you at the property to hand over keys and answer any queries you may have about the home. Our 24/7 concierge team are on hand to help you with any special requests during your stay.

name: Kit net Gracinha in Copa
summary: The flat is located at Nossa Senhora de Copacabana Avenue, 4 blocks away from the beach, close to Posto 4. A short walk along the beachfront will take you to Leme, where you can fird street markets and expositions. On the other side, if you keep walking you’ll get to Pedra do Arpoador, famous for its gorgeous sunset. Later all you have to do is go back to the flat and plan a night out at the famous and full of life Lapa neighborhood, situated very close to the flat.
space: The flat is a “kitnet” (kitchen, bathroom, bedroom-living room, 27m2 in total) recently fully refurbished (2016) to make sure everything works perfectly (including electrical installations) and to provide a very comfortable stay for our guests. All the equipment and items in the flat can be used: fridge, toast grill, hot plate (electric stove), pans, electric shower, cupboard and wardrobe, air conditioner, small fan, washing machine, bed linen and towels and Wi-Fi. We don’t offer breakfast but the building is located next to a bakery/pizzeria, full of very tasty food! The building is located in a kind of “hideaway”, Travessa Angrense (total comfort and silence, since the main entrance of the building is not via the very busy Nossa Senhora de Copacabana Avenue), having a beautiful flower shop in the entrance. The building is fully equipped with security items such as cameras in the entrance and elevators, fire extinguishers, stairs and a doorman 24h a day.

transit: Como chegar/Aeroporto Internacional:  Ônibus especial com ar-condicionado direção Copacabana, descer na Avenida Santa Clara,  tempo estimado  45 à 60 minutos. Como chegar/Rodoviária Novo Rio:  Ônibus convencional linhas: (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) ou ônibus especial com ar-condicionado em direção à Copacabana, descer na Rua Santa Clara. O tempo estimado é de 30 à 40 minutos. Circulando pelo bairro: Existem duas estações de metro (Cardeal Arco Verde e Siqueira campos) muito próximas ao apartamento que ligam o bairro Copacabana as outras estações da cidade do Rio de Janeiro. Ambas exigem uma caminhada de no máximo 10 minutos.  Além disso, há um ponto de ônibus exatamente na frente do prédio onde o apartamento está localizado e um ponto de táxi na rua de trás. Facilidade total para a locomoção na Cidade Maravilhosa!!!
access: The flat has a bedroom-living room together and a separated kitchen as well as bathroom. Feel free to use all the space in the flat. Interaction with the guests We won’t be together during your stay in the apartment, since I don’t live in Rio, but tips and doubts could be asked at any moment via email or phone call.

summary: Great, older space close to The J train station and various eateries like McDonald's, Carrizal Bar & Grill, Bedstuy Fish Fry. You’ll love my place because of the high ceilings and the location. Minute from lower Manhattan. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The a/c works but is a bit noisy.  In addition, there is a private hair salon on the premises, on the lower level, servicing all hair needs for men and women!

neighborhood_overview: This is a great neighborhood because it is pretty assessable to many things! It's an area that has a lot of life but is quiet at the same time! There are many eateries in and around the neighborhood from Spanish to African, Jamacian to Chinese, Haitian, Italian, various cafés, etc. Bushwick is also very close to lower Manhattan and the J subway station is right around the corner!! 15 mins to the city just over the Williamsburg bridge!
notes: This is a great space for those who want to have a nice cozy, at home away from home feel! Though this is a double occupancy, this suite can sleep up to four adults (additional fees apply). There is plenty of natural light that flows through the space! It is mostly quiet in the apartment for those who enjoy sleeping in late. It is a good transient area to explore Brooklyn and the city of New York!
transit: Lots of means of transportation in the area. Just two short blocks away from the J train and right across the street from the B-52 bus that takes you downtown Brooklyn. Also the B-47 bus, one block away, takes you straight to one of Brooklyn's famous malls Kings Plaza.  One of the best things is that it is very easy to get to many different places! B-47 or B-52, 38 to the malls, Q-24 to Queens, NY. The B-15, 7 blocks away, takes you straight to JFK airport.  For more private means of transport you can take one of many car services in the area.

name: Luxury 3-Acre Garden Eco-Estate 10 min to Kona
summary: 3 Bedrooms, 2.5 Bathrooms, Private Pool, Pool Pavilion, WiFi On 3 Secluded Acres Of Gardens, 10 min to Kona airport, Kailua Kona, Beach
space: THE LOCATION: Welcome to Kaloko Gardens Retreat, a secluded 3-acre eco-estate overlooking Kona on the slopes of Mt. Hualalai.  Just ten minutes from the airport, town, and beaches, this luxurious, solar-powered sanctuary was created to provide an unforgettable personal or business retreat experience.  Here you will encounter the heart of Hawaii, a place of quiet and beauty in nature. Enjoy hundreds of botanical specimens of tropical flowering plants throughout the estate. Stroll through the orchard and the gardens. Explore the native Hawaiian forest to discover rare and endangered species. Enjoy complete seclusion with incredibly convenient, ten-minute access to all that Kona has to offer, from best restaurants to beaches. Hualalai.  Just ten minutes from the airport, town, and beaches, this luxurious, solar-powered sanctuary was created to provide an unforgettable personal or business retreat experience.  Here you will encounter the heart of Hawaii, a place of quiet and beauty in nature. Enjoy hundreds of botanical specimens of tropical flowering plants throughout the estate. Stroll through the orchard and the gardens. Explore the native Hawaiian forest to discover rare and endangered species. Enjoy complete seclusion with incredibly convenient, ten-minute access to all that Kona has to offer, from best restaurants to beaches. neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is rich in nature and culture. Community Gardens and trees are among the residential areas while the Highland Park and cemeteries are distant closer to the highways. Also our well preserved Ridgewood reservoir is an amazing spot of well-kept nature where you can take a break from the heavy air polluted from Manhattan.  Traditional Brooklyn area which will soon disappear due to the new developing wave coming from Downtown Brooklyn. In this wonderful area of Brooklyn you can always find parking since it is a family oriented area with more 1-2 family houses rather than buildings.  The freedom of religion is very well expressed by the presence of old- constructions of a Russian and Spanish Catholic church among other American contemporaneous churches.  This neighborhood is rich in diversity. You will find all kind of residents from around the world. Our diversity is shown in our Chinese restaurant, Spanish and Venezuelan restaurants (Popular “arepas” = corn cake delicatess
notes: Iron and hairdryer are available upon request. A set of keys will be in your room. I would either get the door for you or leave a key that you must NOT take with you for self access.

name: Bondi-Tamarama BEACHFRONT Apartment
summary: This gorgeous 3-bedroom apartment is directly across the road from the beach. It's very light, beautifully decorated and all within minutes of Bondi, Bronte, restaurants, shops and buses to the CBD. Watch the waves as you have a drink on the balcony.
space: Here are a few of the highlights of The BEACHFRONT Apartment: THE APARTMENT The building only has 7 apartments in total. Your new neighbours are lovely. They all enjoy spending time at the beach and they are mature enough to avoid late nights and loud parties so you won't be disturbed. THE BALCONY It wraps around the front of the building and gives you a huge entertaining space. From the balcony you stare straight at the water and out to the horizon. It's stunning! INTERNALLY We have furnished the apartment using light and bright colours to capture all of the sun that pours into the rooms throughout the day. There are three different eating areas - the dining table, the breakfast bar with views out to the beach and an outdoor table and chairs (where you'll probably spend most of your time) ENTERTAINMENT If you want to, you can sit inside and watch the huge 54" TV and use the DVD player or you can walk to Bondi and watch some real life entertainment at any one of the bars, clubs or live
