THE BALCONY It wraps around the front of the building and gives you a huge entertaining space. From the balcony you stare straight at the water and out to the horizon. It's stunning! INTERNALLY We have furnished the apartment using light and bright colours to capture all of the sun that pours into the rooms throughout the day. There are three different eating areas - the dining table, the breakfast bar with views out to the beach and an outdoor table and cha
neighborhood_overview: Tamarama is the younger, arguably prettier, sister to Bondi Beach. It's a relatively quiet beach where locals spend hours bathing in the sun. There is a park here with BBQs, toilets, changing rooms and a large grassy area to make a picnic. GREAT OCEAN WALK While you're in the area, you must take the Great Ocean Walk. It's a pathway that hugs the coast line all the way from Bondi to Coogee beach. Thankfully, it crosses your doorstep. Just join the throngs of people making the pilgrimage every day. SCULPTURES BY THE SEA Every year artists erect a series of sculptures along the Great Ocean Walk. It's a magical display set against the ocean views along the walk and it attracts thousands of local people and others from around the world. This year it is happening from 24 October - 10 November.
notes: FREE BOTTLE OF CHAMPAGNE We want you to have a great time when you stay at our place. We like the idea of you sitting out on the balcony celebrating something and admiring the view. So, anyone that books for 3 nights or more will find a bottle of Veuve Cliquot in the fridge upon arrival. SAVING LIVES We are really thankful to live by the beach and it's a stunning beach. One of the things that makes this beach a great place to swim and have fun in summer are the lifesavers who volunteer their time to look after the people who use the beach. Chances are that you've chosen our place partly because of the beach out the front. So to thank the guys that look after the beach for us, 10% of everything that you pay to us will be given to them as a donation. It's the least we can do for the guys that keep the beach safe. We'll send you a copy of the receipt and any comments that we get from them in thanks.
transit: BUSES The local area is serviced by buses that will take you to other transport hubs that will take you anywhere you need to go or you can catch a local bus directly to the CBD and be there in about 15 minutes. You'll have access to the internet from the computer set up for you in the apartment. Just either call 131500 and ask them for help or search 131500 on a search engine and you'll find a website showing all the timetables. You're not too far from anywhere!
access: All guests will have free access to all the amenities and facilities in the Apartment. This includes a coffee machine, dishwasher, washing machine, dryer, 434 litre fridge, a complete library of books, 54" TV & DVD Player, wireless broadband internet, sound system and an intercom / security system. TRANSPORT Once you arrive at The BEACHFRONT Apartment you probably won't want to leave. But should the need arise, there is transport immediately out the front. The #361 bus stop is across the ride and it will take you to Bondi Junction or Bondi Beach. From the Junction you can catch buses and trains to the city. The bus is handy, however, most things are within walking distance anyway.
interaction: Unfortunately, we don't get to meet the guests. We leave keys outside in a 'lockbox' which allows you to collect them whenever you arrive. We usually stay nearby and are available in the event that you need help with anything.
house_rules: Please be mindful of our neighbours and leave our home as you found it :)

Walking distance from Gramercy Park, Madison Square Park, Eataly, and the Flatiron District!!!

house_rules: - Por favor deje el apartamento ordenado y limpio. - Respete el vecindario, no se permite música fuerte ni fiestas después de las 22h (puede ser motivo de expulsión). - No fumen dentro del apartamento, por favor usen el balcón o la ventana. - Contacte con nosotros si hay algún problema o tiene alguna duda. - El horario del check in es de 13h a 21h, mas tarde de las 21h se cobra un suplemento de 20 euros. - Las reservas para solo un dia reciben un recargo de 20 euros de limpieza Si desea entrar mas pronto consúltenos, KONIBarcelona es flexible y se adapta a las necesidades que usted tenga. - En el apartamento encontrará dos juegos de llaves, si usted pierde una llave se le cobrará un recargo de 60€. ------------------------------------------------------------- - Please leave the apartment tidy and clean.  - Respect the neighborhood, no parties or loud music is allowed after 22h (may be grounds for expulsion).  - No smoking inside the apartment, please use the balcony or window.  - Conta

name: Charming apartment in Plateau Mont Royal
summary: The apartment is in the heart of the Plateau-Mont-Royal, at the border of the Mile-End. All the cafes, restaurants, and boutiques you'd hope for are nearby. The place is also at a 2 min. walk from the Laurier Metro Station, which will take you downtown in minutes. The Parc Laurier is 10 min. away. The place is comfortable, homy, and welcoming, ideally located in a central neighbourhood. Good for couples, small groups, solo adventurers. Families (with kids) are also welcome!
space: Very high ceiling, full of cachet. The first bedroom has its own office space. There is another desk in the guest room as well.  Laundry (washer/dryer) is the apartment.  Fully-equipped kitchen, with bar stools. Cozy living room/dining area. Cute, quiet balcony in the back.  The bathroom is rather small but convenient. Self-check in, which allows for more flexibility.

name: 2BR Sunlight & Secret Garden Apartment
summary: Minimal meets vintage, with loads of light and plants in this 2 bedroom apartment. The space is all custom and hand built by the owner, a fashion designer. The apartment has a secret garden guests are welcome to use. Vintage details are paired with modern appliances and great heating and air conditioning throughout the house. Located in historic central Brooklyn, you'll be steps away from great restaurants, cafes, nightlife, and transport.
space: Hello -  I have a south facing, sun-drenched 2-bedroom apartment in Crown Heights, Brooklyn.  The bedrooms are private and cozy. Each are open plan with wall-mounted racks for your clothing. They both have very comfy queen-sized beds with high thread count sheets. They also boast a lot of space under the bed for luggage or anything else. The house has central heating and AC separate controls for each room, so you'll never be too hot or too cold. As you can see in the pictures, the main room is a kitchen/living space which is shared. There is also a balcony outside the main space which has a stair access down to the garden. The garden is very large with lots of outdoor seating. The garden is shared during the week days with the coworking space I run on the first floor. The apartment comes with free WiFi during your stay, and I provide a set of towels as well. (No one likes to travel with towels). The kitchen could be called a chef's kitchen, because it's pretty big. The oven is convecti

house_rules: 1) Please keep the place as original as possible and clear all the garbage before checking out.  2) Please turn on the water heater around 10 minutes before using and turn it off after finished shower. There has been a few guests leaving the air condition on when check out and wasted a lot of electricity.

name: Large Studio with Harbour glimpses, City Fringe
summary: Fully Furnished, spacious studio apartment, on the 14th floor with partial distant views to Sydney Harbour.  The apartment hotel is located on the Darlinghurst side of Hyde Park, just a few minutes walk across Hyde Park and you will be in the heart of the Sydney CBD.
space: Spacious studio apartment, on the 14th floor of Hyde Park Plaza, with partial distant views to Sydney Harbour. The apartment hotel is located on the Darlinghurst side of Hyde Park, just a few minutes walk across Hyde Park and you will be in the heart of the CBD. There is a small balcony, with an outdoor setting, providing glimpses of the harbour water views. The studio faces the back of the building and away from the traffic noise of Oxford Street. Full kitchen facilities, air-conditioning, TV. There is a double pull-down sofa for extra guests.The apartment has a walk-in wardrobe through to the modern bathroom with bathtub, with shower over the bath.  Within a security, complex, with 24-hour reception, and facilities include a common laundry, rooftop with views & outdoor heated pool & gym.

name: Doorman, modern apart. on Broadway (Central Park)

name: Spacious Studio - Waimea Bay Pointe
summary: Our beach cottage is ocean-side, between Three Tables & Waimea Bay on our gated family property. It's behind the main house, but you'll have full access to the front yard facing the rocky coastline & Pacific Ocean, 30 yards away. You’ll love this studio because of how spacious it is; its mountain & ocean views & its convenient location to all things North Shore! This unique 2-level unit is good for couples, solo adventurers, & business travelers, but may not be suitable for toddlers (stairs).
space: There are beach/ocean/mountain views from every window, and the vaulted ceiling compliments the open floor-plan. Ceiling fans keep it cool during the winter season and an a/c keeps it cool during the hotter summer months. The studio is connected by a breezeway to the owner's home, but is above their main floor, so it feels unattached. The entrance is next to your carport parking stall, and the carpeted stairs takes you upstairs to the living area.  The Kitchenette: Apartment refrigerator/freezer, microwave, blender, coffee maker, toaster, and double burner. (No oven) Assortment of pots and pans, dishes, glasses, coffee cups and utensils. Paper towels, dish soap, sponge and dish-towels.  Sleeping arrangements: One Queen and one Full-size Pune'e (day bed) with bedding for both. We will make up the Pune'e upon request. Bathroom: One bathroom with shower and four sets of towels. Starter toilet paper, soap and shampoo. Washer/Dryer & Clothesline is downstairs. Laundry basket, clothespins, l
description: Our beach cottage is ocean-side, between Three Tables & Waimea Bay on our gated family property. It's behind the main house, but you'll have full access to the front yard facing the rocky coastline & Pacific Ocean, 30 yards away. You’ll love this studio because of how spacious it is; its mountain & ocean views & its convenient location to all things North Shore! This unique 2-level unit is good for couples, solo adventurers, & business travelers, but may not be suitable for toddlers (stairs). There are beach/ocean/mountain views from every window, and the vaulted ceiling compliments the open floor-plan. Ceiling fans keep it cool during the winter season and an a/c keeps it cool during the hotter summer months. The studio is connected by a breezeway to the owner's home, but is above their main floor, so it feels unattached. The entrance is next to your carport parking stall, and the carpeted stairs takes you upstairs to the living area.  The Kitchenette: Apartment refrigerator/freezer,
neighborhood_overview: In the summer, we have the best view for the Fourth of July Annual Paddleboard race that starts from Sunset Beach and ends right here in Waimea Bay! From November to May, you can whale-watch from the yard or along the coastline. In the winter, front row seats to spectacular monster waves 20 - 40 feet high!
notes: There is NO SMOKING in or around the unit. We have designated an area under the tent in the front yard where smoking is allowed if unoccupied. Foodland supermarket is 1/4 mile down the road and has all your grocery and sundry needs, and features a deli and coffee shop. Just around the corner from Foodland and directly across Sharks Cove is a "food court" with food trucks offering everything from shave ice & fish tacos to burgers & sandwiches. The Sea Maids boutiques sell pareos, bikinis, surf trunks, slippers & hats. There are snorkel, surfboard and bike rentals there too!
transit: Having a rental car is optimal for exploring this island, but the bus system here can take you to Haleiwa, Waikiki, and circle island! Information can be obtained at (URL HIDDEN)  The bike path from Three Tables beach will take you all the way to Back Yards, past Sunset Beach. Bike rentals can be found with Joe & Carrie at (URL HIDDEN) | (EMAIL HIDDEN) | (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) or at the Sea Maids shops at Sharks Cove.
access: Beach: 3 minute walk - Three Tables to the North, Waimea Bay to the South. Front yard: Grassy yard and covered patio area with tables and chairs. Please join us for our family gatherings on holidays and the weekend!  Rocky shoreline: If you have good balance, you may use the wooden stairs along the wall to the rocks. Proceed at own risk! Do NOT access if the waves are big. This shoreline is protected by the Hawaii Marine Life Conservation District, so nothing may be taken... no fish, shells, rocks, seaweed...nothing! Pole fishing is allowed as long as you are casting your line INTO Waimea Bay.
interaction: We love to talk about our favorite places, activities and foods to eat here on the North Shore, but if you prefer to adventure on your own,  you'll find lots of information in the Guest Book. Again, this is our family property, and we like to get together with family and friends and welcome you to join us for a BBQ, impromptu meal or just to “talk story.” Some activities/places to see within a mile radius is Sharks Cove for summer time tide pool exploration and winter time surf watching; the Heiau in Pupukea which overlooks Waimea Bay and the North Shore coastline; and Waimea Valley Park for nature lovers.
house_rules: Hawaiian style:  1) ALL FOOTWEAR STAYS DOWNSTAIRS, on the tiled area. That means shoes, slippers, sandals, flip-flops/thongs (but don't say that in Hawaii, we call 'em SLIPPAHS!), reef-walkers, slip-ons, Crocs, etc.  2) RINSE OFF ALL SAND BEFORE ENTERING THE HOUSE. Chances are, if you survived the pounding shore break at Waimea, you got a load of sand in your bathing suit. This will clog up the plumbing in the shower, so PLEASE leave the sand at the beach or rinse out your suits with the hose before entering the studio. 3) Do not hang beach towels on balcony. DO hang them on the clothesline downstairs. 4) Do not use the white bath towels for food spills, muddy feet or makeup removal, etc. That's what the rags (under the kitchen and bathroom sinks) and black wash towels are for!   5) No extra guests. 6) RESPECT the ocean. NEVER turn your back on her. If in doubt, don't go out. Swim at beaches that have a lifeguard nearby.

name: At Home in Authentic Porto

name: Kauai 2 Bedroom Family Getaway | 2 Pools
summary: Located on Kaweonui Point and adjacent to two golf courses, this luxury Kauai destination is surrounded by lush greens that will captivate your attention with their beauty and give you a tranquility that can only be found on this magical island. As soon as you step foot onto the Bali Hai Villas, you will feel as if stress is extinguished from existence and colors will take on a different tone.
space: Decorated in Tropical decor the unit will make you feel like a royal in paradise with your own niceties. Each bedroom comes with a private patio and a living room to relax in after surfing all day. Don't forget about the kitchen and washer and dryer, they will make you want to retire and never leave.  Please note the second bedroom may contain (1) queen or (2) doubles depending on availability.

neighborhood_overview: Golf enthusiasts will admire the ambiance as they tee off from green to green. Families will dazzle in the alluring reefs so do not forget those waterproof cameras! Everyone will be captivated by the vivid greens and blues that are the islands vegetation and surrounding sea so book your trip today and revel in the magic that is the Bali Hai Villas.
notes: Wyndham Bali Hai Villas is not air conditioned. However, there are ceiling fans located in each unit. Guest registration is located in the Clubhouse and is available 24 hours per day.  Wireless Internet is free for up to 4 devices, ideal for emails and basic web browsing. For more streaming and surfing options on unlimited devices, Enhanced High-Speed Wireless Internet is available for $9.95 per day, $49.95 for 6-10 days, and $59.95 for 11-30 days. Handicap & Hearing Impaired units are available if available upon request. All requests cannot be guaranteed but we will do our best to accommodate all guests. Guest names will be book into the reservation 20 days prior to arrival depending on when your order has been received.
transit: From Lihue Airport: Turn right onto N. Kapule Hwy./HI-51 N, which becomes Kuhio Hwy./HI-56. Travel for approximately 28 miles, passing the towns of Kapaa, Anahola and Kilauea. Turn right onto Ka Haku Rd. This is the Princeville entrance. After passing the guard station and the Neptune water feature (approximately .25 mile), take the 4th right at Pepelani Loop. Follow Pepelani Loop to the Bali Hai Villas sign on the right. Turn right into Bali Hai Villas and follow the signs to the clubhouse.

interaction: We strive to make your vacation planning and stay a great experience and give you great customer service. Feel free to email ResortShare with any questions.

summary: Newly furnished three bedroom apartment in the heart of Park Slope, has all the basic amenities to make your stay comfortable. Only 5 minutes from the F & R train and the whole block is surrounded by amazing restaurants, bar scenes, grocery stores and cultural activities.
space: Kitchen is fully equipped with a four burner stove and an oven, refrigerator, coffee maker and microwave.  There is a separate dining area right across the kitchen. Bedroom 1 has a queen size bed with its own personal wardrobe closet. Bedroom 2 has a queen size bed and bedroom 3 has two twin beds.  Both of these two bedroom are connected by a door in between. Control your own heat/AC with a thermostat in the hallway. Portable cribs are provided upon request.

name: Standing 3 rooms flat in Copacabana
summary: Beautiful 160 m2 "bourgeois" apartment with 3 rooms (including a suite), 3 bathrooms, a large dining room, a living room and a large kitchen. Ideally located in the heart of Copacabana, 100 meters from the famous beach. This accommodation is perfect for couples, business travelers, families (with children), large groups and pets.
space: There is a very special atmosphere in this "classic" apartment, whose the facade of the building is a real work of art. Note the presence of the "French alliance" (Alliance Française) in the building.

name: Chic 2BR in The Village by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the colorful decor, fully-equipped kitchen, and en suite laundry facilities. Located in Montreal’s The Village, you’re seconds away from the pedestrian stretch of Ste-Catherine Street and its summer attractions.
space: Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay.
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the colorful decor, fully-equipped kitchen, and en suite laundry facilities. Located in Montreal’s The Village, you’re seconds away from the pedestrian stretch of Ste-Catherine Street and its summer attractions. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay. Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay. The Village is a vibrant hub of culture and LGBTQ history. The Village's main artery, Ste-Catherine Street, becomes pedestrian-only during the summer months between St-Hubert Street and De Lorimer Avenue, where dozens of restaurant and bar patios spill out under the pink plastic bubble strings that canopy the stretch. Take
neighborhood_overview: The Village is a vibrant hub of culture and LGBTQ history. The Village's main artery, Ste-Catherine Street, becomes pedestrian-only during the summer months between St-Hubert Street and De Lorimer Avenue, where dozens of restaurant and bar patios spill out under the pink plastic bubble strings that canopy the stretch. Take a walk North on Amherst to check out the sophisticated French pastry shop De Farine Et D'Eau Fraiche, or enjoy island vibes and rum cocktails at hip Haitian restaurant Agrikol. Don't miss out on karaoke any day of the week at Village mainstay Club Date Piano Bar, a show at famed drag bar Cabaret Mado, or basking in Les Jardins Gamelin park space where there's always something going on to stimulate the senses. Montreal is a diversity-friendly city and a center of LGBT+/ LGBTQIA+ life in Canada. The Village is a lively neighborhood, with delicious eats, lovely boutiques, summer street fairs, and exciting nightlife. The Village is within walking distance to La Fontaine
notes: This Sonder does not have cable, but with our Chromecast enabled television you can easily stream your favorite content or music through a phone, tablet, or laptop. This Sonder is a 3rd floor walk-up with stair access only, and no elevator. This Sonder comes with an HDMI cord so that you can connect your laptop to the TV and log in to your personal streaming accounts, but it does not have cable.
transit: You're right beside the Beaudry metro station, making it easy to travel around Montreal.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

neighborhood_overview: Ipanema is one of the most charming neighbourhoods of the Marvellous City and the Visconde de Pirajá Street is a walkway. The apartment is located between two squares, General Osório where on Sundays has the Hippie Fair, and the Nossa Senhora da Paz with a beautiful garden, several places to seat by the shade of trees, playground and a pond with fish, ducks and turtles.  We are located two blocks away from Ipanema beach - Posto 9, Arpoador Stone, Rodrigo de Freitas lagoon and many other things that can be done by foot. Near nightclubs, shops, supermarkets, excellent restaurants, theater, cinema, drugstores and banks.  In Farme de Amoedo street you can find: - Nectar - Bakery Santa Marta - Delirium Tap House - Yosuki - Koni Store - Beach Juice - Galitos Grill - Route 66 - Cafeína - Balada Mix - Opium - Vezpa - To Nem Aí
notes: Rio de Janeiro is a wonderful city and we can help you with some places to visit, in the city or other cities. In case you need, we can also help you with a pick-up service from the airport.
transit: The location is very convenient to visit the neighborhood or other parts of the city. Tourist Attractions around: - Ipanema Beach - Arpoador Beach - Arpoador Rock - Copacabana Beach - Copacabana Fortress - Twin Brothers - Rodrigo de Freitas Lake - Christ the redeemer - Sugar Loaf - Botanic Garden - Lapa - AquaRIO - Tomorrow’s museum - Santa Teresa and Selaron stair - Hang Glide meeting point There is a bike rental station right in front of the building. So, why not take a night tour by Copacabana beach? Your selfies will be amazing :)
access: We expect that our guests have an amazing experience in our home, with full access to the living room and kitchen. interaction: We are available to provide you tips about the city and the neighborhood, like places to see, to go or to eat. name: Kailua Cottage
summary: Charming attached cottage only 2.5 blocks from world famous Kailua beach. Totally private with own entrance, kitchen, bathroom, bedroom and living area.  TV, WiFi and DVD player also available to make your stay comfortable.  Reserved parking for one car and access to your own private washer and dryer.  Super comfy and very clean. We have beach towels, an umbrella, cooler and a cart to make your trip to the beach enjoyable and even an outdoor shower to rinse off when you return.  Dog on property.
space: Spacious open floor plan with high ceilings accentuated by bright natural lighting and cool tropical breeze. Artistic touches can be found throughout the home. Toddlers and infants welcome, but unfortunately we don't have special accommodations for them.  (Crib, cabinet locks,  etc.)

house_rules: Aloha and welcome to our home, we hope you enjoy your stay.  Here are a few guidelines to your stay: 1.) Please park far forward on the right hand side of the driveway.   2.)Once parked, please walk around the right side of the house to the main doors of the cottage.   3.) It is local custom to please remove shoes before entering the house.   4.) If sandy, please wash feet before entering the house and shake off sand before putting anything in the washer/dryer.    5.) Upon leaving the house please turn off all lights and electrical appliances including AC.   6.) When checking out please: -Take out garbage -Wash dirty dishes -Return the key to the lockbox.

name: 1Great location, calm cozy room w/ backyard-garden
summary: This cozy room in a greatly located apartment will open the doors for you to live in Montreal and experience all it has to offer, while at the same time enjoying a living space you can call home! We can't wait to have you here!
space: Great apartment in downtown Montreal, we have a lovely park right in front of us, which makes it a very quiet area, which is awesome! Also a lovely back yard, with a deck and a garden. The room itself is large with lovely high ceilings, it has a closet and also a wardrobe, a desk and of course a comfy single bed!
description: This cozy room in a greatly located apartment will open the doors for you to live in Montreal and experience all it has to offer, while at the same time enjoying a living space you can call home! We can't wait to have you here! Great apartment in downtown Montreal, we have a lovely park right in front of us, which makes it a very quiet area, which is awesome! Also a lovely back yard, with a deck and a garden. The room itself is large with lovely high ceilings, it has a closet and also a wardrobe, a desk and of course a comfy single bed! You will have access to the kitchen, all the kitchenware and appliances, the back yard, the bathroom (of course) and the washing machine and the dryer. We will give you tips and little tricks to make your trip smooth and easy, I was once new to Montreal so I know somethings that might come in handy! «Centre-Sud» is a fast evolving neighborhood, whit a great diversity, which is pretty much what Montreal is about! There are great little cafés and shops ar
neighborhood_overview: «Centre-Sud» is a fast evolving neighborhood, whit a great diversity, which is pretty much what Montreal is about! There are great little cafés and shops around and fun interesting people all over! We are at walking distance from Parc Lafontaine and if the weather allows and you are good walker then we are at walking distance from a lot of great attractions!
notes: We have a cat.
transit: We are at a 10 minute walk from the Papineau subway station and the same distance from Frontenac. The bus #125 stops just across the street, the bus #45 is at a 5 minute walk and #24 is at a 10 minute walk. Also, we are close from UQAM university, the Grande Bibliothèque of Montreal, the parc of Mont-Royal, the Rue St-Denis and all it's fun and the plateau! There is a pharmacy two blocks away, a grocery shop a couple meters from the house, also right after the park there is the bridge Jacques-Cartier which takes you to the park Jean-Drapeau. The parc Lafontaine is also close to the apartment. There are cafés, baker’s shops, and plenty of restaurants for all tastes.
access: You will have access to the kitchen, all the kitchenware and appliances, the back yard, the bathroom (of course) and the washing machine and the dryer.
interaction: We will give you tips and little tricks to make your trip smooth and easy, I was once new to Montreal so I know somethings that might come in handy!

summary: Apartment in the city center, 1 minute away from the metro station. Here you'll be in walking distance from the essencial places to visit in Porto. The street of the apartment is calm and quiet and the place is totally equiped for a confortable stay.

Acomoda duas pessoas no piso de cima e mais duas no sofá-cama da sala.

Este pagamento é feito ao anfitrião, mas nas reservas efetuadas a partir de 1 de Abril a cobrança começou a ser feita pelo Airbnb.  - As of March 1, 2018 all accommodation must pay the Municipal Tourist Tax. This payment is made to the host, but to reservations made from the 1st of April it is now made to Airbnb. name: Napili Surf Beach Resort -Lokelani- #214 2nd Floor
summary: Aloha, We are open after a very extensive restoration project! We restored, replaced & rebuilt the entire plumbing infrastructure, the roof & gutter system, new photo voltaic system & solar water heaters, kitchen & bath cabinets, counters & showers. Interior & exterior paint & and few other items. All units are equipped with new kitchen appliances. Portable Air Conditioning are in all units in the living room area. We look forward to your visit to enjoy our new and updated look!
space: This 500 square foot Ocean View unit #214 on the second floor of the Lokelani wing provides you a view of the beautiful bay as well as the majestic island of Moloka'i on the horizon. This corner unit is equipped with two lanai's (patio's) allowing natural light to enhance your unit. The unit has a king-size bed and a twin sofa pull out, comfortable to to accommodate up to three persons. An ideal home away from home location!

access: E Komo Mai no ka hale! "Come into our house!" Napili Surf Beach Resort consists of four two-story buildings, which house 53 privately owned condominiums. Each fully-equipped condominium offers the amenities and convenience of a resort, but with all of the comforts of your own home. The resort is nestled on one of Maui's most beautiful beaches, crescent shaped Napili Bay.  We are best known for our spectacular oceanfront setting, breathtaking views, and gracious island ho'okipa (hospitality).  The peaceful, laid-back, unpretentious setting makes for the perfect vacation destination!  Enjoy your stay here, And, if there is anything we can do to enhance your experience, please do not hesitate to ask us at any time. He mea Ho'okipa - "we are at your service!" Beat the Central/ Soho crowds and head just a ten-minute walk west to this perfect little oasis from which you can explore.

description: Our cute and comfortable one bedroom apartment has an actual urban city feel.Located in the Trendy area of Sai Ying Pun, where markets stalls and mechanic shops blend with hipster bars and restaurants. Beat the Central/ Soho crowds and head just a ten-minute walk west to this perfect little oasis from which you can explore. Lovely and quiet modern apartment. Enjoy the sunshine , greenery and bird songs coming from the trees outside the bedroom window . All within walking distance from Central Hong Kong. Easily accessible, with a large amount of public transport available. If coming from the airport express, it's easy to take the MTR to Sai Ying Pun station which offers a flat and easy walk and literally across the street from the apartment block. A small walk up and your in your quiet, sunny open and bright retreat away from the hustle and Bustle of Hong Kong. We're away, so phone and email will be best, but we do have a domestic helper on-hand for local help. Sai Ying Pun is an amazin
neighborhood_overview: Sai Ying Pun is an amazing part of Hong Kong Island. Vibrant yet quiet with interesting street art , hidden cafes, galleries, small boutiques , yoga studios and boutique gyms and excellent new restaurants, you'll struggle to get bored. Craving a sea breeze and open space, just a 5 min walk to the water front to Sun Yat Sen Memorial park , the perfect picnic spot or place to take a stroll along and take in the fresh sea breeze before you find where you can find yourself a relaxing little spot on the green grass under the statue of Mr. Sun Yat Sen himself.
transit: Easy to find, with a myriad of transport options. A perfect Hub from which to see all that Hong Kong has to offer! MTR- Sai Ying Pun, Shueng Wan, Central, Hong Kong are all within easy walking distance. Central and Sai Ying Pun Escalator Various buses and taxi's
access: Easily accessible, with a large amount of public transport available. If coming from the airport express, it's easy to take the MTR to Sai Ying Pun station which offers a flat and easy walk and literally across the street from the apartment block. A small walk up and your in your quiet, sunny open and bright retreat away from the hustle and Bustle of Hong Kong.
interaction: We're away, so phone and email will be best, but we do have a domestic helper on-hand for local help.

name: Achei! Loft  na praia, moderno e equipado.
summary: Loft espaçoso em frente a praia, e a 50 mts da Av. Olegário Maciel, famosa rua da Barra onde estão os restaurantes, farmácias, bancos e vida noturna.  Condomínio Barraleme, com portaria e segurança 24 hs. Decoração  descon-traída, ambiente claro, confortável com linda vista para a Pedra da Gávea e o mar. Está voltado para o sol nascente , com  Internet  Wi-fi , ar condicionado (SPLIT), local de trabalho e garagem. Meu espaço é bom para casais,  viajantes de negócios e casal com  duas crianças.

neighborhood_overview: Um dos pontos mais cobiçados da Barra da Tijuca, próximo a praia, comércio, shoppings, centros comerciais e a linha de metrô da Barra, o Jardim Oceânico é considerado o coração da Barra da Tijuca, concentrando imóveis de alto padrão, em prédios baixos, conservando o clima ameno e vista priveligiada do bairro.

name: Ladder up to your own loft bed
summary: Featured in Brooklyn Magazine, March 2016. Look for "Lofty Living in Williamsburg". Just steps from the best of "The Burg". Grab a great cup of coffee at Freehold. Check out the brand new Apple store & Whole Foods The kitchen is made for cooking in. Unlike many NYC apartments, you will not feel cramped here. This loft boasts amazing high ceilings. It's truly a unique experience. Sleep in a private lofted bed that is completely separate from the main bedroom.
space: Whenever anyone new walks into my home, they are amazed. There is something so wonderful being in a place with such high ceilings and having so much open space to live in. It's a truly unique and wonderful experience while staying in NYC.

neighborhood_overview: There is sooo much to offer in this neighborhood. South Williamsburg is bustling with things to do.  • Smorgasborg on Saturdays just a 5 minute walk up the street • North Brooklyn Farms (a little park and garden) is at the end of my block. It's an awesome place to chill out in, take in the waterfront views, buy some vegetables (they sell them in harvest seasons).  • Too many restaurants to name. Explore!!
notes: There is an exterior camera to monitor the outside of the home. Any attempt at disabling, redirecting or obscuring the cameras is prohibited and will result in full forfeiture of the security deposit and may, at the host’s discretion, result in the guest being evicted without refund of outstanding nights’ rents.
transit: There is a CitiBike station right outside the apartment which is very convenient. The L train and the JMZ trains are a 10-13 minute walk away.
access: The whole first floor is yours to access. The upstairs is private and my bedroom. If you are not renting the whole place out, that means I have not set up the upstairs section for guests.
interaction: If I am home to greet you, I will absolutely do my best to tell you about the neighborhood and walk you through the apartment myself. In the case that I am not there, I will communicate everything you'll need to know to make your stay as great as possible.
house_rules: No loud music or TV after 11:30pm.

You will enjoy convenience and comfort the rest of your vacation with all the available amenities in the home such as Air Conditioning and fans in all rooms including the living room and the kitchen; comfortable couch and bedding, washer/dryer, 48”TV in the living room, wifi, and ample parking. The kitchen is fully equipped with keurig, blender, coffee makers, rice cookers, hot water kettle, baking pans and all other the cooking pots and pans. The Master Bedroom has a 30” TV. You will feel home with the amenities included in the property: iron, ironing board, hairdryer, hair curlers, beach towels, beach chairs, cooler bags.  There’s even a handicap chair for the shower. house_rules: No smoking please. Turn off ac when leaving premises to conserve energy. Wash off sand before entering the home. Please remove shoes. Please do not cut on granite. -Please remember that this is somebody’s home, and not a hotel so please leave the home as you found it.  -Wash and dry dishes, clean stove -Remove all trash from property.  -Check for valuables such as chargers.

name: Mier Serviced Apt 04
summary: Mier is located in the heart of one of Hong Kong's most fascinating districts and traditional prestigious residential area on No. 8 Hospital Road, Mid Levels. Just a 5-minute walk to access Sai Ying Pun MTR (exit C). The 24-storey serviced apartment building with 48 luxurious apartments provide 2 types of studio layout with size 470 sq.ft. Mier guests can indulge in a laidback lifestyle away from hustle and bustle of the city.
space: All of our apartment are studio layout. Apartment size is 470s.f. (gross) / (Website hidden by Airbnb)  我們的公寓是開放式設計｡建築面積為470平方英呎,實用面積為380平方英呎｡
description: Mier is located in the heart of one of Hong Kong's most fascinating districts and traditional prestigious residential area on No. 8 Hospital Road, Mid Levels. (gross) / (Website hidden by Airbnb)  我們的公寓是開放式設計｡建築面積為470平方英呎,實用面積為380平方英呎｡ This is an individual apartment (no need to share with other guests) with bathroom, kitchen, one queen size bed, wardrobe, living room and dining table. We have greenly garden and self-service laundry facilities in G/F (HK$30 per laundry token). 這是一個獨立的公寓(無需與其他客人分享)｡公寓有獨立的洗手間,廚房,一張150cm*200cm的大床,衣櫃,小客廳及餐桌｡地下有小花園及自助式洗衣設備(需要購買洗衣幣) We have family size fridge, microwave, toaster, kettle, hot plate, pots and pan, glasses in kit
notes: 1.Towels, sleeper, toiletries set (Shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, toothbrush and tooth paste) will be provided upon arrival. 入住時我們提供沐浴露,洗髮露及護髮素一套,牙刷和牙膏,毛巾兩套及拖鞋｡ 2.Maid service will be provided on daily basis from Mondays to Fridays (except Sat, Sun and Public Holiday) 我們提供每日(星期一至星期五)房間清潔服務,星期六,星期日及公眾假期除外｡ 3.Towels change three times per week, linen change twice per week (except public holidays). Extra costs will be applied for additional towel/linen change or general cleaning service.  毛巾每星期更換三次,床單每星期更換兩次｡如需額外更換毛巾/床單或清潔服務,我們將收取附加費用｡ 4.Heater is available on requested (first come first serve). 如有需要,可以到前台借用暖爐(先到先得) 5.We have 24 hours self-service laundry facilities in G/F. You could but laundry token (HK$30 per token) from our 24 hours counter. Please prepare your won detergent. Or, weight laundry / dry clean service is available at extra cost.  地下洗衣房有自助式洗衣機及乾衣機｡請先到我們大堂24小時服務台購物洗衣幣(每個港幣三十元)｡請自備洗衣液｡如有需要,你也可使用我們的洗衣服務(額外收費)｡
transit: Our address is No.8 Hospital Road, Mid-levels, Hong Kong.  If you are in downtown, the nearest metro station to Sai Ying Pun MTR Station (Exit C - no need to cross the road). Please turn left (you will see Bonham Road Government Primary School) and then go straight. About 5-8 minutes, you will see a blue and white building (G/F is Wellcome Supermarket) next to a small park. Besides the small park, there are some stairs. Go down the stairs, you will find our entrance with a beautiful garden.  From airport, most of guests take Airport express line to Hong Kong Station (around HK$100) and change taxi to Mier (around HK$40-50), subject to traffic condition. 我們的地址是上環醫院道8號｡ 如果你從市區過來,最近的地鐵站為西營盤地鐵站｡請務必使用C出口(無需過馬路)｡請轉左(你會看見般含道官立小學),然後一直向前走｡大概5-8分鐘路程,你會看到一座藍白色的大廈(地下是頂好超市),旁邊是一個小公園｡公園旁邊有一條小階梯,走下去就是我們的入口｡我們大廈前面有一個小花園｡ 如果你從機場過來,大部分客人會乘坐機場快線到香港站(終點站,車費為大概港幣一百元)然後轉乘的士到Mier｡的士費用大概為港幣40-50元,視乎交通情況｡
access: This is an individual apartment (no need to share with other guests) with bathroom, kitchen, one queen size bed, wardrobe, living room and dining table. We have greenly garden and self-service laundry facilities in G/F (HK$30 per laundry token). 這是一個獨立的公寓(無需與其他客人分享)｡公寓有獨立的洗手間,廚房,一張150cm*200cm的大床,衣櫃,小客廳及餐桌｡地下有小花園及自助式洗衣設備(需要購買洗衣幣) We have family size fridge, microwave, toaster, kettle, hot plate, pots and pan, glasses in kitchen. seasoning is not provided.  廚房有雙層雪櫃,微波爐,多士爐,熱水壺,電磁爐,平底鍋及煲,餐具可供使用｡如有需要,你可自備調味品｡ Our housekeepers wash dishes provided by Mier during routine cleaning. Cleaning detergent is available on request during office hour (i.e. 8am-8pm, Mon-Sat) 進行房間清潔時,我們會清洗Mier提供的煮食用具｡如需要清潔用品,請在辦公時間聯絡我們｡
house_rules: 1)Security deposit of HK$500 (by credit card per-authorization / cash) is required. It will be released between 7-21 working days, depends on your bank (credit card per-authorization) / refund upon departure (cash deposit) , subject to no outstanding payment / missing or damaged inventories.   入住時我們需要收取港幣500元作為按金(可使用現金或visa/master/AE信用卡預授權)｡如客人退房時沒有未付的賬單/損壞或遺失物品,按金(如使用現金)將會馬上退回,而信用卡預授權將會在7-21個工作天內自動取消(視乎個別銀行的速度)｡ 2) We have one queen size bed in each apartment. Our standard package is for 2 guests only. Extra cost of HK$550 per night per additional guest will be applied if you have more than 2 guests stay in the apartment. We accept one child (under 6 years) only (per apartment) stay for free using the existing bed. 我們公寓裡面有一張150cm * 200cm的雙人床｡如果有多於兩位客人入住,我們將會收取每位額外客人每晚港幣550元的附加費｡每間公寓只接受一位六歲以下的兒童免費入住(無需加床)｡ 3) There are 48 apartments in Mier. All of them are in same size and same layout (except some apartments do not have sliding door besides the bed). Photos of different views / layout

name: Quarto das Laranjeiras
summary: O "Quarto das Laranjeiras" fica na Foz Velha, a 100 mts do jardim do Passeio Alegre entre a foz do rio Douro e as praias no Atlântico. O centro da cidade está a 30 mnts em transportes públicos.
space: O acesso dos hóspedes ao quarto é directo do exterior através de um pátio ajardinado.
description: O "Quarto das Laranjeiras" fica na Foz Velha, a 100 mts do jardim do Passeio Alegre entre a foz do rio Douro e as praias no Atlântico. O centro da cidade está a 30 mnts em transportes públicos. O acesso dos hóspedes ao quarto é directo do exterior através de um pátio ajardinado. Durante a estadia a porta que liga o quarto à casa fica fechada pelos dois lados, do quarto pelos hóspedes e da casa por nós. Duas bicicletas poderão ser cedidas durante a estadia por 10€/dia (x2).
notes: Duas bicicletas poderão ser cedidas durante a estadia por 10€/dia (x2).
access: Durante a estadia a porta que liga o quarto à casa fica fechada pelos dois lados, do quarto pelos hóspedes e da casa por nós.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located on Diagonal Avenue, one of the main streets that divides the Gracia district and the Eixample. Since you are not right in the Ramblas area, this zone is much more tranquil and local. The Enrique Granados street that is right by the apartment is a lovely pedestrian street that goes from the Diagonal Avenue until the Gran Via in the city centre and has many notable restaurants, green spaces and children's parks. The Diagonal street itself is home to boutique shops and restaurants as well. There is a giant grocery store across the street from the apartment in the Corte Ingles and you also have easy access to all forms of public transport, bus, tram, metro, and taxi.
notes: Check-in: from 15 p.m. (flexible) Check-out: before 11 a.m. (flexible) Strict no party policy. 300€ refundable security damage deposit  Additional:  Barcelona city tax 2.50€ per person per night (max 7 nights) Late check-in fee of 30€ after 21h and 60€ after midnight. *Tourist License: HUTB-003159

name: Elegant Flat in the Center
summary: A part of a famous Poet Orhan Veli Kanık's poem: I am listening to Istanbul, intent, my eyes closed.  The Grand Bazaar is serene and cool,  A hubbub at the hub of the market,  Mosque yards are brimful of pigeons,  At the docks while hammers bang and clang  I am listening to Istanbul, intent, my eyes closed.  In the heart of Istanbul, and a step back from Bosphorus, our flat is ideal for a guest looking for to visit magical corners to listen epic Istanbul.

name: Quarto amplo, arejado, vista livre e silencioso.
summary: Meu espaço é bom para casais, aventuras individuais e viajantes de negócios. Bicama, criado mudo, armário com cinco portas, puf, mesa, cadeira e cabideiro de parede. 13m², vista livre da rua lateral, arejado, claro, Wi-fi e ar condicionado. Banheiro compartilhado com uma pessoa (água quente), sala de estar/jantar, cozinha, área de serviço e máquina de lavar. É o quarto mais reservado e silencioso do apartamento.
space: Quarto com conforto praticidade e tamanho na medida, para a sua estadia de lazer ou trabalho, em apartamento com cara de casa da gente, situado no oitavo andar de prédio exclusivamente residencial. O quarto possui bicama, que é um conjunto formado por duas camas, uma sobre a outra, conforme aparece na foto. O Rio é uma cidade para se curtir na rua, batendo perna, visitando os points tradicionais e descobrindo outros, aproveitando cada momento intensamente. Depois da badalação, nada melhor do que se recolher em um lugar confortável, agradável e aconchegante. O prédio possui excelente localização, portaria 24 horas, em rua segura, com movimento noturno e que durante o dia oferece as maiores e melhores opções de transportes do bairro: distância de 300 m da estação Botafogo do Metrô, em frente ao ponto de ônibus e com fartura de táxi durante 24hs. Facilidade de deslocamento de Metrô para as melhores praias da Zona Sul (Copacabana e Flamengo 5 minutos), Ipanema e Arpoador (10 minutos) e Bar

neighborhood_overview: Botafogo é o bairro do Rio onde mais tem crescido o número de hotéis, albergues e hostels, devido à sua privilegiada localização e às facilidades de transportes e de deslocamento. Forneço aos hóspedes material descritivo com dicas de locais próximos ao prédio, onde poderão fazer refeições, lanches, se abastecer com compras de todos gêneros de necessidade, incluindo restaurantes, bares, lanchonetes, padarias, supermercados, delicatessen, farmácias e tudo mais.
notes: Pacote mínimo de Natal com três noites, entre 23 até 26/12/2017. Pacote mínimo para Réveillon com três noites, entre 29/12 e 01/01/2018. Pacote mínimo para Carnaval com cinco noites, entre sexta-feira (01/03/19) da semana anterior e quarta feira de cinzas (01/06/19). Cobramos taxa de limpeza de R$70,00 por cada semana de hospedagem.
transit: Recomendo que, durante o dia, os hóspedes utilizem transportes coletivos (metrô e ônibus), bikes ou até mesmo façam passeios a pé, aproveitando as belezas ao ar livre que a cidade oferece. Para saídas noturnas, podemos indicar telefones de empresas de táxi confiáveis.
access: Sala de estar/jantar, cozinha e utensílios, área de serviços, lavadora de roupa e banheiro compartilhado (água quente).
interaction: Disponibilidade para auxiliar no que for preciso. Quero que aproveitem muito bem a permanência na cidade, que se divirtam e que sejam felizes no Rio.
house_rules: Uso do ar condicionado nos quartos somente à noite. Durante o dia, solicitamos que usem os ventiladores. Em respeito à maioria dos clientes e vizinhos, e também para preservar a segurança geral, NÃO aceitamos que os hóspedes: Fumem no interior do apartamento. Tragam animais de estimação. Convidem visitas não autorizadas. Consumam drogas no prédio. Por motivos de segurança e exigência do condomínio, solicito o envio de fotos ou cópias legíveis de documentos (RGI ou Passaporte) dos acompanhantes dos hóspedes, por e-mail ou mensagem telefônica, antes do check in. Agradeço a compreensão. Altíssima temporada: NATAL - ENTRE 23/12 E 25/12 MÍNIMO 2 NOITES RÉVEILLON - ENTRE 29/12 E 01/01 MINIMO 3 NOITES CARNAVAL - ENTRE 01/03 E 06/03 MÍNIMO 5 NOITES

name: Amazing apartment with sea view
summary: The apartment is a place for people to renew their energies for the beautiful and wonderful view of the sea. Ideal for those looking for a comfortable place, it is well located, opposite the Aterro do Flamengo with extensive green area which is one of the most pleasant areas of leisure in the city. The ocean view of Flamengo beach and the Sugar Loaf Montain is breathtaking.
space: Beautiful and well decorated apartment, air conditioning (split), Cable TV, Washing machine, Fridge (full size - not a fridge), Coffee maker, Blender, kitchen utensils (glasses, plates, cutlery, pans), and Internet (Wifi). The bathroom is equipped with electric shower. The double bed and sofa bed, the cabinets with several drawers will help in your comfort and organization.

neighborhood_overview: Flamengo is a bohemian neighborhood of Rio. Full of bars, restaurants of all specialties, banks, parks, museums and cinemas. On weekends streets and squares come alive with live shows. The Flamengo beach is ideal for walking, and you can rent bicycles by the day or by the month at a very affordable price. In addition to nearby supermarkets, two fairs take place on Tuesdays, next to the apartment - one conventional and one organic.
notes: The building has two entrances; when one is open the other is closed. 24 hour concierge.
transit: For those who come by car, there are nearby parking lots in it. Several bus and subway lines pass to the front of the building. Allowing access to other areas of the city, including the downtown and port areas, and the famous Copacabana and Ipanema. The vans leading to Cristo de Corcovado depart from Largo do Machado, 10 minutes walking. Some distances: .Flamengo Beach: 400m .Metrô do Catete: (Website hidden by Airbnb) of the Republic: 550m .Ipanema Beach: 9,7 km .Copacabana Beach: 6,8 km .Sugar Loaf: 4.3 km .Lapa: 2,2 km .Sambódromo: 3.8 km
interaction: I live near the apartment, so access will be easy, for any need that may arise.
house_rules: In the building is not allowed the circulation of people in bathing suits, or shirtless in the common areas of the condominium.

name: Treehouse with Incredible Views
summary: Experience the simple life in this mini house located 1 block from the beach. Enjoy nature the Norfolk pine and Noni trees, Ocean and mountain view from amazing second story Loft. Air Condition, spacious design, kitchenette, Full size loft, two full beds, and a full restroom. Relax in the hammock as you plan your day in this rain forest area of Oahu. The beach and world class hikes also just out your doorstep.  Sleeps 4 comfortably! Detached bath is about twenty steps away.
space: This simple compact space is  unique 220 sq ft two story mini house great for travelers that want to see the real Hawaii. It is also located in a rain forest region. Ocean and mountain views, fan, full size refrigerator, Two full beds, one Futon & couch bed, comfortable clean and convenient. Small kitchen, newly installed cabinets, granite countertop, are modern and stylish. The full restroom is newly built with Hot shower, vanity, and full restroom. This detached restroom is located underneath the deck staircase of the main house. If you desire total peace and quiet in a unique jungle environment This spot is perfect. Free use of surfboards and world class hiking and snorkeling are a step away for outdoor types, and adventurers. Also, artists, and retreat attendees frequently stay here for Windward Retreat Center. It is an outdoor lover's paradise.

summary: My appartment is close to Tri Express, Agave, La Distillerie n°2, Verre Bouteille, l'Oeufrier Mont Royal, Byblos, Le Lab, L'Entre-Pot, Le Bilboquet, Bily Kun, Les Torchés, Taverne Normand, Bleu Caramel, Bagel St-Viateur, l'Entrepôt, La Banquise, and many parks. A lot of storage is at your disposition.

name: New york Multi-unit building
description: Fordham university is a walking distance away, about six blocks. The botanical garden is 17 minutes by public bus and 25 minutes walking If you like to walk. The bronx zoo is about 20 minutes depending on traffic. The D train is right on the corner and the yankee stadium is 6 stops away and about 15 minutes in an uber. Columbus circle is 12 stops away! The subway is right on the corner. The D train and the B. There is also the 4 train 4 blocks away. And public bus number 12 is less than a block away.  The train will take you in about 15 minutes to the yankee stadium. You can also use an uber even though traffic makes it feel farther! Bronx zoo, botanical garden and fordham university very close!!

name: Private Apartment between the ocean and mountains
summary: Newly renovated, open and airy, 900 sq foot, fully private apartment, adjoining our two story home. Open beam ceiling, kitchen, living & dining room open floor plan, and one private bedroom. A private garden lanai to BBQ or watch the skydivers. You will have your own private entrances to the apartment, and beach access at the end of our cul de sac. We are located in Mokuleia, off the beaten path, on the west end of the North Shore of Oʻahu, 15 minute drive to the North Shore and Waimea Bay.

Hawaii State Taxes have already been added to nightly price Applicable taxes include Hawaii G.E.T 9.25% and Hawaii Transient A

Open beam ceiling, kitchen, living & dining room open floor plan, and one private bedroom. A private garden lanai to BBQ or watch the skydivers. You will have your own private entrances to the apartment, and beach access at the end of our cul de sac. We are located in Mokuleia, off the beaten path, on the west end of the North Shore of Oʻahu, 15 minute drive to the North Shore and Waimea Bay. Kitchen: Full Size Refrigerator Keurig coffee machine Traditional coffee maker Blender Microwave Filtered Water Dispenser Two Plate Burner on counter Toaster Toaster Oven Fully equipped with Dishes & cookware Granite Tile Counter Tops Bathroom: Newly tiled shower Fresh towels Shampoo & Soap Bedroom: New Queen Bed High quality linens Portable Air Conditioner Ceiling Fan Closet Dresser Luggage Stand Living Room: Two couches Recliner 48 “ Flat Screen TV with Cable Wifi Dining Room Table & Chairs Ceilin
neighborhood_overview: We live at the entrance to a cul de sac in a  peaceful oceanside residential neighborhood with  private beach access 100 steps from our house, shared only with our neighbors.   Our neighbors are friendly and we all know one another. Our home is along the main road, at the entrance to the cul de sac. There is road noise from cars driving by, something to consider if you are sensitive to neighborhood noises.
notes: Mokuleia is on the more remote end of the North Shore and offers something for everyone:  hiking to Kaʻena Natural Area Reserve home to the native endangered Hawaiian Monk Seal which you can observe (from a distance!), Laysan Albatross, tide pools, rare native coastal plants, and a breathtaking view to the other side of the island at the end of the hike. Kealia Hike offers a switch back ascent, with breath taking views of the entire coastline. Picnic at a Sunday Polo Match during polo season (April 10-Sept 4). The Mokuleia Polo Field is footsteps from the studio. Dillingham Airfield,  1 minute down the road, offers adrenalin junkies skydiving with breath taking views of Mt. Kaʻala and the coast. Or just relax on any of the Mokuleia beaches nearby.
transit: We highly recommend a car as we are 10 minutes from Haleiwa Town the main hub where you will find a variety of restaurants, food trucks, boutiques, art galleries, and a grocery store.  Waialua a smaller community five minutes away, has a local coffee shop, pizzeria, small grocery store with lots of fresh produce, Saturday Farmers' Market at the Old Sugar Mill, and the Waialua Bandstand were you can enjoy a Sunday performance the first Sunday of each month by local and national performers. There is also a post office and gas station. The airport is 45 minutes away.
access: Your will have your own private studio that is attached but separate to our house, there are no shared ceilings/floors. You will have a private lanai, and yard. There is a shared walkway that leads to your own private entrances to the studio. You will have access to the studio through a lock box. We enjoy meeting our guests if the opportunity arises, and I am always available by text.
interaction: My husband and I are both born and raised on Oʻahu's north shore, and love to travel.  We have just sent our last child off to college! While my husband and I live on the property, we both work full time and respect your privacy. We are friendly and available to answer questions, and enjoy meeting new people. We love sharing suggestions for ways to enjoy Oʻahu and the North Shore, and aim to make your stay comfortable and provide the information you need to enjoy your time. We are proud to call this special place home and look forward to sharing it with others.

NÃO HÁ COMPARTILHAMENTO DE ESPAÇO COM OUTROS HÓSPEDES. O apartamento será todo seu! Estou sempre à disposição para auxiliar na solução de problemas comuns dos visitantes à Cidade Maravilhosa. Além disso, no prédio existe staff à disposição 24 horas por dia. Se você quer descobrir o coração do Rio de Janeiro e a alma dos
neighborhood_overview: Se você quer descobrir o coração do Rio de Janeiro e a alma dos cariocas não vai encontrar isso nas praias de Copacabana, Ipanema ou Leblon. Para o verdadeiro sabor da vida noturna e do espírito dos cariocas, há apenas um bairro perfeito para isso: A LAPA. Localizado no centro histórico da cidade do Rio de Janeiro, este local é sinônimo de boemia e alegria. Quase todas as antigas mansões e sobrados, com seu charme arquetetônico inigualável, alguns construídos na década de 1770, foram transformados em bares da moda, casas noturnas super-animadas, nascedouros de novas tendências e artistas e locais frequentados pelos amantes dos vários estilos de samba. Muito frequentada pelos moradores da Zona Sul do Rio e da Barra, o local tem número cada vez maior de visitantes estrangeiros também por conta de seus vários atrativos e pelo fato de ser considerado hoje o local mais seguro do Rio para se transitar à noite, com equipe da Guarda Municipal dedicada à região. A LAPA é o berço do Circo Voador
transit: Tudo é perto. A principais movimentações podem ser feitas a pé. Os principais pontos turísticos da Cidade - fora da Lapa, claro - podem ser acessados facilmente via táxi, ônibus ou metrô e ficam entre 5 minutos a 25 minutos de distância. Tudo simples, fácil e sem complicação.
access: O apartamento estará 100% à disposição dos hóspedes. NÃO HÁ COMPARTILHAMENTO DE ESPAÇO COM OUTROS HÓSPEDES. O apartamento será todo seu!
interaction: Estou sempre à disposição para auxiliar na solução de problemas comuns dos visitantes à Cidade Maravilhosa. Além disso, no prédio existe staff à disposição 24 horas por dia.

name: Estúdio 428 near the beach
summary: The Studio 428 is located in the main residential and commercial area, in the city center and within a 5 minutes walk from the beach. It is an exquisite apartment, located on the ground floor of a building with a unique architecture, wide, with an area of 70m2 and a 30m2 terrace and garden. It has an independent and direct entrance through the 18 street. It has a capacity for 2 adults and two children (sofa bed) and also has a baby crib. Free cable TV and Wi-Fi internet.
space: The Studio 428, is a unique and distinctive space, with a clean interior decoration and a contemporary design, thought and designed for people with taste and refinement. It has a very comfortable, minimalist environment where art, music and books in various languages live together in an open way, in order to provide guests with moments of great beauty, well-being and leisure. It has an entrance hall with a sofa and reading area; a living room furnished with a sofa bed and a large dining area with a fully equipped kitchenette; a bedroom with a work area and a large closet for storage; a bathroom with a shower, a terrace with outdoor furniture and a small garden. Free cable TV and Wi-Fi internet.

neighborhood_overview: The location of the Studio 428 is central in this city that can be visited on foot. It is located near the beach and the salt water pool at 400 m. This is a municipal swimming pool which is open to the public and does not require a reservation. The city of Espinho has some emblematic places that we recommend and which you can visit on foot: the Centro Multimeios of Espinho contains a planetarium, cinema hall and exhibition halls; the Municipal Museum FACE (Forum of Art and Culture of Espinho); the music academy; the Municipal Library; the Town Council; playground; the city park. It has several restaurants of grilled and fresh fish throughout the city where you can experience the typical flavors of Portuguese food.
notes: The cleaning are not included.
transit: It is located within an 8 minutes walk from the train station, where you can catch one of the frequent trains that will take you to Porto in 25 minutes or to Aveiro in 40 minutes. The access to the seafront walkways is a permanent invitation to the experience of walking outdoors and by the sea, taking you, if you´d like, to Porto always by the beach, on foot or by bicycle. The Sá Carneiro International Airport is located at 25 km from the Studio. In the city of Porto, neighboring city, there are some emblematic places that we advise to visit such as: the Ribeira area and its Port wine cellars; The Clérigos Tower; the gardens of the Crystal Palace; the Cathedral of Porto; the House of Music; the Coliseum of Porto; the D. Luís I bridge; the Serralves Museum, among others.
access: All the house.
interaction: The person responsible for this establishment is Inês Lacerda, and will be happy to welcome you, as she is always available to clarify any information or suggestion you need.

name: PALM TREE HOUSE steps to beach
summary: Surrounded by tropical trees and cool island breezes, our bungalow is perfectly situated for your getaway. Walking distance to beautiful, white sandy beaches, near world famous surf breaks, and just minutes to restaurants and shopping in Haleiwa Town. Nearest beach is known for watching Honu (Hawaiian turtle).
space: Waialua is a wonderful beach town! So close to everything, our bungalow is perfect to enjoy all of what North shore has to offer: World famous surf breaks, beautiful white sandy beaches, shopping, restaurants, boutiques and farmers markets. Our Bungalow is a few houses to the beach and Aweoweo Beach Park is perfect for kids. The bungalow is raised and the entire living space is on the second floor with a relaxing outdoor, covered deck with views of Mount Ka'ala. name: Bright,cozy,quiet,walking distance metro,park ...
summary: This cozy, charming and bright apartment is located on the second floor of a duplex in a quiet Montreal neighborhood.
space: The apartment, with a balcony overlooking a quiet yard, is equipped with a fully furnished kitchen, bathroom, 2 bedrooms and living room. Unlimited Wi-Fi is available, a TV with HDMI cable to connect a computer, Chromecast as well as a Bluetooth radio. Also available, a private access to a washer, dryer and steamer. The Verdun metro (located at a 10 minutes walking distance and 2 minutes by bus from the apartment) is a 15 minute ride away from downtown. By car, downtown is a 20 minute  drive.
description: This cozy, charming and bright apartment is located on the second floor of a duplex in a quiet Montreal neighborhood. The apartment, with a balcony overlooking a quiet yard, is equipped with a fully furnished kitchen, bathroom, 2 bedrooms and living room. Unlimited Wi-Fi is available, a TV with HDMI cable to connect a computer, Chromecast as well as a Bluetooth radio. Also available, a private access to a washer, dryer and steamer. The Verdun metro (located at a 10 minutes walking distance and 2 minutes by bus from the apartment) is a 15 minute ride away from downtown. By car, downtown is a 20 minute  drive. Within a short walking distance, you will find markets, pharmacies, banks, restaurants, coffee shops and other services such as the Verdun metro station, bus stops and a bicycle Bixi station. If you like the outdoors, a beautiful riverside park is accessible under five minutes by foot from the apartment with an over 6-kilometre bike path, canoe, kayak and surf courses and rental se
neighborhood_overview: Within a short walking distance, you will find markets, pharmacies, banks, restaurants, coffee shops and other services such as the Verdun metro station, bus stops and a bicycle Bixi station. If you like the outdoors, a beautiful riverside park is accessible under five minutes by foot from the apartment with an over 6-kilometre bike path, canoe, kayak and surf courses and rental services during the summer season.

name: Most enviable location in the West Village
summary: Stay in the West Village's most sought after tree-lined street. Doors up from Carrie's Sex & the City apartment and across the road from the city's chicest restaurants like Extra Virgin and Sant Ambroeus. Also near the Spotted Pig and Little Owl. A classic brownstone building. A walk up on the 4th floor (three flights up). Generous living space. Please note that the bathroom has not been updated for a while and not suited to people seeking modern features. This is old school New York!
space: This is a classic old school, New York West Village Brownstone. It is the BEST location in the city. It has "character," which makes is uber cool and bohemian, but also means: - You need to walk up three flights of stairs - There is no TV - The shower takes 7 to 10 minutes to heat up (but it does) - The kitchen is simple (no dishwasher) If you are patient with the above, you will love the space. It is situated on one of the most sought after corners in the West Village. Yet, very quiet. There is A/C in the bedroom, a FREE laundry in the building and a wardrobe in the bedroom.

neighborhood_overview: This is the most sought after neighborhood in the city. Neighbors include Sarah Jessica Parker, Matthew Broderick, Helena Christensen etc.  The best restaurants: Extra Virgin, Waverly Inn, Cafe Cluny, Spotted Pig, Saint Ambrouse, L'Artusi, the list goes on and on. And yet quiet - there are strict rules in the West Village that keep the noise down at night. Tree lined streets. Close to the Hudson River path - great path for a jog or stroll.
transit: Close to the 1 train (Christopher Street) and West 4th Street Station (BDFM and ACE lines.
access: As of now I plan to sleep in the living room (in a small bed behind the sofa), however a small nook may be constructed in the living room, where I will sleep (but this is still not confirmed). You are welcome to use the living area freely.
interaction: I'm pretty busy - I work full time and am about to start studying, plus I go out fairly often. I'll say hello if we cross paths.

name: Little Slice of Paradise Mauna Lani
summary: Mauna Lani Resort on the Big Island of Hawaii! Activities and Amenities Abound in The Mauna Lani Resort! - Beach, Pool, Spa, Golf, Tennis, Shopping, and Restaurants ... to name a few! "The Fairways at Mauna Lani", is a private gated community of luxury homes on the Kohala Coast located inside the world-renowned Mauna Lani Resort. The Mauna Lani Resort, also home to The Fairmont Orchid and The Mauna Lani Bay Hotels is located 25 minutes north of the Kailua-Kona Airport.
space: The home features two bedrooms and three bathrooms, approximately 1700 square feet of living space, in addition to two Lanai.  Perfect for a small family on vacation or a couple.  The Fairways sports lava rock waterfalls, an outdoor jacuzzi/spa, and a free form pool with an attached kid pool.  The jacuzzi/spa, pool, and air conditioned exercise room are a short walk, providing the perfect blend of convenience and privacy.  Enjoy drinks at the Fairmont's Ocean Bar, while watching the sea turtles come ashore on the white sand beach. The Fairmont Orchid has a fantastic beach, extremely kid friendly and offers many water sports activities for rent/purchase. Two golf courses are available at the Mauna Lani Resort; The South Course, with its signature "over-the-water" 15th green, and The North Course, both designed by Francis H. I'i Brown.  Several additional world-class courses are located 10 to 15 minutes from the home.  At the Waikoloa Resort, you can choose The Beach Course designed by R

transit: A short walk south from the Fairways, leads to the The Shops at Mauna Lani, a unique shopping center featuring art galleries, gift stores, and a well appointed Foodland gourmet grocery store. While at The Shops at Mauna Lani, you may enjoy weekly hula performances, live Hawaiian music, ukulele instruction and lei making classes.  Two fabulous gourmet restaurants are located at the Shops at Mauna Lani; Ruth Chris Steak House and The Tommy Bahama Restaurant and Bar. Have dinner or cocktails while watching the sunset at the Tommy Bahama Restaurant and Bar.

name: King Bdrm w/private bath/ocean view
summary: Beautiful Ocean and Diamond Head view from your bedroom window!  This room offers a comfortable king bed, private ensuite bathroom and free street parking.  Close drive to outdoor activities and trendy restaurants, 15mins from Waikiki, 10 mins to beaches, 20mins from airport, 7mins from Kahala Mall and grocery stores. The room is located on the lower floor of a residential house. Being so high up on a hill you feel like you are living on top of the world with ocean views from every window!
space: This private non-smoking room is located in the lower floor of a 2 storey house, entrance is through our front door and down one flight of stairs in the living room.  The Living room, deck, and kitchen will be shared with myself, husband and young son. We also have a house cat, please do not let her out of the house. 1) Memory Foam King size Bed  2) Flat screen TV comes with over 200 channels 3) Free Wifi 4) Mini Refrigerator with small freezer compartment 5) Private ensuite bathroom with full size tub 6) Own quiet Air Conditioner 7) Ocean, Diamond Head and Wakiki Views from your room window 8) Beach towels 9) Shampoo/Conditioner and body wash  10) Hair dryer 11) Iron and ironing board 12) Laundry detergent 13) Desk in hallway outside room Only things you need to share are the: 1) Kitchen - You are welcome to prepare light meals in our kitchen 2) shared Laundry- is available if needed between 8am-7pm.
description: Beautiful Ocean and Diamond Head view from your bedroom window!  This room offers a comfortable king bed, private ensuite bathroom and free street parking.  Close drive to outdoor activities and trendy restaurants, 15mins from Waikiki, 10 mins to beaches, 20mins from airport, 7mins from Kahala Mall and grocery stores. The room is located on the lower floor of a residential house. Being so high up on a hill you feel like you are living on top of the world with ocean views from every window! This private non-smoking room is located in the lower floor of a 2 storey house, entrance is through our front door and down one flight of stairs in the living room.  The Living room, deck, and kitchen will be shared with myself, husband and young son. We also have a house cat, please do not let her out of the house. 1) Memory Foam King size Bed  2) Flat screen TV comes with over 200 channels 3) Free Wifi 4) Mini Refrigerator with small freezer compartment 5) Private ensuite bathroom with full size t
neighborhood_overview: Maualani Heights / Kaimuki area has majestic ocean views and breezy trade winds, a very quiet and safe neighbourhood. We have a list of our favourite neighbourhood restaurants we can share!  This area offers a great variety of local restaurants and supermarkets, very close to all amenities, beaches, Waikiki, downtown and shopping. It is approximately 20mins by car on HWY1 or a $15-25 Uber/ Lyft fare to Airport. There is also a bus Route 14 a couple minutes walk from our house that will take you to Kahala mall, Kahala Beach park, Waikiki, The Honolulu Zoo and Aquarium.  The bus is slow, and not very frequent, we highly recommend renting a car to the make best use of your time. There is free street parking in front of our house on the opposite side of the street.
notes: No smoking in or around the premises  Kindly take shoes off when entering the house One cat living in the common areas  Your private room is on the lower floor of our 2 storey house. One flight of stairs needed to go down to your room. Entrance to use is the front door of the house. We have the “August Smart Lock” system for our front door for easy access, please have your "August Home App" set up prior to arrival so the electronic keys can be issued to your smart phone.  This system only requires Bluetooth from your smartphone to operate, wifi is not needed after initial setup.
transit: CAR: HIGHLY RECOMMEND! We have free street parking on the opposite side of the street to our house.  Easiest way to get around is renting a car as you can see the island at your own leisure. PUBLIC BUS: The Bus stop is 2 minutes walk down hill from our house with route #14 taking you to Kahala mall (Whole Foods, Times Supermarket, Longs Drugs, restaurants etc.) Waikiki, Honolulu Zoo, Aquarium, numerous restaurants and Supermarkets, are along that route.  The bus comes every 45min-1hr and may take 30mins or more to Waikiki. TOUR BUSES: are available for pickup and drop off in Waikiki if you want to explore highlights of the island.  The ones we recommend are “Aloha Bus, Waikiki Trolley, Honolulu Hop on Hop off  Trolley, Jalpak Trolley”. If you go to their website you can purchase day passes in advance. WALKING: NOT RECOMMENDED! We are located 3/4 up a large hill so walking up or down the hill is very strenuous.
access: Our kitchen is free for you to use if you would like to prepare light meals. You are more than welcome to sit and eat in the kitchen, the balcony on the top floor or sit in the back yard and enjoy the fruit trees.
interaction: We will be home if you need anything, as my husband works from his home office and I am in and out of the house or you can email or text us and I will respond.
house_rules: - Please be respectful of house furnishings and profanities used in shared common areas. - Turn off all lights, fan and air conditioner, close and lock windows, when leaving your room for the day. - Take off outdoor shoes while you are in the house - No smoking, no drugs, no loud music in or near the house. - Laundry is available between 8-7pm, after using washer, please leave door open. - Please do not eat or leave open food in your room as this leads to unwanted insects.  You may eat in our kitchen or lanai. - checkin time is between 2pm-11pm - checkout time is before 11am

neighborhood_overview: Ville-Marie is the name of a borough (arrondissement) in the centre of the city of Montreal, Quebec. The borough is named after Fort Ville-Marie, the French settlement that would later become Montreal (now Old Montreal), which was located within the present-day borough.  This location is a popular attraction for both tourists and locals alike. North of De Maisonneuve Boulevard, one can find many luxury boutiques and art galleries in a Victorian architectural setting. To the south of de Maisonneuve the concentration of nightclubs, bars and restaurants makes this Montreal's most well-known nightlife strips.
notes: - The parking spots can be arranged in the same building with $30/night. (Please note that the Garage Entrance has a max height clearance of 182 cm /  6’ feet.) Note that the clearance for the garage is 6 feet. This is fine for SUV but not one with ski rack on top. - The storage your luggage before check-in or after checkout  can be arranged in the same building (the other unit) with only $1/hour for each piece. - Extra cleaning for the duration of your stay can be arranged with $39 for each time (the apartment will be clean as clean as check-in day)
transit: - Guy-Concordia metro station located within 1 minutes walking from my apartment  Multiple buses and Metro stations on each corner. Night buses on the corner. - The Montreal Museum of Fine Art located within 2 minutes walking  - Concordia university located within 1 minute walking - McGill university located within 10 minutes walking  - Bell Centre located within 15 minutes walking  - The Old Montreal located within 40 minutes walking  - The Places des Art located within 15 minutes walking  - Mount Royal park located within 15 minutes walking  - The Crescent street (night life of Montreal) located in 3 minutes walking  - Hundreds restaurants, bars, cafes, clubs located in a few apartments walking

name: Country Oasis Pa'ala Kai
summary: The property is quintessential North Shore country living, gated property with quiet sunsets and quiet mornings. Little to no street light pollution makes the night sky stand out. Trade winds cool the property and close proximity to the beach and Haleiwa town, make this an Ideal getaway with convince close at hand. The property has 7 mango trees, 6 large coconut palms, a large banana patch, small citrus orchard, small (but deep) tilapia pond and a small farm animal pen. 30 Day lease option.
space: The gated property is 1.5 acres. New, clean and modern, excellent views and cross breezes and fans make the space very comfortable in both the winter and summer months.

name: Gorgeous Ocean Front Home w/ Salt Water Pool

For those  traveling as a couple or solo, consider booking the main house or guest house separately.
