summary:
Poipu Peaceful Garden Retreat With Pool & Jacuzzi *Kahala 913*
Please Note: 14.42% Hawaii Transient Accommodation Tax is included in the rates provided.
space: Enjoy the beauty of Kauai by day, and rest and relax by night in this one bedroom one bath condo at the Kahala development of the famous Poipu Kai Resort. This unit offers the amenities needed to make a vacation comfortable - washer/dryer, a kitchen equipped with a full-size refrigerator, range/oven, dishwasher, and microwave. Everything you need to cook a meal, mix a mai tai, or bake cookies if you feel like it can be found in the kitchen. The lanai is a great place to sit and read or enjoy a cup of morning coffee while taking in the sunrise. Poipu Kai Resort is conveniently close to the top destinations in Poipu - like Poipu Beach, Shipwrecks Beach, the Spouting Horn, National Tropical Botanical Garden, a beautiful coastline that can be viewed from a horse's back, and various local stores and restaurants. neighborhood_overview: Times Square/Theatre District is the heart of New York City. This unceasingly energetic area is a year-round hotspot for the throngs of visitors flocking to its flagship stores, only-on-Broadway productions, and iconic television studios. As one of NYC’s most frenetic neighborhoods, Times Square/Theatre District exemplifies "bright lights, big city" like nowhere else.
transit: Located just steps from great shopping in the Theatre District, restaurants including Blue Ribbon and Baked by Melissa. Conveniently located around the corner from the M11 and M50 bus lines and close to several subway lines, including the C, E, and 1 trains.

name: Hab. individual en Barcelona / Single room in Bcn
summary: Somos dos chicas jóvenes con una habitación libre, dispuestas a acoger a  aventureros, turistas, viajeros de negocios... En definitiva a alguien que busque un alojamiento acogedor y bien ubicado para pasar un fin de semana o una semana completa en Barcelona. Lugares de interés: Plaça d'Espanya, Fira de Barcelona, Sants Estació, Av. Paral·lel, Plaça de Sants, Montjuic.
space: Nuestro piso es acogedor, soleado y está muy bien comunicado. Línea de metro L1 y L5  a menos de 10 minutos, así como estación de autobuses, tren y AVE. Por la zona podrás encontrar diferentes supermercados. Además, cerca de la zona podrás encontrar vida nocturna.
description: Somos dos chicas jóvenes con una habitación libre, dispuestas a acoger a  aventureros, turistas, viajeros de negocios... Lugares de interés: Plaça d'Espanya, Fira de Barcelona, Sants Estació, Av. Paral·lel, Plaça de Sants, Montjuic. Nuestro piso es acogedor, soleado y está muy bien comunicado. Línea de metro L1 y L5  a menos de 10 minutos, así como estación de autobuses, tren y AVE. Por la zona podrás encontrar diferentes supermercados. Además, cerca de la zona podrás encontrar vida nocturna. Los huéspedes tendrán acceso a la cocina, así como a los utensilios de esta. Sal, aceite y azúcar estarán incluidos. Sí en la medida de lo posible ya que las dos anfitriones trabajamos 8 horas diarias pero el resto del día estaremos encantadas de atenderte para explicarte más detalladamente todas las dudas que tengas acerca del piso así como dudas de la ciudad.
neighborhood_overview: Es un barrio muy tranquilo en el que encontrarás supermercados, bares y tiendas. Nos encontramos cerca de Plaza Huesca, l'Eixample, Plaza España, Poble Sec.
notes: Cuando quieras acomodarte en nuestro salón, deberás convivir con nuestra mascota, un pequeño conejo llamado Coffi. No obstante, no tienes porque preocuparte por él puesto que es muy independiente y a la vez, sociable.
transit: Estamos cerca de todos los tipos de transporte público. La L1 y L5 de metro la encontrarás a 5-10 minutos del apartamento, así como diferentes líneas de autobús que te llevarán al centro de la ciudad. También nos encontramos cerca de la Estación de trenes de Sants, que te llevará directo al Aeropuerto.
access: Los huéspedes tendrán acceso a la cocina, así como a los utensilios de esta. Sal, aceite y azúcar estarán incluidos.
interaction: Sí en la medida de lo posible ya que las dos anfitriones trabajamos 8 horas diarias pero el resto del día estaremos encantadas de atenderte para explicarte más detalladamente todas las dudas que tengas acerca del piso así como dudas de la ciudad. Cuando estemos en el piso, estaremos encantadas de conocerte un poco más y hacer de tu estancia lo más agradable y acogedora posible.

summary: Double bedroom in charming 3 bedroom Victorian terrace set in a leafy street only a few minutes walk to Redfern station.  Right next door to the ever-popular and fashionable Surry Hills. Filled with creatives. Less than 3kms from the CBD.  Close to trendy bars and cafes.  One stop away by train from Central station. Added - we have a washing machine and air con in the lounge room

I will be staying in one of the rooms, but can happily give it up if someone wants to hire the whole place. HOUSE: The house features a seamless flow throughout - separate living and dining area with a gas stove and oven. There are 3 bedrooms (1 x master bedroom with balcony, 2 x double sized rooms), combined internal bathroom (toilet and shower), and courtyard with external W/C. All bedlinen is provided. If you need a clothing rail, and/or curtains, I will organise to put these in the room/s - please request this. I will do what I can to make your stay as comfortable as possible. If you need anything else, please let me know and I'll see if I can meet your needs. E

neighborhood_overview: LOCATION: Suburbs close by - Surry Hills, Chippendale, Alexandria, Newtown, CBD, Central, Eveleigh, Waterloo, Moore Park, Darlington.  Redfern is an inner-city suburb of Sydney. Once decidedly bohemian, Redfern is in the later stages of gentrification. Situated alongside the ever-popular and fashionable Surry Hills, and just moments from the CBD, Redfern is a perfectly positioned city base.  Conveniently located close to Sydney’s CBD (Redfern station is just one stop way from Central station by train) together with a well-serviced bus network, Redfern is primed for getting around. Also in close proximity to the airport. Redfern residents are thoroughly enjoying its revival. There is a mix of young professionals, young families and mature locals enjoying the convenient lifestyle. There is a hip and creative vibe in the area. With a mix of warehouse conversions, Victorian terrace houses and new apartment buildings, it’s a vibrant and eclectic mix of architecture. People can be found enjo
transit: Closest train station - Redfern Station. Next stop is Central Station, which is central to all trains and a central part of the city. There are buses that go into the city also and can be found close by. These run regularly. My favourite places to go for brunch are – Bean and Berry, Baffi and Mo’s, Three Williams, Henry Lee’s, Brickfields. Great food, coffee and service. My favourite bars are – The Dock, Arcadia Liquors, The Bearded Tit, Cake Wines Lovely places to go for dinner – Pitt Street Diner, The Continental. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, location, the people, and the ambiance. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, families (with kids), and big groups.
access: Their room, lounge room, kitchen, bathrooms, courtyard.
interaction: Certainly be able to help with anything you need. Please let me know and I'll do the best I can to answer your questions or point you in the right direction. Ask away! I am very sociable and will be happy to stay and have a chat or if you would like your privacy, I'll also respect that.
house_rules: No shoes in the house.

name: Private Room in Renovated Library w/ Swimming Pool
summary: A double room in a unique villa located on top of Tibidabo, with a lovely garden, an amazing swimming pool and spectacular views over the city. Perfect for those who want to be in a relaxed environment, enjoy the privacy and intimacy and still be 20min from the center of Barcelona.
space: What makes this space special is the combination of culture, history and nature. The room is located in a natural park, with spectacular views into the valley.
description: A double room in a unique villa located on top of Tibidabo, with a lovely garden, an amazing swimming pool and spectacular views over the city. Perfect for those who want to be in a relaxed environment, enjoy the privacy and intimacy and still be 20min from the center of Barcelona. What makes this space special is the combination of culture, history and nature. The room is located in a natural park, with spectacular views into the valley. The main building housing the old library is where we live. The room referenced in the listing is an independent unit. This room, together with the garden and swimming tool is to be enjoyed by our guests. Having said that, we invite all guest to have breakfast in the main building every morning and love to love to invite guests to use and visit the old library. We are Øyvin from Norway and Martha from Colombia. Since 2000 we have been living in this old library on the roof of Barcelona, which we have and are still renovating. We are travelers, and lov
neighborhood_overview: The setting of the house is what really sets it apart. It is located in the heart of the Natural Park of Collserola that rises up over Barcelona’s Metropolitan Area. This well-preserved, 8,000-hectare natural area is a paradise for hikers, bikers and nature lovers. The house offers amazing views to both sides of the mountain: to the east you are greeted with a fully-fledged panoramic view of the city. From the garden, you have view of the valley, and on clear days you will see the mountain of Montserrat. Vallvidrera village is only less than 1 km away, and it is a lovely walk if you are in need of some basic groceries or if you want to enjoy a beer in the sunny plaza. The village has one convenient store and a bigger supermarket. In the mornings it is an experience in itself to walk to the village and buy fresh bread at the local bakery. The house is also only a 5-minute walk away from one of Barcelona’s main family attractions, the amusement park of TIbidabo. In addition the house is
notes: 1) We have a young, energetic but very beautiful and good german shepherd called Black. 2) We sometimes host events such as small concerts and events 3) The kitchen is not available for guests' use
transit: When going to the city, it will only take you 25 minutes to get to the center (Plaza Catalunya) using public transportation (Bus del barri + funicular + metro). The whole trip is paid with the same ticket (T10) and it is truly an experience in itself. If you opt for taking a taxi, it will only cost around 15€. There is parking area in our garden. From Barcelona city: LÍNEAS FGC: SABADELL - TERRASSA: Do not enter the first 3/4 wagons (since the doors do not open at Peu de Funicular where you have to get off). Alternatively, take Funicular of Tibidabo (plaça Dr. Andreu) or Tibibus T-2 (Plaça Catalunya) until Plaça del Tibidabo and walk down (3 minutes) -note that this only applies when the amusement park of Tibidabo is open. Once you have done this one or two times you will find it extremely easy and convenient!
access: The main building housing the old library is where we live. The room referenced in the listing is an independent unit. This room, together with the garden and swimming tool is to be enjoyed by our guests. Having said that, we invite all guest to have breakfast in the main building every morning and love to love to invite guests to use and visit the old library.
interaction: We are Øyvin from Norway and Martha from Colombia. Since 2000 we have been living in this old library on the roof of Barcelona, which we have and are still renovating. We are travelers, and love discovering new places by land. We went around the world with our own Toyota Land Cruiser for about 5 years ago with our 4 kids ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) Now that our kids are all studying or working abroad, we want to open our house to meet travelers like us, that want to experience the local life in a distinct neighborhood of Barcelona, and share their experiences with us.

name: The Destination Loft Downtown Montreal #203
summary: In the heart of Downtown Montreal, nestled in the Shaughnessy Village, this studio is close to everything, half a block away from the famous St-Catherine Street, minutes from public transportation, universities, and museums. This Studio is great for anyone seeking short or long term accommodations. We also offer Weekly, Monthly, and Yearly rates for students studying in the City Center. My place is good for students, couples, adventurers, business travellers, families, and big groups.
space: Beautifully decorated, recently renovated this studio apartment will give you the liberty and the chance to live as a local in the city you are exploring. Fully equipped private kitchen and bathroom, dining area, Smart 40'' flat screen TV, Free Wi-fi and much much more...

Beautifully decorated, recently renovated this studio apartment will give you the liberty and the chance to live as a local in the city you are exploring. Fully equipped private kitchen and bathroom, dining area, Smart 40'' flat screen TV, Free Wi-fi and much much more... The building is equipped with state of the art security, the common space doors are with a unique access codes that are given to each guest upon booking confirmation, and an encrypted virtual e-key that is dispatched the day of check-in.
neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood is the most densely populated area of Quebec, with stately Victorian grey-stone row houses and beaux-arts styled apartment blocks at the edges of the neighborhood. It is a primarily institutional neighborhood, with a university, junior college, seminary, hospital and architecture museum among many private schools, colleges and technical schools at its core.
notes: We will always make sure to check in and check out our guest. With our 24hr checkin service you can be sure that you will always have someone checking you in at any given time. We are always here for any inquiries and we make sure that each and every guest has my number as well to reach out at anytime. Upon arrival or before, you will need to fill out an online pre-check-in form that will be sent to our guest services or front desk manager, so that he can prepare your arrival and everything else that is necessary for your stay. Looking forward to having you as our guest at Destination Stays
transit: The neighborhood is served by two Montreal Metro Green line stations. Guy-Concordia station in the east and Atwater station to the west. Georges Vanier station on the Orange line is just south of Shaughnessy Village in nearby Little Burgundy. The area is also well-served by numerous bus lines terminating at Atwater Station that connect Westmount, Cote-des-Neiges and much of the rest of the urban core. The Claire-Morissette bike path on De Maisonneuve Boulevard cuts through the centre of the neighborhood and the area is well served by Bixi stations.
